scn testCryoSubjectSCRIPT
ref myRef
BEGIN ONHIT
IF ( getAV variable07 == 1 ) setActorsAI 1 set myRef to getSelf kill myRef 1 kill myRef 2 kill myRef 3 kill myRef 4 kill myRef 5 kill myRef 6 kill myRef 7 kill myRef 8 kill myRef 9 kill myRef 10 ENDIF
END

scn testCryoTriggerSCRIPT
ref enteringRef
BEGIN ONTRIGGERENTER
set enteringRef to getActionRef enteringRef.setActorsAI 0 enteringRef.setAV variable07 1 disable
END

scn spaceWalkSCRIPT
float timer
BEGIN ONTRIGGERENTER PLAYER player.addspell MirklurkWaterBreathing set timer to 4 END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
IF ( timer > 0 ) set timer to timer - getSecondsPassed ELSE player.playSound DLC05SpaceWalkTestSound set timer to 4 ENDIF
END

scn DLC05MZ2QuestScript
short MZ2SomahMove ;1= Somah has been moved to the engineering core short MZ2Unfrozen ;1= The stasis has been turned off (for dialogue) short MZ2SallyTalked ;1= Player got updated objective from Sally after opening Stasis short MZ2Follow ;1= An NPC is now in the Player's "group" (for dialogue) short MZ2PaulsonFollow ;1= Toggles Paulson's package follow short MZ2TercorienFollow ;1= Toggles Tercorien's package follow short MZ2SomahFollow ;1= Toggles Somah's package follow short MZ2Generator ;x= Number of Generators disabled (3 to complete) short MZ2FirstGenerator ;1= 1 Generator is down short MZ2SecondGenerator ;1= 2 Generators are down short MZ2ThirdGenerator ;1= 3 Generators are down short MZ2SomahTrigger ;1= Named NPC has been brought into "wrong" section of ship (kick off package) short MZ2TercorienTrigger ;1= Named NPC has been brought into "wrong" section of ship (kick off package) short MZ2PaulsonTrigger ;1= Named NPC has been brought into "wrong" section of ship (kick off package) short MZ2CryoGet ;1= Tercorien has finished the Cryo Labs with Player and has Cryo materials short MZ2QuestDone ;1= Player has entered upper level of vessel short MZ2SamuraiTalk ;1= Player attempted to communicate with the Samurai NPC (for dialogue) short MZ2EndFollows ;1= End all activate follows after third generator and in Engine Core short MZ2CryoBoom ;1= Cryo Generator is done short MZ2AsmBoom ;1= Robot Assembly Generator is done short MZ2HQBoom ;1= Hangar Generator is done short MZ2SallyStash ;1= Sally gives player extra items short MZ2SamuraiGone ;1= Samurai has been removed from Engineering Core short MZ2PaulsonBG ;1= Paulson has told the player his backstory short MZ2SomahBG ;1= Somah has told the player her backstory short MZ2GoVent ;1= Sally heads to the vent in the Engine Core to unlock all the "mini-dungeon" doors
begin gamemode
;Pop Somah into the Engineering Core at the beginning of this quest
if ( MZ2SomahMove == 0 ) if ( DLC05SomahRef.GetDead == 0 ) DLC05SomahRef.Moveto DLC05MZ2SomahStartMarker DLC05SomahRef.Additem CondShotgunCombatNPC 1 DLC05SomahRef.Additem AmmoShotgunShell 100 DLC05SomahREF.EVP set MZ2SomahMove to 1 endif endif
;This array of 3 blocks handles finding the generators in each of the "sub-levels" off of the engine core ;As each one is disabled, we count how many generators are down. They can of course be done in any order
if ( MZ2FirstGenerator == 0 ) if ( MZ2Generator == 1 ) Set MZ2FirstGenerator to 1 if ( DLC05CryoQ.CryoGenDestroyed == 1 ) && ( MZ2CryoBoom == 0 ) SetObjectiveCompleted DLC05MZ2 30 1 Set MZ2CryoBoom to 1 elseif ( GetStageDone DLC05HQ 255 == 1 ) && ( MZ2HQBoom == 0 ) SetObjectiveCompleted DLC05MZ2 40 1 Set MZ2HQBoom to 1 elseif ( GetStageDone DLC05Asm 255 == 1 ) && ( MZ2AsmBoom == 0 ) SetObjectiveCompleted DLC05MZ2 50 1 Set MZ2AsmBoom to 1 endif endif endif
if ( MZ2SecondGenerator == 0 ) if ( MZ2Generator == 2 ) Set MZ2SecondGenerator to 1 if ( DLC05CryoQ.CryoGenDestroyed == 1 ) && ( MZ2CryoBoom == 0 ) SetObjectiveCompleted DLC05MZ2 30 1 Set MZ2CryoBoom to 1 elseif ( GetStageDone DLC05HQ 255 == 1 ) && ( MZ2HQBoom == 0 ) SetObjectiveCompleted DLC05MZ2 40 1 Set MZ2HQBoom to 1 elseif ( GetStageDone DLC05Asm 255 == 1 ) && ( MZ2AsmBoom == 0 ) SetObjectiveCompleted DLC05MZ2 50 1 Set MZ2AsmBoom to 1 endif endif endif
if ( MZ2ThirdGenerator == 0 ) if ( MZ2Generator >= 3 ) Set MZ2ThirdGenerator to 1 if ( DLC05CryoQ.CryoGenDestroyed == 1 ) && ( MZ2CryoBoom == 0 ) SetObjectiveCompleted DLC05MZ2 30 1 SetObjectiveCompleted DLC05MZ2 35 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed DLC05MZ2 60 1 Set MZ2CryoBoom to 1 elseif ( GetStageDone DLC05HQ 255 == 1 ) && ( MZ2HQBoom == 0 ) SetObjectiveCompleted DLC05MZ2 40 1 SetObjectiveCompleted DLC05MZ2 35 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed DLC05MZ2 60 1 Set MZ2HQBoom to 1 elseif ( GetStageDone DLC05Asm 255 == 1 ) && ( MZ2AsmBoom == 0 ) SetObjectiveCompleted DLC05MZ2 50 1 SetObjectiveCompleted DLC05MZ2 35 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed DLC05MZ2 60 1 Set MZ2AsmBoom to 1 endif endif endif
if ( MZ2EndFollows == 0 ) if ( MZ2ThirdGenerator == 1 ) if ( Player.GetInCell DLC05EngineCore == 1 ) set DLC05MZ2.MZ2Follow to 0 set DLC05MZ2.MZ2SomahFollow to 0 set DLC05MZ2.MZ2TercorienFollow to 0 set DLC05MZ2.MZ2PaulsonFollow to 0 DLC05PaulsonRef.Evp DLC05SomahRef.Evp DLC05TercorienRef.Evp set MZ2EndFollows to 1 endif endif endif
;This block checks if the Player has entered the top tier of the ship to do handoff for Quest 3
if ( MZ2QuestDone == 0 ) if ( Player.GetInCell DLC05Exlab01 == 1 ) SetStage DLC05MZ2 200 Set MZ2QuestDone to 1 endif endif
end

ScriptName DLC05MZ1QuestScript
;handling for DLC05MZ1
short DLC05MessageRan short DLC05Abducted
short DLC05MZ1ClawFlag ;flag used to track whether claw has gone past, used in dialogue and anim scripting
short DLC05MZ1Fight ;flag set to 1 when player agrees to fight Somah short DLC05MZ1Attack ;flag set if player didn't agree to fight Somah but started fight on his own short DLC05MZ1FightOb ;incremented to update objective as fight progresses
short DLC05MZ1GeneratorConv ;incremented as we step through lines about the generator
short DLC05MZ1AbductionImod ;incremented as we run imagespace mods during abduction short DLC05MZ1AbductionHappy ;incrimented as happy place objects are swapped
short DLC05MZ1SomahFree ;flag set when the alien guards are down and the cell is free short DLC05MZ1SomahName ;flag set if player bothers to ask Somah about herself
short DLC05MZ1SallyDoor ;flag set when Sally goes to open the door short DLC05MZ1SallyCoreUpdate ;flag set when player or Sally hits trigger in engine core cell, used for package update
short DLC05MS16Check
short frameWait
float DLC05MZ1ClawTimer ;timer used to control dialogue/packages for claw animation float DLC05MessageTimer float DLC05AbductionTimer float DLC05MZ1SallyDoorTimer float RadioTimer
ref fxRef
short init ;"Do Once" setting up various book keeping tasks that need to be done when the DLC first runs
Begin GameMode
;====INIT===== ;add various things to form lists, etc.
if init == 0 ;RockitLauncherAmmo: addFormToFormlist RockItLauncherAmmo DLC05AlienCrystalLarge addFormToFormlist RockItLauncherAmmo DLC05AlienCrystalSmall addFormToFormlist RockItLauncherAmmo DLC05ButtercupToy
addFormToFormList RepairCombatArmor DLC05ArmorCombatMedic addFormToFormList RepairCombatArmorHelmet DLC05ArmorCombatHelmet
set init to 1 endif
;============
;---------Radio Beacon----------------
if DLC05AlienRadioBeaconRef.GetDisabled == 0 if Radiotimer > 0 set Radiotimer to Radiotimer - GetSecondsPassed else DLC05AlienRadioBeaconREF.startRadioConversation set Radiotimer to 7 endif endif
; if Enclave Radio ref has been enabled, it means the player is out of the vault, which means it's time to run the message box
if ( DLC05MessageRan == 0 ) if ( RadioEnclaveRef.GetDisabled == 0 )
Set DLC05MessageRan to 1 set DLC05MessageTimer to 60 elseif ( GetStage MQ09 >= 60 ) Set DLC05MessageRan to 1 Set DLC05MessageTimer to 60 endif elseif ( DLC05MessageRan == 1 ) if ( DLC05MessageTimer <= 0 ) AlienRadioBeaconREF.Disable ShowMessage DLC05StartMessage SetStage DLC05MZ1 10 Set DLC05MessageRan to 2 else set DLC05MessageTimer to ( DLC05MessageTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif
endif
;beam the player up to the ship the first time he goes near Recon Craft Theta after loading DLC
if ( DLC05Abducted == 0 ) ;Freeze player and add effects if ( Player.GetDistance AlienRadioBeaconREF < 1000 ) if (frameWait == 0 )
imod DLC05BeamUpISFX
DisablePlayerControls 1 1 1 1 1 1 1
if ( MS16Vault101ExternalRadioREF.GetDisabled == 0 ) Set DLC05MS16Check to 1 endif
;While we're here, set any followers to Waiting
if ( JerichoRef.HasBeenHired == 1 ) set JerichoRef.Waiting to 1 set Followers.FollowerWaitingLeaveDay to ( GameDaysPassed + FollowerWaitTime ) endif if ( CharonRef.HasBeenHired == 1 ) set CharonRef.Waiting to 1 set Followers.FollowerWaitingLeaveDay to ( GameDaysPassed + FollowerWaitTime ) endif if ( DogmeatRef.HasBeenHired == 1 ) set DogmeatRef.Waiting to 1 set Followers.FollowerWaitingLeaveDay to ( GameDaysPassed + FollowerWaitTime ) endif if ( ButchRef.HasBeenHired == 1 ) set ButchRef.Waiting to 1 set Followers.FollowerWaitingLeaveDay to ( GameDaysPassed + FollowerWaitTime ) endif if ( CloverRef.HasBeenHired == 1 ) set CloverRef.Waiting to 1 set Followers.FollowerWaitingLeaveDay to ( GameDaysPassed + FollowerWaitTime ) endif if ( RL3Ref.HasBeenHired == 1 ) set RL3Ref.Waiting to 1 set Followers.FollowerWaitingLeaveDay to ( GameDaysPassed + FollowerWaitTime ) endif if ( MQ08FawkesRef.HasBeenHired == 1 ) set MQ08FawkesRef.Waiting to 1 set Followers.FollowerWaitingLeaveDay to ( GameDaysPassed + FollowerWaitTime ) endif if ( StarPaladinCrossRef.HasBeenHired == 1 ) set StarPaladinCrossRef.Waiting to 1 set Followers.FollowerWaitingLeaveDay to ( GameDaysPassed + FollowerWaitTime ) endif
;specifically remove any unarmed weapons so they don't interfere with animation
Player.UnequipItem WeapPowerFist 0 1 Player.UnequipItem WeapUniquePowerFist 0 1 Player.UnequipItem WeapUniqueShocker 0 1 Player.UnequipItem WeapDeathclawGauntlet 0 1 Player.UnequipItem WeapSpikedKnuckles 0 1 Player.UnequipItem WeapUniqueJundersBrassKnuckles 0 1 Player.UnequipItem WeapUniqueLoveTap 0 1 Player.UnequipItem WeapBrassKnuckles 0 1
;place fx and start the animation sequence
set fxRef to player.PlaceAtMe DLC05FXBeamMeUp 1, 0, 0 ;Mark's FX stuff----------------------------------------------- fxRef.setAngle z 0 fxRef.setAngle y 0 fxRef.setAngle x 0 DLC05RadDisableMarker.Disable set frameWait to 1
imod DLC05AbductionISFX ;Mark's FX stuff-----------------------------------------------
elseif (frameWait < 10 ) ;Mark's FX stuff----------------------------------------------- set frameWait to ( frameWait + 1)
elseif (frameWait == 10 ) ;Mark's FX stuff----------------------------------------------- fxRef.moveTo player player.pms DLC05BeamUpFXShader fxRef.pms DLC05BeamUpFXShader fxRef.playgroup forward 1 set frameWait to 11 elseif ( frameWait > 10 && frameWait < 40 ) set frameWait to ( frameWait + 1) fxRef.moveTo player elseif (frameWait == 40 ) Set DLC05Abducted to 1 endif
endif elseif ( DLC05Abducted == 1 ) if ( fxRef.isAnimPlaying == 0) Player.addscriptpackage dlc05playerabductionpackage set dlc05abductiontimer to 27 set DLC05Abducted to 2
fxRef.playgroup backward 1
else set DLC05AbductionTimer to ( DLC05AbductionTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif elseif ( DLC05Abducted == 2 ) if ( DLC05AbductionTimer <= 5 ) if ( DLC05MZ1AbductionImod == 0 ) set DLC05MZ1AbductionImod to 1
endif endif
if ( DLC05AbductionTimer <= 0 ) Player.sms DLC05BeamUpFXShader Player.RemoveScriptPackage DLC05PlayerAbductionPackage
;disable wasteland radio stations for the duration of the player's stay onboard
if ( RadioGalaxyNewsRef01.GetDisabled == 0 ) RadioGalaxyNewsRef01.Disable endif if ( RadioGalaxyNewsRef02.GetDisabled == 0 ) RadioGalaxyNewsRef02.Disable endif if ( MS16Vault101ExternalRadioREF.GetDisabled == 0 ) MS16Vault101ExternalRadioREF.Disable endif RadioEnclaveRef.Disable if ( MS17RadioRef.GetDisabled == 0 ) MS17RadioRef.Disable endif
PipBoyRadioOff SetNoActivationSound QSTDLC05ProbeStruggle Player.Moveto DLC05PlayerStartMarker fxRef.disable 1 ;clean up beam up stuff----------------------------------------------------- rimod DLC05AbductionISFX ;Mark's FX stuff------------------------------------------------------- imod DLC05FadeInButtProbeISFX ;Mark's FX stuff----------------------------------------------- imod DLC05AlienBlurISFX ;Mark's FX stuff----------------------------------------------- DLC05MZ1AnimationAlien1REF.EVP DLC05MZ1AnimationAlien2REF.EVP DLC05MZ1AnimationAlien3REF.EVP Player.RemoveAllItems DLC05PlayerContainerREF 1 set DLC05Abducted to 3 set DLC05AbductionTimer to 1
else set DLC05AbductionTimer to ( DLC05AbductionTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif
elseif ( DLC05Abducted == 3 ) if ( Player.GetDistance DLC05PlayerStartMarker < 50 ) if ( Player.HasLoaded3D == 1 ) if ( DLC05AbductionTimer <= 0 ) set DLC05Abducted to 4 set DLC05AbductionTimer to 56 else set DLC05AbductionTimer to ( DLC05AbductionTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif endif endif
;run all the animations here
elseif ( DLC05Abducted == 4 ) DLC05MZ1AnimationAlien1REF.Moveto DLC05MZ1Alien1StartMarker
DLC05MZ1AnimationAlien2REF.Moveto DLC05MZ1Alien2StartMarker
DLC05MZ1AnimationAlien3REF.Moveto DLC05MZ1Alien3StartMarker
Set DLC05Abducted to 5
elseif ( DLC05Abducted == 5 ) DLC05MZ1AnimationAlien1REF.EVP DLC05MZ1AnimationAlien2REF.EVP DLC05MZ1AnimationAlien3REF.EVP DLC05MZ1TortureDeviceREF.Playgroup forward 1 Player.addscriptpackage DLC05Playeranimationscenepackage set DLC05Abducted to 6 elseif ( DLC05Abducted == 6 ) if ( DLC05AbductionTimer <= 24 ) if ( DLC05MZ1AbductionImod == 1 ) fxRef.markForDelete ;clean up beam up stuff---------------------------------------------------------- imod DLC05FadeOutButtProbeISFX ;Mark's fx ------------------------------------------------------- set DLC05MZ1AbductionImod to 2 endif endif if ( DLC05AbductionTimer <= 12 ) ;Mark's FX stuff----------------------------------------------- if ( DLC05MZ1AbductionHappy == 0 ) ;------- ;This was the spot where the birthday stuff would pop up I left the surrounding code here for placing the pain sfx ;-------- set DLC05MZ1AbductionHappy to 1 endif endif ;Mark's FX stuff-----------------------------------------------
if ( DLC05AbductionTimer <= 0 ) Player.removescriptpackage DLC05Playeranimationscenepackage ClearNoActivationSound Player.Moveto DLC05PlayerHoldingCellMarker ; EnablePlayerControls rimod DLC05AlienBlurISFX ;Mark's FX stuff----------------------------------------------- imod FadeInFromWhiteISFX ;Mark's FX stuff----------------------------------------------- DLC05SomahRef.SayTo Player DLC05MZ1SomahInitGreet set DLC05Abducted to -1 else set DLC05AbductionTimer to ( DLC05AbductionTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif endif
;TEMP
;Run a timer while the claw is animating ;DLC05MZ1ClawFlag is set in Somah's dialogue
if ( DLC05MZ1ClawFlag == 1 ) set DLC05MZ1ClawTimer to 20 set DLC05MZ1ClawFlag to 2 elseif ( DLC05MZ1ClawFlag == 2 ) if ( DLC05MZ1ClawTimer <= 0 ) Set DLC05MZ1ClawFlag to -1 else set DLC05MZ1ClawTimer to ( DLC05MZ1ClawTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif endif
;update quest for sequence with Somah and the guards
if ( DLC05MZ1Fight == 1 ) if ( DLC05MZ1Attack == 0 ) if ( DLC05MZ1FightOb == 0 ) SetObjectiveCompleted DLC05MZ1 10 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed DLC05MZ1 25 1 set DLC05MZ1FightOB to 1 endif endif if ( DLC05MZ1AlienGuardRef1.GetDistance DLC05MZ1AlienGuard1Marker < 50 ) if ( DLC05SomahRef.GetDead == 0 ) DLC05ClawNPCRef.Disable DLC05MZ1AlienGuardRef1.SayTo Player DLC05MZ1AlienGuardLine set DLC05MZ1Fight to 2 else set DLC05MZ1Fight to 3 endif endif elseif ( DLC05MZ1Fight == 3 ) DLC05PlayerHoldingCellActivatorREF.Activate Player set DLC05PlayerHoldingCellActivatorREF.State to 1 DLC05PlayerHoldingCellActivatorREF.Playgroup forward 1 DLC05MZ1AlienGuardRef1.SetAV Aggression 2 DLC05MZ1AlienGuardRef2.SetAV Aggression 2
set DLC05MZ1Fight to 4 elseif ( DLC05MZ1Fight == 4 ) if ( DLC05SomahRef.GetDead == 0 ) DLC05SomahREF.StopCombat DLC05SomahRef.SetFactionRank DLC05NPCFollowerFaction 0
DLC05SomahRef.SayTo Player DLC05MZ1SomahAttackGuard endif if ( DLC05MZ1FightOb < 2 ) SetObjectiveCompleted DLC05MZ1 10 1 SetObjectiveCompleted DLC05MZ1 20 1 SetObjectiveCompleted DLC05MZ1 25 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed DLC05MZ1 27 1 Set DLC05MZ1FightOb to 2 endif set DLC05MZ1Fight to 5 elseif ( DLC05MZ1Fight == 6 ) if ( DLC05MZ1AlienGuardRef1.GetDead == 1 ) if ( DLC05MZ1AlienGuardRef2.GetDead == 1 )
Set DLC05MZ1Fight to -1 SetObjectiveCompleted DLC05MZ1 27 1 if ( DLC05SomahRef.GetDead == 0 ) DLC05SomahRef.SayTo Player DLC05MZ1SomahPostFight else SetStage DLC05MZ1 30 endif endif endif endif
if ( GetStage DLC05MZ1 == 30 ) if ( DLC05MZ1AlienHCMelee2.GetDead == 1 ) if ( DLC05MZ1AlienHCMelee1.GetDead == 1 ) SetStage DLC05MZ1 35 endif endif endif
;move Sally to marker outside door and open it
if ( DLC05MZ1SallyDoor == 1 ) if ( DLC05SomahRef.GetDead == 0 ) DLC05SomahRef.SayTo Player DLC05MZ1SomahWaitForSally endif set DLC05MZ1SallyDoor to 2 DLC05SallyREF.EVP set DLC05MZ1SallyDoorTimer to 10.5 elseif ( DLC05MZ1SallyDoor == 2 ) if ( DLC05SallyRef.GetSitting == 2 ) if ( DLC05MZ1SallyDoorTimer <= 0 ) if ( DLC05SomahRef.GetDead == 0 ) && ( DLC05SomahRef.GetDistance DLC05MZ1SallyDoorMarker <= 800 ) DLC05SomahRef.SayTo Player DLC05MZ1SomahWaitForSally endif DLC05SallyRef.Moveto DLC05MZ1SallyDoorMoveMarker set DLC05MZ1SallyDoorTimer to 10 set DLC05MZ1SallyDoor to 3 DLC05SallyRef.EVP else set DLC05MZ1SallyDoorTimer to ( DLC05MZ1SallyDoorTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif endif elseif ( DLC05MZ1SallyDoor == 3 ) if ( DLC05MZ1SallyDoorTimer >= 0 ) set DLC05MZ1SallyDoorTimer to ( DLC05MZ1SallyDoorTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) else set DLC05MZ1SallyDoor to 4 DLC05MZ1HoldingCellIntDoorREF.Unlock DLC05MZ1HoldingCellIntDoorREF.Activate DLC05SallyREF
endif endif
End

scn DLC05TeleporterDoorSCRIPT
float teleportTimer short startTeleport
short teleStage1 short teleStage2 short teleStage3
short charging float chargeTimer
ref user
BEGIN ONACTIVATE
IF ( charging == 0 )
;// the charge timer set charging to 1 set chargeTimer to 5
;// teleport timers set teleportTimer to 1.5 set startTeleport to 1
set user to getActionRef
IF ( user == player ) imod DLC05FadeToWhiteAndBackISFX ENDIF
ELSEIF ( charging == 1 && isActionRef player == 1 ) showMessage DLC05TeleporterChargingMSG
ENDIF
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;// the teleportation IF ( startTeleport == 1 )
IF ( teleportTimer > 0 ) set teleportTimer to teleportTimer - getSecondsPassed
IF ( teleStage1 == 0 && teleportTimer < 1.4 ) user.pms effectAtomization set teleStage1 to 1
ENDIF
IF ( teleStage2 == 0 && teleportTimer < 0.75 ) activate set teleStage2 to 1 ENDIF
IF ( teleStage3 == 0 && teleportTimer < 0.1 ) user.pms effectAtomization set teleStage3 to 1 ENDIF
ELSE set startTeleport to 0 user.sms effectAtomization set teleStage1 to 0 set teleStage2 to 0 set teleStage3 to 0 ENDIF ENDIF
;// the charging IF ( charging == 1 ) IF ( chargeTimer > 0 ) set chargeTimer to chargeTimer - getSecondsPassed
ELSE set charging to 0
ENDIF
ENDIF
END

ESP.ORIGINAL:
ScriptName DLC05WeapRechargeStationScript
;GLOBAL constant: DLC05RechargeStationCoolDownTime -- seconds of cool down before recharge station becomes available again
short coolingDown float timerCoolDown
ref mySelf ref pistolLocRef ;reference to triggerbox where pistol should be placed ref rifleLocRef ;reference to triggerbox where pistol should be placed
;coordinates for "place at me" offset for repaired weapons
Begin OnLoad
;init variables set mySelf to getSelf set pistolLocRef to myself.getLinkedRef set rifleLocRef to pistolLocRef.getLinkedRef
End
Begin GameMode if coolingDown == 1 if timerCoolDown > 0 set timerCoolDown to timerCoolDown - getSecondsPassed else showwarning "Weapon Recharge Ready Sound Effect here." set coolingDown to 0 endif endif End
Begin OnActivate
if IsActionRef player == 1 if coolingDown == 0 set DLC05AlienTechFunctions.repairStationRef to mySelf set DLC05AlienTechFunctions.repairPistolLocRef to pistolLocRef set DLC05AlienTechFunctions.repairRifleLocRef to rifleLocRef
setstage DLC05AlienTechFunctions 100 ;remove all the alien weapons from player's inventory, give him one of each version taken away, fully repaired set timerCoolDown to DLC05RechargeStationCoolDownTime set coolingDown to 1
else ;cooling down showwarning "Weapon Recharge Failure Sound Effect here." showMessage DLC05WeapRechargeStationCooldownMessage endif endif
End

scn DLC05CryoTrapSCRIPT
short onLoad short trapOn ref myLink short timerStage float timer
Begin GameMode
if (onLoad == 0) set myLink to getLinkedRef set timerStage to 1 set onLoad to 1 endif
if (myLink.GetDisabled == 0) && (trapOn == 0) set timer to 1 set timerStage to 1 set trapOn to 1 endif
if (trapOn == 1)
if (timerStage == 1) if (timer < 0) PlaceAtMe DLC05CryoTrapExplosion set timer to 1 set timerStage to 2 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
if (timerStage == 2) if (timer < 0) PlaceAtMe DLC05CryoTrapExplosion set timer to 1 set timerStage to 3 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
if (timerStage == 3) if (timer < 0) PlaceAtMe DLC05CryoTrapExplosion set timer to 1 set timerStage to 4 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
if (timerStage == 4) if (timer < 0) PlaceAtMe DLC05CryoTrapExplosion set timer to .25 set timerStage to 5 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
if (timerStage == 5) if (timer < 0) set trapOn to 0 myLink.Disable set timer to 1 set timerStage to 6 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
endif
End

scn DLC05CryoKnockoutSCRIPT
ref mySelf
Begin ScriptEffectStart set mySelf to GetSelf
mySelf.PushActorAway mySelf 1
End

scn DLC05AlienControllerSCRIPT
;// menu vars short menuSelect short button
;// turret variables ref linkedTurret short turretAttached
;// overload timer vars float overloadTimer short overloadSeq
;// the science skill needed float skillLevel
BEGIN ONLOAD
set linkedTurret to getLinkedRef set overloadTimer to 0 set overloadSeq to 0
;// get the attached turret to see which menu we throw out IF ( linkedTurret.getIsCreatureType 6 == 1 && linkedTurret.getDead == 0) set turretAttached to 1
ELSE set turretAttached to 0
ENDIF
set skillLevel to 50.0
END
BEGIN ONACTIVATE PLAYER
;////////// ;// check to see if the player's science is high enough ;////////// if overloadSeq < 1 ;if they overload it, don't let the player activate again IF ( player.getAV science >= 50 )
;// check to see which message to use (turret or no turret) and start the menu poll IF ( turretAttached == 0 || linkedTurret.getDead == 1) showMessage DLC05trapAlienCommMSG set menuSelect to 1
ELSEIF ( turretAttached == 1) showMessage DLC05trapAlienCommTurretMSG set menuSelect to 1
ENDIF ELSE showMessage DLC05InteractLowSkillScienceMsg skillLevel ENDIF endif END
begin onTrigger
if overloadSeq > 1
do 500
endif
end
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;//////////// ;// check for the player's menu input ;//////////// IF ( menuSelect == 1 ) set button to getButtonPressed
IF ( button > - 1 ) set menuSelect to 0
;// if theyre overloading the terminal IF ( button == 1 ) set overloadSeq to 1 set overloadTimer to 5
;// if theyre overloading the turret and it's still alive ELSEIF ( button == 2) IF ( linkedTurret.getDead == 0 )
;// get the turret, kill it and update the variable set linkedTurret to getLinkedRef linkedTurret.setAV health 1 linkedTurret.placeatme grenadePlasmaExplosion 1 set turretAttached to 0
ENDIF ENDIF ENDIF ENDIF
;//////////// ;// if the player decides to overload ;//////////// IF ( overloadSeq == 1 ) IF ( overloadTimer > 0 ) set overloadTimer to overloadTimer - getSecondsPassed
ELSE
;// swap the mine and the terminal ;placeAtMe dlc05AlienControllerMine 1 ;disable set overloadSeq to 2
ENDIF ENDIF
END
BEGIN ONDEATH
;// if the player manually kills the controller, frenzy the turret linkedTurret.damageAV braincondition 100
END

scn DLC05WeapAlienScript
short healthPercentEmpty ;at what percent of the weapon's health does the gun no longer function short healthPercentWarn ;at what percent of the weapon's health do we pop a warning message
;short ammoCheck ;0 = unset, 1 = checked to see if player had ammo, if so did nothing, if not added ammo
short equiped ;0 = i'm not equiped, 1 = i'm equipped
short warned ;0 = unset, 1 = warning about charge given
Begin OnEquip Player set healthPercentWarn to 30 ;initialize this "constant"
set equiped to 1 End
Begin OnUnEquip Player set equiped to 0
End
Begin GameMode
if equiped == 1 if warned == 0 if player.getWeaponHealthPerc <= healthPercentWarn set warned to 1 showMessage DLC05WeapAlienWarningMessage endif
elseif warned == 1 if player.getWeaponHealthPerc > healthPercentWarn set warned to 0
endif endif endif
End

scn DLC05AlienSwitchEnableREFSCRIPT ; Enables linked ref on activate, and can't be reactivated unless the linked ref is disabled again.
short doOnceA short doOnceB short isDisabled short onLoad ref myLink ref mySelf
Begin onActivate
if (doOnceA == 0) && (doOnceB == 0) && (myLink.GetDisabled == 1)
if (mySelf == DLC05SwitchCellsToSteamREF) PlaySound OBJVaultGearConsoleUnlock endif
playgroup Forward 1 Activate myLink.enable set doOnceA to 1 set doOnceB to 1 endif
End
Begin GameMode
if (onLoad == 0) set myLink to getLinkedRef set mySelf to GetSelf playgroup specialidle 1 set onLoad to 1 endif
if (doOnceA == 1) && (IsAnimPlaying Forward == 0) playgroup backward 1 set doOnceA to 2 endif
if (doOnceB == 1) if (myLink.GetDisabled == 1) playgroup SpecialIdle 1 set doOnceA to 0 set doOnceB to 0 set isDisabled to 0 endif endif
if (isDisabled == 0) && (myLink.GetDisabled == 0) && (doOnceB == 0) playgroup backward 1 set isDisabled to 1 endif
if (isDisabled == 1) && (myLink.GetDisabled == 1) && (doOnceB == 0) playgroup specialidle 1 set isDisabled to 0 endif
End

ScriptName DLC05ParalysisSCRIPT
Begin ScriptEffectStart ; SMS DLC05ThawGrenade if (isSpellTarget DLC05ParalyzeOnce == 0) PMS DLC05ThawGrenade cios DLC05ParalyzeOnce endif End
Begin ScriptEffectFinish SMS DLC05ThawGrenade End

scn DLC05CryoLabDeathclawTrigSCRIPT
short onLoad short seqInit short doOnceA ref myLink short stage float timer
short loadTimerInit short loadTimerStage float loadTimer
Begin GameMode
if (onLoad == 0) set myLink to getLinkedRef set timer to 6 set stage to 1
if (myLink == DLC05CryoSuperMutantEnabler01REF) DLC05CryoLabSuperMutant02REF.SetUnconscious 1 DLC05CryoLabSuperMutant03REF.SetUnconscious 1 ; DLC05CryoLabSuperMutant02REF.pms DLC05Frozen ;Mark's FX ------------------------------------ ; DLC05CryoLabSuperMutant03REF.pms DLC05Frozen ;Mark's FX ------------------------------------ else DLC05CryoLabSuperMutant01REF.SetUnconscious 1 DLC05CryoLabSuperMutant04REF.SetUnconscious 1 ; DLC05CryoLabSuperMutant01REF.pms DLC05Frozen ;Mark's FX ------------------------------------ ; DLC05CryoLabSuperMutant04REF.pms DLC05Frozen ;Mark's FX ------------------------------------ endif
set loadTimer to 1 set loadTimerStage to 1 set loadTimerInit to 1 set onLoad to 1 endif
if (myLink.GetDisabled == 0) && (seqInit == 0) set seqInit to 1 endif
if (loadTimerInit == 1)
if (loadTimerStage == 1) if (loadTimer < 0)
if (myLink == DLC05CryoSuperMutantEnabler01REF) DLC05CryoLabSuperMutant01REF.MoveTo DLC05CryoLabSuperMutant01MrkREF DLC05CryoLabSuperMutant03REF.MoveTo DLC05CryoLabSuperMutant03MrkREF DLC05CryoLabSuperMutant01REF.SetActorsAI 0 DLC05CryoLabSuperMutant03REF.SetActorsAI 0 else DLC05CryoLabSuperMutant02REF.MoveTo DLC05CryoLabSuperMutant02MrkREF DLC05CryoLabSuperMutant04REF.MoveTo DLC05CryoLabSuperMutant04MrkREF DLC05CryoLabSuperMutant02REF.SetActorsAI 0 DLC05CryoLabSuperMutant04REF.SetActorsAI 0 endif
set loadTimerStage to 2 set LoadTimerInit to 2 else set loadTimer to (loadTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
endif
if (doOnceA == 0) if (seqInit == 1)
if (stage == 1) if (timer < 0) ;DLC05CryoLabDeathclawPod01AFTER.Enable 0 ;DLC05CryoLabDeathclawPod02AFTER.Enable 0 ;DLC05CryoLabDeathclawPod01BEFORE.Disable 0 ;DLC05CryoLabDeathclawPod02BEFORE.Disable 0 ;DLC05CryoLabDeathclaw01REF.Enable ;DLC05CryoLabDeathclaw02REF.Enable
if (myLink == DLC05CryoSuperMutantEnabler01REF) DLC05CryoLabSuperMutant02REF.SetActorsAI 1 DLC05CryoLabSuperMutant03REF.SetActorsAI 1 DLC05CryoLabSuperMutant02REF.SetUnconscious 0 DLC05CryoLabSuperMutant03REF.SetUnconscious 0 DLC05CryoSMPod01REF.PlayGroup Forward 1 DLC05CryoSMPod03REF.PlayGroup Forward 1 DLC05CryoLabSuperMutant02REF.pms DLC05ThawSlowSM ;Mark's FX ------------------------------------ ;DLC05CryoLabSuperMutant02REF.sms DLC05Frozen ;Mark's FX ------------------------------------ DLC05CryoLabSuperMutant03REF.pms DLC05ThawSlowSM ;Mark's FX ------------------------------------ ;DLC05CryoLabSuperMutant03REF.sms DLC05Frozen ;Mark's FX ------------------------------------ else DLC05CryoLabSuperMutant01REF.SetActorsAI 1 DLC05CryoLabSuperMutant04REF.SetActorsAI 1 DLC05CryoLabSuperMutant01REF.SetUnconscious 0 DLC05CryoLabSuperMutant04REF.SetUnconscious 0 DLC05CryoSMPod02REF.PlayGroup Forward 1 DLC05CryoSMPod04REF.PlayGroup Forward 1 DLC05CryoLabSuperMutant01REF.pms DLC05ThawSlowSM ;Mark's FX ------------------------------------ ;DLC05CryoLabSuperMutant01REF.sms DLC05Frozen ;Mark's FX ------------------------------------ DLC05CryoLabSuperMutant04REF.pms DLC05ThawSlowSM ;Mark's FX ------------------------------------ ;DLC05CryoLabSuperMutant04REF.sms DLC05Frozen ;Mark's FX ------------------------------------ endif
set doOnceA to 1 set stage to 2 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
endif endif
End

end

scn DLC05NPCPaulsonScript
short gunSwapped ;see OnActivate block below
;// portInEffects short portIn short portFX short SetupOnce float portFXTimer
;This is temp to represent the NPC in freezing state int init
begin OnLoad ; if init == 0 && getInCell DLC05Bridge != 1 ; SetUnconscious 1 ; set init to 1 ; endif
end
;This handles giving him a playable version of his gun for the player to loot Begin OnActivate
if gunSwapped == 0 if getDead == 1 if IsActionRef player == 1 additemHealthPercent DLC05weapPaulsonsRevolver 1 .45 removeitem DLC05weapPaulsonsRevolverNonPlayable 9999
set GunSwapped to 1
endif endif endif
activate
End
Begin SayToDone DLC05MZ3ExLabSceneLines
if ( DLC05MZ3ExLabSCeneTriggerRef.SceneStep == 4 ) Set DLC05MZ3ExLabSceneTriggerRef.SceneStep to 5 DLC05SallyRef.SayTo Player DLC05MZ3ExLabSceneLines endif
End
;///////////////////////////////////// ;// GAMEMODE BLOCK ;///////////////////////////////////// BEGIN GAMEMODE
; if ( SetupOnce == 0 ) ; MoveTo DLC05PaulsonFreezeMarker ; Set SetupOnce to 1 ; endif
;// the teleport in effects IF ( portFX >= 1 ) IF ( portFXTimer > 0 ) set portFXTimer to portFXTimer - getSecondsPassed
IF ( portFX == 1 && portFXTimer <= 1.3 ) set portFX to 2 saa 1 ENDIF
ELSE setUnconscious 0 sms DLC05teleportInFXShader set portFX to -1
ENDIF ENDIF
END
begin OnDeath

if ( DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3ViewscreenSpeechStep == -4 ) if ( GetStage DLC05MZ3 < 20 ) set DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3ViewscreenSpeechStep to -5 endif endif
end

scn DLC05NPCSamuraiScript
short SetupOnce short Init
ref talkerRef ;used to control who's talking in the bridge scene float openDoorTimer ;used when Sally "opens" the door in the samurai bridge scene
;begin OnLoad ; ; if ( Init == 0 ) ; SetUnconscious 1 ; Set Init to 1 ; endif ; ;end
;begin gamemode ; ; if ( SetupOnce == 0 ) ; MoveTo DLC05SamuraiFreezeMarker ; Set SetupOnce to 1 ; endif ; ;end
Begin GameMode ;BRIDGE SCENE
If DLC05SamuraiScenes.bridgeSceneRunning == 1
;Run scene If DLC05SamuraiScenes.talking == 0
if DLC05SamuraiScenes.stage == 1 set talkerRef to DLC05SamuraiRef endif
if DLC05SamuraiScenes.stage == 2 set talkerRef to DLC05SallyRef endif
if DLC05SamuraiScenes.stage == 3 if DLC05PaulsonRef.getDead == 0 set talkerRef to DLC05PaulsonRef else set DLC05SamuraiScenes.stage to 4 endif endif
if DLC05SamuraiScenes.stage == 4 if DLC05SomahRef.getDead == 0 set talkerRef to DLC05SomahRef else set DLC05SamuraiScenes.stage to 5 endif endif
if DLC05SamuraiScenes.stage == 5 set talkerRef to DLC05SamuraiRef endif
if DLC05SamuraiScenes.stage == 6 set talkerRef to DLC05SallyRef endif
if DLC05SamuraiScenes.stage == 7 set talkerRef to DLC05SamuraiRef endif
if DLC05SamuraiScenes.stage == 8 set talkerRef to DLC05SallyRef endif
if DLC05SamuraiScenes.stage == 9 if DLC05PaulsonRef.getDead == 0 set talkerRef to DLC05PaulsonRef else set DLC05SamuraiScenes.stage to 12 endif endif
if DLC05SamuraiScenes.stage == 10 set talkerRef to DLC05SallyRef endif
if DLC05SamuraiScenes.stage == 11 if DLC05PaulsonRef.getDead == 0 set talkerRef to DLC05PaulsonRef else set DLC05SamuraiScenes.stage to 12 endif endif
if DLC05SamuraiScenes.stage == 12 && DLC05SamuraiScenes.openDoor == 0 set openDoorTimer to 5 set DLC05SamuraiScenes.openDoor to 1
endif
if DLC05SamuraiScenes.stage == 13 && DLC05SamuraiScenes.SallyToMarker == 0 set DLC05SamuraiScenes.SallyToMarker to 1 ;This is cleared in her package when she arrives endif
if DLC05SamuraiScenes.stage == 13 set talkerRef to DLC05SallyRef endif
if DLC05SamuraiScenes.stage == 14 set talkerRef to DLC05SamuraiRef endif
if DLC05SamuraiScenes.stage >= 15 ;scene done setstage DLC05SamuraiScenes 55 ;stop scene endif
if DLC05SamuraiScenes.openDoor == 1 if openDoorTimer > 0 set openDoorTimer to openDoorTimer - getSecondsPassed else
set DLC05SamuraiScenes.openDoor to 2 ;used by door script to open itself set DLC05SamuraiScenes.stage to 13 endif
elseif DLC05SamuraiScenes.SallyToMarker != 1 set DLC05SamuraiScenes.talking to 1 talkerRef.say DLC05SamuraiScenesBridgeTopic set DLC05SamuraiScenes.stage to DLC05SamuraiScenes.stage + 1 endif
endif endif
End
Begin OnDeath
if DLC05SamuraiScenes.bridgeSceneRunning == 1 setstage DLC05SamuraiScenes 55 ;stop scene endif
End

scn DLC05NPCTercorienScript
;This is temp to represent the NPC in freezing state
int init short hitBySquad short SetupOnce
;// portInEffects short portIn short portFX float portFXTimer
;------------------------------------------------------------ ;Control Elliots reaction to his squad ;------------------------------------------------------------
;Don't attack them unless they attack you first ;BEGIN OnStartCombat DLC05CryoBecketREF ; if (hitBySquad == 0) ; StopCombat ; endif ;END ; ;BEGIN OnStartCombat DLC05CryoDanielREF ; if (hitBySquad == 0) ; StopCombat ; endif ;END
BEGIN OnHit DLC05CryoBecketREF if (hitBySquad == 0) DLC05TercorienRef.Setav Confidence 4 DLC05TercorienRef.Setav Assistance 2 set DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF.runFromSquad to 0 EVP set hitBySquad to 1 endif set DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF.runFromSquad to 0 END
BEGIN OnHit DLC05CryoDanielREF if (hitBySquad == 0) DLC05TercorienRef.Setav Confidence 4 DLC05TercorienRef.Setav Assistance 2 set DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF.runFromSquad to 0 EVP set hitBySquad to 1 endif END
BEGIN SayToDone DLC05CryoElliotSpeak
if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotTalkStage == 60) set DLC05CryoQ.elliotTalkStage to 65 endif
if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotTalkStage == 55) set DLC05CryoQ.elliotTalkStage to 60 endif
if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotTalkStage == 50) set DLC05CryoQ.elliotTalkStage to 55 endif
if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotTalkStage == 45) set DLC05MZ2.MZ2TercorienFollow to 1 DLC05TercorienRef.EVP set DLC05CryoQ.elliotTalkStage to 50 DLC05TercorienRef.EquipItem WeapChineseAssaultRifle DLC05TercorienRef.SayTo Player DLC05CryoElliotSpeak 0 0 endif
if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotTalkStage == 40) set DLC05CryoQ.elliotTalkStage to 45 endif
if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotTalkStage == 35) set DLC05CryoQ.elliotTalkStage to 40 DLC05TercorienRef.EVP endif
if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotTalkStage == 30) set DLC05CryoQ.elliotTalkStage to 35 endif
if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotTalkStage == 25) set DLC05CryoQ.elliotTalkStage to 30 endif
if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotTalkStage == 20) set DLC05CryoQ.elliotTalkStage to 25 endif
if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotTalkStage == 15) set DLC05CryoQ.elliotTalkStage to 20 set DLC05CryoLab01MasTrigREF.elliotMark to 5 DLC05TercorienRef.SayTo DLC05CryoFreezeRoomAlien03REF DLC05CryoElliotSpeak 0 0 EVP endif
if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotTalkStage == 10) set DLC05CryoQ.elliotTalkStage to 15 endif
if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotTalkStage == 5) set DLC05CryoQ.elliotTalkStage to 10 endif
END
BEGIN SayToDone DLC05CryoElliotFoundSquadSpeak
if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage == 80) set DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF.mark to -1 set DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF. reset to -1 set DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage to -1 set DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF.triggerHit to 3 EVP endif
if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage == 75) set DLC05MZ2.MZ2TercorienFollow to 1 EVP set DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage to 80 DLC05TercorienRef.SayTo Player DLC05CryoElliotFoundSquadSpeak 0 0 endif
if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage == 70) EVP set DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage to 75 endif
if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage == 65) set DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage to 70 endif
if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage == 60) set DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage to 65 endif
if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage == 55) set DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage to 60 endif
if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage == 50) set DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF.useEm to 3 set DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage to 55 endif
if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage == 45) set DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF.mark to -1 set DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF. reset to -1 set DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage to -1 set DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF.triggerHit to 3 set DLC05MZ2.MZ2TercorienFollow to 1 EVP endif
if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage == 40) set DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage to 45 endif
if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage == 35) set DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF.killEm to 3 set DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF.squadDead to 3 set DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF.useEm to 4 set DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage to 40 endif
if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage == 30) set DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage to 35 endif
if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage == 25) set DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage to 30 endif
if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage == 20) set DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage to 25 endif
if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage == 15) set DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage to 20 endif
if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage == 10) set DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage to 15 endif
if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage == 5) set DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage to 10 endif
END
BEGIN SayToDone DLC05CryoWeaponsFound
; if (DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF.findCryoStuff == 1) ; set DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF.findCryoStuff to 2 ; EVP ; DLC05TercorienRef.SayTo Player DLC05CryoWeaponsFound 0 0 ; endif
if (DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF.findCryoStuff == 2) set DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF.findCryoStuff to 3 set DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF.triggerHit to 5 EVP endif
END
Begin SayToDone DLC05MZ3ExLabSceneLines
if ( DLC05MZ3ExLabSCeneTriggerRef.SceneStep == 3 ) if ( DLC05PaulsonRef.GetDead == 0 ) set DLC05MZ3ExLabSceneTriggerRef.SceneStep to 4 DLC05PaulsonRef.SayTo DLC05SallyREF DLC05MZ3ExLabSceneLines else set DLC05MZ3ExLabSceneTriggerRef.SceneStep to 5 DLC05SallyRef.SayTo Player DLC05MZ3ExLabSceneLines endif endif
End
;///////////////////////////////////// ;// GAMEMODE BLOCK ;///////////////////////////////////// BEGIN GAMEMODE
; if ( SetupOnce == 0 ) ; MoveTo DLC05TercorienFreezeMarker ; Set SetupOnce to 1 ; endif
;// the teleport in effects IF ( portFX >= 1 ) IF ( portFXTimer > 0 ) set portFXTimer to portFXTimer - getSecondsPassed
IF ( portFX == 1 && portFXTimer <= 1.3 ) set portFX to 2 saa 1 ENDIF
ELSE setUnconscious 0 sms DLC05teleportInFXShader set portFX to -1
ENDIF ENDIF
END
begin OnDeath
if ( DLC05TercorienDead == 0 ) Showmessage DLC05DeadTercorienMessage set DLC05MZ2.MZ2TercorienFollow to 0 set DLC05MZ2.MZ2Follow to 0 set DLC05TercorienDead to 1 endif
if ( DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3ViewscreenSpeechStep == -3 ) if ( GetStage DLC05MZ3 < 20 ) set DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3ViewscreenSpeechStep to -5 endif endif
end

scn DLC05TrigAsmControlSCRIPT ; ;This is the in-level script that accompanies the DLC05Asm quest and script ;=============================== int init
begin onLoad if init == 0 setstage DLC05Asm 1 ;This kicks off the quest the first time the player enters the cell. set init to 1 ;set DLC05Asm.SomahDead to 1 ;temp until Elliot is worked into the scene. ;DLC05AsmAnim06REF.playgroup forward 1 endif end

SCN DLC05AsmSCRIPT
int SomahDead int alarm1Tripped int alarm1Sounded int SomahActive int PointOfNoReturn
;Alan Added these variables short SomahGo short DoOnce float SomahFixTimer
int deadPartB ;counters for enemies dead in their respective parts. These are tallied in quest stages. int deadPartC int deadPartD
;---=====Useful references=====--- ;DLC05AsmTeleDoor01 :The first door that Somah uses ;DLC05AsmTeleDoor02 :The second door, above the exploding assembly part. ;DLC05AsmTeleDoor03 :The door that connects the upper and lower area before assembly explosion.
;DLC05SomahRef :Somah ;DLC05ExplodingConveyorMachineREF :exploding generator ; ;==Turrets:== ;RAsmTurretA1 ;RAsmTurretA2 ;RAsmTurretB1 ;RAsmTurretB2 ;RAsmTurretB3 ;RAsmTurretB4 ;RAsmTurretC1 ;RAsmTurretC2 ; ;==Robots:== ;AsmRobot01 :These robots are in the first attack wave ;AsmRobot02 ;AsmRobot03 ;AsmRobot04 ;AsmRobot05 ;AsmRobot06 ; ; ;AsmRobotC01 :These are in the second attack wave, and they only appear if somah is dead ;AsmRobotC02 ;AsmRobotC03 ; ;AsmRobotD01 ;AsmRobotD02 ;AsmRobotD03 ;AsmRobotD04 ;AsmRobotD05 ;AsmRobotD06
;==Light Control== ;DLC05ASMLightToggle :This gets enabled when the lights turn on (when alarm sounds) ; ; ;==Generator== ;DLC05AsmGeneratorRef :Generator that gets destroyed in the end of the area. ; ; ; ;==Markers== ;DLC05SomahHide01Marker :after going through the door, somah will hide here
int turret01 int turret02
begin gamemode
;Somah's Timer for fixing the teleporter pad. After the timer, send her through
if ( SomahGo == 1 ) && ( SomahFixTimer > 0 ) Set SomahFixTimer to ( SomahFixTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) elseif ( SomahGo == 1 ) && ( SomahFixTimer <= 0 ) SetStage DLC05Asm 6 Set SomahGo to -1 endif
;This sets the appropriate stage when all 4 robots are slain in "Part B"
if ( DoOnce == 0 ) if DLC05Asm.deadPartB >= 4 setstage dlc05Asm 19 Set DoOnce to 1 endif endif
if (turret01 == 0 && RAsmTurretC2.getdead) set turret01 to 1 setstage dlc05ASM 26 endif if (turret02 == 0 && RAsmTurretC1.getdead) set turret02 to 1 setstage dlc05ASM 26 endif
end

scn DLC05TrigAsmAlarm1SCRIPT
int doOnce
begin onTrigger Player
if doOnce == 0 set DLC05Asm.alarm1Tripped to 1 setstage DLC05Asm 3 set doOnce to 1 endif
end

scn DLC05StasisControlsScript
short UsedOnce short CheckButtonPress short Button short Step short activationState
short fxStep ;Mark's FX ------------------------------------------
float fxTimer;Mark's FX ------------------------------------------ float WakeTimer
begin OnActivate
if ( UsedOnce == 0 ) ;ShowMessage DLC05StasisControlsMessage playgroup forward 0 set activationState to 1 set Step to 1 activate elseif ( UsedOnce == 1 ) ;ShowMessage DLC05StasisControlsMessageDone endif
end
begin gamemode
;Mark's FX ------------------------------------------ if (fxStep == 0) ; DLC05DeadAstronautRef.pms DLC05FrozenStasis ; DLC05PaulsonRef.pms DLC05FrozenStasis ; DLC05SamuraiRef.pms DLC05FrozenStasis ; DLC05TercorienRef.pms DLC05FrozenStasis set fxStep to -1 elseif (fxStep == 1) ;clean up fx if (fxTimer > 0) set fxTimer to (fxTimer - getSecondsPassed) else DLC05DeadAstronautRef.sms DLC05ThawSlowStasis DLC05PaulsonRef.sms DLC05ThawSlowStasis DLC05SamuraiRef.sms DLC05ThawSlowStasis DLC05TercorienRef.sms DLC05ThawSlowStasis DLC05CryoBurstStasisREF01.disable DLC05CryoBurstStasisREF01.markForDelete DLC05CryoBurstStasisREF02.disable DLC05CryoBurstStasisREF02.markForDelete DLC05CryoBurstStasisREF03.disable DLC05CryoBurstStasisREF03.markForDelete DLC05CryoSprayStasisREF01.markForDelete DLC05CryoBurstStasisREF04.disable DLC05CryoBurstStasisREF04.markForDelete DLC05CryoBurstStasisREF05.disable DLC05CryoBurstStasisREF05.markForDelete DLC05CryoBurstStasisREF06.disable DLC05CryoBurstStasisREF06.markForDelete DLC05CryoSprayStasisREF02.markForDelete DLC05CryoBurstStasisREF07.disable DLC05CryoBurstStasisREF07.markForDelete DLC05CryoBurstStasisREF08.disable DLC05CryoBurstStasisREF08.markForDelete DLC05CryoBurstStasisREF09.disable DLC05CryoBurstStasisREF09.markForDelete DLC05CryoSprayStasisREF03.markForDelete DLC05CryoBurstStasisREF10.disable DLC05CryoBurstStasisREF10.markForDelete DLC05CryoBurstStasisREF11.disable DLC05CryoBurstStasisREF11.markForDelete DLC05CryoBurstStasisREF12.disable DLC05CryoBurstStasisREF12.markForDelete DLC05CryoSprayStasisREF04.markForDelete set fxStep to -2 endif endif ;Mark's FX ------------------------------------------
set Button to GetButtonPressed
; if ( Button == 0 ) if ( Step == 1 ) Set WakeTimer to 5 DLC05Cryo1Ref.Playgroup Forward 1 DLC05Cryo2Ref.Playgroup Forward 1 DLC05Cryo3Ref.Playgroup Forward 1 DLC05Cryo4Ref.Playgroup Forward 1
;Mark's FX ------------------------------------------ DLC05CryoBurstStasisREF01.playgroup forward 1 DLC05CryoBurstStasisREF02.playgroup forward 1 DLC05CryoBurstStasisREF03.playgroup forward 1 DLC05CryoSprayStasisREF01.disable 1 DLC05CryoBurstStasisREF04.playgroup forward 1 DLC05CryoBurstStasisREF05.playgroup forward 1 DLC05CryoBurstStasisREF06.playgroup forward 1 DLC05CryoSprayStasisREF02.disable 1 DLC05CryoBurstStasisREF07.playgroup forward 1 DLC05CryoBurstStasisREF08.playgroup forward 1 DLC05CryoBurstStasisREF09.playgroup forward 1 DLC05CryoSprayStasisREF03.disable 1 DLC05CryoBurstStasisREF11.playgroup forward 1 DLC05CryoBurstStasisREF12.playgroup forward 1 DLC05CryoBurstStasisREF10.playgroup forward 1 DLC05CryoSprayStasisREF04.disable 1 ; DLC05DeadAstronautRef.sms DLC05FrozenStasis ; DLC05PaulsonRef.sms DLC05FrozenStasis ; DLC05SamuraiRef.sms DLC05FrozenStasis ; DLC05TercorienRef.sms DLC05FrozenStasis DLC05DeadAstronautRef.pms DLC05ThawSlowStasis DLC05PaulsonRef.pms DLC05ThawSlowStasis DLC05SamuraiRef.pms DLC05ThawSlowStasis DLC05TercorienRef.pms DLC05ThawSlowStasis set fxStep to 1 set fxTimer to 31 ;Mark's FX ------------------------------------------
set UsedOnce to 1 set Step to 2 endif ; endif
if ( Step == 2 ) && ( WakeTimer > 0 ) Set WakeTimer to ( WakeTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) elseif ( Step == 2 ) && ( WakeTimer <= 0 ) Set DLC05MZ2.MZ2Unfrozen to 1 Set DLC05Wake to 1 DLC05DeadAstronautRef.SetUnconscious 0 DLC05DeadAstronautRef.Kill DLC05PaulsonRef.SetUnconscious 0 DLC05SamuraiRef.SetUnconscious 0 DLC05TercorienRef.SetUnconscious 0 Set Step to 3 endif
if ( Step == 3 ) DLC05PaulsonRef.Evp DLC05SamuraiRef.Evp DLC05TercorienRef.Evp if ( GetStage DLC05MZ1 < 200 ) SetStage DLC05MZ1 200 endif SetObjectiveCompleted DLC05MZ2 10 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed DLC05MZ2 20 1 DLC05SallyRef.EVP Set Step to 4 endif
IF ( activationState == 1 ) IF ( isAnimPlaying forward == 0 ) set activationState to 0 playgroup Backward 0
ENDIF ENDIF
end

Scn DLC05GeneratorCoreSCRIPT
ref myLink ref nextLink short onLoad short openState ;1 - enabled, 2 - opening, 3 - opened and playing looping anim short enableDestruction
short overheatStage float overheatTimer
float flashTimer short flashStage short flashUpdate short flashFreq
float hitTimer
short destroyed
begin GameMode
if (onLoad == 0) set myLink to GetLinkedRef set nextLink to myLink.GetLinkedRef set overheatTimer to 1 disable set onLoad to 1 endif
if (openState ==0) && (myLink.IsAnimPlaying Forward == 1) ;If my linked generator is opening... enable ;i should enable myself set openState to 1 endif
if (openState == 1) && (myLink.IsAnimPlaying Forward == 1) && (hasLoaded3D) ;once my 3d is loaded... PlayGroup Forward 1 ;i should play my animation too set openState to 2 endif
if (openState == 2) && (IsAnimPlaying Forward == 0) ;If i am fully opened... PlayGroup Left 1 ;play the loop anim... set openState to 3 set enableDestruction to 1 ;and check which destruction stage i'm at if (GetDestructionStage == 1) PlayGroup ReloadA 1 endif
if (GetDestructionStage == 2) PlayGroup ReloadB 1 endif
if (GetDestructionStage == 3) PlayGroup ReloadC 1 endif
if (GetDestructionStage == 4) ;ShowWarning "4" PlayGroup ReloadD 1 endif
if (GetDestructionStage == 5) PlayGroup ReloadE 1 endif
if (GetDestructionStage == 6) ;ShowWarning "6" PlayGroup ReloadF 1 endif
if (GetDestructionStage == 7)
disable
endif
endif
;Flash the core if it's hit if (hitTimer < 0) sms DLC05AlienArmorSpellFlareShader ;myLink.sms DLC05AlienShieldShader else set hitTimer to (hitTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
;If coolant switches are off start overheating the core if (myLink.GetIsReference DLC05AsmGeneratorRef == 1) set overheatStage to DLC05AsmGeneratorRef.activatedSwitches endif
if (myLink.GetIsReference DLC05HangarGeneratorRef == 1) set overheatStage to DLC05HangarGeneratorRef.activatedSwitches endif
if (myLink.GetIsReference DLC05CryoGeneratorREF == 1) set overheatStage to DLC05CryoGeneratorREF.activatedSwitches endif
if (myLink.GetIsReference DLC05ExLabGeneratorREF == 1) set overheatStage to DLC05ExLabGeneratorREF.activatedSwitches endif
if (myLink.GetIsReference DLC05cellsGeneratorREF == 1) set overheatStage to DLC05cellsGeneratorREF.activatedSwitches endif
;Damage core every second depending on overheatStage if (overheatTimer < 0) if (overheatStage == 1) if (isAnimPlaying Left == 1) || (isAnimPlaying ReloadA == 1) || (isAnimPlaying ReloadB == 1) || (isAnimPlaying ReloadC == 1) || (isAnimPlaying ReloadD == 1) || (isAnimPlaying ReloadE == 1) || (isAnimPlaying ReloadF == 1) do 15 endif endif if (overheatStage == 2) if (isAnimPlaying Left == 1) || (isAnimPlaying ReloadA == 1) || (isAnimPlaying ReloadB == 1) || (isAnimPlaying ReloadC == 1) || (isAnimPlaying ReloadD == 1) || (isAnimPlaying ReloadE == 1) || (isAnimPlaying ReloadF == 1) do 35 endif endif if (overheatStage == 3) if (isAnimPlaying Left == 1) || (isAnimPlaying ReloadA == 1) || (isAnimPlaying ReloadB == 1) || (isAnimPlaying ReloadC == 1) || (isAnimPlaying ReloadD == 1) || (isAnimPlaying ReloadE == 1) || (isAnimPlaying ReloadF == 1) do 55 endif endif set overheatTimer to 1 else set overheatTimer to (overheatTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
;Timed flash to show that disabling the coolant is actually damaging it
if (overheatStage == 1) && (flashUpdate == 0) set flashStage to 1 set flashFreq to 1.5 set flashUpdate to 1 endif
if (overheatStage == 2) && (flashUpdate == 1) set flashFreq to 1 set flashUpdate to 2 endif
if (overheatStage == 3) && (flashUpdate == 2) set flashFreq to .5 set flashUpdate to 3 endif
if (flashStage == 1) if (flashTimer < 0) pms DLC05AlienArmorSpellFlareShader set flashTimer to .25 set flashStage to 2 else set flashTimer to (flashTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
if (flashStage == 2) if (flashTimer < 0) sms DLC05AlienArmorSpellFlareShader set flashTimer to flashFreq set flashStage to 1 else set flashTimer to (flashTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
if (GetDisabled == 0) && (destroyed == 0) set destroyed to 1 endif
if (GetDisabled == 1) && (destroyed == 1)
set destroyed to 2
endif
if (GetDestructionStage == 8) && (destroyed == 1)
set destroyed to 2
endif
if (destroyed == 2)
myLink.disable myLink.PlaceAtMe DLC05MZRmGeneratorACTDestroyed myLink.PlaceAtMe DLC05MZRmGeneratorACTHavok nextLink.PlaceAtMe DLC05GeneratorExplosion
;ShowWarning "BOOM"
if (myLink.getIsReference DLC05cellsGeneratorREF == 1) ; is this the holding cells generator? DLC05SallyCellButton.activate player DLC05MaxSecButton02.activate player DLC05MaxSecButton03.activate player DLC05cellsKlaxon01.playgroup left 0 DLC05cellsKlaxon02light.playgroup left 0 DLC05cellsKlaxon02.playgroup left 0 DLC05cellsKlaxon01light.playgroup left 0 DLC05cellsKlaxon01a.enable DLC05cellsKlaxon01b.enable endif
if (myLink.GetIsReference DLC05AsmGeneratorRef == 1) ;is this the robot assembly generator? setstage DLC05Asm 255 endif
if (myLink.GetIsReference DLC05HangarGeneratorRef == 1) ;is this the hangar generator? setstage DLC05HQ 255 endif
if (myLink.GetIsReference DLC05CryoGeneratorREF == 1) ;is this the cryo lab generator? set DLC05MZ2.MZ2Generator to DLC05MZ2.MZ2Generator + 1 set DLC05CryoQ.cryoGenDestroyed to 1
if (DLC05CryoBecketREF.GetAV Variable05 != 3) DLC05CryoBecketREF.Kill endif if (DLC05CryoDanielREF.GetAV Variable05 != 3) DLC05CryoDanielREF.Kill endif
StopQuest DLC05CryoQ endif
if (myLink.GetIsReference DLC05ExLabGeneratorREF == 1) ;is this the experimental lab generator? ;power down experimental lab area DLC05ExLabFieldMasterControl.activate player DLC05ExLabResearcherREF.playidle AlienCapture1 DLC05ExLabResearcher02REF.playidle AlienCapture1 setenemy DLC05AlienFaction DLC05ExLabAbom Dlc05ExLabAbomA.setav variable01 1 Dlc05ExLabAbomB.setav variable01 1 Dlc05ExLabAbomC.setav variable01 1 Dlc05ExLabAbomD.setav variable01 1 Dlc05ExLabAbomE.setav variable01 1 Dlc05ExLabAbomF.setav variable01 1 Dlc05ExLabAbomA.evp Dlc05ExLabAbomB.evp Dlc05ExLabAbomC.evp Dlc05ExLabAbomD.evp Dlc05ExLabAbomE.evp Dlc05ExLabAbomF.evp endif
set destroyed to 3
endif
End
Begin OnHit
pms DLC05AlienArmorSpellFlareShader ;myLink.pms DLC05AlienShieldShader set hitTimer to .15
End
Begin OnDestructionStageChange
if (IsAnimPlaying Left == 1) || (enableDestruction == 1) ;Only update destruction stages... ;if the core is fully open if (enableDestruction == 0) set enableDestruction to 1 endif
if (GetDestructionStage == 1) PlayGroup ReloadA 1 endif
if (GetDestructionStage == 2) PlayGroup ReloadB 1 ;ShowWarning "2" endif
if (GetDestructionStage == 3) PlayGroup ReloadC 1 endif
if (GetDestructionStage == 4) ;ShowWarning "4" PlayGroup ReloadD 1 endif
if (GetDestructionStage == 5) PlayGroup ReloadE 1 endif
if (GetDestructionStage == 6) ;ShowWarning "6" PlayGroup ReloadF 1 endif
if (GetDestructionStage == 7)
disable
endif
endif
End

scn DLC05AsmRobotEVPSomahOnDeathSCRIPT
begin onDeath
DLC05SomahRef.evp
end

scn DLC05FXSprayBigDoorSCRIPT
short onLoad short enableOrDisable ref myLink
Begin OnActivate Player
if (GetDisabled == 0) myLink.Activate Player 1 disable 1 else myLink.Activate Player 1 enable 1 endif
End
Begin GameMode
if (onLoad == 0) set myLink to getLinkedRef ;set enableOrDisable to 2 ;disable 0 set onLoad to 1 endif
;if (enableOrDisable == 0) ; mylink.disable 1 ;endif
;if (enableOrDisable == 1) ; mylink.enable 1 ;endif
End

scn DLC05BigDoorWithEffectsSCRIPT
short onLoad short activated short openClose ref myLink float timer
Begin OnActivate Player
if (activated == 0) set timer to 5 set openClose to 1 set activated to 1 else ;do nothing endif
End
Begin GameMode
if (onLoad == 0) set myLink to getLinkedRef set onLoad to 1 endif
if (activated == 1)
if (openClose == 1)
if (GetOpenState == 1) || (GetOpenState == 3)
if (GetOpenState == 3) SetOpenState 1 myLink.Activate Player 1 set openClose to 0 endif
if (GetOpenState == 1) SetOpenState 0 myLink.Activate Player 1 set openClose to 0 endif
endif
endif
if (timer < 0) myLink.Activate Player 1 set activated to 0 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
endif
End

ScriptName DLC05MZ3QuestScript
short SallyMove ;used to move sally from furniture markers to the connected door marker
short DLC05MZ3SallyTrigger short BridgeUpdate short DLC05MZ3SallyOpenDoor1 short DLC05MZ3SallyOpenDoor2
short DLC05MZ3LabTeleporterActive ;set to 1 when player activates control at far end of lab; used for updating NPC positions short DLC05MZ3LabTeleporterUpdate ;set to 1 when Sally passes through trigger in ExLab01, set to 2 after she's talked to player. Checked for dialogue
short DLC05MZ3BridgeTeleporterActive short DLC05MZ3BridgeTeleporterUpdate
short DLC05MZ3ViewscreenTrigger short DLC05MZ3ViewscreenSpeechStep
float DLC05MZ3SallyDoorTimer float DLC05MZ3ViewscreenTimer
;Added by Daryl short DLC05MZ3AllGeneratorsDestroyed
Begin GameMode
;Update DLC05MZ3LabTeleporterUpdate var when player hits control
if ( DLC05MZ3LabTeleporterActive == 1 ) if ( DLC05MZ3LabTeleporterUpdate > 0 ) set DLC05MZ3LabTeleporterUpdate to -1 endif endif
;hand-off from Viewscreen script: ;when Viewscreen var hits 7, run a timer
if ( DLC05MZ3ViewScreenSpeechStep == 7 ) if ( DLC05MZ3ViewscreenTimer <= 0 ) playSound QSTDLC05BattleFire DLC05LaserAimWarningREF.FireWeapon DLC05DeathRayLaserLevel2 set DLC05MZ3ViewscreenTimer to 1.5 set DLC05MZ3ViewScreenSpeechStep to 8 else set DLC05MZ3ViewscreenTimer to ( DLC05MZ3ViewscreenTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif elseif ( DLC05MZ3ViewscreenSpeechStep == 8 ) if ( DLC05MZ3ViewScreenTimer <= 0 ) set DLC05MZ3ViewscreenTimer to 1.5 set DLC05MZ3ViewscreenSpeechStep to 9 DLC05LaserAimWarningREF.FireWeapon DLC05DeathRayLaserLevel2 else set DLC05MZ3ViewscreenTimer to ( DLC05MZ3ViewscreenTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif elseif ( DLC05MZ3ViewscreenSpeechStep == 9 ) if ( DLC05MZ3ViewScreenTimer <= 0 ) set DLC05MZ3ViewscreenTimer to 2 set DLC05MZ3ViewscreenSpeechStep to 10 DLC05LaserAimWarningREF.FireWeapon DLC05DeathRayLaserLevel2 else set DLC05MZ3ViewscreenTimer to ( DLC05MZ3ViewscreenTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif elseif ( DLC05MZ3ViewscreenSpeechStep == 10 ) if ( DLC05MZ3ViewscreenTimer <= 0 ) Set DLC05MZ3ViewScreenSpeechStep to -1 else set DLC05MZ3ViewscreenTimer to ( DLC05MZ3ViewscreenTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif endif endif
;Disable Hub teleporter when player reaches the cell
if ( Player.GetInCell DLC05DeathRayHub01 == 1 ) if ( DLC05MZ3HubtoLabRef.State == 1 ) set DLC05MZ3HubtoLabRef.State to -1 DLC05MZ3HubArcRef.Enable endif endif
;Update objective when player hits the bridge
if ( Player.GetInCell DLC05Bridge == 1 ) if ( BridgeUpdate == 0 ) SetStage DLC05MZ3 25 set BridgeUpdate to 1 endif endif
;Scripting for Sally opening the first door (triggered in her script)
if ( Player.GetInCell DLC05ExLab01 == 1 ) if ( DLC05SallyRef.GetinCell DLC05ExLab01 == 1 ) if ( DLC05MZ3SallyOpenDoor1 == 0 ) set DLC05MZ3SallyDoorTimer to 3 set DLC05MZ3SallyOpenDoor1 to 1 elseif ( DLC05MZ3SallyOpenDoor1 == 1 ) if ( DLC05MZ3SallyDoorTimer <= 0 )
Set DLC05MZ3SallyOpenDoor1 to 2 DLC05SallyRef.SayTo Player DLC05MZ3SallyLabTriggerTopic DLC05SallyRef.EVP set DLC05MZ3SallyDoorTimer to 10.5 set DLC05MZ3SallyOpenDoor1 to 2 else set DLC05MZ3SallyDoorTimer to ( DLC05MZ3SallyDoorTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif elseif ( DLC05MZ3SallyOpenDoor1 == 2 ) if ( DLC05SallyRef.GetSitting == 2 ) if ( DLC05MZ3SallyDoorTimer <= 0 ) DLC05SallyRef.Moveto DLC05MZ3SallyLabDoor1Marker set DLC05MZ3SallyOpenDoor1 to 3 set DLC05MZ3SallyDoorTimer to 5 DLC05SallyRef.EVP else set DLC05MZ3SallyDoorTimer to ( DLC05MZ3SallyDoorTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif endif elseif ( DLC05MZ3SallyOpenDoor1 == 3 ) if ( DLC05MZ3SallyDoorTimer <= 0 ) DLC05MZ3LabBlockingDoor1REF.Unlock DLC05MZ3LabBlockingDoor1REF.Activate DLC05SallyREF set DLC05MZ3SallyOpenDoor1 to -1 else set DLC05MZ3SallyDoorTimer to ( DLC05MZ3SallyDoorTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif endif endif endif
;Scripting for Sally opening the second door in DLC05ExLab01 ;triggered in NPC scripts when scene lines are done playing
if ( DLC05MZ3SallyOpenDoor2 == 1 ) set DLC05MZ3SallyDoorTimer to 10.5 set DLC05MZ3SallyOpenDoor2 to 2 elseif ( DLC05MZ3SallyOpenDoor2 == 2 ) if ( DLC05SallyRef.GetSitting == 2 ) if ( DLC05MZ3SallyDoorTimer <= 0 )
;When Sally hits the second marker, update DLC05MZ3ViewcsreenTrigger ;which fires off viewscreen lines
DLC05SallyRef.Moveto DLC05MZ3SomahLabWaitMarker set DLC05MZ3SallyOpenDoor2 to 3 set DLC05MZ3ViewscreenTrigger to 1
DLC05SallyRef.EVP else set DLC05MZ3SallyDoorTimer to ( DLC05MZ3SallyDoorTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif endif elseif ( DLC05MZ3SallyOpenDoor2 == 3 )
;Wait to open door until stage has updated
if ( GetStage DLC05MZ3 == 20 ) DLC05MZ3LabBlockingDoor2REF.Unlock DLC05MZ3LabBlockingDoor2REF.Activate DLC05SallyREF set DLC05MZ3SallyOpenDoor2 to -1 elseif ( DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3ViewScreenSpeechStep == -5 ) DLC05MZ3LabBlockingDoor2Ref.Unlock DLC05MZ3LabBlockingDoor2Ref.Activate DLC05SallyREF set DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3ViewScreenSpeechStep to -6 DLC05SallyRef.EVP endif endif
End

scn DLC05SomahSCRIPT
;// portInEffects short portIn short portFX float portFXTimer
begin OnDeath
; if GetStageDone DLC05Asm 20 ; DLC05AsmTeleDoor02.unlock ; DLC05AsmTeleDoor03.unlock ; endif
set dlc05Asm.SomahDead to 1
if ( DLC05SomahDead == 0 ) Showmessage DLC05DeadSomahMessage set DLC05MZ2.MZ2SomahFollow to 0 set DLC05MZ2.MZ2Follow to 0 set DLC05SomahDead to 1 endif
if ( DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3ViewscreenSpeechStep == -2 ) if ( GetStage DLC05MZ3 < 20 ) set DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3ViewscreenSpeechStep to -5 endif endif
end
Begin SayToDone DLC05MZ3ExLabSceneLines
if ( DLC05MZ3ExLabSCeneTriggerRef.SceneStep == 2 ) if ( DLC05TercorienRef.GetDead == 0 ) set DLC05MZ3ExLabSceneTriggerRef.SceneStep to 3 DLC05TercorienRef.SayTo DLC05SallyREF DLC05MZ3ExLabSceneLines elseif ( DLC05PaulsonRef.GetDead == 0 ) set DLC05MZ3ExLabSceneTriggerRef.SceneStep to 4 DLC05PaulsonRef.SayTo DLC05SallyREF DLC05MZ3ExLabSceneLines else set DLC05MZ3ExLabSceneTriggerRef.SceneStep to 5 DLC05SallyRef.SayTo Player DLC05MZ3ExLabSceneLines return endif endif
End
Begin SayToDone DLC05MZ1SomahInitGreet
DLC05SomahRef.AddScriptPackage DLC05MZ1SomahInitialGreet
End
Begin SayToDone DLC05MZ1GeneratorConversation
if DLC05MZ1.DLC05MZ1GeneratorConv == 0 set DLC05MZ1.DLC05MZ1GeneratorConv to 2 DLC05SallyRef.SayTo Player DLC05MZ1GeneratorConversation endif
End
;///////////////////////////////////// ;// GAMEMODE BLOCK ;///////////////////////////////////// BEGIN GAMEMODE
;// the teleport in effects IF ( portFX >= 1 ) IF ( portFXTimer > 0 ) set portFXTimer to portFXTimer - getSecondsPassed
IF ( portFX == 1 && portFXTimer <= 1.3 ) set portFX to 2 saa 1 ENDIF
ELSE setUnconscious 0 sms DLC05teleportInFXShader set portFX to -1
ENDIF ENDIF
if ( GetStage DLC05MZ1 < 30 ) if ( DLC05MZ1.DLC05MZ1Fight == 0 ) if ( IsCombatTarget Player == 1 ) set DLC05MZ1.DLC05MZ1Fight to 1 set DLC05MZ1.DLC05MZ1Attack to 1 endif endif endif
END

scn DLC05TrigAsmPartC02SCRIPT
int doOnce
begin onTriggerEnter Player
if doOnce == 0 setstage DLC05Asm 24 set doOnce to 1 endif
end

scn DLC05ConveyorMachineSCRIPT
int broken int index ref linkedRef int ready float timer
Begin OnActivate
; do 5000 ; setstage dlc05Asm 25 set broken to 1 set linkedRef to getLinkedRef set index to 1 set ready to 1 end
Begin onHit
if broken == 0 clearDestruction endif
end
Begin OnDestructionStageChange
set broken to 1
End
begin GameMode
if broken == 1 if ready == 0 if timer > 0 ;this timer is for every explosion set timer to timer - getSecondsPassed else set ready to 1 endif endif endif
;DLC05AsmLExplosion ;DLC05AsmMExplosion ;DLC05AsmSExplosion
if broken == 1 && ready == 1 if index == 1 ;small explosion, small delay set ready to 0 set timer to 0.1 linkedRef.placeAtMe DLC05AsmSExplosion elseif index == 2 ;small explosion, small delay set linkedRef to linkedRef.getLinkedRef set ready to 0 set timer to 0.15 linkedRef.placeAtMe DLC05AsmSExplosion elseif index == 3 ;medium explosion, medium delay set linkedRef to linkedRef.getLinkedRef set ready to 0 set timer to 0.4 linkedRef.placeAtMe DLC05AsmMExplosion elseif index == 4 ;medium explosion, medium delay set linkedRef to linkedRef.getLinkedRef set ready to 0 set timer to 0.25 linkedRef.placeAtMe DLC05AsmMExplosion elseif index == 5 ;small explosion, medium delay set linkedRef to linkedRef.getLinkedRef set ready to 0 set timer to 0.3 linkedRef.placeAtMe DLC05AsmSExplosion elseif index == 6 ;large explosion, medium delay do 5000 setstage dlc05Asm 25 set linkedRef to linkedRef.getLinkedRef set ready to 0 set timer to 0.4 linkedRef.placeAtMe DLC05AsmLExplosion elseif index == 7 ;small explosion, small delay set linkedRef to linkedRef.getLinkedRef set timer to 0.1 set ready to 0 linkedRef.placeAtMe DLC05AsmSExplosion elseif index == 8 ;medium explosion, small delay set linkedRef to linkedRef.getLinkedRef set timer to 0.15 set ready to 0 linkedRef.placeAtMe DLC05AsmMExplosion elseif index == 9 ;small explosion, small delay set linkedRef to linkedRef.getLinkedRef set timer to 0.1 set ready to 0 linkedRef.placeAtMe DLC05AsmSExplosion elseif index == 10 ;small explosion, small delay set linkedRef to linkedRef.getLinkedRef set timer to 0.2 set ready to 0 linkedRef.placeAtMe DLC05AsmSExplosion elseif index == 11 ;medium explosion, small delay set linkedRef to linkedRef.getLinkedRef set timer to 0.16 set ready to 0 linkedRef.placeAtMe DLC05AsmMExplosion elseif index == 12 ;small explosion, small delay set linkedRef to linkedRef.getLinkedRef set timer to 0.5 set ready to 0 linkedRef.placeAtMe DLC05AsmSExplosion elseif index == 13 ;medium explosion set linkedRef to linkedRef.getLinkedRef linkedRef.placeAtMe DLC05AsmMExplosion set broken to 2 endif
set index to index + 1
endif
end

scn DLC05GeneratorSwitchSCRIPT
ref myLink short onLoad short openState ;1 is opening, 2 is open short closeState ;1 is closing, 2 is closed
short linkDestroyed
Begin GameMode
if (onLoad == 0) set myLink to GetLinkedRef ;PlayGroup SpecialIdle 1 set onLoad to 1 endif
if (myLink.IsAnimPlaying Forward == 1) && (openState == 0) ;If the generator is opening... PlayGroup Forward 1 ;make this switch open too set openState to 1 endif
if (openState == 1) if (IsAnimPlaying Forward == 0) ;when i'm done opening... PlayGroup Left 1 ;loop the smoke effects set openState to 2 endif endif
if (IsAnimPlaying Backward == 1) && (closeState == 0) ;i must have been activated... set closestate to 1 ;so set me to the "closing" state endif
if (closeState == 1) ;i'm now closing... if (IsAnimPlaying Backward == 0) ;so when this animation stops i'm fully closed... ;and i can set the "activatedSwitches" to +1 on myLink if (myLink.GetIsReference DLC05AsmGeneratorRef == 1) set DLC05AsmGeneratorRef.activatedSwitches to (DLC05AsmGeneratorRef.activatedSwitches + 1) set closeState to 2 endif
if (myLink.GetIsReference DLC05HangarGeneratorRef == 1) set DLC05HangarGeneratorRef.activatedSwitches to (DLC05HangarGeneratorRef.activatedSwitches + 1) set closeState to 2 endif
if (myLink.GetIsReference DLC05CryoGeneratorREF == 1) set DLC05CryoGeneratorREF.activatedSwitches to (DLC05CryoGeneratorREF.activatedSwitches + 1) set closeState to 2 endif
if (myLink.GetIsReference DLC05ExLabGeneratorREF == 1) set DLC05ExLabGeneratorREF.activatedSwitches to (DLC05ExLabGeneratorREF.activatedSwitches + 1) set closeState to 2 endif
IF ( myLink.GetIsReference DLC05cellsGeneratorREF == 1 ) set DLC05cellsGeneratorREF.activatedSwitches to (DLC05cellsGeneratorREF.activatedSwitches + 1) set closeState to 2 ENDIF
endif endif
if (myLink.GetDisabled == 1) && (linkDestroyed == 0) if (closeState == 0) PlayGroup right 1 set linkDestroyed to 1 endif endif
End
Begin OnActivate Player
if (IsAnimPlaying Left == 1) PlayGroup Backward 1 else ;Do Nothing endif
End

scn DLC05FaceSmasherMagicEffectSCRIPT
ref myRef
BEGIN SCRIPTEFFECTSTART
set myRef to getSelf

ENDIF ENDIF

ScriptName DLC05MZ3SallyLabTrigger1Script
short DoOnce
Begin OnTriggerEnter
if ( IsActionRef DLC05SallyREF == 1 ) if ( DoOnce == 0 ) DLC05SallyREF.SayTo Player DLC05MZ3SallyLabTriggerTopic set DoOnce to 1 endif endif
End

ScriptName DLC05SallyScript
short TestCrawl
;// portInEffects short portIn short portFX short ghosted
float portFXTimer
;/////////////////////////////// ;// ONLOAD BLOCK ;/////////////////////////////// BEGIN ONLOAD
if ghosted == 0 setghost 1 set ghosted to 1 endif
END
Begin OnActivate
;Prevent player from activating Sally while she's in the middle of crawling
if ( IsActionRef Player == 1 ) if ( DLC05MZ1.DLC05MZ1SallyDoor >= 1 ) if ( DLC05MZ1.DLC05MZ1SallyDoor < 4 ) ; do nothing else Activate endif elseif ( DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3SallyOpenDoor1 >= 1 ) ;do nothing elseif ( DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3SallyOpenDoor2 >= 1 ) ;do nothing elseif ( DLC05FF01.SallyCrawl == 3) ;do nothing elseif ( DLC05FF01.SallyCrawlA== 3) ;do nothing else Activate endif else Activate endif
END
Begin Gamemode
if ( TestCrawl == 1 ) set TestCrawl to 2 EVP endif
;// the teleport in effects IF ( portFX >= 1 ) IF ( portFXTimer > 0 ) set portFXTimer to portFXTimer - getSecondsPassed
IF ( portFX == 1 && portFXTimer <= 1.3 ) set portFX to 2 saa 1 ENDIF
ELSE setUnconscious 0 sms DLC05teleportInFXShader set portFX to -1
ENDIF ENDIF
End
Begin SayToDone DLC05MZ1SallyRelease
if ( DLC05MZ1.DLC05MZ1GeneratorConv == 0 ) if ( DLC05SomahRef.GetDead == 0 ) DLC05SomahRef.SayTo Player DLC05MZ1GeneratorConversation else set DLC05MZ1.DLC05MZ1GeneratorConv to 2 SayTo player DLC05MZ1GeneratorConversation endif endif
End
Begin SayToDone DLC05MZ1GeneratorConversation
if ( DLC05MZ1.DLC05MZ1GeneratorConv == 2 ) set DLC05MZ1.DLC05MZ1GeneratorConv to 4 SayTo Player DLC05MZ1GeneratorConversation elseif ( DLC05MZ1.DLC05MZ1GeneratorConv == 4 ) Set DLC05SallyCellTriggerRef.DoOnce to -1 endif
End
Begin SayToDone DLC05MZ3ExLabSceneLines
if ( DLC05MZ3ExLabSCeneTriggerRef.SceneStep == 1 ) if ( DLC05SomahRef.GetDead == 0 ) set DLC05MZ3ExLabSceneTriggerRef.SceneStep to 2 DLC05SomahRef.SayTo DLC05SallyREF DLC05MZ3ExLabSceneLines elseif ( DLC05TercorienRef.GetDead == 0 ) set DLC05MZ3ExLabSceneTriggerRef.SceneStep to 3 DLC05TercorienRef.SayTo DLC05SallyREF DLC05MZ3ExLabSceneLines elseif ( DLC05PaulsonRef.GetDead == 0 ) set DLC05MZ3ExLabSceneTriggerRef.SceneStep to 4 DLC05PaulsonRef.SayTo DLC05SallyREF DLC05MZ3ExLabSceneLines else set DLC05MZ3ExLabSceneTriggerRef.SceneStep to 5 DLC05SallyRef.SayTo Player DLC05MZ3ExLabSceneLines return endif elseif ( DLC05MZ3ExLabSceneTriggerRef.SceneStep == 5 ) set DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3SallyOpenDoor2 to 1 DLC05SallyRef.EVP endif
End

ScriptName DLC05MZ3DeathRaySwitchScript
Begin OnActivate
if ( IsActionRef PLayer == 1 ) if ( GetStage DLC05MZ3 == 20 ) SetStage DLC05MZ3 30 DLC05MZ3DeathRaytoQuartersDoorREF.Unlock endif endif
End

ScriptName DLC05MZ3TEMPBridgeTriggerScript
Begin OnTriggerEnter
if ( IsActionRef Player == 1 ) if ( GetSTage DLC05MZ3 == 30 ) ; ShowMessage DLC05MZ3TEMPBridgeMessage SetSTage DLC05MZ3 40 endif endif
End

scn DLC05CryoLab01MasSCRIPT
short onLoad short doOnceA
short elliotFollow
short testStart float testTimer
;Stuff for Elliot's Freeze Scene short elliotMark short elliotMarkHit short elliotReset short delay float delayTimer
short cryoPodLeftNumber short cryoPodRightNumber
Begin GameMode
if (cryoPodLeftNumber == 9) DLC05CryoPodSwitchLeftREF.PlayGroup Backward 1 set cryoPodLeftNumber to -1 endif
;========================= ;==Elliot's Freeze Room Scene ;=========================
; Elliot yells at the aliens through the window if (elliotMarkHit == 5) set elliotMark to 10 set elliotMarkHit to -1 endif
if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotTalkStage == 25) && (elliotMark == 10) if (elliotReset == 10) DLC05TercorienRef.SayTo DLC05CryoFreezeRoomAlien01REF DLC05CryoElliotSpeak 0 0 DLC05TercorienRef.EVP set elliotReset to 15 endif endif
; Elliot tries to find a way in, then presses the button if (elliotMarkHit == 10) set elliotMark to 15 set elliotMarkHit to -1 endif
if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotTalkStage == 30) && (elliotMark == 15) if (elliotReset == 15) DLC05TercorienRef.SayTo Player DLC05CryoElliotSpeak 0 1 DLC05TercorienRef.EVP set delay to 10 set delayTimer to 3 set elliotReset to 20 endif endif
; Delay for when Elliot presses the button if (delay == 10) if (delayTimer < 0) DLC05CryoLabFreezeRoomButtonREF.Activate player 1 set delay to -1 else set delayTimer to (delayTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
; Elliot taunts the aliens while they are dying, and fires at the glass if (elliotMarkHit == 15) set elliotMark to 20 set elliotMarkHit to -1 endif
if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotTalkStage == 35) && (elliotMark == 20) if (elliotReset == 20) DLC05TercorienRef.SayTo DLC05CryoFreezeRoomAlien03REF DLC05CryoElliotSpeak 0 0 DLC05TercorienRef.EquipItem weapassaultrifle DLC05TercorienRef.EVP
set elliotReset to 25 endif endif
; Elliot walks into the room, up to the dead alien, says something, and shoots at him if (elliotMarkHit == 20) set elliotMark to 25 set elliotMarkHit to -1 endif
if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotTalkStage == 40) && (elliotMark == 25) && (DLC05CryoFreezeRoomTrigREF.switchFlipped == 2) if (elliotReset == 25) DLC05TercorienRef.EVP set elliotReset to 30 endif endif
; Elliot walks up to one of his soldiers and says something to him if (elliotMarkHit == 25) ;DLC05TercorienRef.SayTo DLC05CryoFreezeRoomAlien03REF DLC05CryoElliotSpeak 0 0 set elliotMark to 30 set elliotMarkHit to -1 endif
if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotTalkStage == 45) && (elliotMark == 30) && (DLC05CryoFreezeRoomTrigREF.switchFlipped == 2) if (elliotReset == 30) DLC05TercorienRef.EVP set elliotReset to 40 endif endif
; Elliot walks back to follow the player and says something if (elliotMarkHit == 30) DLC05TercorienRef.SayTo DLC05CryoFreezeDeadSoldierREF DLC05CryoElliotSpeak 0 0 set elliotMark to 35 set elliotMarkHit to -1 endif
if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotTalkStage == 50) && (elliotMark == 35) if (elliotReset == 35)
DLC05TercorienRef.EVP set elliotReset to 45 endif endif
if (elliotMarkHit == 35) DLC05TercorienRef.SayTo Player DLC05CryoElliotSpeak 0 0 set elliotMark to 40 set elliotMarkHit to -1 endif
;================================ ;==END of Elliot's Freeze Room Scene ;================================
if (onLoad == 0) StartQuest DLC05CryoQ ;set testStart to 1 ;Moves Elliot to player, puts him in the right package, and gives him a weapon. set testTimer to 2 set DLC05CryoQ.elliotTalkStage to 5 set elliotMark to 0 set elliotReset to 10 set onLoad to 1 endif
if (testStart == 1) StartQuest DLC05MZ2 DLC05TercorienRef.MoveTo Player DLC05TercorienRef.SetUnconscious 0 DLC05TercorienRef.AddItem WeapChineseAssaultRifle 1 DLC05TercorienRef.AddItem Ammo556mm 33 DLC05TercorienRef.AddItem Stimpak 3 DLC05TercorienRef.SetPlayerTeammate 1 set DLC05MZ2.MZ2TercorienFollow to 1
;For Testing Freeze Room Scene
set testStart to 2 endif
if (testStart == 2) if (testTimer < 0) DLC05TercorienRef.SetUnconscious 0 else set testTimer to (testTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
End

scn DLC05CryoFreezeRoomSCRIPT
short onLoad short freezeOn short freezeStage short switchFlipped ref myLink
float timer
Begin GameMode
if (onLoad == 0) set myLink to getLinkedRef set freezeStage to 1 set onLoad to 1 endif
if (switchFlipped == 0) if (myLink.GetDisabled == 0) set switchFlipped to 1 endif endif
if (switchFlipped == 1) if (freezeStage == 1) ;Cryo spray starts, and aliens in packages if (timer < 0) DLC05CryoFreezeRoomAlien01REF.SetAV Variable05 1 DLC05CryoFreezeRoomAlien02REF.SetAV Variable06 1 DLC05CryoFreezeRoomAlien03REF.SetAV Variable07 1 DLC05CryoFreezeRoomAlien01REF.EVP DLC05CryoFreezeRoomAlien02REF.EVP DLC05CryoFreezeRoomAlien03REF.EVP DLC05CryoFreezeRoomAlien01REF.pms DLC05Freeze ;Mark's FX-------------------------------- DLC05CryoFreezeRoomAlien02REF.pms DLC05Freeze ;Mark's FX-------------------------------- DLC05CryoFreezeRoomAlien03REF.pms DLC05Freeze ;Mark's FX--------------------------------- DLC05CryoDeadNPC01REF.pms DLC05Freeze ;Mark's FX-------------------------------- DLC05CryoDeadNPC02REF.pms DLC05Freeze ;Mark's FX-------------------------------- DLC05CryoDeadNPC03REF.pms DLC05Freeze ;Mark's FX-------------------------------- DLC05SquadSpurlockREF.pms DLC05Freeze ;Mark's FX-------------------------------- DLC05CryoFreezeDeadSoldierREF.pms DLC05Freeze ;Mark's FX-------------------------------- DLC05SquadMearsREF.pms DLC05Freeze ;Mark's FX-------------------------------- DLC05FreezeRoomBurstREF01.playgroup forward 1 ;Mark's FX--------------------------------- DLC05FreezeRoomBurstREF02.playgroup forward 1 ;Mark's FX--------------------------------- DLC05FreezeRoomBurstREF03.playgroup forward 1 ;Mark's FX--------------------------------- DLC05FreezeRoomBurstREF04.playgroup forward 1 ;Mark's FX--------------------------------- set timer to 1 set freezeStage to -1 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
if (freezeStage == -1) ;mark's fx second stage jets if (timer < 0) ;DLC05CryoFreezeRoomSpray03REF.Enable 1 ;Mark's FX--------------------------------- ;DLC05CryoFreezeRoomSpray04REF.Enable 1 ;Mark's FX--------------------------------- DLC05CryoFreezeRoomSpray05REF.Enable 1 ;Mark's FX--------------------------------- DLC05CryoFreezeRoomSpray06REF.Enable 1 ;Mark's FX--------------------------------- DLC05FreezeRoomFXEnableMARKER.enable 1 ;Mark's FX--------------------------------- DLC05CryoFreezeBloodDisabler.enable set timer to 3 set freezeStage to 2 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
if (freezeStage == 2) ; First alien freezes in place if (timer < 0) DLC05CryoFreezeRoomAlien01REF.CastImmediateOnSelf DLC05CryoParalyzeLONG set timer to 2 set freezeStage to 3 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
if (freezeStage == 3) ; Second alien freezes in place if (timer < 0) DLC05CryoFreezeRoomAlien02REF.CastImmediateOnSelf DLC05CryoParalyzeLONG set timer to 3 set freezeStage to 4 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
if (freezeStage == 4) ; Third alien freezes in place if (timer < 0) DLC05CryoFreezeRoomAlien03REF.CastImmediateOnSelf DLC05CryoParalyzeLONG set timer to 2.5 set freezeStage to 5 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
if (freezeStage == 5) ; Doors open if (timer < 0) DLC05CryoLabAutopsyDoor01REF.SetOpenState 1 DLC05CryoLabAutopsyDoor02REF.SetOpenState 1 DLC05CryoLabAutopsyDoor03REF.SetOpenState 1 DLC05CryoLabAutopsyDoor04REF.SetOpenState 1 DLC05CryoLabAutopsyDoor05REF.SetOpenState 1 DLC05CryoFreezeRoomSpray04REF.Disable 1 ;Mark's FX--------------------------------- DLC05CryoFreezeRoomSpray03REF.Disable 1 ;Mark's FX--------------------------------- DLC05CryoFreezeRoomSpray05REF.Disable 1 ;Mark's FX--------------------------------- DLC05CryoFreezeRoomSpray06REF.Disable 1 ;Mark's FX--------------------------------- DLC05FreezeRoomBurstREF01.Disable 1 ;Mark's FX--------------------------------- DLC05FreezeRoomBurstREF02.Disable 1 ;Mark's FX--------------------------------- DLC05FreezeRoomBurstREF03.Disable 1 ;Mark's FX--------------------------------- DLC05FreezeRoomBurstREF04.Disable 1 ;Mark's FX--------------------------------- DLC05CryoSquadRedLightOff04REF.enable DLC05CryoSquadRedLightOff03REF.enable DLC05CryoSquadRedLightOn04REF.disable DLC05CryoSquadRedLightOn03REF.disable DLC05CryoSquadRedLight03REF.disable DLC05CryoSquadRedLight04REF.disable DLC05TercorienRef.EVP
set DLC05CryoQ.elliotTalkStage to 55 set DLC05CryoLab01MasTrigREF.elliotReset to 45 set DLC05CryoLab01MasTrigREF.elliotmark to 40
set DLC05CryoQ.elliotTalkStage to 40 set DLC05CryoLab01MasTrigREF.elliotMark to 25 set DLC05CryoLab01MasTrigREF.elliotReset to 25 set timer to 10 set freezeStage to 6 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
if (freezeStage == 6) ; Mark's fx clean up if (timer < 0) DLC05CryoFreezeRoomSpray04REF.MarkForDelete 1 ;Mark's FX--------------------------------- DLC05CryoFreezeRoomSpray03REF.MarkForDelete 1 ;Mark's FX--------------------------------- DLC05CryoFreezeRoomSpray05REF.MarkForDelete 1 ;Mark's FX--------------------------------- DLC05CryoFreezeRoomSpray06REF.MarkForDelete 1 ;Mark's FX--------------------------------- DLC05FreezeRoomBurstREF01.MarkForDelete 1 ;Mark's FX--------------------------------- DLC05FreezeRoomBurstREF02.MarkForDelete 1 ;Mark's FX--------------------------------- DLC05FreezeRoomBurstREF03.MarkForDelete 1 ;Mark's FX--------------------------------- DLC05FreezeRoomBurstREF04.MarkForDelete 1 ;Mark's FX--------------------------------- set freezeStage to 7 set switchFlipped to 2 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
endif
End

scn DLC05CryoFreezeRoomAlienSCRIPT
;This script will kill the aliens after a certain amount of time.
short onLoad float timer
Begin GameMode
if (onLoad == 0) set timer to 14 set onLoad to 1 endif
if (DLC05CryoFreezeRoomTrigREF.freezeStage > 1)
if (timer < 0) kill else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
endif
End
