scn DLC05TriggerBumperControlSCRIPT
;This polls the activator, and figures out which button has been pressed ;================================
ref actRef
float blastTime
int PaulsonSayCount
int groupAActive int groupBActive int groupCActive int groupDActive int groupEActive int groupFActive
float groupATime float groupBTime float groupCTime float groupDTime float groupETime float groupFTime
begin onLoad
set blastTime to 0.3
end
begin OnActivate
if getStageDone DLC05HQ 40 if PaulsonSayCount < 1 DLC05PaulsonRef.sayto player DLC05HQPaulsonButtons01 endif set PaulsonSayCount to PaulsonSayCount + 1
if PaulsonSayCount == 5 if getStageDone DLC05HQ 100 == 0 DLC05PaulsonRef.sayto player DLC05HQPaulsonButtons01 endif endif endif
set actRef to getActionRef if DLC05HangarUFO.IsAnimPlaying backward == 0 DLC05HangarUFO.playgroup forward 1 endif
if actRef == BumperSwitchB set groupBTime to blastTime set groupBActive to 1 DLC05HangerBumperB1.placeatme DLC05BumperExplosion DLC05HangerBumperB2.placeatme DLC05BumperExplosion DLC05HangerBumperB1.playgroup forward 1 DLC05HangerBumperB2.playgroup forward 1 endif
if actRef == BumperSwitchC set groupCTime to blastTime set groupCActive to 1 DLC05HangerBumperC1.playgroup forward 1 DLC05HangerBumperC2.playgroup forward 1 DLC05HangerBumperC1.placeatme DLC05BumperExplosion DLC05HangerBumperC2.placeatme DLC05BumperExplosion endif
if actRef == BumperSwitchD set groupDTime to blastTime set groupDActive to 1 DLC05HangerBumperD1.placeatme DLC05BumperExplosion DLC05HangerBumperD2.placeatme DLC05BumperExplosion DLC05HangerBumperD1.playgroup forward 1 DLC05HangerBumperD2.playgroup forward 1 endif
if actRef == BumperSwitchE set groupETime to blastTime set groupEActive to 1 DLC05HangerBumperE1.placeatme DLC05BumperExplosion DLC05HangerBumperE2.placeatme DLC05BumperExplosion DLC05HangerBumperE1.playgroup forward 1 DLC05HangerBumperE2.playgroup forward 1 endif
if actRef == BumperSwitchF set groupFTime to blastTime set groupFActive to 1 DLC05HangerBumperF1.placeatme DLC05BumperExplosion DLC05HangerBumperF2.placeatme DLC05BumperExplosion DLC05HangerBumperF1.playgroup forward 1 DLC05HangerBumperF2.playgroup forward 1 endif end
begin GameMode
if groupBActive == 1 if groupBTime > 0 set groupBTime to groupBTime - getSecondsPassed DLC05HangerBumperB1.placeatme DLC05FakeForceBallBumper DLC05HangerBumperB2.placeatme DLC05FakeForceBallBumper else set groupAActive to 0 endif endif
if groupCActive == 1 if groupCTime > 0 set groupCTime to groupCTime - getSecondsPassed DLC05HangerBumperC1.placeatme DLC05FakeForceBallBumper DLC05HangerBumperC2.placeatme DLC05FakeForceBallBumper else set groupCActive to 0 endif endif
if groupFActive == 1 if groupFTime > 0 set groupFTime to groupFTime - getSecondsPassed DLC05HangerBumperF1.placeatme DLC05FakeForceBallBumper DLC05HangerBumperF2.placeatme DLC05FakeForceBallBumper else set groupFActive to 0 endif endif
if groupDActive == 1 if groupDTime > 0 set groupDTime to groupDTime - getSecondsPassed DLC05HangerBumperD1.placeatme DLC05FakeForceBallBumper DLC05HangerBumperD2.placeatme DLC05FakeForceBallBumper else set groupDActive to 0 endif endif
if groupEActive == 1 if groupETime > 0 set groupETime to groupETime - getSecondsPassed DLC05HangerBumperE1.placeatme DLC05FakeForceBallBumper DLC05HangerBumperE2.placeatme DLC05FakeForceBallBumper else set groupEActive to 0 endif endif
end

scn DLC05SpaceWalk02MasTrigSCRIPT
short onLoad short runTimer short timerStage float timer
float currentScale float newScale short runScaleTimer float scaleTimer
short numRepaired short allNodesRepaired
Begin GameMode
if (onLoad == 0) DisablePlayerControls 0 1 1 0 0 0 0 player.SetAv SpeedMult 75 DLC05SpaceBridge02Door01REF.Lock 255 DLC05SpaceWalkAlienInner01REF.EVP DLC05SpaceWalkAlienInner02REF.EVP DLC05SpaceWalkAlienInner03REF.EVP set scaleTimer to .005 set runTimer to 1 set timerStage to 1 set timer to .00025 set onLoad to 1 endif
if (runScaleTimer == 1)
if (scaleTimer < 0) set currentScale to (DLC05SpaceGravLightBeamREF.GetScale + .0001) set newScale to (newScale + currentScale) DLC05SpaceGravLightBeamREF.setScale newScale set scaleTimer to .005
if (DLC05SpaceGravLightBeamREF.getScale >= .8) set runScaleTimer to 0 endif
else set scaleTimer to (scaleTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
endif
;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ;----If at Zero Atmosphere, and no Astro Suit, kill player ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- if (DLC05SpaceWalkQ.zeroAtmo == 1) && (Player.GetEquipped DLC05AstronautSuit == 0) ShowMessage DLC05DeathInSpaceMessage Player.Kill Player 1 set DLC05SpaceWalkQ.zeroAtmo to 2 endif
if (allNodesRepaired == 0) if (numRepaired == 3) set allNodesRepaired to 1 endif endif
if (allNodesRepaired == 1) ;Lower Central Column ;ShowWarning "All Nodes Repaired. Central Column Lowered" set runScaleTimer to 1 DLC05SpaceGravLightBeamREF.enable 0 DLC05SpaceIrisDoor01REF.PlayGroup Forward 1 DLC05SpaceWalkLevitateTrigREF.enable set allNodesRepaired to 2 endif
if (runTimer == 1)
if (timerStage == 1)
if (timer < 0) player.MoveTo DLC05SpaceBridgeToWaterREF set timer to .00025 set timerStage to 2 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
endif
if (timerStage == 2)
if (timer < 0) player.MoveTo DLC05SpaceBridgeFromWaterREF set timer to 2 set timerStage to 3 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
endif
if (timerStage == 3)
if (timer < 0) DLC05SpaceDoor01REF.PlayGroup Forward 1 DLC05SpaceWalkEnableDeathTriggerTrigREF.Enable set timer to 2 set timerStage to 4 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
endif
endif
End

Begin GameMode
End

scn DLC05SteamworksLDSCRIPT
;---- ;-- give Sally a grenade ;---- short menuSelect short button short grenadeCheckOnce
;-- 0 = None ;-- 1 = Frag ;-- 2 = Plasme short sallyGrenade
;---- ;--Sally opens the door ;---- short doorOpenLines short doorOpenInit float doorOpenTimer
;---- ;-- Sally helping with the works ;-- short worksTimerInit float worksTimer short worksSay
short sallyIgnored short sallyComment short sallyGunTut short sallyFinal
;// sally ignored so she climbs in the vent short sallyIgnoreVent
;// vent timer short ventTimerInit float ventTimer
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// ;// SALLY CRAWLING INTO THE VENT // ;////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// IF ( getStage DLC05SteamworksLD == 8)
;// start when she starts climbing into the vent IF ( DLC05SallyRef.getSitting == 2 && ventTimer == 0) set ventTimerInit to 1 ENDIF
IF ( ventTimerInit >= 1 ) IF ( ventTimerInit == 1 ) set ventTimerInit to 2 set ventTimer to 10 ENDIF
IF ( ventTimerInit == 2 ) IF ( ventTimer > 0 ) set ventTimer to ventTimer - getSecondsPassed ELSE
DLC05SteamSallyTACTQS08.sayTo Player DLC05SteamSallyGuide setStage DLC05SteamworksLD 9 DLC05SallyREF.disable set ventTimerInit to 0
ENDIF ENDIF
ENDIF ENDIF
;///////////////////////////////////// ;// THE TIMER FOR THE DOOR ;/////////////////////////////////////
IF ( doorOpenInit == 1 ) set doorOpenLines to 0 set doorOpenInit to 2 set doorOpenTimer to 25
;// have Sally talk about the door DLC05SteamSallyTACTQS15.sayTo player DLC05SteamSallyDoor
ENDIF
IF ( doorOpenInit == 2 ) IF ( doorOpenTimer > 0 ) set doorOpenTimer to doorOpenTimer - getSecondsPassed
IF ( doorOpenTimer < 13 && doorOpenLines == 0 ) set doorOpenLines to 1 DLC05SteamSallyTACTQS15.sayTo player DLC05SteamSallyDoor
;// enable the patrollers DLC05SteamQS15A.enable 0 DLC05SteamQS15B.enable 0 DLC05SteamQS15C.enable 0
ENDIF
ELSE set doorOpenLines to 2 DLC05SteamSallyTACTQS15.sayTo player DLC05SteamSallyDoor DLC05SteamLockedDoor.setOpenState 1 set doorOpenInit to -1
ENDIF ENDIF
;///////////////////////////////////// ;// THE INFO FOR MOVING THROUGH THE WORKS ;/////////////////////////////////////
IF ( getStage DLC05SteamworksLD == 30 && worksTimerInit == 0) set worksTimerInit to 1 set worksTimer to 5 set worksSay to 1 ENDIF
IF ( worksTimerInit == 1 ) IF ( worksTimer > 0 ) set worksTimer to worksTimer - getSecondsPassed ELSE set worksTimerInit to -1 DLC05SteamWorksExplosionXMRKA.placeAtMe FakeLargeExplosion 1 DLC05SteamWorksExplosionXMRKB.placeAtMe FakeLargeExplosion 1 DLC05SteamSallyTACTQS30.sayTo Player DLC05SteamSallyGuide
;// move the guys DLC05SteamWorksEngineerA.setAV variable07 2 DLC05SteamWorksEngineerA.EVP
DLC05SteamWorksEngineerB.setAV variable07 2 DLC05SteamWorksEngineerB.EVP
DLC05SteamWorksEngineerC.setAV variable07 2 DLC05SteamWorksEngineerC.EVP
DLC05SteamWorksEngineerD.setAV variable07 2 DLC05SteamWorksEngineerD.EVP
ENDIF ENDIF
;////////////////////////////////////// ;// THE FINAL DOOR SALLY IS BEHIND ;////////////////////////////////////// IF ( getStage DLC05SteamworksLD == 55 )
IF ( DLC05SteamAlienQS55A.getDead == 1 && DLC05SteamAlienQS55B.getDead == 1 && sallyFinal == 1) ;// warp Sally over DLC05SallyREF.enable 0 DLC05SallyREF.moveTo DLC05SteamFinalSallyWarpXMRK DLC05SallyREF.EVP DLC05SallyREF.sayTo Player DLC05SteamSallyFinal
;// unlock Sally's door DLC05SteamDoorExit.activate DLC05SteamDoorExitControlHack
set sallyFinal to 2
ENDIF ENDIF END

scn DLC05SteamQuestStepsSCRIPT
BEGIN ONTRIGGERENTER PLAYER
;/////////////////////// ;// STAGE BEGIN ;// have the first set of aliens spawn and walk past ;/////////////////////// IF ( getSelf == DLC05SteamQuestStepBegin )
;// set the appropriate quest stage setStage DLC05SteamworksLD 01
;// move Sally DLC05SallyREF.moveTo DLC05SteamSallyStartXMRK DLC05SallyREF.EVP
;// update DLC05MZ1 quest stage if necessary if ( GetStage DLC05MZ1 < 50 ) SetStage DLC05MZ1 50 endif
ENDIF
;/////////////////////// ;// STAGE 05 ;// have the first set of aliens spawn and walk past ;/////////////////////// IF ( getSelf == DLC05SteamQuestStep05 )
;// set the appropriate quest stage setStage DLC05SteamworksLD 05
;// have Sally say the first line DLC05SallyREF.sayTo Player DLC05SteamSallyGuide
ENDIF
;/////////////////////// ;// STAGE 10 ;// have Sally blow the thing and kill all those aliens ;/////////////////////// IF ( getSelf == DLC05SteamQuestStep10 && getStage DLC05SteamworksLD == 9 && DLC05SteamworksLD.sallyIgnored != 1)
;// the explosion DLC05SteamSallyTACTQS10.sayTo player DLC05SteamSallyGuide
;// set the appropriate quest stage setStage DLC05SteamworksLD 10
IF ( dlc05SteamworksLD.sallyGrenade == 1 ) DLC05SteamQS10ExplosionXMRK.placeAtMe GrenadeFragExplosion 1
DLC05SteamQS10ExplosionXMRK.pushActorAway DLC05SteamQS05A 10 DLC05SteamQS05A.kill player DLC05SteamQS10ExplosionXMRK.pushActorAway DLC05SteamQS05B 10 DLC05SteamQS05B.kill player DLC05SteamQS10ExplosionXMRK.pushActorAway DLC05SteamQS05C 10 DLC05SteamQS05C.kill player
ELSEIF ( dlc05SteamworksLD.sallyGrenade == 2 ) DLC05SteamQS10ExplosionXMRK.placeAtMe GrenadePlasmaExplosion 1
DLC05SteamQS10ExplosionXMRK.pushActorAway DLC05SteamQS05A 10 DLC05SteamQS05A.kill player DLC05SteamQS10ExplosionXMRK.pushActorAway DLC05SteamQS05B 10 DLC05SteamQS05B.kill player DLC05SteamQS10ExplosionXMRK.pushActorAway DLC05SteamQS05C 10 DLC05SteamQS05C.kill player
ENDIF ENDIF
;/////////////////////// ;// STAGE 15 ;// have Sally open the door so the player can avoid the pat ;/////////////////////// IF ( getSelf == DLC05SteamQuestStep15 )
;// set the appropriate quest stage setStage DLC05SteamworksLD 15
;// start the door stuff set DLC05SteamworksLD.doorOpenInit to 1
ENDIF
;/////////////////////// ;// STAGE 16 ;// player made it, close the door behind them ;/////////////////////// IF ( getSelf == DLC05SteamQuestStep16 )
;// set the appropriate quest stage setStage DLC05SteamworksLD 16
DLC05SteamSallyTACTQS15.sayTo player DLC05SteamSallyDoor
;// start the door stuff DLC05SteamLockedDoor.setOpenState 0
ENDIF
;/////////////////////// ;// STAGE 20 ;// warn the player to sneak to the left ;/////////////////////// IF ( getSelf == DLC05SteamQuestStep20 )
;// set the appropriate quest stage setStage DLC05SteamworksLD 20
DLC05SteamSallyTACTQS20.sayTo player DLC05SteamSallyDoor
ENDIF
;/////////////////////// ;// STAGE 25 ;// apologize and tell the player to go right ;/////////////////////// IF ( getSelf == DLC05SteamQuestStep25 )
;// set the appropriate quest stage setStage DLC05SteamworksLD 25
DLC05SteamSallyTACTQS25.sayTo player DLC05SteamSallyWorks
ENDIF
;/////////////////////// ;// STAGE 30 ;// tell the player to wait for the distraction ;/////////////////////// IF ( getSelf == DLC05SteamQuestStep30 )
;// set the appropriate quest stage setStage DLC05SteamworksLD 30
DLC05SteamSallyTACTQS30.sayTo player DLC05SteamSallyWorks
ENDIF
;/////////////////////// ;// STAGE 35 ;// tell the player to wait for the distraction ;/////////////////////// IF ( getSelf == DLC05SteamQuestStep35 )
;// set the appropriate quest stage setStage DLC05SteamworksLD 35
DLC05SteamSallyTACTQS30.sayTo player DLC05SteamSallyWorks DLC05SteamWorksDoor.setOpenState 1
ENDIF
;/////////////////////// ;// STAGE 40 ;// tell the player down the stairs and to the left ;/////////////////////// IF ( getSelf == DLC05SteamQuestStep40 )
;// set the appropriate quest stage setStage DLC05SteamworksLD 40
;// if they skipped the sequence, dont play the line IF ( DLC05SteamWorksLD.sallyIgnored <= 10 ) DLC05SteamSallyTACTQS40.sayTo player DLC05SteamSallyWorks
ENDIF
ENDIF
;/////////////////////// ;// STAGE 43 ;// tell the player down the stairs and to the left ;/////////////////////// IF ( getSelf == DLC05SteamQuestStep43 )
;// set the appropriate quest stage setStage DLC05SteamworksLD 43
DLC05SteamSallyTACTQS43.sayTo player DLC05SteamSallyWorks
ENDIF
;/////////////////////// ;// STAGE 45 ;// Sally has to leave for a bit ;/////////////////////// IF ( getSelf == DLC05SteamQuestStep45 )
;// set the appropriate quest stage setStage DLC05SteamworksLD 45
DLC05SteamSallyTACTQS45.sayTo player DLC05SteamSallyWorks ENDIF
;/////////////////////// ;// STAGE 50 ;// Sally comes back with a bang ;/////////////////////// IF ( getSelf == DLC05SteamQuestStep50 )
;// set the appropriate quest stage setStage DLC05SteamworksLD 50
DLC05SteamSallyTACTQS50.sayTo player DLC05SteamSallyFinal DLC05SteamFinalExplosionXMRK.placeAtMe weapGrenadeFrag 1 DLC05SteamFinalFodder.kill player DLC05SteamFinalExplosionXMRK.pushActorAway DLC05SteamFinalFodder 5
ENDIF
;/////////////////////// ;// STAGE 55 ;// Sally crawls out and rejoins the party ;/////////////////////// IF ( getSelf == DLC05SteamQuestStep55 )
;// set the appropriate quest stage setStage DLC05SteamworksLD 55
DLC05SteamDoorExit.sayTo player DLC05SteamSallyFinal set DLC05SteamworksLD.sallyFinal to 1
ENDIF
;/////////////////////// ;// STAGE 60 ;// shut it all down ;/////////////////////// IF ( getSelf == DLC05SteamQuestStep60 )
;// set the appropriate quest stage setStage DLC05SteamworksLD 60
ENDIF
;/////////////////////// ;// STAGE 65 ;// shut it all down ;/////////////////////// IF ( getSelf == DLC05SteamQuestStep65 )
;// set the appropriate quest stage setStage DLC05SteamworksLD 65
DLC05SallyRef.EVP
ENDIF
;// disable the trigger after it fires disable
END

scn DLC05ControlSCRIPT
short activationState
BEGIN ONACTIVATE
IF ( activationState == 0 ) playgroup forward 0 set activationState to 1 activate ENDIF
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
IF ( activationState == 1 ) IF ( isAnimPlaying forward == 0 ) set activationState to 0 playgroup specialIdle 0
ENDIF ENDIF
END

scn DLC05SpaceWalkRepairNodeSCRIPT
;This activator beeps so that the player can find it and fix it. It updates a variable in the DLC05SpaceWalkMasTrigSCRIPT.
short onLoad short isFixed short isOffset ref myLink
float timer float offsetTimer
Begin OnActivate
;Once "fixed" this script updates the "numRepaired" variable plus 1 in the "DLC05SpaceWalkMasTrigSCRIPT"
if (isFixed == 0) set isFixed to 1 PlayGroup Forward 1 endif
End
Begin GameMode
;Gets a random time to star the beep if (onLoad == 0) set offsetTimer to (5.0/99 * Getrandompercent) ;Random 0-5 set myLink to GetLinkedRef set onLoad to 1 endif
if (isOffset == 0) if (offsetTimer < 0) set isOffset to 1 else set offsetTimer to (offsetTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
;As long as this activator isn't "fixed" it will beep every 5 seconds after the initial (0-5 second) beep if (isFixed == 0)
if (isOffset == 1) if (timer < 0) myLink.PlaySound3D DLC05SpaceWalkRepairBeep set timer to 5 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
endif
;Once the panel is closed loop the flashing lights anim if (isFixed == 1) if (IsAnimPlaying Forward == 0) set DLC05SpaceWalk02MasTrigREF.numRepaired to (DLC05SpaceWalk02MasTrigREF.numRepaired + 1) myLink.PlaySound3D QSTRelayFix PlayGroup Backward 0 set isFixed to 2 endif endif
End

scn DLC05SpaceBridge04MasTrigSCRIPT
short onLoad
; Decompression Sequence Stuff float seqTimer short seqInit short seqStage short decompressionCompleted short decompressionBegun
; SpeedMult Hack short runTimer short timerStage float timer
Begin GameMode
if (onLoad == 0) SetQuestObject DLC05AstronautSuit 0 IMOD FadeInFromWhiteISFX player.SetAv SpeedMult 100 StopQuest DLC05SpaceWalkQ EnablePlayerControls set seqStage to 5 set timerStage to 1 set runTimer to 1 set onLoad to 1 endif
;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ;----If at Zero Atmosphere, and no Astro Suit, kill player ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- if (DLC05SpaceWalkQ.zeroAtmo == 1) && (Player.GetEquipped DLC05AstronautSuit == 0) ShowMessage DLC05DeathInSpaceMessage Player.Kill Player 1 set DLC05SpaceWalkQ.zeroAtmo to 2 endif
;---------------------------------------------- ;----SpeedMult Hack ;----------------------------------------------
if (runTimer == 1)
if (timerStage == 1)
if (timer < 0) player.MoveTo DLC05SpaceBridgeToWater02REF set timer to .00025 set timerStage to 2 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
endif
if (timerStage == 2)
if (timer < 0) player.MoveTo DLC05SpaceBridgeFromWater02REF set timer to .0025 set timerStage to 3 set runTimer to 0 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
endif
endif
;---------------------------------------------- ;----Decompression Sequence ;----------------------------------------------
if (seqInit == 1)
:---------------------------------------------- ; Activate the Alarm Sound :---------------------------------------------- if (seqStage == 5) if (seqTimer < 0)
DLC05SpaceBridge02Alarm01REF.Enable DLC05SpaceBridge02DecompressionDoor01REF.SetOpenState 0 DLC05SpaceBridge02DecompressionDoor01REF.Lock 255 set seqTimer to .5 set seqStage to 10
else set seqTimer to (seqTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
:------------------------------------------------------------- ; Close the door behind the player :------------------------------------------------------------- if (seqStage == 10) if (seqTimer < 0)
DLC05SpaceBridge02DecompressionDoor01REF.SetOpenState 0 set decompressionBegun to 1 set seqTimer to .5 set seqStage to 15
else set seqTimer to (seqTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
:------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Activate the "Door Locked" lights behind the player :------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- if (seqStage == 15) if (seqTimer < 0)
DLC05SpaceBridge02LockLight01bREF.Enable DLC05SpaceBridge02LockLight02BonREF.Enable 0 DLC05SpaceBridge02LockLight01BonREF.Enable 0 DLC05SpaceBridge02LockLight02BoffREF.Disable 0 DLC05SpaceBridge02LockLight01BoffREF.Disable 0 set seqTimer to 2 set seqStage to 20
else set seqTimer to (seqTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
:---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Start decompression/turn on the spray effects :---------------------------------------------------------------------------- if (seqStage == 20) if (seqTimer < 0)
DLC05SpaceBridge02Spray01REF.Enable 1 DLC05SpaceBridge02Spray02REF.Enable 1 DLC05SpaceBridge02Spray03REF.Enable 1 DLC05SpaceBridge02Spray04REF.Enable 1 DLC05SpaceBridge02Spray05REF.Enable 1 DLC05SpaceBridge02Spray06REF.Enable 1 DLC05SpaceBridge02Spray07REF.Enable 1 DLC05SpaceBridge02Spray08REF.Enable 1 DLC05SpaceBridge02Spray09REF.Enable 1 DLC05SpaceBridge02Spray10REF.Enable 1 set seqTimer to 8 set seqStage to 25
else set seqTimer to (seqTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
:------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; From this point on the player will need the suit on or else he will die :------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- if (seqStage == 25) if (seqTimer < 0) set DLC05SpaceWalkQ.zeroAtmo to 0 set seqTimer to .5 set seqStage to 30
else set seqTimer to (seqTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
:---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Stop decompression/turn off the spray effects :---------------------------------------------------------------------------- if (seqStage == 30) if (seqTimer < 0)
DLC05SpaceBridge02Spray01REF.Disable 1 DLC05SpaceBridge02Spray02REF.Disable 1 DLC05SpaceBridge02Spray03REF.Disable 1 DLC05SpaceBridge02Spray04REF.Disable 1 DLC05SpaceBridge02Spray05REF.Disable 1 DLC05SpaceBridge02Spray06REF.Disable 1 DLC05SpaceBridge02Spray07REF.Disable 1 DLC05SpaceBridge02Spray08REF.Disable 1 DLC05SpaceBridge02Spray09REF.Disable 1 DLC05SpaceBridge02Spray10REF.Disable 1 set seqTimer to 2 set seqStage to 35
else set seqTimer to (seqTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
:------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Disable the "Door Locked" lights in front of the player :------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- if (seqStage == 35) if (seqTimer < 0)
DLC05SpaceBridge02LockLight01AREF.disable DLC05SpaceBridge02LockLight02AonREF.disable 0 DLC05SpaceBridge02LockLight01AonREF.disable 0 DLC05SpaceBridge02LockLight02AoffREF.Enable 0 DLC05SpaceBridge02LockLight01AoffREF.Enable 0 DLC05SpaceBridge02DecompressionDoor02REF.unlock set decompressionCompleted to 1 set seqTimer to .5 set seqStage to 40
else set seqTimer to (seqTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
:---------------------------------------------- ; Disable Alarm Sound :---------------------------------------------- if (seqStage == 40) if (seqTimer < 0)
DLC05SpaceBridge02Alarm01REF.Disable set seqTimer to .5 set seqStage to 45
else set seqTimer to (seqTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
:---------------------------------------------- ; Open Door :---------------------------------------------- if (seqStage == 45) if (seqTimer < 0)
DLC05SpaceBridge02DecompressionDoor02REF.SetOpenState 1 set seqTimer to .5 set seqStage to 50
else set seqTimer to (seqTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
endif
End

scn DLC05SpaceBridge01MasTrigSCRIPT
short onLoad
; Decompression Sequence Stuff float seqTimer short seqInit short seqStage short decompressionCompleted short decompressionBegun
short hasSuitOn float killTimer short damageCount short playerDead
Begin GameMode
if (onLoad == 0) ;Player.AddItem DLC05AstronautSuit 1 StartQuest DLC05SpaceWalkQ set DLC05SpaceWalkQ.spaceTopicStage to 5 set seqStage to 5 set onLoad to 1 endif
;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ;----If at Zero Atmosphere, and no Astro Suit, kill player ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
if (DLC05SpaceWalkQ.zeroAtmo == 1) && (Player.GetEquipped DLC05AstronautSuit == 0) ShowMessage DLC05DeathInSpaceMessage Player.Kill Player 1 set DLC05SpaceWalkQ.zeroAtmo to 2 endif
; if (DLC05SpaceWalkQ.zeroAtmo == 1) ; ; if (Player.GetEquipped DLC05AstronautSuit == 1) && (hasSuitOn == 0) ; set damageCount to 0 ; set hasSuitOn to 1 ; endif ; ; if (Player.GetEquipped DLC05AstronautSuit == 0) && (hasSuitOn == 1) ; ;ShowMessage DLC05DeathInSpaceMessage ; set killTimer to .5 ; set hasSuitOn to 0 ; endif ; ; if (hasSuitOn == 0) ; if (killTimer < 0) ; player.DamageAV Health 100 ; player.say Hit ; set damageCount to (damageCount + 1) ; ; if (damageCount >= 4) ; ShowMessage DLC05DeathInSpaceMessage ; player.kill ; endif ; ; set killTimer to .5 ; else ; set killTimer to (killTimer - GetSecondsPassed) ; endif ; ; endif ; ; endif ; ; if (player.GetAV Health <= 0) ; ShowMessage DLC05DeathInSpaceMessage ; endif
;---------------------------------------------- ;----Decompression Sequence ;----------------------------------------------
if (seqInit == 1)
:---------------------------------------------- ; Activate the Alarm Sound :---------------------------------------------- if (seqStage == 5) if (seqTimer < 0)
DLC05SpaceBridge01Alarm01REF.Enable set seqTimer to .5 set seqStage to 10
else set seqTimer to (seqTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
:------------------------------------------------------------- ; Close the door behind the player :------------------------------------------------------------- if (seqStage == 10) if (seqTimer < 0)
DLC05SpaceBridge01DecompressionDoor01REF.Lock 255 set decompressionBegun to 1 set seqTimer to .5 set seqStage to 15
else set seqTimer to (seqTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
:------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Activate the "Door Locked" lights behind the player :------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- if (seqStage == 15) if (seqTimer < 0)
DLC05SpaceBridge01LockLight01bREF.Enable DLC05SpaceBridge01LockLight02BonREF.Enable 0 DLC05SpaceBridge01LockLight01BonREF.Enable 0 DLC05SpaceBridge01LockLight02BoffREF.Disable 0 DLC05SpaceBridge01LockLight01BoffREF.Disable 0 set seqTimer to 2 set seqStage to 20
else set seqTimer to (seqTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
:---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Start decompression/turn on the spray effects :---------------------------------------------------------------------------- if (seqStage == 20) if (seqTimer < 0)
DLC05SpaceBridge01Spray01REF.Enable 1 DLC05SpaceBridge01Spray02REF.Enable 1 DLC05SpaceBridge01Spray03REF.Enable 1 DLC05SpaceBridge01Spray04REF.Enable 1 DLC05SpaceBridge01Spray05REF.Enable 1 DLC05SpaceBridge01Spray06REF.Enable 1 DLC05SpaceBridge01Spray07REF.Enable 1 DLC05SpaceBridge01Spray08REF.Enable 1 DLC05SpaceBridge01Spray09REF.Enable 1 DLC05SpaceBridge01Spray10REF.Enable 1 set seqTimer to 8 set seqStage to 25
else set seqTimer to (seqTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
:------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; From this point on the player no longer needs to wear the astro suit :------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- if (seqStage == 25) if (seqTimer < 0) set DLC05SpaceWalkQ.zeroAtmo to 1 set seqTimer to .5 set seqStage to 30
else set seqTimer to (seqTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
:---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Stop decompression/turn off the spray effects :---------------------------------------------------------------------------- if (seqStage == 30) if (seqTimer < 0)
DLC05SpaceBridge01Spray01REF.Disable 1 DLC05SpaceBridge01Spray02REF.Disable 1 DLC05SpaceBridge01Spray03REF.Disable 1 DLC05SpaceBridge01Spray04REF.Disable 1 DLC05SpaceBridge01Spray05REF.Disable 1 DLC05SpaceBridge01Spray06REF.Disable 1 DLC05SpaceBridge01Spray07REF.Disable 1 DLC05SpaceBridge01Spray08REF.Disable 1 DLC05SpaceBridge01Spray09REF.Disable 1 DLC05SpaceBridge01Spray10REF.Disable 1 set seqTimer to 2 set seqStage to 35
else set seqTimer to (seqTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
:------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Disable the "Door Locked" lights in front of the player :------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- if (seqStage == 35) if (seqTimer < 0)
DLC05SpaceBridge01LockLight01AREF.disable DLC05SpaceBridge01LockLight02AonREF.disable 0 DLC05SpaceBridge01LockLight01AonREF.disable 0 DLC05SpaceBridge01LockLight02AoffREF.Enable 0 DLC05SpaceBridge01LockLight01AoffREF.Enable 0 DLC05SpaceBridge01DecompressionDoor02REF.unlock DLC05SpaceBridge01DecompressionDoor02REF.SetOpenState 1 set decompressionCompleted to 1 set seqTimer to .5 set seqStage to 40
else set seqTimer to (seqTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
:---------------------------------------------- ; Disable Alarm Sound :---------------------------------------------- if (seqStage == 40) if (seqTimer < 0)
DLC05SpaceBridge01Alarm01REF.Disable set seqTimer to .5 set seqStage to 45
else set seqTimer to (seqTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
endif
End

scn DLC05SpaceWalk01TalkTrig01SCRIPT
short doOnce
Begin OnTriggerEnter Player
if (doOnce == 0) DLC05SpaceWalk01Talk01SpeakerREF.Say DLC05SpaceWalkTopic 0 set doOnce to 1 endif
End
Player presses button and goes through decompression (Steam Effects along with Sound Effects) then the opposite door unlocks

scn DLC05SpaceWalk03MasTrigSCRIPT
short onLoad
Begin GameMode
if (onLoad == 0) ShowWarning "Player rides the central elevator to the upper part of the ship." set onLoad to 1 endif
;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ;----If at Zero Atmosphere, and no Astro Suit, kill player ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- if (DLC05SpaceWalkQ.zeroAtmo == 1) && (Player.GetEquipped DLC05AstronautSuit == 0) ShowMessage DLC05DeathInSpaceMessage Player.Kill set DLC05SpaceWalkQ.zeroAtmo to 2 endif
