scn DLC05TrigHangarEnemyUpstairsSCRIPT
;int doOnce ref actionRef
begin onTriggerEnter
set actionRef to getActionRef if actionRef != DLC05PaulsonRef && actionRef != playerRef DLC05PaulsonRef.Say DLC05HQPaulsonEnemyUpstairs if actionref.getav health > 50 actionRef.setav health 50 endif endif end

scn DLC05DeathRayPos01ButtonSCRIPT
short activationState
short update ;1 == off, 2 == on
short onLoad float timer short timerInit
BEGIN ONACTIVATE
IF ( activationState == 0 ) && (IsAnimPlaying SpecialIdle == 1) playgroup forward 0 set activationState to 1 ;set timerInit to 1 set DLC05DeathRayREF.pos01 to 1 set DLC05DeathRayREF.pos02 to 0 if (DLC05DeathRayREF.anyButtonPressed < 1) set DLC05DeathRayREF.anyButtonPressed to 1 endif ENDIF
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
IF ( onLoad == 0 ) set timer to .5 set onLoad to 1
ENDIF
IF ( timerInit == 1) IF ( timer < 0 ) ;set DLC05DeathRayREF.pos01 to 1 set timer to .5 set timerInit to 0 ELSE set timer to ( timer - GetSecondsPassed )
ENDIF ENDIF
IF ( activationState == 1 ) IF ( isAnimPlaying forward == 0 ) set activationState to 2 playgroup backward 0 ;playgroup specialIdle 0
ENDIF ENDIF
IF ( activationState == 2 ) IF ( IsAnimPlaying SpecialIdle == 1 ) set activationState to 0 ;playgroup specialIdle 0
ENDIF ENDIF
IF (update == 1) PlayGroup Backward 0 set update to -1
ENDIF
IF (update == 2) PlayGroup SpecialIdle 0 set update to -1
ENDIF
IF (DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3AllGeneratorsDestroyed == 1) playgroup backward 1 endif
END

scn DLC05DeathRaySCRIPT
short onLoad
short pos01 ; Safe Direction (away from earth) short pos02 ; Unsafe Direction (toward earth) short updateCharge ; Update the current charge stage short chargeStage ; Current Charge Stage(how many times charge button has been pressed) short chargeReady ; Current READY charge stage(how many generators are open and ready) short isFiring ; Is the death ray firing? short destroyedGens ; Number of generators destroyed short openGen1 short openGen2 short openGen3 short openGen4 short gen1D short gen2D short gen3D short gen4D short aliensSpawned short anyButtonPressed
float isFiringTimer
short isFireHoloOff short isChargeHoloOff short isPos01HoloOff short isPos02HoloOff
;Mark's FX variables--------------------
short powerToCore short waitForIdle short earthDamage
ref currentLaser
;Mark's FX variables--------------------
Begin GameMode
;Control the holographs ;Fire Holo if (DLC05DeathRayFireButtonREF.IsAnimPlaying Backward == 1) && (isFireHoloOff == 0) DLC05DeathRayFireHoloREF.disable 1 DLC05DeathRayFireHoloGlowREF.disable 1 set isFireHoloOff to 1 endif if (DLC05DeathRayFireButtonRef.IsAnimPlaying Backward != 1) && (isFireHoloOff == 1) DLC05DeathRayFireHoloREF.enable 1 DLC05DeathRayFireHoloGlowREF.enable 1 set isFireHoloOff to 0 endif
;Charge Holo if (DLC05DeathRayChargeButtonREF.IsAnimPlaying Backward == 1) && (isChargeHoloOff == 0) DLC05DeathRayChargeHoloREF.disable 1 DLC05DeathRayChargeHoloGlowREF.disable 1 set isChargeHoloOff to 1 endif if (DLC05DeathRayChargeButtonREF.IsAnimPlaying Backward != 1) && (isChargeHoloOff == 1) DLC05DeathRayChargeHoloREF.enable 1 DLC05DeathRayChargeHoloGlowREF.enable 1 set isChargeHoloOff to 0 endif
;Pos01 Holo if (DLC05DeathRayPos01ButtonREF.IsAnimPlaying Backward == 1) && (isPos01HoloOff == 0) DLC05DeathRayPos01HoloREF.disable 1 DLC05DeathRayPos01HoloGlowREF.disable 1 set isPos01HoloOff to 1 endif if (DLC05DeathRayPos01ButtonREF.IsAnimPlaying Backward != 1) && (isPos01HoloOff == 1) DLC05DeathRayPos01HoloREF.enable 1 DLC05DeathRayPos01HoloGlowREF.enable 1 set isPos01HoloOff to 0 endif
;Pos02 Holo if (DLC05DeathRayPos02ButtonREF.IsAnimPlaying Backward == 1) && (isPos02HoloOff == 0) DLC05DeathRayPos02HoloREF.disable 1 DLC05DeathRayPos02HoloGlowREF.disable 1 set isPos02HoloOff to 1 endif if (DLC05DeathRayPos02ButtonREF.IsAnimPlaying Backward != 1) && (isPos02HoloOff == 1) DLC05DeathRayPos02HoloREF.enable 1 DLC05DeathRayPos02HoloGlowREF.enable 1 set isPos02HoloOff to 0 endif
;If any button is pressed panic the aliens if (anyButtonPressed == 1) DLC05DeathRayControlAlien01REF.SetAV Variable05 1 DLC05DeathRayControlAlien02REF.SetAV Variable05 1 DLC05DeathRayControlAlien03REF.SetAV Variable05 1 DLC05DeathRayControlAlien04REF.SetAV Variable05 1 DLC05DeathRayControlAlien01REF.EVP DLC05DeathRayControlAlien02REF.EVP DLC05DeathRayControlAlien03REF.EVP DLC05DeathRayControlAlien04REF.EVP set anyButtonPressed to 2 endif
;If once two generators are destroyed spawn in the aliens if (destroyedGens >= 2) && (aliensSpawned == 0) set DLC05DeathRayTeleAttackWave01REF.state to 1 set aliensSpawned to 1 endif
;if any generator is opened set playgroup for deathray core to show increased power and switch laser ref to larger laser if (powerToCore == 0) if (openGen1 == 1 || openGen2 == 1 || openGen3 == 1 || openGen4 == 1) DLC05DeathRayCoreREF.playgroup forward 1 imod DLC05DeathRayRevUpLongISFX set powerToCore to 1 endif endif
;Control what order the Generators open in
;Generator 1 always opens first, unless it's disabled if (chargeStage >= 1) && (gen1D == 0) set openGen1 to 1 endif if (chargeStage < 1) && (gen1D == 0) set openGen1 to 0 endif
;Generator 2 opens second, unless it's disabled or... if (chargeStage >= 2) && (gen2D == 0) set openGen2 to 1 endif if (chargeStage < 2) && (gen2D == 0) set openGen2 to 0 endif
;unless Generator 1 is disabled, then it opens first if (chargeStage >= 1) && (gen1D == 1) set openGen2 to 1 endif if (chargeStage < 1) && (gen1D == 1) set openGen2 to 0 endif
;Generator 3 opens third, unless it's disabled or... if (chargeStage >= 3) && (gen3D == 0) set openGen3 to 1 endif if (chargeStage < 3) && (gen3D == 0) set openGen3 to 0 endif
;unless Generator 1 is disabled, but 2 isn't, then it opens second... if (chargeStage >= 2) && (gen2D == 0) && (gen1D == 1) set openGen3 to 1 endif if (chargeStage < 2) && (gen2D == 0) && (gen1D == 1) set openGen3 to 0 endif
;unless Generator 2 is disabled, but 1 isn't, then it opens second... if (chargeStage >= 2) && (gen2D == 1) && (gen1D == 0) set openGen3 to 1 endif if (chargeStage < 2) && (gen2D == 1) && (gen1D == 0) set openGen3 to 0 endif
;unless Generator 1 and 2 are disabled, then it opens first if (chargeStage >= 1) && (gen2D == 1) && (gen1D == 1) set openGen3 to 1 endif if (chargeStage < 1) && (gen2D == 1) && (gen1D == 1) set openGen3 to 0 endif
;Generator 4 opens fourth, unless it's disabled or... if (chargeStage >= 4) && (gen4D == 0) set openGen4 to 1 endif if (chargeStage < 4) && (gen4D == 0) set openGen4 to 0 endif
;unless Generator 1 is disabled, and 2 and 3 aren't, then it opens third... if (chargeStage >= 3) && (gen1D == 1) && (gen2D == 0) && (gen3D == 0) set openGen4 to 1 endif if (chargeStage < 3) && (gen1D == 1) && (gen2D == 0) && (gen3D == 0) set openGen4 to 0 endif
;unless Generator 2 is disabled, and 1 and 3 aren't, then it opens third... if (chargeStage >= 3) && (gen1D == 0) && (gen2D == 1) && (gen3D == 0) set openGen4 to 1 endif if (chargeStage < 3) && (gen1D == 0) && (gen2D == 1) && (gen3D == 0) set openGen4 to 0 endif
;unless Generator 3 is disabled, and 1 and 2 aren't, then it opens third... if (chargeStage >= 3) && (gen1D == 0) && (gen2D == 0) && (gen3D == 1) set openGen4 to 1 endif if (chargeStage < 3) && (gen1D == 0) && (gen2D == 0) && (gen3D == 1) set openGen4 to 0 endif
;unless Generators 1 and 2 are disabled, and 3 isn't, then it opens second... if (chargeStage >= 2) && (gen1D == 1) && (gen2D == 1) && (gen3D == 0) set openGen4 to 1 endif if (chargeStage < 2) && (gen1D == 1) && (gen2D == 1) && (gen3D == 0) set openGen4 to 0 endif
;unless Generators 2 and 3 are disabled, and 1 isn't, then it opens second... if (chargeStage >= 2) && (gen1D == 0) && (gen2D == 1) && (gen3D == 1) set openGen4 to 1 endif if (chargeStage < 2) && (gen1D == 0) && (gen2D == 1) && (gen3D == 1) set openGen4 to 0 endif
;unless Generators 3 and 1 are disabled, and 2 isn't, then it opens second... if (chargeStage >= 2) && (gen1D == 1) && (gen2D == 0) && (gen3D == 1) set openGen4 to 1 endif if (chargeStage < 2) && (gen1D == 1) && (gen2D == 0) && (gen3D == 1) set openGen4 to 0 endif
;unless Generators 1, 2, and 3 are disabled, then it opens first... if (chargeStage >= 1) && (gen1D == 1) && (gen2D == 1) && (gen3D == 1) set openGen4 to 1 endif if (chargeStage < 1) && (gen1D == 1) && (gen2D == 1) && (gen3D == 1) set openGen4 to 0 endif
;All 4 generators are destroyed if (gen1D == 1) && (gen2D == 1) && (gen3D == 1) && (gen4D == 1) && (DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3AllGeneratorsDestroyed == 0) set DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3AllGeneratorsDestroyed to 1 DLC05DRtoLQForceFieldREF.SetOpenState 1 DLC05MZ3DeathRaytoQuartersDoorREF.Unlock SetObjectiveCompleted DLC05MZ3 20 1 DLC05DeathRayCoreREF.playgroup left 1 ;power down core DLC05DeathRayDestroyedEnablerREF.Disable ;turn off lights and effects around core OBJDLC05DeathRayIdleLPREF.disable ;turn off death ray core idle sound playSound OBJDLC05DeathRayShutdown ;play death ray shutdown sound set DLC05DeathRayPos01ButtonREF.update to 1 set DLC05DeathRayChargeButtonREF.update to 1 set DLC05DeathRayFireButtonREF.update to 1 set DLC05DeathRayPos02ButtonREF.update to 1 endif
;On load make sure the death ray is in the "safe" position if (onLoad == 0) set pos01 to 1 set DLC05DeathRayPos01ButtonREF.update to 1 set onLoad to 1 set isFiringTimer to 1.5 endif
;Set death ray to "safe" position if Pos01 is selected if (pos01 == 1) ;DLC05DeathRayREF.setAngle Z 90 DLC05DeathRayREF.PlayGroup Backward 0 ;set DLC05DeathRayPos01ButtonREF.update to 1 ;set DLC05DeathRayPos02ButtonREF.update to 1 ;ShowWarning "Death Ray in SAFE Position" set pos01 to 2 endif
if (pos01 == 2) if (DLC05DeathRayREF.IsAnimPlaying Backward == 0) set DLC05DeathRayPos02ButtonREF.update to 2 ;set DLC05DeathRayFireButtonREF.update to 2 set pos01 to 3 endif endif
;Set death ray to "dangerous" position if Pos02 is selection if (pos02 == 1) ;DLC05DeathRayREF.setAngle Z -100 DLC05DeathRayREF.PlayGroup Forward 0 ;set DLC05DeathRayPos01ButtonREF.update to 1 ;set DLC05DeathRayPos02ButtonREF.update to 1 ;ShowWarning "Death Ray in DANGERIOUS Position" set pos02 to 2 endif
if (pos02 == 2) if (DLC05DeathRayREF.IsAnimPlaying Forward == 0) set DLC05DeathRayPos01ButtonREF.update to 2 ;set DLC05DeathRayFireButtonREF.update to 2 set pos02 to 3 endif endif
;If the charge button has been hit update the charge if (updateCharge == 1)
;First Charge State if (chargeStage == 1) if (destroyedGens == 3) set DLC05DeathRayChargeButtonREF.update to 1 endif ;ShowWarning "Death Ray at Charge Level 1" set updateCharge to 0 endif
;Second Charge State if (chargeStage == 2) if (destroyedGens == 2) set DLC05DeathRayChargeButtonREF.update to 1 endif ;ShowWarning "Death Ray at Charge Level 2" set updateCharge to 0 endif
;Third Charge State if (chargeStage == 3) if (destroyedGens == 1) set DLC05DeathRayChargeButtonREF.update to 1 endif ;ShowWarning "Death Ray at Charge Level 3" set updateCharge to 0 endif
;Fourth Charge State if (chargeStage == 4) ;ShowWarning "Death Ray at Charge Level 4" set DLC05DeathRayChargeButtonREF.update to 1
;Put all of the buttons in the "deactivated" state now that the gun is disabled ;set DLC05DeathRayPos01ButtonREF.update to 1 ;set DLC05DeathRayChargeButtonREF.update to 1 ;set DLC05DeathRayFireButtonREF.update to 1 ;set DLC05DeathRayPos02ButtonREF.update to 1 set updateCharge to 0 endif
endif
;If the fire button is hit... if (isFiring == 1) imod DLC05DeathRayRevUpISFX player.placeAtMe DLC05FF01cartShake 1 playSound OBJDLC05DeathRayFire DLC05DeathRayCoreREF.playgroup backward 1 set waitForIdle to 1 ;kick off loop waiting for core and pillar idle anims to finish set isFiring to 2 set isFiringTimer to 2
set DLC05DeathRayChargeButtonREF.update to 1 ;set DLC05DeathRayFireButtonREF.update to 1 set DLC05DeathRayPos02ButtonREF.update to 1 set DLC05DeathRayPos01ButtonREF.update to 1
endif
;start ray charge anim based on which position the ray is in the wait if (isFiring == 2) if (isFiringTimer < 0) if (pos01 == 3) DLC05DeathRayREF.playgroup right 1 elseif (pos02 == 3) DLC05DeathRayREF.playgroup left 1 endif set isFiring to -1 set isFiringTimer to 3 else set isFiringTimer to (isFiringTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
;play imod flash and firing sound fx to simulate the start of the laser fire if (isFiring == -1) if (isFiringTimer < 0) if (openGen1 == 1 || openGen2 == 1 || openGen3 == 1 || openGen4 == 1) imod DLC05DeathRayISFX rimod DLC05DeathRayRevUpLongISFX rimod DLC05DeathRayRevUpISFX player.placeAtMe DLC05FF01cartLurch 1 set currentLaser to DLC05DeathRayLaserLevel2 set isFiring to 3 set isFiringTimer to 1.5 else imod DLC05DeathRayLiteISFX rimod DLC05DeathRayRevUpLongISFX rimod DLC05DeathRayRevUpISFX set currentLaser to DLC05DeathRayLaserLevel1 player.placeAtMe DLC05FF01cartShake 1 set isFiring to 3 set isFiringTimer to 0 endif else set isFiringTimer to (isFiringTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
;Fire actual weapon as visuallisation of laser itself if (isFiring == 3) if (isFiringTimer < 0)
; toggle current laser to space laser if pointed away from earth if (pos01 == 3) set currentLaser to DLC05DeathRayLaserSpace endif
; play damage anim on earth depending on if laser has been fired before or not if (earthDamage == 0 && pos02 == 3) DLC05spaceDome02altREF.playgroup backward 1 set earthDamage to 1 elseif (pos02 == 3) DLC05spaceDome02altREF.playgroup left 1 endif
;Firing at Charge Stage Zero if (chargeReady == 0) DLC05DeathRayREF.fireWeapon currentLaser ;ShowWarning "Death Ray Firing at Charge Stage 0" ;set isFiring to 2 ;set chargeStage to 0 ;set chargeReady to 0 endif
;Firing at Charge Stage One if (chargeReady == 1) DLC05DeathRayREF.fireWeapon currentLaser ;ShowWarning "Death Ray Firing at Charge Stage 1" ;set isFiring to 2 ;set chargeStage to 0 ;set chargeReady to 0 endif
;Firing at Charge Stage Two if (chargeReady == 2) DLC05DeathRayREF.fireWeapon currentLaser ;ShowWarning "Death Ray Firing at Charge Stage 2" ;set isFiring to 2 ;set chargeStage to 0 ;set chargeReady to 0 endif
;Firing at Charge Stage Three if (chargeReady == 3) DLC05DeathRayREF.fireWeapon currentLaser ;ShowWarning "Death Ray Firing at Charge Stage 3" ;set isFiring to 2 ;set chargeStage to 0 ;set chargeReady to 0 endif
;Firing at Charge Stage Three if (chargeReady == 4) DLC05DeathRayREF.fireWeapon currentLaser ;ShowWarning "Death Ray Firing at Charge Stage 4" ;set isFiring to 2 ;set chargeStage to 0 ;set chargeReady to 0 endif
set isFiring to 4 set isFiringTimer to 1.5
else set isFiringTimer to (isFiringTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
if (isFiring == 4) if (isFiringTimer < 0) ;done firing set isFiring to 0 set chargeStage to 0 set chargeReady to 0
set isFiringTimer to 1.5
set DLC05DeathRayFireButtonREF.update to 2
if (pos01 > 0) set DLC05DeathRayPos02ButtonREF.update to 2 endif
if (pos02 > 0) set DLC05DeathRayPos01ButtonREF.update to 2 endif
if (destroyedGens < 4) set DLC05DeathRayChargeButtonREF.update to 2 endif else set isFiringTimer to (isFiringTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
;waiter to restart idle after fire animation is over if (waitForIdle == 1) if (DLC05DeathRayCoreREF.isAnimPlaying backward == 0) DLC05DeathRayCoreREF.playgroup specialidle 1 ;DLC05MZRmWinPillarREF01.playgroup specialidle 1 ;DLC05MZRmWinPillarREF02.playgroup specialidle 1 ;DLC05MZRmWinPillarREF03.playgroup specialidle 1 ;DLC05MZRmWinPillarREF04.playgroup specialidle 1 set waitForIdle to 0 endif endif
End

scn DLC05DeathRayChargeButtonSCRIPT
short activationState short onLoad
short maxButtonPresses
short update ;1 == off, 2 == on
BEGIN ONACTIVATE
IF (DLC05DeathRayREF.chargeStage != 4) && (DLC05DeathRayREF.destroyedGens == 0) IF ( activationState == 0 ) && (IsAnimPlaying SpecialIdle == 1) playgroup forward 0 set activationState to 1 if (DLC05DeathRayREF.anyButtonPressed < 1) set DLC05DeathRayREF.anyButtonPressed to 1 endif
ENDIF ENDIF
IF (DLC05DeathRayREF.chargeStage != 3) && (DLC05DeathRayREF.destroyedGens == 1) IF ( activationState == 0 ) && (IsAnimPlaying SpecialIdle == 1) playgroup forward 0 set activationState to 1
ENDIF ENDIF
IF (DLC05DeathRayREF.chargeStage != 2) && (DLC05DeathRayREF.destroyedGens == 2) IF ( activationState == 0 ) && (IsAnimPlaying SpecialIdle == 1) playgroup forward 0 set activationState to 1
ENDIF ENDIF
IF (DLC05DeathRayREF.chargeStage != 1) && (DLC05DeathRayREF.destroyedGens == 3) IF ( activationState == 0 ) && (IsAnimPlaying SpecialIdle == 1) playgroup forward 0 set activationState to 1
ENDIF ENDIF
ELSE ;Do Nothing
ENDIF
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
IF ( onLoad == 0 ) set maxButtonPresses to 4 set onLoad to 1
ENDIF
IF ( activationState == 1 ) IF ( isAnimPlaying forward == 0 ) set DLC05DeathRayREF.updateCharge to 1 set DLC05DeathRayREF.chargeStage to (DLC05DeathRayREF.chargeStage + 1) set activationState to 0 playgroup specialIdle 0
ENDIF ENDIF
IF (update == 1) PlayGroup Backward 0 set update to -1
ENDIF
IF (update == 2) PlayGroup SpecialIdle 0 set update to -1
ENDIF
END

scn DLC05DeathRayFireButtonSCRIPT
short activationState
short update ;1 == off, 2 == on short deathRayMovingForward short deathRayMovingBackward short posButtonsMovingForward short posButtonsMovingBackward short doOnce
BEGIN ONACTIVATE
IF ( activationState == 0 ) && ( IsAnimPlaying SpecialIdle == 1 ) playgroup forward 0 set DLC05DeathRayREF.isFiring to 1 set activationState to 1 if (DLC05DeathRayREF.anyButtonPressed < 1) set DLC05DeathRayREF.anyButtonPressed to 1 endif ENDIF
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
IF ( doOnce == 0 ) set update to 2 set doOnce to 1
ENDIF
IF ( activationState == 1 ) IF ( isAnimPlaying forward == 0 ) set activationState to 0 playgroup backward 0
ENDIF ENDIF
IF (update <= 1) PlayGroup Backward 0 set update to 3
ENDIF
IF (update == 2) PlayGroup SpecialIdle 0 set update to 3
ENDIF
;If the death ray is moving the fire button can't be pressed IF (DLC05DeathRayREF.IsAnimPlaying Forward == 1) && (deathRayMovingForward == 0) set update to 1 set deathRayMovingForward to 1 ENDIF
IF (DLC05DeathRayREF.IsAnimPlaying Forward == 0) && (deathRayMovingForward == 1) set update to 2 set deathRayMovingForward to 0 ENDIF
IF (DLC05DeathRayREF.IsAnimPlaying Backward == 1) && (deathRayMovingBackward == 0) set update to 1 set deathRayMovingBackward to 1 ENDIF
IF (DLC05DeathRayREF.IsAnimPlaying Backward == 0) && (deathRayMovingBackward == 1) set update to 2 set deathRayMovingBackward to 0 ENDIF
IF (DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3AllGeneratorsDestroyed == 1) playgroup backward 1 endif
;If the death ray is moving the fire button can't be pressed ; IF (DLC05DeathRayREF.IsAnimPlaying Forward == 1) && (deathRayMovingForward == 0) ; set update to 1 ; set deathRayMovingForward to 1 ; ENDIF ; ; IF (DLC05DeathRayREF.IsAnimPlaying Forward == 0) && (deathRayMovingForward == 1) ; set update to 2 ; set deathRayMovingForward to 0 ; ENDIF ; ; IF (DLC05DeathRayREF.IsAnimPlaying Backward == 1) && (deathRayMovingBackward == 0) ; set update to 1 ; set deathRayMovingBackward to 1 ; ENDIF ; ; IF (DLC05DeathRayREF.IsAnimPlaying Backward == 0) && (deathRayMovingBackward == 1) ; set update to 2 ; set deathRayMovingBackward to 0 ; ENDIF
END

scn DLC05DeathRayPos02ButtonSCRIPT
short activationState
short update ;1 == off, 2 == on
short onLoad float timer short timerInit
BEGIN ONACTIVATE
IF ( activationState == 0 ) && (IsAnimPlaying SpecialIdle == 1) playgroup forward 0 set activationState to 1 ;set timerInit to 1 set DLC05DeathRayREF.pos02 to 1 set DLC05DeathRayREF.pos01 to 0 if (DLC05DeathRayREF.anyButtonPressed < 1) set DLC05DeathRayREF.anyButtonPressed to 1 endif ENDIF
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
IF ( onLoad == 0 ) playgroup forward 1 set activationstate to 1 set timer to .5 set onLoad to 1
ENDIF
IF ( timerInit == 1) IF ( timer < 0 ) ;set DLC05DeathRayREF.pos02 to 1 set timer to .5 set timerInit to 0 ELSE set timer to ( timer - GetSecondsPassed )
ENDIF ENDIF
IF ( activationState == 1 ) IF ( isAnimPlaying forward == 0 ) set activationState to 2 playgroup backward 0 ;playgroup specialIdle 0
ENDIF ENDIF
IF ( activationState == 2 ) IF ( IsAnimPlaying SpecialIdle == 1 ) set activationState to 0 ;playgroup specialIdle 0
ENDIF ENDIF
IF (update == 1) PlayGroup Backward 0 set update to -1
ENDIF
IF (update == 2) PlayGroup SpecialIdle 0 set update to -1
ENDIF
IF (DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3AllGeneratorsDestroyed == 1) playgroup backward 1 endif
END

After killing all aliens in this room the player is told, over loudspeaker, that the thing in front of him is the ships core and that it leads to the Death Ray at the bottom of the ship. The Death Ray must be a level or two below this point.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: ShowWarning "After killing all aliens in this room the player is told, over loudspeaker, that the thing in front of him is the ships core and that it leads to the Death Ray at the bottom of the ship. The Death Ray must be a level or two below this point."

ESP.ORIGINAL:
scn DLC05DeathRayDialogue10TrigSCRIPT
short doOnce
Begin GameMode
if (doOnce == 1) ShowWarning "After killing all aliens in this room the player is told, over loudspeaker, that the thing in front of him is the ships core and that it leads to the Death Ray at the bottom of the ship. The Death Ray must be a level or two below this point." set doOnce to 0 endif
End
After killing all aliens in this room the player is told, over loudspeaker, that he needs to find some way to deactivate the death ray. Maybe there is some way to overheat it?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: ShowWarning "After killing all aliens in this room the player is told, over loudspeaker, that he needs to find some way to deactivate the death ray. Maybe there is some way to overheat it?"

ESP.ORIGINAL:
scn DLC05DeathRayDialogue20TrigSCRIPT
short doOnce
Begin GameMode
if (doOnce == 1) ShowWarning "After killing all aliens in this room the player is told, over loudspeaker, that he needs to find some way to deactivate the death ray. Maybe there is some way to overheat it?" set doOnce to 0 endif
End

scn DLC05EXLabTeleControlSCRIPT
short activationState ref linkedRef
BEGIN ONACTIVATE
set linkedRef to GetLinkedRef
IF ( activationState == 0 ) playgroup forward 0 set activationState to 1 if linkedRef.getIsReference DLC05ExLabBrahminMarker01 linkedRef.placeatme DLC05BrahminExperiment01 endif ; if linkedRef.getIsReference DLC05ExLabBrahminMarker02 ; linkedRef.placeatme DLC05BrahminExperiment02 ; endif ; if linkedRef.getIsReference DLC05ExLabBrahminMarker03 ; linkedRef.placeatme DLC05BrahminExperiment03 ; endif ENDIF
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
IF ( activationState == 1 ) IF ( isAnimPlaying forward == 0 ) set activationState to 0 playgroup specialIdle 0
ENDIF ENDIF
END

scn DLC05ExLabWeaponFireControlSCRIPT
short activationState ref linkedRef
BEGIN ONACTIVATE
IF ( activationState == 0 ) playgroup forward 0 set activationState to 1 set linkedRef to GetLinkedRef if linkedRef.getDisabled == 0 ; linkedRef.fireWeapon DLC05TestAlienRifle endif ENDIF
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
IF ( activationState == 1 ) IF ( isAnimPlaying forward == 0 ) set activationState to 0 playgroup specialIdle 0
ENDIF ENDIF
END

scn DLC05AlienBedSCRIPT
short activationState
BEGIN ONACTIVATE PLAYER
IF ( activationState == 0 ) set activationState to 1 setOpenState 1
ELSEIF ( activationState == 1 ) set activationState to 0 setOpenState 0
ENDIF END

scn DLC05BridgeLDSCRIPT
;// chat variables short interElliot short interPaulson short interSally short interSomah
;// the bridge's deathcounter short deathCounter
;// setup the vars short bridgeVars
;// EMP hit vars short empChat
;// Paulson's Variables float paulsonTeleportTimer
;// Our Ship Variables short shipSay
;// Enemy Ship Variables short mainScreen short attackTimer short attackTimerInit short attackPhaseRand short justShot
;// enemies teleporting in short teleporterInit float teleportTimer short teleportBlock
;// deathray variables short deathRay
;// sally's help lines short sallyHelp short sallyHelpJam
;// the power vars short powerCurrentState short generatorCount
;// COMBAT VARIABLES float shipHP float shipHPMAX short enemyHP short enemyHPMAX short gunRecharge short playerShipDraw short playerShipPrev short enemyGunRand short enemyGunPower short enemyGunPrevious float enemyGunStateTimer
;// SALLY'S COMMANDS float sallyCommandTimer short elliotFirstPos short paulsonFirstPos short sallyFirstPos short somahFirstPos short sallyCommandPhase short sallyCommandHold short sallyCommandCounter
;// SPIN THE WORLD float spinControl
;// random sayTos short paulsonSayCount short sallySayCount short somahSayCount short tercorienSayCount float randomSayTimer short randomSayInit short randomSayer
;// the ship's flare short flareStepper float flareTimer
;// say blocker short sayBlocker
;// variables for the main Timer float mainTimer short mainTimerPhase
;// ship rumble timer short rumbleControl
;// samurai scene short firstPorters short samScene
;// alien head holo short alienHoloState
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;//////////////////// ;// setup all the variables we need ;//////////////////// IF ( bridgeVars == 0 ) set mainTimer to 300 set mainTimerPhase to 0 set deathCounter to 5 set elliotFirstPos to 0 set sallyFirstPos to 0 set somahFirstPos to 0 set playerShipPrev to 1
;// combat variables set shipHPMAX to 800 set shipHP to shipHPMAX set enemyHPMAX to 650 set enemyHP to enemyHPMAX set gunRecharge to 10
;// start on the even DLC05BridgePlayerShipEven.enable 0
set bridgeVars to 1
DLC05BridgeHoloHead.playgroup backward 0 ENDIF
;//////////////////// ;// POLL FOR ALL DEAD ON THE BRIDGE ;//////////////////// IF ( deathCounter == 0 && bridgeVars == 1 ) DLC05BridgeHoloHead.playgroup forward 0 setStage DLC05BridgeLD 50 set alienHoloState to 1
;// move the survivors when its all done ELSEIF ( deathCounter == -2 )
IF ( mainScreen == 1 ) DLC05BridgeMainScreen.sayTo player DLC05BridgeTopicMainScreen set alienHoloState to 1 set mainScreen to 2
ENDIF ENDIF
;//////////////////// ;// THE MAIN TIMER FOR ALL OF THE FUN ;//////////////////// IF ( getStage DLC05BridgeLD == 52 ) IF ( mainTimer > 0 && DLC05EMPPowerDown.getDisabled != 1 && DLC05SamuraiScenes.bridgeSceneRunning != 1 ) set mainTimer to mainTimer - getSecondsPassed
;// sally has a lock IF ( mainTimer <= 295 && sallyCommandCounter >= 9 ) DLC05SallyREF.sayTo player DLC05BridgeTopicSallyShipHelp set sallyCommandCounter to -1 set sayBlocker to 1
ENDIF
;// have sally give some help if Terc is dead IF ( mainTimer <= 280 && sallyHelpJam == 0 && DLC05TercorienRef.getDead == 1 ) set sallyHelpJam to 1 set sayBlocker to 1 DLC05SallyRef.sayTo player DLC05BridgeTopicSallyHelp
ENDIF
;///// ;//[ Phase 0: Event Start 1:00 ] ;///// IF ( mainTimer <= 280 && mainTimerPhase == 0 ) set mainTimerPhase to 5
IF ( DLC05TercorienRef.getDead == 1 ) DLC05SallyRef.sayTo player DLC05BridgeTopicSallyHelp set sayBlocker to 1 ENDIF
;///// ;//[ Phase 1: EMP Shot - 1:30 ] ;///// ELSEIF ( mainTimer <= 260 && mainTimerPhase == 5 && justShot == 1 ) set mainTimerPhase to 10
;// somah's line! set sayBlocker to 1
;// kill the power set powerCurrentState to -1
;// the bridge has been hit by an EMP shot line IF ( DLC05SomahRef.getDead == 0 ) DLC05SomahRef.sayTo player DLC05BridgeEMPHitAlt ELSE DLC05SallyRef.sayTo player DLC05BridgeEMPHitAlt ENDIF
;//////// ;// kill the lights and other things ;//////// DLC05EMPPowerDown.disable DLC05BridgeFireControlREF.playgroup backward 0 DLC05BridgeEnemyShipHealth25.disable 0 DLC05BridgeEnemyShipHealth50.disable 0 DLC05BridgeEnemyShipHealth75.disable 0 DLC05BridgeEnemyShipHealth100.disable 0
DLC05BridgeEnemyShields1.disable 0 DLC05BridgeEnemyShields2.disable 0 DLC05BridgeEnemyShields3.disable 0
DLC05BridgePlayerShipHealth25.disable 0 DLC05BridgePlayerShipHealth50.disable 0 DLC05BridgePlayerShipHealth75.disable 0 DLC05BridgePlayerShipHealth100.disable 0
DLC05BridgePlayerShipEven.disable 0 DLC05BridgePlayerShipShields.disable 0 DLC05BridgePlayerShipGuns.disable 0
;// turn on the generator buttons DLC05BridgeGeneratorControlAHolo.enable DLC05BridgeGeneratorControlBHolo.enable DLC05BridgeGeneratorControlCHolo.enable DLC05BridgeGeneratorControlDHolo.enable DLC05BridgeGeneratorControlA.playgroup specialIdle 0 DLC05BridgeGeneratorControlB.playgroup specialIdle 0 DLC05BridgeGeneratorControlC.playgroup specialIdle 0 DLC05BridgeGeneratorControlD.playgroup specialIdle 0
;///// ;//[ Phase 2: Shield Generator Destroyed - 3:00 ] ;///// ELSEIF ( mainTimer <= 220 && mainTimerPhase == 15 && justShot == 1 ) set mainTimerPhase to 20
;// explosion and Terc unconscious DLC05BridgeJammerControlREF.placeAtMe grenadeFragExplosion 1 DLC05BridgeFFieldConsoleSmoke.enable DLC05BridgeJammerControlREF.disable DLC05BridgeJammerControlREF.pushActorAway DLC05TercorienRef 3 DLC05TercorienRef.setUnconscious 0
set interElliot to 3
set sayBlocker to 1
;// the elliot is down line IF ( DLC05SomahRef.getDead == 0 ) DLC05SomahRef.sayTo player DLC05BridgeElliotDown ELSE DLC05SallyRef.sayTo player DLC05BridgeElliotDown ENDIF
ENDIF
ELSE
ENDIF ENDIF
;///////////////////////////////////////////////////// ;// TURN THE POWER BACK ON // ;///////////////////////////////////////////////////// IF ( DLC05EMPPowerDown.getDisabled == 1 && mainTimerPhase == 10 )
;// if the player gets the power back on IF ( generatorCount == 4 ) ;// return the lights and the counter DLC05EMPPowerDown.enable set mainTimerPhase to 15
;// restart the fire button DLC05BridgeFireButtonHolo.enable DLC05BridgeFireControlREF.playgroup specialIdle 0
;//////// ;// reset the enemy's ship holograms ;//////// ;// ship at 100% IF ( ( DLC05BridgeLD.enemyHP / DLC05BridgeLD.enemyHPMAX ) > 0.75 ) DLC05BridgeEnemyShipHealth100.enable
;// ship at ~75% ELSEIF ( ( DLC05BridgeLD.enemyHP / DLC05BridgeLD.enemyHPMAX ) <= 0.75 ) DLC05BridgeEnemyShipHealth75.enable
;// ship at 50% ELSEIF ( ( DLC05BridgeLD.enemyHP / DLC05BridgeLD.enemyHPMAX ) <= 0.5 ) DLC05BridgeEnemyShipHealth50.enable
;// ship at ~25% ELSEIF ( ( DLC05BridgeLD.enemyHP / DLC05BridgeLD.enemyHPMAX ) <= 0.25 ) DLC05BridgeEnemyShipHealth25.enable
ENDIF
;// what's their power level? ;// theyre at max guns IF ( DLC05BridgeLD.enemyGunPower == 1 ) DLC05BridgeEnemyShields1.enable
;// theyre in the middle ELSEIF ( DLC05BridgeLD.enemyGunPower == 2 ) DLC05BridgeEnemyShields2.enable
;// theyre at max shields ELSEIF ( DLC05BridgeLD.enemyGunPower == 3 ) DLC05BridgeEnemyShields3.enable ENDIF
;//////// ;// reset the player's ship holograms ;//////// ;// ship at ~75% IF ( ( shipHP / shipHPMAX ) <= 0.75 ) DLC05BridgePlayerShipHealth75.enable
;// ship at 50% ELSEIF ( ( shipHP / shipHPMAX ) <= 0.5 ) DLC05BridgePlayerShipHealth50.enable
;// ship at ~25% ELSEIF ( ( shipHP / shipHPMAX ) <= 0.25 ) DLC05BridgePlayerShipHealth25.enable ENDIF
;// we're max shields IF ( powerCurrentState == 0 ) DLC05BridgePlayerShipShields.enable
;// we're 50/50 ELSEIF ( powerCurrentState == 1 ) DLC05BridgePlayerShipEven.enable
;// we're max guns ELSEIF ( powerCurrentState == 2 ) DLC05BridgePlayerShipGuns.enable ENDIF
;// figure out our shield level IF ( DLC05BridgePowerGun.isAnimPlaying specialIdle == 0 ) DLC05BridgePlayerShipGuns.enable set dlc05BridgeLD.powerCurrentState to 2
ELSEIF ( DLC05BridgePowerMiddle.isAnimPlaying specialIdle == 0 ) DLC05BridgePlayerShipEven.enable set dlc05BridgeLD.powerCurrentState to 1
ELSEIF ( DLC05BridgePowerShields.isAnimPlaying specialIdle == 0 ) DLC05BridgePlayerShipShields.enable set dlc05BridgeLD.powerCurrentState to 0 ENDIF
ENDIF ENDIF
;/////////////////////////////////////////////////////// ;// SHIP BEING ATTACKED LOOP // ;////////////////////////////////////////////////////// IF ( getStage DLC05BridgeLD == 52 ) IF ( attackTimerInit == 0 )
;// get the attack time and give us some time to randomize the enemies power set attackTimer to 1 + 0.04 * getRandomPercent set enemyGunStateTimer to attackTimer
;// add the 5 seconds for the enemy to adjust set attackTimer to attackTimer + 3
;// randomize where the explosions happen set attackPhaseRand to 1 + 0.04 * getRandomPercent set attackTimerInit to 1
;// turn off the just shot var set justShot to 1
IF ( getStage DLC05BridgeLD == 52 ) IF ( DLC05BridgeEnemyShipREF. isAnimplaying forward == 0 && DLC05BridgeEnemyShipREF. isAnimplaying backward == 0 ) DLC05BridgeEnemyShipREF.playgroup backward 0 DLC05ZetaLaserAimBridge.playgroup backward 0
ENDIF ENDIF
ENDIF
;/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// ;// TIMER FOR ALIEN SHIP'S POWER/SHIELDS IF ( enemyGunStateTimer > 0 ) set enemyGunStateTimer to enemyGunStateTimer - getSecondsPassed ELSE
;// if the power isn't on, don't check IF ( powerCurrentState != -1 )
;// randomly get the power of the alien's ship set enemyGunRand to 1 + 0.1 * getRandomPercent
;// check the old gun power IF ( enemyGunPrevious == 1 ) DLC05BridgeEnemyShields1.disable
ELSEIF ( enemyGunPrevious == 2 ) DLC05BridgeEnemyShields2.disable
ELSEIF ( enemyGunPrevious == 3 ) DLC05BridgeEnemyShields3.disable
ENDIF
;// set the new gun power IF ( enemyGunRand >= 1 && enemyGunRand <= 2 && getStage DLC05BridgeLD == 52 ) set enemyGunPower to 1 DLC05BridgeEnemyShields1.enable 0
ELSEIF ( enemyGunRand > 2 && enemyGunRand <= 8 && getStage DLC05BridgeLD == 52 ) set enemyGunPower to 2 DLC05BridgeEnemyShields2.enable 0
ELSEIF ( enemyGunRand > 8 && getStage DLC05BridgeLD == 52 ) set enemyGunPower to 3 DLC05BridgeEnemyShields3.enable 0
ENDIF ENDIF
;////////////////////////////// ;// have Sally or Somah give a head's up on the enemy ship IF ( DLC05SomahRef.getDead == 0 && sayBlocker == 0 ) DLC05SomahRef.sayTo player DLC05BridgeTopicSomahShipHelp
ELSEIF ( DLC05SomahRef.getDead == 1 && sayBlocker == 0 ) DLC05SallyRef.sayTo player DLC05BridgeTopicSallyShipHelp
ENDIF
;// keep track of the old one set enemyGunPrevious to enemyGunPower
ENDIF
;////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// ;// THE TIMER FOR THE ALIEN SHIP TO ATTACK IF ( attackTimer > 0 ) set attackTimer to attackTimer - getSecondsPassed
ELSE set attackTimerInit to 0 set justShot to 1
;///////////////////////////////////////////// ;// SHOOT THE LASER APPLY THE DAMAGE IF ( powerCurrentState == 0 )
;// we're max shields, what are they? IF ( DLC05BridgeLD.enemyGunPower == 1 ) set DLC05BridgeLD.shipHP to DLC05BridgeLD.shipHP - 35 DLC05BridgeEnemyShipREF.fireWeapon DLC05ZetaEnemyLaserLevel3 DLC05FXZetaShieldsWindowREF.playgroup forward 1
ELSEIF ( DLC05BridgeLD.enemyGunPower == 2 ) set DLC05BridgeLD.shipHP to DLC05BridgeLD.shipHP - 25 DLC05BridgeEnemyShipREF.fireWeapon DLC05ZetaEnemyLaserLevel2 DLC05FXZetaShieldsWindowREF.playgroup forward 1
ELSEIF ( DLC05BridgeLD.enemyGunPower == 3 ) set DLC05BridgeLD.shipHP to DLC05BridgeLD.shipHP - 15 DLC05BridgeEnemyShipREF.fireWeapon DLC05ZetaEnemyLaserLevel1 DLC05FXZetaShieldsWindowREF.playgroup forward 1
ENDIF
ELSEIF ( powerCurrentState == 1 )
;// we're 50/50, what are they? IF ( DLC05BridgeLD.enemyGunPower == 1 ) set DLC05BridgeLD.shipHP to DLC05BridgeLD.shipHP - 60 DLC05BridgeEnemyShipREF.fireWeapon DLC05ZetaEnemyLaserLevel3 DLC05FXZetaShieldsWindowREF.playgroup forward 1
ELSEIF ( DLC05BridgeLD.enemyGunPower == 2 ) set DLC05BridgeLD.shipHP to DLC05BridgeLD.shipHP - 50 DLC05BridgeEnemyShipREF.fireWeapon DLC05ZetaEnemyLaserLevel2 DLC05FXZetaShieldsWindowREF.playgroup forward 1
ELSEIF ( DLC05BridgeLD.enemyGunPower == 3 ) set DLC05BridgeLD.shipHP to DLC05BridgeLD.shipHP - 40 DLC05BridgeEnemyShipREF.fireWeapon DLC05ZetaEnemyLaserLevel1 DLC05FXZetaShieldsWindowREF.playgroup forward 1
ENDIF
ELSEIF ( powerCurrentState == 2 )
;// we're max guns, what are they? IF ( DLC05BridgeLD.enemyGunPower == 1 ) set DLC05BridgeLD.shipHP to DLC05BridgeLD.shipHP - 85 DLC05BridgeEnemyShipREF.fireWeapon DLC05ZetaEnemyLaserLevel3 DLC05FXZetaShieldsWindowREF.playgroup forward 1
ELSEIF ( DLC05BridgeLD.enemyGunPower == 2 ) set DLC05BridgeLD.shipHP to DLC05BridgeLD.shipHP - 75 DLC05BridgeEnemyShipREF.fireWeapon DLC05ZetaEnemyLaserLevel2 DLC05FXZetaShieldsWindowREF.playgroup forward 1
ELSEIF ( DLC05BridgeLD.enemyGunPower == 3 ) set DLC05BridgeLD.shipHP to DLC05BridgeLD.shipHP - 65 DLC05BridgeEnemyShipREF.fireWeapon DLC05ZetaEnemyLaserLevel1 DLC05FXZetaShieldsWindowREF.playgroup forward 1
ENDIF
ENDIF
;//////////////////////////////////////////////////////// ;// KNOCK AROUND THE PEOPLE IF ( getStage DLC05BridgeLD == 52 )
IF ( DLC05SomahRef.getDead == 0 ) IF ( attackPhaseRand == 1 ) DLC05SomahRef.playidle MTHitTorsoA ELSEIF ( attackPhaseRand == 2 ) DLC05SomahRef.playidle MTHitTorsoB ELSEIF ( attackPhaseRand == 3 || attackPhaseRand == 4 ) DLC05SomahRef.playidle MTHitTorsoC ENDIF ENDIF
IF ( DLC05PaulsonRef.getDead == 0 ) IF ( attackPhaseRand == 1 ) DLC05PaulsonRef.playidle MTHitTorsoA ELSEIF ( attackPhaseRand == 2 ) DLC05PaulsonRef.playidle MTHitTorsoB ELSEIF ( attackPhaseRand == 3 || attackPhaseRand == 4 ) DLC05PaulsonRef.playidle MTHitTorsoC ENDIF ENDIF
IF ( DLC05TercorienRef.getDead == 0 ) IF ( attackPhaseRand == 1 ) DLC05TercorienRef.playidle MTHitTorsoA ELSEIF ( attackPhaseRand == 2 ) DLC05TercorienRef.playidle MTHitTorsoB ELSEIF ( attackPhaseRand == 3 || attackPhaseRand == 4 ) DLC05TercorienRef.playidle MTHitTorsoC ENDIF ENDIF
IF ( DLC05SallyRef.getDead == 0 ) IF ( attackPhaseRand == 1 ) DLC05SallyRef.playidle MTHitTorsoA ELSEIF ( attackPhaseRand == 2 ) DLC05SallyRef.playidle MTHitTorsoB ELSEIF ( attackPhaseRand == 3 || attackPhaseRand == 4 ) DLC05SallyRef.playidle MTHitTorsoC ENDIF ENDIF ENDIF
;// END IT FOR THE PLAYER IF ( shipHP <= 0 ) player.placeAtMe grenadeFragExplosion 1 player.kill ENDIF
ENDIF ENDIF
;////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// ;// THE ALIENS TELEPORTING ONTO THE SHIP // ;////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// IF ( getStage DLC05BridgeLD == 52 && DLC05SamuraiScenes.bridgeSceneRunning != 1 ) IF ( teleporterInit == 0 ) set teleporterInit to 1 + 0.03 * getRandomPercent set teleportTimer to 1 + 0.5 * getRandomPercent set teleportTimer to teleportTimer + 5
ENDIF
IF ( teleportTimer > 0 ) set teleportTimer to teleportTimer - getSecondsPassed
ELSE
;// check to see if this is the first batch in IF ( firstPorters == 0 ) set firstPorters to 1
ENDIF
IF ( teleporterInit == 1 ) DLC05BridgeTeleporterC.placeAtMe DLC05BridgeTeleporter 1 DLC05BridgeTeleporterA.placeAtMe DLC05BridgeTeleporter 1 set teleporterInit to 0
ELSEIF ( teleporterInit == 2 ) DLC05BridgeTeleporterE.placeAtMe DLC05BridgeTeleporter 1 DLC05BridgeTeleporterB.placeAtMe DLC05BridgeTeleporter 1 set teleporterInit to 0
ELSEIF ( teleporterInit == 3 ) DLC05BridgeTeleporterD.placeAtMe DLC05BridgeTeleporter 1 DLC05BridgeTeleporterF.placeAtMe DLC05BridgeTeleporter 1 set teleporterInit to 0
ENDIF ENDIF ENDIF
;////////////////////////////////////////////////// ;// TRACK THE SHIPS HEALTH // ;////////////////////////////////////////////////// IF ( ( shipHP / shipHPMAX ) <= 0.75 && shipSay == 0 && getStage DLC05BridgeLD == 52 && justShot == 1 && powerCurrentState != -1 ) IF ( sayBlocker == 0 )
;// ship at ~75% DLC05BridgePlayerShipHealth75.enable DLC05BridgePlayerShipHealth100.disable
IF ( DLC05SomahRef.getDead == 0 ) DLC05SomahREF.sayTo player DLC05BridgeTopicShipHealth ELSE DLC05SallyREF.sayTo player DLC05BridgeTopicShipHealth ENDIF
set shipSay to 1 set sayBlocker to 1
;// EXPLOSIONS! DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF11.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion01 1 DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF13.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion03 1 DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF17.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion01 1 DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF10.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion03 1
ENDIF
ELSEIF ( ( shipHP / shipHPMAX ) <= 0.5 && shipSay == 1 && getStage DLC05BridgeLD == 52 && justShot == 1 ) IF ( sayBlocker == 0 )
;// ship at 50% DLC05BridgePlayerShipHealth50.enable DLC05BridgePlayerShipHealth75.disable
IF ( DLC05SomahRef.getDead == 0 ) DLC05SomahREF.sayTo player DLC05BridgeTopicShipHealth ELSE DLC05SallyREF.sayTo player DLC05BridgeTopicShipHealth ENDIF
set shipSay to 2 set sayBlocker to 1
;// EXPLOSIONS! DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF12.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion02 1 DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF14.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion01 1 DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF18.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion02 1
DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF03.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion03 1 DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF06.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion03 1 DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF07.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion01 1
ENDIF
ELSEIF ( ( shipHP / shipHPMAX ) <= 0.25 && shipSay == 2 && getStage DLC05BridgeLD == 52 && justShot == 1 ) IF ( sayBlocker == 0 )
;// ship at ~25% DLC05BridgePlayerShipHealth25.enable DLC05BridgePlayerShipHealth50.disable
IF ( DLC05SomahRef.getDead == 0 ) DLC05SomahREF.sayTo player DLC05BridgeTopicShipHealth ELSE DLC05SallyREF.sayTo player DLC05BridgeTopicShipHealth ENDIF
set shipSay to 3 set sayBlocker to 1
;// EXPLOSIONS! DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF16.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion03 1 DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF15.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion02 1
DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF01.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion01 1 DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF02.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion02 1 DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF04.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion01 1 DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF05.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion02 1 DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF08.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion02 1
ENDIF ENDIF
;////////////////////////////////// ;// SALLY'S ORDERS ;////////////////////////////////// IF ( getStage DLC05BridgeLD == 51 && deathCounter == -2 )
IF ( sallyCommandCounter == 0 ) DLC05BridgeMainScreen.sayTo player DLC05BridgeTopicMainScreen set sallyCommandTimer to 6 set sallyCommandCounter to 1 ENDIF
;//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// ;// the alien ship continuing to be mad IF ( sallyCommandTimer > 0 ) set sallyCommandTimer to sallyCommandTimer - getSecondsPassed
ELSE
;// start the ship IF ( sallyCommandCounter == 1 ) ; DLC05BridgeMainScreen.sayTo player DLC05BridgeTopicMainScreen ; set sallyCommandTimer to 6 ; set sayBlocker to 1
;// enable the ship DLC05BridgeEnemyShipREF.enable 0
ELSEIF ( sallyCommandCounter == 2 ) DLC05BridgeMainScreen.sayTo player DLC05BridgeTopicMainScreen set sallyCommandTimer to 3 set sayBlocker to 1
;// start the ship set flareStepper to 1 set rumbleControl to 1 DLC05BridgeEnemyShipREF.playgroup forward 0 DLC05ZetaLaserAimBridge.playgroup forward 0
;///////////////////////////// ;// move the NPCS IF ( DLC05PaulsonRef.getDead == 0 && DLC05PaulsonRef.getInCell DLC05Bridge != 1 ) DLC05PaulsonRef.setUnconscious 0 DLC05PaulsonRef.moveTo DLC05BridgePaulsonPortInXMRK DLC05PaulsonRef.EVP ENDIF
IF ( DLC05SallyRef.getDead == 0 && DLC05SallyRef.getInCell DLC05Bridge != 1) DLC05SallyRef.moveTo DLC05BridgeSallyPortInXMRK DLC05SallyRef.EVP ENDIF
IF ( DLC05SomahRef.getDead == 0 && DLC05SomahRef.getInCell DLC05Bridge != 1) DLC05SomahRef.moveTo DLC05BridgeSomahPortInXMRK DLC05SomahRef.EVP ENDIF
IF ( DLC05TercorienRef.getDead == 0 && DLC05TercorienRef.getInCell DLC05Bridge != 1 ) DLC05TercorienRef.setUnconscious 0 DLC05TercorienRef.moveTo DLC05BridgeElliotPortInXMRK DLC05TercorienRef.EVP ENDIF
ELSEIF ( sallyCommandCounter == 3 ) DLC05SomahREF.sayTo player DLC05BridgeTopicSomahRandom DLC05BridgeHoloHead.playgroup backward 0 set alienHoloState to -1
;////// ;// done with the aliens, start sally's commands ;////// ;// sally's orders ELSEIF ( sallyCommandCounter == 4 ) DLC05BridgeHoloHead.disable DLC05SallyRef.sayTo player DLC05BridgeTopicSallyCommands set sayBlocker to 1
;// tell somah where to go ELSEIF ( sallyCommandCounter == 5 )
IF ( DLC05SomahREF.getDead == 0 ) DLC05SallyRef.sayTo player DLC05BridgeTopicSallyCommands set sayBlocker to 1 ENDIF
;// tell terc where to go ELSEIF ( sallyCommandCounter == 6 )
IF ( DLC05TercorienREF.getDead == 0 ) DLC05SallyRef.sayTo player DLC05BridgeTopicSallyCommands set sayBlocker to 1 ENDIF
;// tell Paulson where to go ELSEIF ( sallyCommandCounter == 7 )
IF ( DLC05PaulsonREF.getDead == 0 ) DLC05SallyRef.sayTo player DLC05BridgeTopicSallyCommands set sayBlocker to 1 ENDIF
ELSEIF ( sallyCommandCounter == 8 ) DLC05SallyRef.sayTo player DLC05BridgeTopicSallyCommands set sayBlocker to 1
ELSEIF ( sallyCommandCounter == 9 ) setStage DLC05BridgeLD 52 set alienHoloState to -1 DLC05BridgeFireControlREF.playgroup specialIdle 0
;// set the stage for Chap setStage DLC05MZ3 40 set sayBlocker to 0 ENDIF
;///// ;// increment the counter, restart timer for next line ;///// set sallyCommandCounter to ( sallyCommandCounter + 1 )
ENDIF ENDIF ENDIF
;//////////////////////////////////// ;// RANDOM SAYTOS // ;/////////////////////////////////// IF ( mainTimer < 290 && getStage DLC05BridgeLD == 52 && sayBlocker == 0 );DLC05SamuraiScenes.bridgeSceneRunning != 1 && sayBlocker == 0 )
IF ( randomSayInit == 0 ) set randomSayTimer to 1 + 0.05 * getRandomPercent set randomSayTimer to ( randomSayTimer + 15 )
;// subtract the dead IF ( DLC05PaulsonREF.getDead == 0 ) set randomSayTimer to ( randomSayTimer - 3 ) ENDIF IF ( DLC05SomahREF.getDead == 0 ) set randomSayTimer to ( randomSayTimer - 3 ) ENDIF IF ( DLC05TercorienREF.getDead == 0 ) set randomSayTimer to ( randomSayTimer - 3 ) ENDIF
set randomSayInit to 1
ENDIF
IF ( randomSayTimer > 0 ) set randomSayTimer to randomSayTimer - getSecondsPassed
ELSE
;//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// ;// make sure everyone says their line ;// before they start saying others IF ( sallySayCount == randomSayer ) DLC05SallyREF.sayTo player DLC05BridgeTopicSallyRandom set sallySayCount to ( sallySayCount + 1 )
ELSEIF ( somahSayCount == randomSayer && DLC05SomahREF.getDead == 0 ) DLC05SomahREF.sayTo player DLC05BridgeTopicSomahRandom set somahSayCount to ( somahSayCount + 1 )
ELSEIF ( tercorienSayCount == randomSayer && DLC05TercorienREF.getDead == 0 ) DLC05TercorienREF.sayTo player DLC05BridgeTopicElliotRandom set tercorienSayCount to ( tercorienSayCount + 1 )
ELSEIF ( paulsonSayCount == randomSayer && DLC05PaulsonREF.getDead == 0 ) DLC05PaulsonREF.sayTo player DLC05BridgeTopicPaulsonRandom set paulsonSayCount to ( paulsonSayCount + 1 )
ELSE
set randomSayer to ( randomSayer + 1 )
ENDIF
;// do it again set randomSayInit to 0
ENDIF ENDIF
;////////////////////////////////////////// ;// THE SAMURAI SCENE // ;///////////////////////////////////////// IF ( firstPorters == 1 && deathCounter <= -3 )
;// start the samurai scene setSTage DLC05SamuraiScenes 50 set firstPorters to -1
ENDIF
END

scn DLC05BridgeCrewSCRIPT
short deathOnce short randChance ref mySelf
short loadOnce
;// alien effects Float Timer Short DoOnce Short IsPile
;// portInEffects short portFX float portFXTimer
BEGIN ONLOAD
IF ( loadOnce == 0 )
set mySelf to getSelf
;// if the blocker is on random chance to die on arrival IF ( dlc05BridgeLD.teleportBlock == 1 )
set randChance to 1 + 0.1 * getRandomPercent
;// 80% to be dead on spawn if blocker is on IF ( randChance > 4 ) set doOnce to 1 kill myself 1
ENDIF
;// teleport in FX ELSE pms DLC05teleportInFXShader saa 0 setUnconscious 1 set portFXTimer to 1.5 set portFX to 1 ENDIF
set loadOnce to 1
ENDIF
END
BEGIN ONDEATH
set DLC05BridgeLD.deathCounter to ( DLC05BridgeLD.deathCounter - 1 )
if ( GetSelf == DLC05BridgeCaptain ) SetStage DLC05MZ3 30 endif
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;////////////// ;// the effect for the alien disintegration ;////////////// IF ( doOnce == 1 ) SetCriticalStage DisintegrateStart PMS AlienCritGlowFXShader PMS effectAlienDisintegration Set Timer to 1.8 Set IsPile to 0 set doOnce to 2
ENDIF
IF ( doOnce == 2 ) IF ( IsPile == 0 ) IF ( Timer <= 0.5 ) AttachAshPile Set IsPile to 1
ENDIF ENDIF
IF ( Timer <= 0 ) SetCriticalStage DisintegrateEnd SMS AlienCritGlowFXShader SMS effectAlienDisintegration Set DoOnce to -1 ENDIF
Set Timer to (Timer - GetSecondsPassed)
ENDIF
;////////////// ;// the teleport in effects ;////////////// IF ( portFX >= 1 ) IF ( portFXTimer > 0 ) set portFXTimer to portFXTimer - getSecondsPassed
IF ( portFX == 1 && portFXTimer <= 1.3 ) set portFX to 2 saa 1 ENDIF
ELSE setUnconscious 0 sms DLC05teleportInFXShader set portFX to -1 ENDIF
ENDIF
END

scn DLC05EngineCoreDoorSCRIPT
short Active
float teleportTimer short startTeleport
short teleStage1 short teleStage2 short teleStage3
short charging float chargeTimer
ref user
;// the teleporter ref telepad
float timer short animCheck
;// the teleport states for user ;// 0 = fresh ;// 1 = In Trigger ;// 2 = Activated ;// 3 = Arrived
short stage short lastStage
Begin OnLoad
if ( Active == 0 ) Playgroup Left 1 endif
End
BEGIN ONACTIVATE
if ( IsActionRef Player == 1 ) if ( GetStage DLC05MZ3 < 10 ) ShowMessage DLC05MZ3CoreTeleporterMEssage return else ;// Activate set user to getActionRef set telepad to getSelf playgroup forward 0 set startTeleport to 1 set stage to 0
user.setAV variable08 2 endif else ;// Activate Activate user.setAV variable08 2
endif
END
BEGIN ONTRIGGERENTER
;// get the person who entered set user to getActionRef
;// play the light if they're on the pad IF ( user.getAV variable08 == 0 ) user.pms DLC05teleportLightFXShader user.setAV variable08 -1 ENDIF
;// if they're teleporting in IF ( user.getAV variable08 == 2 ) user.setAV variable08 3 set startTeleport to 1 set stage to 3 ENDIF
END
BEGIN ONTRIGGERLEAVE
IF ( user.getAV variable08 != 2 ) user.sms DLC05teleportLightFXShader user.sms DLC05teleportInFXShader user.setAV variable08 0 user.saa 1 ENDIF
END
Begin GameMode
If ( GetStage DLC05MZ3 == 10 ) if ( Active == 0 ) set Active to 1 Playgroup Right 1 endif endif
if ( Active == 1 ) if ( IsAnimPlaying Right == 0 ) set Active to 2 Playgroup SpecialIdle 1 endif endif
IF ( startTeleport == 1 )
IF ( stage == 0 ) .playgroup forward 1 set animCheck to 1
;// Turn on fx shader out on alien user.pms DLC05teleportOutFXShader user.sms DLC05teleportLightFXShader
;//time to pause before next stage set timer to 1.5
;// Store stage variable while toggled to -1 for timed pause set lastStage to stage set stage to -1
ELSEIF ( stage == 1 )
;// Turn off fx shader user.sms DLC05teleportOutFXShader activate user user.setAV variable08 2
set timer to 3 set lastStage to stage set stage to -1
ENDIF
;////////// ;// Teleport in -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ;//////////
;////////// ;// stage 3 IF ( stage == 3 )
telepad.playgroup backward 1 set animCheck to 1
;// Shader on user.saa 0 user.pms DLC05teleportInFXShader set timer to 1.5 set lastStage to stage set stage to -1 ENDIF
;////////// ;// stage 4 IF ( stage == 4 ) user.pms DLC05teleportLightFXShader user.sms DLC05teleportInFXShader user.saa 0 user.saa 1
set timer to 8 set lastStage to stage set stage to -1 ENDIF ENDIF
;// Timer loop to pause between stages--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- IF ( stage == -1 ) IF ( timer > 0 ) set timer to ( timer - getSecondsPassed )
ELSE ;// Return to stages where you left off or at beginning IF ( lastStage == 1 || lastStage == 4 ) set stage to 0 set startTeleport to 0 ENDIF
set stage to ( lastStage + 1 )
ENDIF ENDIF
;// Loop to restart idle after teleport machine anim plays------------------------------------------------------------------------- IF ( animCheck == 1) IF ( DLC05teleportTestObjectREF.isAnimPlaying forward == 0 && DLC05teleportTestObjectREF.isAnimPlaying backward == 0) .playgroup specialIdle 1 set animCheck to 0 ENDIF ENDIF
END

scn DLC05CoreTeleporterControlSCRIPT
short activationState short MZ3NPCMove
float MoveTimer
BEGIN ONACTIVATE
IF ( activationState == 0 ) playgroup forward 0 set activationState to 1 if ( GetStage DLC05MZ3 < 10 ) SetStage DLC05MZ3 10 set MZ3NPCMove to 1 set MoveTimer to 0.5 endif
;// turn the button off - Phil DLC05DecHoloButton.disable DLC05DecHoloButtonGlow.disable ENDIF
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
IF ( activationState == 1 ) IF ( isAnimPlaying forward == 0 ) set activationState to 0 playgroup specialIdle 0
ENDIF ENDIF
if ( MZ3NPCMove == 1 ) if ( MoveTimer <= 0 ) DLC05SallyRef.EVP set MZ3NPCMove to 2 set MoveTimer to 5 else set MoveTimer to ( MoveTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif elseif ( MZ3NPCMove == 2 ) if ( MoveTimer <= 0 ) DLC05PaulsonRef.EVP set MZ3NPCMove to 3 set MoveTimer to 5 else set MoveTimer to ( MoveTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif elseif ( MZ3NPCMove == 3 ) if ( MoveTimer <= 0 ) DLC05TercorienRef.EVP set MZ3NPCMove to -1 else set MoveTimer to ( MoveTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif endif
END

scn DLC05CargoDumpDisableTriggerSCRIPT ;this script randomly handles picks from a list of objects, enables them, enables a push force to move them, and then disables them upon entering a trigger. ;also is safety script for handling player if he's in the trash chute
ref trashRef ref corpseRef float timer float rndTimer short dice short trashShootRunning
ref obj1 ref obj2 ref obj3 ref obj4 ref obj5
;***********************************************
Begin onTriggerEnter
set trashRef to getActionRef if (trashRef == Player) Player.kill else trashRef.disable trashRef.markForDelete endif
End
;***********************************************
Begin gameMode
if (trashShootRunning == 1) if (obj1 != 0) if(obj1.getPos Z < 4700.0000) obj1.disable obj1.markForDelete set obj1 to 0 endif endif
if (obj2 != 0) if(obj2.getPos Z < 4700.0000) obj2.disable obj2.markForDelete set obj2 to 0 endif endif
if (obj3 != 0) if(obj3.getPos Z < 4700.0000) obj3.disable obj3.markForDelete set obj3 to 0 endif endif
if (obj4 != 0) if(obj4.getPos Z < 4700.0000) obj4.disable obj4.markForDelete set obj4 to 0 endif endif
if (obj5 != 0) if(obj5.getPos Z < 4700.0000) obj5.disable obj5.markForDelete set obj5 to 0 endif endif
if (timer <= 0) set dice to (1 + 0.19 * GetRandompercent) if (dice == 1) DLC05CargoDumpMarker01.placeatme Bucket01 1 DLC05TrashCollisionPlaneREF.enable elseif (dice == 2) DLC05CargoDumpMarker01.placeatme OfficeFan01 1 DLC05TrashCollisionPlaneREF.disable elseif (dice == 3) DLC05CargoDumpMarker01.placeatme PotBig 1 DLC05TrashCollisionPlaneREF.enable elseif (dice == 4) DLC05CargoDumpMarker01.placeatme CookingPot01 1 DLC05TrashCollisionPlaneREF.disable elseif (dice == 5) DLC05CargoDumpMarker01.placeatme RollerSkate 1 DLC05TrashCollisionPlaneREF.enable elseif (dice == 6) DLC05CargoDumpMarker01.placeatme Broom 1 DLC05TrashCollisionPlaneREF.disable elseif (dice == 7) DLC05CargoDumpMarker01.placeatme Globe00 1 DLC05TrashCollisionPlaneREF.enable elseif (dice == 8) DLC05CargoDumpMarker01.placeatme MilkCrate01 1 DLC05TrashCollisionPlaneREF.disable elseif (dice == 9) DLC05CargoDumpMarker01.placeatme MusicStand 1 DLC05TrashCollisionPlaneREF.enable elseif (dice == 10) DLC05CargoDumpMarker01.placeatme TricycleDirty01 1 DLC05TrashCollisionPlaneREF.disable elseif (dice == 11) DLC05CargoDumpMarker01.placeatme Barrel01 1 DLC05TrashCollisionPlaneREF.enable elseif (dice == 12) DLC05CargoDumpMarker01.placeatme DLC05BarrelToxicWaste 1 DLC05TrashCollisionPlaneREF.disable elseif (dice == 13) DLC05CargoDumpMarker01.placeatme GardenGnomeDestroyed01 1 DLC05TrashCollisionPlaneREF.enable elseif (dice == 14) set corpseRef to DLC05CargoDumpMarker01.placeatme DeadBrahmin 1 corpseRef.kill elseif (dice == 15) set corpseRef to DLC05CargoDumpMarker01.placeatme DLC05YaoGuaiDEAD 1 corpseRef.kill elseif (dice == 16) if (obj1 == 0) set obj1 to DLC05CargoDumpMarker01.placeatme DLC05BabyCarriageDirty01 1 elseif (obj2 == 0) set obj2 to DLC05CargoDumpMarker01.placeatme DLC05BabyCarriageDirty01 1 elseif (obj3 == 0) set obj3 to DLC05CargoDumpMarker01.placeatme DLC05BabyCarriageDirty01 1 elseif (obj4 == 0) set obj4 to DLC05CargoDumpMarker01.placeatme DLC05BabyCarriageDirty01 1 elseif (obj5 == 0) set obj5 to DLC05CargoDumpMarker01.placeatme DLC05BabyCarriageDirty01 1 endif elseif (dice == 17) if (obj1 == 0) set obj1 to DLC05CargoDumpMarker01.placeatme Tire04 1 elseif (obj2 == 0) set obj2 to DLC05CargoDumpMarker01.placeatme Tire04 1 elseif (obj3 == 0) set obj3 to DLC05CargoDumpMarker01.placeatme Tire04 1 elseif (obj4 == 0) set obj4 to DLC05CargoDumpMarker01.placeatme Tire04 1 elseif (obj5 == 0) set obj5 to DLC05CargoDumpMarker01.placeatme Tire04 1 endif elseif (dice == 18) if (obj1 == 0) set obj1 to DLC05CargoDumpMarker01.placeatme ShoppingCart01 1 elseif (obj2 == 0) set obj2 to DLC05CargoDumpMarker01.placeatme ShoppingCart01 1 elseif (obj3 == 0) set obj3 to DLC05CargoDumpMarker01.placeatme ShoppingCart01 1 elseif (obj4 == 0) set obj4 to DLC05CargoDumpMarker01.placeatme ShoppingCart01 1 elseif (obj5 == 0) set obj5 to DLC05CargoDumpMarker01.placeatme ShoppingCart01 1 endif elseif (dice == 19) if (obj1 == 0) set obj1 to DLC05CargoDumpMarker01.placeatme Tire01 1 elseif (obj2 == 0) set obj2 to DLC05CargoDumpMarker01.placeatme Tire01 1 elseif (obj3 == 0) set obj3 to DLC05CargoDumpMarker01.placeatme Tire01 1 elseif (obj4 == 0) set obj4 to DLC05CargoDumpMarker01.placeatme Tire01 1 elseif (obj5 == 0) set obj5 to DLC05CargoDumpMarker01.placeatme Tire01 1 endif elseif (dice == 20) DLC05TrashCollisionPlaneREF.disable endif
set rndTimer to (0.02 * GetRandomPercent) + .5
set timer to rndTimer else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif ;//timer endif ;//trashShootRunning
End
;***********************************************

scn DLC05CryoPodDoorSCRIPT
short activationState short onLoad short itsAlive
ref myLink ref actorLink
float timer
Begin onActivate
if (activationState == 0) myLink.pms DLC05ThawSlow ; Mark's Effects------------------------------------------------------------ ; myLink.sms DLC05FrozenLite ; Mark's Effects------------------------------------------------------------ ; sms DLC05FrozenLite ; Mark's Effects------------------------------------------------------------ playgroup forward 1 set activationState to 1 endif
End
Begin GameMode
if (onLoad == 0) set myLink to getLinkedRef set actorLink to myLink.GetLinkedRef set timer to .25 set itsAlive to 1 set onLoad to 1 ; pms DLC05FrozenLite ; Mark's Effects------------------------------------------------------------ endif
if (itsAlive == 1) myLink.SetUnconscious 1 myLink.MoveTo actorLink ; myLink.pms DLC05FrozenLite ; Mark's Effects------------------------------------------------------------ set itsAlive to 2 endif
if (itsAlive == 2) if (timer < 0) myLink.SetActorsAI 0 set timer to 2 set itsAlive to 3 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
if (itsAlive == 3) && (activationState == 1)
if (timer < 0) myLink.SetUnconscious 0 myLink.SetActorsAI 1 myLink.SetAV Aggression 4 set itsAlive to 4 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
End

scn DLC05CryoPodAnimSCRIPT
short activationState short onLoad short itsAlive short timerStage short forwardDone short thawing ;Marks FX-----------------------------------------------------------------------
ref myLink ref actorLink
float timer float thawFXTimer ;Marks FX-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Begin onActivate
if (activationState == 0) playgroup forward 1 pms DLC05PodThaw ;Marks FX----------------------------------------------------------------------- placeAtMe DLC05CryopodSmokeExplosion 1 ;Marks FX----------------------------------------------------------------------- set activationState to 1 endif
End
Begin GameMode
if (onLoad == 0) set myLink to GetLinkedRef set actorLink to myLink.GetLinkedRef set itsAlive to 1 set timer to 1 set onLoad to 1 endif
if (forwardDone == 0) if (isAnimPlaying forward == 1) set forwardDone to 1 endif endif
if (forwardDone == 1) if (isAnimPlaying forward == 0) set forwardDone to 2 endif endif
if (itsAlive == 1) myLink.SetUnconscious 1
;myLink.SetActorsAI 0 set itsAlive to 2 endif
if (itsAlive == 2) myLink.Disable 0 set itsAlive to 3 endif
if (itsAlive == 3) && (activationState == 1) && (forwardDone == 2)
if (timerStage == 0) if (timer < 0) myLink.Enable 0 myLink.MoveTo actorLink set timer to 2 set timerStage to 10 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
if (timerStage == 10) if (timer < 0)
myLink.pms DLC05Thaw ; Marks fx----------------------------------------------------------------------------- set thawFXTimer to 4 ; Marks fx----------------------------------------------------------------------------- set thawing to 1 ; Marks fx-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
playgroup backward 1 set timer to 2 set timerStage to 20 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
if (timerStage == 20) if (timer < 0) ;myLink.SetActorsAI 1 myLink.SetUnconscious 0 set timer to .5 set timerStage to 30 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
if (timerStage == 30) if (timer < 0) myLink.SetAV Aggression 4 set timer to 2 set timerStage to 40 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
endif
; Marks fx-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
if (thawing == 1) if (thawFXTimer > 0) set thawFXTimer to (thawFXTimer -getSecondsPassed) else myLink.pms DLC05ThawSlow myLink.sms DLC05Thaw set thawing to 2 endif endif
; Marks fx-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
End

scn DLC05TeleportTestSCRIPT
;// -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- short stage short lastStage
short fadeMode ;// 1= out, 2 = in short fadeStepper
short animCheck
float fadeValue
float timer
;// end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;// Teleport out----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
IF ( stage == 0 )
DLC05teleportTestObjectREF.playgroup forward 1 DLC05teleportTestObject02REF.playgroup forward 1 set animCheck to 1
;// Turn on fx shader out on alien pms DLC05teleportOutFXShader sms DLC05teleportLightFXShader
;// Turn on fx shader out on player player.pms DLC05teleportOutFXShader player.sms DLC05teleportLightFXShader
;//time to pause before next stage set timer to 1.5
;// Store stage variable while toggled to -1 for timed pause set lastStage to stage set stage to -1 ENDIF
;// Clean up alpha issues IF ( stage == 1 ) ;// hide model using actor alpha to fix sorting issues saa 0 player.saa 0
set timer to .01 set lastStage to stage set stage to -1 ENDIF
IF ( stage == 2 ) ;// Turn off fx shader sms DLC05teleportOutFXShader player.sms DLC05teleportOutFXShader
set timer to 3 set lastStage to stage set stage to -1 ENDIF
;// Teleport in --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
IF ( stage == 3 )
DLC05teleportTestObjectREF.playgroup backward 1 DLC05teleportTestObject02REF.playgroup backward 1 set animCheck to 1
;// Shader on saa 1 pms DLC05teleportInFXShader player.saa 1 player.pms DLC05teleportInFXShader set timer to 1.5 set lastStage to stage set stage to -1 ENDIF
IF ( stage == 4 ) pms DLC05teleportLightFXShader sms DLC05teleportInFXShader saa 1 player.pms DLC05teleportLightFXShader player.sms DLC05teleportInFXShader player.saa 1
set timer to 8 set lastStage to stage set stage to -1 ENDIF
;// Timer loop to pause between stages---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
IF ( stage == -1 ) IF ( timer > 0 ) set timer to ( timer - getSecondsPassed ) ELSEIF ( timer <= 0 ) ;// Return to stages where you left off or at beginning IF ( lastStage < 4 ) set stage to ( lastStage + 1 ) ELSEIF ( lastStage == 4 ) set stage to 0 ENDIF ENDIF ENDIF
;// Loop to restart idle after teleport machine anim plays-------------------------------------------------------------------------
IF ( animCheck == 1) IF ( DLC05teleportTestObjectREF.isAnimPlaying forward == 0 && DLC05teleportTestObjectREF.isAnimPlaying backward == 0) DLC05teleportTestObjectREF.playgroup specialIdle 1 DLC05teleportTestObject02REF.playgroup specialIdle 1 set animCheck to 0 ENDIF ENDIF
;// Loops to fade actor alpha in and out-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
; set fadeMode to 2 ; set fadeValue to 0 ; set fadeStepper to 0
; IF ( fadeMode == 1 ) ; IF ( fadeStepper < 25) ; set fadeValue to ( fadeValue - .04 ) ; saa fadeValue ; ELSE ; set fadeMode to 0 ; ENDIF ; ENDIF ; ; IF ( fadeMode == 2 ) ; IF ( fadeStepper < 25 ) ; set fadeValue to ( fadeValue + .04 ) ; saa fadeValue ; ELSE ; set fadeMode to 0 ; ENDIF ; ENDIF
;// ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
END

End

scn testDLC05TeleporterDoorSCRIPT
short charging short startTeleport float chargeTimer
ref user
;//////////////////////// short stage short lastStage
;// 1= out, 2 = in short fadeMode short fadeStepper
short animCheck
float fadeValue
float timer
ref telepad
short fadeOnce ;////////////////////////
BEGIN ONACTIVATE
IF ( charging == 0 )
;// the charge timer set charging to 1 set chargeTimer to 5 set startTeleport to 1
set user to getActionRef set telepad to getSelf telepad.playgroup forward 0
ELSEIF ( charging == 1 && isActionRef player == 1 ) showMessage DLC05TeleporterChargingMSG
ENDIF
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;// the teleportation IF ( startTeleport == 1 )
;////////// ;// Teleport out---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ;//////////
;////////// ;// stage 0 IF ( stage == 0 )
.playgroup forward 1 set animCheck to 1
;// Turn on fx shader out on alien user.pms DLC05teleportOutFXShader user.sms DLC05teleportLightFXShader
;//time to pause before next stage set timer to 1.5
;// Store stage variable while toggled to -1 for timed pause set lastStage to stage set stage to -1 ENDIF
;////////// ;// Clean up alpha issues IF ( stage == 1 ) ;// hide model using actor alpha to fix sorting issues user.saa 0
set timer to .01 set lastStage to stage set stage to -1 ENDIF
;////////// ;// stage 2 IF ( stage == 2 ) ;// Turn off fx shader user.sms DLC05teleportOutFXShader activate user
set timer to 3 set lastStage to stage set stage to -1 ENDIF
;////////// ;// Teleport in -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ;//////////
;////////// ;// stage 3 IF ( stage == 3 )
telepad.playgroup backward 1 set animCheck to 1
;// Shader on user.saa 1 user.pms DLC05teleportInFXShader set timer to 1.5 set lastStage to stage set stage to -1 ENDIF
;////////// ;// stage 4 IF ( stage == 4 ) ; user.pms DLC05teleportLightFXShader user.sms DLC05teleportInFXShader user.saa 1
set timer to 8 set lastStage to stage set stage to -1 ENDIF
;// Timer loop to pause between stages--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- IF ( stage == -1 ) IF ( timer > 0 ) set timer to ( timer - getSecondsPassed )
; IF ( user == player && lastStage == 0 && timer < 0.5 && fadeOnce == 0) ; imod DLC05FadeToWhiteAndBackISFX ; set fadeOnce to 1 ; ENDIF
;// actor alpha hack IF ( lastStage == 4 && fadeOnce == 0 && timer < 8 ) set fadeOnce to 1 user.saa 0
ELSEIF ( lastStage == 4 && fadeOnce == 1 && timer < 8 ) set fadeOnce to 2 user.saa 1 ENDIF
ELSEIF ( timer <= 0 ) ;// Return to stages where you left off or at beginning IF ( lastStage < 4 ) set stage to ( lastStage + 1 ) ELSEIF ( lastStage == 4 ) set stage to 0 set startTeleport to 0 set charging to 0 ENDIF ENDIF ENDIF
ENDIF
;// Loop to restart idle after teleport machine anim plays------------------------------------------------------------------------- IF ( animCheck == 1) IF ( DLC05teleportTestObjectREF.isAnimPlaying forward == 0 && DLC05teleportTestObjectREF.isAnimPlaying backward == 0) .playgroup specialIdle 1 set animCheck to 0 ENDIF ENDIF
END

scn DLC05LivingQWorkerRobotSCRIPT
short unconOnce float sciSkill
;// messagebox vals short menuSelect short button short walkingBomb
BEGIN ONLOAD
;// first time we load, set unconscious IF ( unconOnce == 0 ) set unconOnce to 1 setUnconscious 1 set sciSkill to 50
ENDIF
END
BEGIN ONACTIVATE
;// if the player can activate it IF ( getUnconscious == 1 ) IF ( getActionRef == player && player.getAV Science >= 50 ) showMessage DLC05InteractLQWorkerRobotMsg set menuSelect to 1 ELSE showMessage DLC05InteractLowSkillScienceMsg, sciSkill
ENDIF ELSE activate
ENDIF
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;//////////// ;// check for the player's menu input ;//////////// IF ( menuSelect == 1 ) set button to getButtonPressed
IF ( button > - 1 ) set menuSelect to 0
;// activate the robot IF ( button == 0 ) setUnconscious 0 EVP
;// make the robot an ally ELSEIF ( button == 1 ) addToFaction playerFaction 5 removeFromFaction robotFaction removeFromFaction DLC05RobotFaction EVP
;// exit ELSEIF ( button == 2 ) set menuSelect to 0
ENDIF ENDIF ENDIF END
BEGIN ONHIT
;// the walking bomb check! IF ( walkingBomb == 1 && getHealthPercentage <= .1 ) kill player placeAtMe GrenadePlasmaExplosion 1 set walkingBomb to -1 ENDIF
END
