scn DLC05BridgeMainControlSCRIPT
short activationState short initOnce short firedState float rechargeTimer float hitTimer short healthTracker
BEGIN ONACTIVATE ;// when the player activates the firing control IF ( activationState == 0 && getStage DLC05BridgeLD >= 52 && DLC05BridgeLD.powerCurrentState != -1 ) playgroup forward 0 set activationState to 1 set firedState to 1
;// the hit timer and recharge timer set hitTimer to 1 set rechargeTimer to 7
ACTIVATE
;// fire the laser, play the enemy ship shader IF ( DLC05BridgeLD.powerCurrentState == 0 ) DLC05ZetaLaserAimBridge.fireWeapon DLC05ZetaLaserLevel1 DLC05BridgeEnemyShipREF.pms DLC05ZetaShieldsFXShader
ELSEIF ( DLC05BridgeLD.powerCurrentState == 1 ) DLC05ZetaLaserAimBridge.fireWeapon DLC05ZetaLaserLevel2 DLC05BridgeEnemyShipREF.pms DLC05ZetaShieldsFXShader
ELSEIF ( DLC05BridgeLD.powerCurrentState == 2 ) DLC05ZetaLaserAimBridge.fireWeapon DLC05ZetaLaserLevel3 DLC05BridgeEnemyShipREF.pms DLC05ZetaShieldsFXShader
ENDIF
;// disable the hologram DLC05BridgeFireButtonHolo.disable
ELSE showMessage DLC05BridgeDeathRayOfflineMSG
ENDIF
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;////////////////// ;// TIMERS ;////////////////// IF ( firedState >= 1 )
;//////////////////////////////////// ;// the timer for when the hit is triggered IF ( firedState == 1 )
IF ( hitTimer > 0 ) set hitTimer to hitTimer - getSecondsPassed
ELSE
;// do damage based on the power to the gun and enemy shields IF ( DLC05BridgeLD.powerCurrentState == 0 )
;// we're max shields, what are they? IF ( DLC05BridgeLD.enemyGunPower == 1 ) set DLC05BridgeLD.enemyHP to DLC05BridgeLD.enemyHP - 35 ELSEIF ( DLC05BridgeLD.enemyGunPower == 2 ) set DLC05BridgeLD.enemyHP to DLC05BridgeLD.enemyHP - 25 ELSEIF ( DLC05BridgeLD.enemyGunPower == 3 ) set DLC05BridgeLD.enemyHP to DLC05BridgeLD.enemyHP - 15 ENDIF
ELSEIF ( DLC05BridgeLD.powerCurrentState == 1 )
;// we're 50/50, what are they? IF ( DLC05BridgeLD.enemyGunPower == 1 ) set DLC05BridgeLD.enemyHP to DLC05BridgeLD.enemyHP - 60 ELSEIF ( DLC05BridgeLD.enemyGunPower == 2 ) set DLC05BridgeLD.enemyHP to DLC05BridgeLD.enemyHP - 50 ELSEIF ( DLC05BridgeLD.enemyGunPower == 3 ) set DLC05BridgeLD.enemyHP to DLC05BridgeLD.enemyHP - 40 ENDIF
ELSEIF ( DLC05BridgeLD.powerCurrentState == 2 )
;// we're max guns, what are they? IF ( DLC05BridgeLD.enemyGunPower == 1 ) set DLC05BridgeLD.enemyHP to DLC05BridgeLD.enemyHP - 65 ELSEIF ( DLC05BridgeLD.enemyGunPower == 2 ) set DLC05BridgeLD.enemyHP to DLC05BridgeLD.enemyHP - 75 ELSEIF ( DLC05BridgeLD.enemyGunPower == 3 ) set DLC05BridgeLD.enemyHP to DLC05BridgeLD.enemyHP - 55 ENDIF
ENDIF
;////////////////////////////////////////////////// ;// TRACK THE SHIPS HEALTH // ;////////////////////////////////////////////////// IF ( ( DLC05BridgeLD.enemyHP / DLC05BridgeLD.enemyHPMAX ) <= 0.75 && healthTracker == 0 ) ;// ship at ~75% DLC05BridgeEnemyShipHealth75.enable 0 DLC05BridgeEnemyShipHealth100.disable 1 set healthTracker to 1 ELSEIF ( ( DLC05BridgeLD.enemyHP / DLC05BridgeLD.enemyHPMAX ) <= 0.5 && healthTracker == 1 ) ;// ship at 50% DLC05BridgeEnemyShipHealth50.enable 0 DLC05BridgeEnemyShipHealth75.disable 1 set healthTracker to 2 ELSEIF ( ( DLC05BridgeLD.enemyHP / DLC05BridgeLD.enemyHPMAX ) <= 0.25 && healthTracker == 2 ) ;// ship at ~25% DLC05BridgeEnemyShipHealth25.enable 0 DLC05BridgeEnemyShipHealth50.disable 1 set healthTracker to 3 ENDIF
set firedState to 2
;///////////////////////////// ;// FINISH IT OFF // ;///////////////////////////// IF ( DLC05BridgeLD.enemyHP <= 0 && getStage DLC05BridgeLD == 52 ) DLC05BridgeEnemyShipHealth25.disable DLC05BridgeEnemyShipREF.do 400 setStage DLC05BridgeLD 99 SetSTage DLC05MZ3 200
;// take care of the E-Core return DLC05BridgeOldTele.disable 0 DLC05BridgeECoreTeleport.enable 0 DLC05BridgeEnemyShields1.disable DLC05BridgeEnemyShields2.disable DLC05BridgeEnemyShields3.disable stopQuest DLC05BridgeLD
ENDIF
ENDIF ENDIF
;//////////////////////////////////// ;// the timer for before the deathray can be fired again IF ( rechargeTimer > 0 && firedState >= 1) set rechargeTimer to rechargeTimer - getSecondsPassed
ELSE DLC05BridgeFireButtonHolo.enable playgroup specialIdle 0 set activationState to 0 set firedState to 0
ENDIF
ENDIF
;////////////////// ;// after its pressed, turn it off IF ( activationState == 1 ) IF ( isAnimPlaying forward == 0 ) set activationState to 2 playgroup backward 0 ENDIF ENDIF END

scn DLC05shockVolumeSCRIPT
short triggered ; tells event to happen in mainloop short damFlag ; flag to damage once per timer float timer ref actronaut ; the reference who stepped into the trigger
;================================================================
begin onTrigger
if triggered == 0 set triggered to 1 set actronaut to getActionRef set timer to 0.25 set damFlag to 1 endif
end
;================================================================
begin gameMode
if triggered == 1 ;shock the victim immediately, wait at least *timer* before doing it again
if damFlag == 1 actronaut.damageAV health 15 actronaut.do 15 ; for stuff like grenades? Test. actronaut.say Hit set damFlag to 0 if actronaut == player imod TrapToiletShockISFX endif actronaut.pms PulseDisableFXShader endif endif
; periodically disable the shader and prevent constant damage ticking per frame if timer > 0 ; timer to prevent constant damage set timer to (timer - getSecondsPassed) else set triggered to 0 actronaut.sms PulseDisableFXShader endif
endif
end ;================================================================

scn DLC05ShockVolumeSwitchSCRIPT
ref myLink ref mySelf short active
float timer
short init
begin onActivate
if active == 0 set active to 1 endif
end
begin gameMode
if init == 0 ; just initialize these variables. set mySelf to getSelf set myLink to mySelf.getLinkedRef set init to 1 endif
if active == 1 mySelf.playgroup forward 0
if myLink.getDisabled == 1 myLink.enable else myLink.disable endif
set active to 0
endif
end

scn DLC05FF01barkPointsSCRIPT
; function style mega script to handle all the little barks. ;======================================== short doOnce ref myLink ref mySelf
short init short subBool ; on/off flag for subtitles force
;========================================
BEGIN onTriggerEnter player
if init == 0 set myLink to getLinkedRef set mySelf to getSelf set subBool to 0 ; change to globally on/off forced subtitles set init to 1 endif
if doOnce == 0
if getisReference DLC05FF01BarkTrig01 setStage DLC05FF01 50 myLink.sayTo player DLC05FF01Bark01c, subBool set doOnce to 1 endif
if getisReference DLC05FF01BarkTrig02 myLink.sayTo player DLC05FF01ambush01c, subBool set doOnce to 1 endif
if getisReference DLC05FF01BarkTrig03 myLink.sayTo player DLC05FF01moreBehindYou, subBool set doOnce to 1 endif
if getisReference DLC05FF01AirlockBark01 ; sally trying to let playing INTO airlock #1 set DLC05FF01.field01flag to 1 set DLC05FF01.timer01 to 3 DLC05FF01cleanupTrig01.enable ; clean up aliens trying to pursue player myLink.sayTo player DLC05FF01AirlockVox01, subBool set doOnce to 1 endif
if getisReference DLC05FF01AirlockBark02 ; sally trying to let player OUT of airlock #1 set DLC05FF01.field02flag to 1 set DLC05FF01.timer02 to 10 DLC05AirlockFrame01.setOpenState 0 myLink.sayTo player DLC05FF01AirlockVox02, subBool set doOnce to 1 endif
if getisReference DLC05FF01AirlockBark03 set DLC05FF01.field03flag to 1 set DLC05FF01.timer03 to 15 DLC05AirlockFrame02.setOpenState 0 ; close field behind player DLC05AirlockFrame03.setOpenState 0 ; close field behind player myLink.sayTo player DLC05FF01AirlockVox03, subBool set doOnce to 1 endif
if getisReference DLC05FF01AirlockBark04 set DLC05FF01.field04flag to 1 set DLC05FF01.timer04 to 15 DLC05AirlockFrame04.setOpenState 0 ; close field behind player DLC05AirlockFrame05.setOpenState 0 ; close field behind player DLC05FF01cleanupTrig02.enable ; clean up first two rooms/halls of airlock area myLink.sayTo player DLC05FF01AirlockVox04, subBool set doOnce to 1 endif
if getisReference DLC05FF01preArenaBark DLC05FF01ArenaEntryDoor.unlock ; unlock the door to the arena FF01arenaAlien01.enable FF01arenaAlien02.enable FF01arenaAlien03.enable FF01arenaAlien04.enable DLC05FF01cleanupTrig03.enable ; final airlock area cleanup trigger DLC05AirlockFrame06.setOpenState 0 ; close airlock section off entirely now myLink.sayTo player DLC05FF01PreArenaVox, subBool set doOnce to 1 endif
if getisReference DLC05PostArenaBark myLink.sayTo player DLC05FF01PostArenaVox, subBool set doOnce to 1 endif
if getisReference DLC05FF01FinalBarkTRIG DLC05FF01MeanieREF.enable ; enable an alien just outside Sally's area DLC05FF01MeanieREF.additem DLC05weapPistol 1 DLC05FF01MeanieREF.equipitem DLC05weapPistol 1 DLC05FF01MeanieREF.setAV health 1 ; make sure this guy goes down easy DLC05FF01MeanieREF.setAV perception 1 ; make sure this guy is dense DLC05FF01MeanieREF.useWeapon DLC05weapPistol DLC05MeanieMarker DLC05SallyControlRoomMarker 25 setStage DLC05FF01 90 DLC05SallyREF.moveTo DLC05SallyControlRoomMarker DLC05SallyREF.addToFaction DLC05AlienFaction 1 DLC05SallyREF.stopCombat DLC05SallyREF.evp myLink.sayTo player DLC05FF01goAwayMeanhead, subBool set doOnce to 1 endif
if getisReference DLC05FF01preControlRoomTRIG DLC05FF01MeanieREF.kill ; kill the blue meanie, just in case. DLC05FF01controlRoomFrame.setOpenState 1 ; open the field to Sally's room DLC05FF01ControlRoomBlocker.disable DLC05SallyREF.stopCombat DLC05SallyREF.evp set doOnce to 1 endif
;==================== ;== Close out the loop | ; <--- endif
END
;========================================

scn DLC05DeathRayGeneratorActTRIG
short isDestroyed short isOpened short isClosed short isOpening short isClosing short onLoad
short disabled short activatedSwitches
short pillarDestroyed
ref mySelf ref myPillar
Begin GameMode
if (onLoad == 0) set mySelf to GetSelf myself.PlayGroup SpecialIdle 0 set isClosed to 1 ; Generator starts in closed position set onLoad to 1 if (mySelf == DLC05DeathRayGen01REF) set myPillar to DLC05MZRmWinPillarREF01 endif
if (mySelf == DLC05DeathRayGen02REF) set myPillar to DLC05MZRmWinPillarREF02 endif
if (mySelf == DLC05DeathRayGen03REF) set myPillar to DLC05MZRmWinPillarREF03 endif
if (mySelf == DLC05DeathRayGen04REF) set myPillar to DLC05MZRmWinPillarREF04 endif endif
;If i'm destroyed set myPillar to turn off if (myself.GetDisabled == 1) && (pillarDestroyed == 0) myPillar.PlayGroup Right 1 set pillarDestroyed to 1 endif
if (disabled == 0) && (GetDisabled == 1) && (isOpened == 1) set DLC05DeathRayREF.chargeReady to (DLC05DeathRayREF.chargeReady - 1) set DLC05DeathRayREF.destroyedGens to (DLC05DeathRayREF.destroyedGens + 1)
set DLC05DeathRayREF.chargeStage to (DLC05DeathRayREF.chargeStage - 1)
set DLC05DeathRayChargeButtonREF.maxButtonPresses to (DLC05DeathRayChargeButtonREF.maxButtonPresses - 1)
if (mySelf == DLC05DeathRayGen01REF) set DLC05DeathRayREF.gen1D to 1 endif
if (mySelf == DLC05DeathRayGen02REF) set DLC05DeathRayREF.gen2D to 1 endif
if (mySelf == DLC05DeathRayGen03REF) set DLC05DeathRayREF.gen3D to 1 endif
if (mySelf == DLC05DeathRayGen04REF) set DLC05DeathRayREF.gen4D to 1 endif
set disabled to 1 endif
;------------------------------------------------- ;----Death Ray Generator 01 ;------------------------------------------------- ; Am I the correct Death Ray Generator? if (mySelf == DLC05DeathRayGen01REF) && (mySelf.GetDisabled == 0) ; Open if the charge stage is equal to, or above, this generators charge number if (DLC05DeathRayREF.openGen1 == 1)
; If i am closed start opening if (isClosed == 1) set isOpening to 1 set isClosed to 0 mySelf.PlayGroup Forward 1 myPillar.playgroup Left 1 endif
; Once i'm done opening set me to opened if (isOpening == 1) if (mySelf.IsAnimPlaying Forward == 0) set DLC05DeathRayREF.chargeReady to (DLC05DeathRayREF.chargeReady + 1) myPillar.playgroup Forward 1 set isOpened to 1 set isOpening to 0 endif endif
; If i am closing already then my charge number must already be ; equal to, or below, my required charge number. if (isClosing == 1) if (mySelf.IsAnimPlaying Backward == 0) set isClosing to 0 set isClosed to 1 mySelf.PlayGroup SpecialIdle 0 endif endif
endif
; Close if gun has been fired and charge number is now less than my charge number if (DLC05DeathRayREF.openGen1 == 0) if (isClosing == 0) && (isClosed == 0) && (isOpening == 0) set isOpened to 0 set isClosing to 1 mySelf.PlayGroup Backward 1 myPillar.playgroup Backward 1 endif
if (isOpening == 1) && (IsAnimPlaying Forward == 0) set isOpening to 0 set isClosing to 1 PlayGroup Backward 1 endif
; Close until completed, then mark myself closed if (isClosing == 1) if (mySelf.IsAnimPlaying Backward == 0) set isClosing to 0 set isClosed to 1 mySelf.PlayGroup SpecialIdle 0 set DLC05DeathRayREF.powerToCore to 0 ; allows the core anim to be powered up again when generators open endif
endif endif
; If this generator is opened enable the charge beam if (isOpened == 1) ;DLC05DeathRayChargeBeam01REF.Enable 0 else ;DLC05DeathRayChargeBeam01REF.Disable 0 endif
endif
;------------------------------------------------- ;----Death Ray Generator 02 ;------------------------------------------------- ; Am I the correct Death Ray Generator? if (mySelf == DLC05DeathRayGen02REF) && (mySelf.GetDisabled == 0) ; Open if the charge stage is equal to, or above, this generators charge number if (DLC05DeathRayREF.openGen2 == 1)
; If i am closed start opening if (isClosed == 1) set isOpening to 1 set isClosed to 0 mySelf.PlayGroup Forward 1 myPillar.playgroup Left 1 endif
; Once i'm done opening set me to opened if (isOpening == 1) if (mySelf.IsAnimPlaying Forward == 0) set DLC05DeathRayREF.chargeReady to (DLC05DeathRayREF.chargeReady + 1) myPillar.playgroup Forward 1 set isOpened to 1 set isOpening to 0 endif endif
; If i am closing already then my charge number must already be ; equal to, or below, my required charge number. if (isClosing == 1) if (mySelf.IsAnimPlaying Backward == 0) set isClosing to 0 set isClosed to 1 mySelf.PlayGroup SpecialIdle 0 endif endif
endif
; Close if gun has been fired and charge number is now less than my charge number if (DLC05DeathRayREF.openGen2 == 0) if (isClosing == 0) && (isClosed == 0) && (isOpening == 0) set isOpened to 0 set isClosing to 1 mySelf.PlayGroup Backward 1 myPillar.playgroup Backward 1 endif
if (isOpening == 1) && (IsAnimPlaying Forward == 0) set isOpening to 0 set isClosing to 1 PlayGroup Backward 1 endif
; Close until completed, then mark myself closed if (isClosing == 1) if (mySelf.IsAnimPlaying Backward == 0) set isClosing to 0 set isClosed to 1 mySelf.PlayGroup SpecialIdle 0 set DLC05DeathRayREF.powerToCore to 0 ; allows the core anim to be powered up again when generators open endif
endif endif
; If this generator is opened enable the charge beam if (isOpened == 1) ;DLC05DeathRayChargeBeam01REF.Enable 0 else ;DLC05DeathRayChargeBeam01REF.Disable 0 endif
endif
;------------------------------------------------- ;----Death Ray Generator 03 ;------------------------------------------------- ; Am I the correct Death Ray Generator? if (mySelf == DLC05DeathRayGen03REF) && (mySelf.GetDisabled == 0) ; Open if the charge stage is equal to, or above, this generators charge number if (DLC05DeathRayREF.openGen3 == 1)
; If i am closed start opening if (isClosed == 1) set isOpening to 1 set isClosed to 0 mySelf.PlayGroup Forward 1 myPillar.playgroup Left 1 endif
; Once i'm done opening set me to opened if (isOpening == 1) if (mySelf.IsAnimPlaying Forward == 0) set DLC05DeathRayREF.chargeReady to (DLC05DeathRayREF.chargeReady + 1) myPillar.playgroup Forward 1 set isOpened to 1 set isOpening to 0 endif endif
; If i am closing already then my charge number must already be ; equal to, or below, my required charge number. if (isClosing == 1) if (mySelf.IsAnimPlaying Backward == 0) set isClosing to 0 set isClosed to 1 mySelf.PlayGroup SpecialIdle 0 endif endif
endif
; Close if gun has been fired and charge number is now less than my charge number if (DLC05DeathRayREF.openGen3 == 0) if (isClosing == 0) && (isClosed == 0) && (isOpening == 0) set isOpened to 0 set isClosing to 1 mySelf.PlayGroup Backward 1 endif
if (isOpening == 1) && (IsAnimPlaying Forward == 0) set isOpening to 0 set isClosing to 1 PlayGroup Backward 1 myPillar.playgroup Backward 1 endif
; Close until completed, then mark myself closed if (isClosing == 1) if (mySelf.IsAnimPlaying Backward == 0) set isClosing to 0 set isClosed to 1 mySelf.PlayGroup SpecialIdle 0 set DLC05DeathRayREF.powerToCore to 0 ; allows the core anim to be powered up again when generators open endif
endif endif
; If this generator is opened enable the charge beam if (isOpened == 1) ;DLC05DeathRayChargeBeam01REF.Enable 0 else ;DLC05DeathRayChargeBeam01REF.Disable 0 endif
endif
;------------------------------------------------- ;----Death Ray Generator 04 ;------------------------------------------------- ; Am I the correct Death Ray Generator? if (mySelf == DLC05DeathRayGen04REF) && (mySelf.GetDisabled == 0) ; Open if the charge stage is equal to, or above, this generators charge number if (DLC05DeathRayREF.openGen4 == 1)
; If i am closed start opening if (isClosed == 1) set isOpening to 1 set isClosed to 0 mySelf.PlayGroup Forward 1 myPillar.playgroup Left 1 endif
; Once i'm done opening set me to opened if (isOpening == 1) if (mySelf.IsAnimPlaying Forward == 0) set DLC05DeathRayREF.chargeReady to (DLC05DeathRayREF.chargeReady + 1) myPillar.playgroup Forward 1 set isOpened to 1 set isOpening to 0 endif endif
; If i am closing already then my charge number must already be ; equal to, or below, my required charge number. if (isClosing == 1) if (mySelf.IsAnimPlaying Backward == 0) set isClosing to 0 set isClosed to 1 mySelf.PlayGroup SpecialIdle 0 endif endif
endif
; Close if gun has been fired and charge number is now less than my charge number if (DLC05DeathRayREF.openGen4 == 0) if (isClosing == 0) && (isClosed == 0) && (isOpening == 0) set isOpened to 0 set isClosing to 1 mySelf.PlayGroup Backward 1 myPillar.playgroup Backward 1 endif
if (isOpening == 1) && (IsAnimPlaying Forward == 0) set isOpening to 0 set isClosing to 1 PlayGroup Backward 1 endif
; Close until completed, then mark myself closed if (isClosing == 1) if (mySelf.IsAnimPlaying Backward == 0) set isClosing to 0 set isClosed to 1 mySelf.PlayGroup SpecialIdle 0 set DLC05DeathRayREF.powerToCore to 0 ; allows the core anim to be powered up again when generators open endif
endif endif
; If this generator is opened enable the charge beam if (isOpened == 1) ;DLC05DeathRayChargeBeam01REF.Enable 0 else ;DLC05DeathRayChargeBeam01REF.Disable 0 endif
endif
End

scn DLC05HQScript
int numActive ;number of active enemies int maxActive ;number of possible active enemies, init in stage 101
int track int trackA int trackB
int numEnemies ;number of enemies that have spawned int maxEnemies ;number of total enemies the player will see, init in stage 101
float spawnTime ;spawn time, calculated in 102 int spawnDiff ;spawn difficulty, calculated in 102
int needToSpawn
int buttonPushed ;for alien controller. sets to 1 when he's pushed a button. int bumperZone ;zone F => 1 ;zone B => 2 ;zone C => 3 ;zone D => 4 ;zone E => 5
begin gamemode
if getstagedone dlc05hq 100 setstage dlc05HQ 103 endif
end

scn DLC05HangarLvlSiegeSCRIPT
begin OnDeath setstage dlc05HQ 103 ;set DLC05HQ.numActive to DLC05HQ.numActive - 1 end

scn DLC05TriggerHangarSiegeControlSCRIPT ; ;this handles the spawning cycle. Will also trigger waves. ;needToSpawn makes sure that this isn't processing at the same time as a quest stage ; ;================
begin gameMode
if getStageDone DLC05HQ 101 && (getStageDone DLC05HQ 111 == 0) if DLC05HQ.needToSpawn == 1 if (DLC05HQ.numActive < DLC05HQ.maxActive) && (DLC05HQ.numEnemies < DLC05HQ.maxEnemies) if DLC05HQ.spawnTime <= 0 if getStageDone DLC05HQ 105 == 0 && (DLC05HQ.numEnemies > 5) set DLC05HQ.needToSpawn to 0 setStage DLC05HQ 105 elseif (getStageDone DLC05HQ 107 == 0) && (DLC05HQ.numEnemies > 15) ;after 20 enemies have spawned if (DLC05HQ.numActive < DLC05HQ.maxActive - 6) ;will be spawning 6 guys. wait till there's room set DLC05HQ.needToSpawn to 0 setStage DLC05HQ 107 endif ; elseif (getStageDone DLC05HQ 109 == 0) && (DLC05HQ.numEnemies > 40) ;after 40 enemies have spawned ; if (DLC05HQ.numActive < DLC05HQ.maxActive - 6) ;will be spawning 6 guys. wait till there's room ; set DLC05HQ.needToSpawn to 0 ; setStage DLC05HQ 109 ; endif elseif (getStageDone DLC05HQ 111 == 0) && (DLC05HQ.numEnemies > 23) ;after 60 enemies have spawned if (DLC05HQ.numActive < DLC05HQ.maxActive - 6) ;will be spawning 6 guys. wait till there's room set DLC05HQ.needToSpawn to 0 setStage DLC05HQ 111 endif else set DLC05HQ.needToSpawn to 0 setstage DLC05HQ 102 endif else set DLC05HQ.spawnTime to DLC05HQ.spawnTime - getSecondsPassed endif endif endif endif
end

scn DLC05TriggerHangarLeviForceSCRIPT
ref actionRef
begin onTriggerEnter
set actionRef to getActionRef DLC05HangarLeviPushMarker.pushactoraway actionref 7 ;DLC05TriggerLeviRef.placeatme DLC05FakeForceBallLevi
end

scn DLC05GeneratorSCRIPT
short onLoad ;short requiredSwitches ;How many switches are required to be flipped? short activatedSwitches ;How many switches have been activated? ;short allSwitches ;Have all the switches been activated? short opened ;1 is open
Begin GameMode
if (onLoad == 0) ; if (GetIsReference DLC05CryoGeneratorREF == 1) ;if i'm the cryo generator... ; set requiredSwitches to 3 ;set my switches to 3 ; endif ; ; if (GetIsReference DLC05HangarGeneratorRef == 1) ;if i'm the hangar generator... ; set requiredSwitches to 3 ;set my switches to 3 ; endif ; ; if (GetIsReference DLC05AsmGeneratorRef == 1) ;if i'm the asm generator... ; set requiredSwitches to 4 ;set my switches to 4 ; endif ; ; if (GetIsReference DLC05ExLabGeneratorREF== 1) ;if i'm the experimental lab generator... ; set requiredSwitches to 3 ;set my switches to 3 ; endif
PlayGroup SpecialIdle 1 ;Start SpecialIdle anim
set onLoad to 1 endif
if (opened == 0) && (IsAnimPlaying Forward == 1) if (IsAnimPlaying Forward ==0) set opened to 1 ;generator fully open endif endif
End

scn DLC05CryoSwitchFreezeSceneREFSCRIPT
short doOnceA short doOnceB short onLoad ref myLink float timer short runTimer
Begin onActivate
if (doOnceA == 0) && (doOnceB == 0) set myLink to getLinkedRef playgroup Forward 1 Activate myLink.enable
if (IsActionRef Player == 1) set runTimer to 1 endif
set doOnceA to 1 set doOnceB to 1 endif
;DLC05CryoLab01MasTrigREF
End
Begin GameMode
if (doOnceB == 1) if (myLink.GetDisabled == 1) playgroup SpecialIdle 1 set doOnceA to 0 set doOnceB to 0 endif
if (IsAnimPlaying Forward == 0) PlayGroup Backward 0 set DoOnceB to 2 endif
endif
if (onLoad == 0) set timer to 2 set onLoad to 1 endif
if (runTimer == 1) if (timer < 0) set DLC05MZ2.MZ2TercorienFollow to 0 set DLC05CryoLab01MasTrigREF.elliotMarkHit to 15 set DLC05CryoQ.elliotTalkStage to 35 set DLC05CryoLab01MasTrigREF.elliotReset to 20 set runTimer to 2 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
End

scn DLC05MZ2NPCTriggerCryoScript
short CheckPaulson short CheckSomah
begin OnTriggerEnter
if ( IsActionRef Player == 1 ) if ( DLC05MZ2.MZ2PaulsonFollow == 1 ) set CheckPaulson to 1 endif elseif ( DLC05MZ2.MZ2SomahFollow == 1 ) set CheckSomah to 1 endif endif
end
begin Gamemode
if ( CheckSomah == 1 ) if ( DLC05SomahRef.GetInCell DLC05CryoLab01 == 1 ) set DLC05MZ2.MZ2SomahFollow to 0 Set DLC05MZ2.MZ2Follow to 0 set DLC05MZ2.MZ2SomahTrigger to 1 DLC05TercorienRef.Evp set CheckSomah to 0 endif elseif ( CheckPaulson == 1 ) if ( DLC05PaulsonRef.GetInCell DLC05CryoLab01 == 1 ) set DLC05MZ2.MZ2PaulsonFollow to 0 Set DLC05MZ2.MZ2Follow to 0 set DLC05MZ2.MZ2PaulsonTrigger to 1 DLC05PaulsonRef.Evp set CheckPaulson to 0 endif endif
end

scn DLC05MZ2NPCTriggerHangarScript
short CheckTercorien short CheckSomah
begin OnTriggerEnter Player
if ( IsActionRef Player == 1 ) if ( DLC05MZ2.MZ2TercorienFollow == 1 ) set CheckTercorien to 1 elseif ( DLC05MZ2.MZ2SomahFollow == 1 ) set CheckSomah to 1 endif endif
end
begin Gamemode
if ( CheckTercorien == 1 ) if ( DLC05TercorienRef.GetInCell DLC05Hangar == 1 ) set DLC05MZ2.MZ2TercorienFollow to 0 Set DLC05MZ2.MZ2Follow to 0 set DLC05MZ2.MZ2TercorienTrigger to 1 DLC05TercorienRef.Evp set CheckTercorien to 0 endif elseif ( CheckSomah == 1 ) if ( DLC05SomahRef.GetInCell DLC05Hangar == 1 ) set DLC05MZ2.MZ2SomahFollow to 0 Set DLC05MZ2.MZ2Follow to 0 set DLC05MZ2.MZ2SomahTrigger to 1 DLC05SomahRef.Evp set CheckSomah to 0 endif endif
end

scn DLC05MZ2NPCTriggerRobotScript
short CheckTercorien short CheckPaulson
begin OnTriggerEnter Player
if ( IsActionRef Player == 1 ) if ( DLC05MZ2.MZ2TercorienFollow == 1 ) set CheckTercorien to 1 elseif ( DLC05MZ2.MZ2PaulsonFollow == 1 ) set CheckPaulson to 1 endif endif
end
begin Gamemode
if ( CheckTercorien == 1 ) if ( DLC05TercorienRef.GetInCell DLC05RobotAssembly == 1 ) set DLC05MZ2.MZ2TercorienFollow to 0 Set DLC05MZ2.MZ2Follow to 0 set DLC05MZ2.MZ2TercorienTrigger to 1 DLC05TercorienRef.Evp set CheckTercorien to 0 endif elseif ( CheckPaulson == 1 ) if ( DLC05PaulsonRef.GetInCell DLC05RobotAssembly == 1 ) set DLC05MZ2.MZ2PaulsonFollow to 0 Set DLC05MZ2.MZ2Follow to 0 set DLC05MZ2.MZ2PaulsonTrigger to 1 DLC05PaulsonRef.Evp set CheckPaulson to 0 endif endif
end

scn DLC05CryoTrapSprayJetSCRIPT
ref myLink short onLoad short sprayOn
Begin GameMode
if (onLoad == 0) set myLink to GetLinkedRef PlayGroup Backward 1 Disable 0 set onLoad to 1 endif
if (myLink.GetDisabled == 0) && (sprayOn == 0) set sprayOn to 1 endif
if (myLink.GetDisabled == 1) && (sprayOn == 1) set SprayOn to 0 endif
if (sprayOn == 1) && (GetDisabled == 1) Enable 0 PlayGroup Forward 1 endif
if (sprayOn == 0) && (IsAnimPlaying Forward == 1) && (GetDisabled == 0) Disable 1 endif
if (GetDisabled == 1) && (IsAnimPlaying Forward == 1) PlayGroup Backward 1 endif
End

scn DLC05CryoTrapActSCRIPT
ref myLink short podLeaveing short podEntering short onLoad
short runTimer float timer
Begin GameMode
if (onLoad == 0) set myLink to GetLinkedRef set onLoad to 1 endif
if (myLink.GetDisabled == 0) && (podLeaveing == 0) set podLeaveing to 1 set podEntering to 0 endif
if (myLink.GetDisabled == 1) && (podEntering == 0) set podEntering to 1 set podLeaveing to 0 endif
if (podEntering == 1) PlayGroup Backward 0 set podEntering to 2 endif
if (podLeaveing == 1) ;PlayGroup Forward 0 set timer to 2.5 set runTimer to 1 set podLeaveing to 2 endif
if (runTimer == 1) if (timer < 0) PlayGroup Forward 0 set runTimer to 0 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
End

scn DLC05CryoTrapMainSCRIPT
short onLoad short trapOn ref enteringREF ref myLink short timerStage float timer
Begin GameMode
if (onLoad == 0) set myLink to getLinkedRef set timerStage to 1 set onLoad to 1 endif
if (myLink.GetDisabled == 0) && (trapOn == 0) set timer to 6 myLink.Enable set trapOn to 1 endif
if (trapOn == 1) if (timerStage == 1) if (timer < 0) set trapOn to 0 myLink.Disable else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
endif
End

scn DLC05FF01SCRIPT
;Variables for Engine Core Fortification Script ;============================================================================== short doOnce
short coreStage short updateCoreStage
short sallyCrawl short sallyCrawlA float sallyTimer float sallyTimerA
short sewerUpdate short asmUpdate short hangarUpdate short cryoUpdate short engineUpdate short cargoUpdate
short playerFromHangar short playerFromCargo short playerFromSewer short playerFromAsm short playerFromEngine short alienAssaultActive
short coreStageCryoWithElliot short coreStageRobotAsm
Begin GameMode
if (doOnce == 0) set sallyTimer to 12 set sallyTimerA to 12 set doOnce to 1 endif
;SALLY CRAWLING TO STASH if (sallyCrawlA == 1) if (DLC05SallyRef.GetSitting == 0) set sallyCrawlA to 2 endif endif
if (sallyCrawlA == 2) if (DLC05SallyRef.GetSitting > 0) set sallyCrawlA to 3 endif endif
if (sallyCrawlA == 3) if (sallyTimerA < 0) set sallyCrawlA to 4 DLC05SallyRef.MoveTo DLC05CoreSallyMoveToAfterCrawlAREF DLC05CoreSallyCrawlForceFieldAREF.SetOpenState 1 DLC05CoreSallyCrawlForceFieldA2REF.PlayGroup Backward 1 Set DLC05MZ2.MZ2SallyStash to 2 DLC05SallyRef.EVP
else set sallyTimerA to (sallyTimerA - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
if ( SallyCrawlA == 4 )
endif
;SALLY CRAWLING TO UNLOCK DOORS if (sallyCrawl == 1) if (DLC05SallyRef.GetSitting == 0) set sallyCrawl to 2 endif endif
if (sallyCrawl == 2) if (DLC05SallyRef.GetSitting > 0) set sallyCrawl to 3 endif endif
if (sallyCrawl == 3) if (sallyTimer < 0) set sallyCrawl to 4 DLC05SallyRef.MoveTo DLC05CoreSallyMoveToAfterCrawlREF
else set sallyTimer to (sallyTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
if (player.GetInCell DLC05EngineCore == 1) && (coreStage == 3) && (alienAssaultActive == 0) if (DLC05TercorienRef.GetDead == 1) && (DLC05SomahRef.GetDead == 1) && (DLC05PaulsonRef.GetDead == 1)
;DoNothing
else
;Player comes from hangar if (playerFromHangar == 1) DLC05EngineCoreStage03AlienSpawn01REF.MoveTo DLC05CoreAlienMoveToHangarREF DLC05EngineCoreStage03AlienSpawn02REF.MoveTo DLC05CoreAlienMoveToHangarREF endif
;Player comes from Cargo Bay if (playerFromCargo == 1) DLC05EngineCoreStage03AlienSpawn01REF.MoveTo DLC05CoreAlienMoveToCargoREF DLC05EngineCoreStage03AlienSpawn02REF.MoveTo DLC05CoreAlienMoveToCargoREF endif
;Player comes from Sewer Bay if (playerFromSewer == 1) DLC05EngineCoreStage03AlienSpawn01REF.MoveTo DLC05CoreAlienMoveToSewerAsmREF DLC05EngineCoreStage03AlienSpawn02REF.MoveTo DLC05CoreAlienMoveToSewerAsmREF endif
;Player comes from Robot Assembly if (playerFromAsm == 1) DLC05EngineCoreStage03AlienSpawn01REF.MoveTo DLC05CoreAlienMoveToSewerAsmREF DLC05EngineCoreStage03AlienSpawn02REF.MoveTo DLC05CoreAlienMoveToSewerAsmREF endif
;Player comes from Engine Room if (playerFromEngine == 1) DLC05EngineCoreStage03AlienSpawn01REF.MoveTo DLC05CoreAlienMoveToEngineREF DLC05EngineCoreStage03AlienSpawn02REF.MoveTo DLC05CoreAlienMoveToEngineREF endif
;Player comes from Cryo Labs ;Do Nothing, the aliens are already in place for this instance
endif
set alienAssaultActive to 1
endif
;This finds out what stage it is and enables the references accordingly if (coreStage == 1) && (updateCoreStage == 1) if (DLC05TercorienRef.GetDead == 1) && (DLC05SomahRef.GetDead == 1) && (DLC05PaulsonRef.GetDead == 1) ;Do Nothing
else if (DLC05TercorienRef.GetDead == 0) && (DLC05MZ2.MZ2TercorienFollow == 0) DLC05TercorienRef.MoveTo DLC05MZ2SomahStartMarker endif
if (DLC05SomahRef.GetDead == 0) && (DLC05MZ2.MZ2SomahFollow == 0) DLC05SomahRef.MoveTo DLC05MZ2SomahStartMarker endif
if (DLC05PaulsonRef.GetDead == 0) && (DLC05MZ2.MZ2PaulsonFollow == 0) DLC05PaulsonRef.MoveTo DLC05MZ2SomahStartMarker endif
if (DLC05SamuraiRef.GetDead == 0) DLC05SamuraiRef.MoveTo DLC05EngineCoreSamuraiSitMarkerREF endif
DLC05SallyRef.MoveTo DLC05MZ2SomahStartMarker
DLC05LivingAreaEnablerStage01REF.Enable
;ShowWarning "Setting Stage 1 because people are alive." endif set updateCoreStage to 0 endif
if (coreStage == 2) && (updateCoreStage == 1) if (DLC05TercorienRef.GetDead == 1) && (DLC05SomahRef.GetDead == 1) && (DLC05PaulsonRef.GetDead == 1) ;Do Nothing else DLC05LivingAreaEnablerStage02REF.Enable ;ShowWarning "Setting Stage 2 because people are alive." endif set updateCoreStage to 0 endif
if (coreStage == 3) && (updateCoreStage == 1) if (DLC05TercorienRef.GetDead == 1) && (DLC05SomahRef.GetDead == 1) && (DLC05PaulsonRef.GetDead == 1) ;Do Nothing else DLC05LivingAreaEnablerStage03REF.Enable ;ShowWarning "Setting Stage 3 because people are alive." endif set updateCoreStage to 0 endif
if (coreStage == 4) && (updateCoreStage == 1) if (DLC05TercorienRef.GetDead == 1) && (DLC05SomahRef.GetDead == 1) && (DLC05PaulsonRef.GetDead == 1) ;Do Nothing else DLC05LivingAreaEnablerStage04REF.Enable ;ShowWarning "Setting Stage 4 because people are alive." endif set updateCoreStage to 0 endif
if (coreStage == 5) && (updateCoreStage == 1) if (DLC05TercorienRef.GetDead == 1) && (DLC05SomahRef.GetDead == 1) && (DLC05PaulsonRef.GetDead == 1) ;Do Nothing else DLC05LivingAreaEnablerStage05REF.Enable ;ShowWarning "Setting Stage 5 because people are alive." endif set updateCoreStage to 0 endif
if (coreStage == 6) && (updateCoreStage == 1) if (DLC05TercorienRef.GetDead == 1) && (DLC05SomahRef.GetDead == 1) && (DLC05PaulsonRef.GetDead == 1) ;Do Nothing else DLC05LivingAreaEnablerStage06REF.Enable ;ShowWarning "Setting Stage 6 because people are alive." endif set updateCoreStage to 0 endif
;This updates the coreStage each time the player leaves the engine core and returns if (sewerUpdate == 0) && (GetStage DLC05FF01 == 100) set coreStage to (coreStage + 1) set updateCoreStage to 1 set sewerUpdate to 1 endif
if (asmUpdate == 0) && (GetStage DLC05Asm== 255) set coreStage to (coreStage + 1) DLC05LivingAreaEnablerRobotASMREF.Enable set updateCoreStage to 1 set asmUpdate to 1 endif
if (hangarUpdate== 0) && (GetStage DLC05HQ== 255) set coreStage to (coreStage + 1) set updateCoreStage to 1 set hangarUpdate to 1 endif
if (cryoUpdate == 1) set coreStage to (coreStage + 1) set updateCoreStage to 1 set cryoUpdate to 2 endif
if (engineUpdate == 1) set coreStage to (coreStage + 1) set updateCoreStage to 1 set engineUpdate to 2 endif
if (cargoUpdate == 1) set coreStage to (coreStage + 1) set updateCoreStage to 1 set cargoUpdate to 2 endif
;No longer enabling cryo mine/grenades at this point. ; if (cryoUpdate == 2) ; if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotPickedUpCryoParts == 1) && (DLC05TercorienRef.GetInCell DLC05EngineCore) ; DLC05LivingAreaEnablerCryoREF.Enable ; set cryoUpdate to 3 ; endif ; endif
End
;============================================================================== ; Script Start For Sewer Level ;============================================================================== ; variable for the cart sequence
short inCartFlag
short field01flag float timer01
short field02flag float timer02
short field03flag float timer03
short field04flag float timer04
;==============================================================================
BEGIN gameMode
if field01flag == 1 if timer01 > 0 set timer01 to (timer01 - getSecondsPassed) else DLC05AirlockFrame01.setOpenState 1 DLC05FF01airlockBarkPoint.sayTo player DLC05FF01moveForward set field01flag to 0 endif endif
if field02flag == 1 if timer02 > 0 set timer02 to (timer02 - getSecondsPassed) else DLC05AirlockFrame02.setOpenState 1 DLC05AirlockFrame03.setOpenState 1 DLC05AirlockBarkPoint01.sayTo player DLC05FF01moveForward set field02flag to 0 endif endif
if field03flag == 1 if timer03 > 0 set timer03 to (timer03 - getSecondsPassed) else DLC05AirlockFrame04.setOpenState 1 DLC05AirlockFrame05.setOpenState 1 DLC05AirlockBarkPoint01.sayTo player DLC05FF01moveForward set field03flag to 0 endif endif
if field04flag == 1 if timer04 > 0 set timer04 to (timer04 - getSecondsPassed) else DLC05Airlockframe06.setOpenState 1 DLC05AirlockBarkPoint01.sayTo player DLC05FF01moveForward set field04flag to 0 endif endif
END

scn DLC05HealingArchTriggerScript
;GLOBALS ;DLC05HealingArchCoolDown -- how many seconds an arch has to cool down before it can be used again
ref archRef ;reference to it's linkedRef healing arch activator
;Mark's FX code == ---------------------------------- short warmUp ;steps from non animated timer mode to warm up anim then to warm idle--------------------
short coolingDown float timerCoolDown
Begin OnLoad set archRef to getLinkedRef
if coolingDown == 0 playgroup specialIdle 1 ; plays looping idle ---------------------------------------------------------- endif
End
Begin GameMode if coolingDown == 1
if timerCoolDown > 0 set timerCoolDown to timerCoolDown - getSecondsPassed
elseif timerCoolDown <= 0 && warmUp == 0 playgroup forward 1 ; animates a 30 frame warm up animation once------------------------- set warmUp to 1
elseif isAnimPlaying forward == 0 && warmUp == 1 playgroup specialIdle 1 ; plays looping idle ---------------------------------------------------------- set coolingDown to 0 set warmUp to 0 endif
endif
End
Begin OnTriggerEnter
if coolingDown == 0 if IsActionRef player == 1 setstage DLC05AlienTechFunctions 10 ;heal player and weapon set timerCoolDown to DLC05HealingArchCoolDown set coolingDown to 1
playgroup backward 1; kicks off healing animation-------------------------------------------------------- imod DLC05healArchISFX ; image space for healing-------------------------------------------------------
endif else showMessage DLC05HealingArchCoolDownMessage
endif
End

sms DLC05AlienArmorSpellShader03
End

scn DLC05ERoomEngineerSCRIPT
float respawnTimer short respawnTimerRun
short deathOnce short randChance ref mySelf
;// alien effects Float Timer Short DoOnce Short IsPile
;// portInEffects short portFX float portFXTimer
BEGIN ONLOAD
set mySelf to getSelf
;// if the blocker is on random chance to die on arrival IF ( getSelf == DLC05EREngineer2A || getSelf == DLC05EREngineer4A ) pms DLC05teleportInFXShader saa 0 setUnconscious 1 set portFXTimer to 1.5 set portFX to 1 ENDIF
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;////////////////// ;// if the engineer is dead, count down to when his replacement will arrive ;////////////////// IF ( respawnTimerRun == 1 )
IF ( respawnTimer > 0 ) set respawnTimer to respawnTimer - getSecondsPassed ELSE
;// spawn the replacement engineer IF ( getSelf == DLC05EREngineer2 ) DLC05EREngineer2A.enable
ELSEIF ( getSelf == DLC05EREngineer4 ) DLC05EREngineer4A.enable
ENDIF
;// stop the check set respawnTimerRun to -1
ENDIF ENDIF
;////////////// ;// the teleport in effects ;////////////// IF ( portFX >= 1 ) IF ( portFXTimer > 0 ) set portFXTimer to portFXTimer - getSecondsPassed
IF ( portFX == 1 && portFXTimer <= 1.3 ) set portFX to 2 saa 1 ENDIF
ELSE setUnconscious 0 sms DLC05teleportInFXShader set portFX to -1 ENDIF
ENDIF
END
BEGIN ONDEATH
;// start the respawn timer for the new engineer set respawnTimer to 15 set respawnTimerRun to 1
;// if my engineer is dead, turn me off IF ( getSelf == DLC05EREngineer0 ) IF ( DLC05ERRobotRoom0A.getDead == 0 ) DLC05ERRobotRoom0A.setUnconscious 1 DLC05ERRobotRoom0A.pms PulseDisableFXShader ENDIF
IF ( DLC05ERRobotRoom0B.getDead == 0 ) DLC05ERRobotRoom0B.setUnconscious 1 DLC05ERRobotRoom0B.pms PulseDisableFXShader ENDIF
ELSEIF ( getSelf == DLC05EREngineer1 ) IF ( DLC05ERRobotRoom1A.getDead == 0 ) DLC05ERRobotRoom1A.setUnconscious 1 DLC05ERRobotRoom1A.pms PulseDisableFXShader ENDIF
IF ( DLC05ERRobotRoom1B.getDead == 0 ) DLC05ERRobotRoom1B.setUnconscious 1 DLC05ERRobotRoom1B.pms PulseDisableFXShader ENDIF
ELSEIF ( getSelf == DLC05EREngineer2 || getSelf == DLC05EREngineer2A ) IF ( DLC05ERRobotRoom2A.getDead == 0 ) DLC05ERRobotRoom2A.setUnconscious 1 DLC05ERRobotRoom2A.pms PulseDisableFXShader ENDIF
IF ( DLC05ERRobotRoom2B.getDead == 0 ) DLC05ERRobotRoom2B.setUnconscious 1 DLC05ERRobotRoom2B.pms PulseDisableFXShader ENDIF
IF ( DLC05ERRobotRoom2C.getDead == 0 ) DLC05ERRobotRoom2C.setUnconscious 1 DLC05ERRobotRoom2C.pms PulseDisableFXShader ENDIF
IF ( DLC05ERRobotRoom2D.getDead == 0 ) DLC05ERRobotRoom2D.setUnconscious 1 DLC05ERRobotRoom2D.pms PulseDisableFXShader ENDIF
ELSEIF ( getSelf == DLC05EREngineer3 ) IF ( DLC05ERRobotRoom3A.getDead == 0 ) DLC05ERRobotRoom3A.setUnconscious 1 DLC05ERRobotRoom3A.pms PulseDisableFXShader ENDIF
IF ( DLC05ERRobotRoom3B.getDead == 0 ) DLC05ERRobotRoom3B.setUnconscious 1 DLC05ERRobotRoom3B.pms PulseDisableFXShader ENDIF
ELSEIF ( getSelf == DLC05EREngineer4 || getSelf == DLC05EREngineer4A ) IF ( DLC05ERRobotRoom4A.getDead == 0 ) DLC05ERRobotRoom4A.setUnconscious 1 DLC05ERRobotRoom4A.pms PulseDisableFXShader ENDIF
IF ( DLC05ERRobotRoom4B.getDead == 0 ) DLC05ERRobotRoom4B.setUnconscious 1 DLC05ERRobotRoom4B.pms PulseDisableFXShader ENDIF
IF ( DLC05ERRobotRoom4C.getDead == 0 ) DLC05ERRobotRoom4C.setUnconscious 1 DLC05ERRobotRoom4C.pms PulseDisableFXShader ENDIF
ELSEIF ( getSelf == DLC05EREngineer5 ) IF ( DLC05ERRobotRoom5A.getDead == 0 ) DLC05ERRobotRoom5A.setUnconscious 1 DLC05ERRobotRoom5A.pms PulseDisableFXShader ENDIF
IF ( DLC05ERRobotRoom5B.getDead == 0 ) DLC05ERRobotRoom5B.setUnconscious 1 DLC05ERRobotRoom5B.pms PulseDisableFXShader ENDIF
IF ( DLC05ERRobotRoom5C.getDead == 0 ) DLC05ERRobotRoom5C.setUnconscious 1 DLC05ERRobotRoom5C.pms PulseDisableFXShader ENDIF ENDIF
END

scn DLC05FF01arenaSCRIPT
; script controller for an arena fight in the trash area
short complete
short init
short barkFlag float barkOffset
short active float timer short timerOn short wave2
short subBool
BEGIN GAMEMODE
if complete == 0 if active == 0 && init == 0 if DLC05FF01ArenaEntryDoor.getOpenState == 1 || DLC05FF01ArenaEntryDoor.getOpenState == 2 ; setup stuff ; sally says it's an ambush! set subBool to 1 set init to 1 set active to 1 set barkFlag to 1 set barkOffset to 5 endif endif
if barkFlag == 1 if barkOffset > 0 set barkOffset to (barkOffset - getSecondsPassed) else DLC05FF01arenaBarker.sayTo player DLC05FF01SallyAmbushWarning subBool set barkFlag to 0 endif endif
if active == 1 if FF01arenaAlien01.getDead == 1 && FF01arenaAlien02.getDead && FF01arenaAlien03.getDead == 1 && FF01arenaAlien04.getDead == 1 ; all the initial ambushers are dead ; sally says she can't hold them off? DLC05FF01arenaBarker.sayTo player DLC05arenaBetweenWaves subBool DLC05FF01wave2aliens.enable set timer to 5 set timerOn to 1 set active to 0 endif endif
if timerOn == 1 if timer > 0 set timer to (timer - getSecondsPassed) else set wave2 to 1 set timerOn to 0 endif endif
if wave2 == 1 DLC05FF01arenaExitDoor.activate DLC05FF01arenaDoorController set wave2 to 0 endif endif
END
