scn DLC05MZDoorSmFieldSCRIPT
ref linkedRef short init short closing
begin onLoad set linkedRef to getLinkedREF if getOpenState == 1 linkedRef.playgroup backward 1 endif
end
begin onActivate
if getOpenState == 1 ;open setOpenState 0 endif
if getOpenState == 3 ;closed setOpenState 1 endif
end
begin onOpen linkedRef.playgroup backward 1 end
;begin onClose ; linkedRef.playgroup forward 1 ; set closing to 1 ;end
begin gameMode
if closing == 1 if getOpenState == 3 set closing to 0 linkedRef.playgroup specialidle 1 endif endif
if getOpenState == 4 && closing == 0 set closing to 1 linkedRef.playgroup forward 1 endif
end

scn DLC05AssemblySwitchSCRIPT
short Button short DoOnce float timer int ready ;activate if ready == 1
begin OnActivate
if ( IsActionRef Player == 1 ) && doOnce == 0 if ( Player.GetAv Repair >= 75 ) ShowMessage DLC05AsmAssemblyHighRepair set timer to 2 elseif ( Player.GetAv Repair < 75 ) ShowMessage DLC05AsmAssemblyLowRepair endif endif
end
begin gamemode
Set Button to GetButtonPressed
if ( Button == 0 ) elseif ( Button == 1 ) && ( DoOnce == 0 ) ; DLC05AsmBrkSwapMarker.enable ;Activate set ready to 1 Set DoOnce to 1 endif
if ready == 1 if timer < 0 activate set ready to 2 else set timer to timer - getSecondsPassed endif endif
end

scn DLC05AlienEpoxyEffectSCRIPT
float weapHealth
BEGIN ScriptEffectStart
;// get the current health percent and add 25 set weapHealth to player.getWeaponHealthPerc
;// run through the player's repair skill and augment appropriately IF ( player.getAV Repair < 25 ) set weapHealth to weapHealth + 15
ELSEIF ( player.getAV Repair >= 25 && player.getAV Repair < 50 ) set weapHealth to weapHealth + 20
ELSEIF ( player.getAV Repair >= 50 && player.getAV Repair < 75 ) set weapHealth to weapHealth + 25
ELSEIF ( player.getAV Repair >= 75 ) set weapHealth to weapHealth + 30
ENDIF
;// set the weapons new health percent player.setWeaponHealthPerc weapHealth
END

scn DLC05BridgeControlsSCRIPT
short startIdle short jammerInit short activationState float jammerTimer
BEGIN ONLOAD IF ( startIdle == 0 ) playgroup specialIdle 0 set startIdle to 1
ENDIF
END
BEGIN ONACTIVATE
IF ( getSelf == DLC05BridgeJammerControlREF && DLC05BridgeLD.teleportBlock == 0 && getStage DLC05BridgeLD >= 51 )
;// jam it! playgroup forward 0 set DLC05BridgeLD.teleportBlock to 1 set DLC05BridgeLD.sallyHelpJam to 1 set activationState to 1
;// start the countdown to restart set jammerTimer to 45 set jammerInit to 1
ELSE showMessage DLC05BridgeJammerOnlineMSG
ENDIF
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
IF ( activationState == 1 ) IF ( isAnimPlaying forward == 0 ) playgroup backward 0 set activationState to 0
ENDIF ENDIF
;////////////////////////////////////////////// ;// THE JAMMER TIMER IF ( jammerInit == 1 ) IF ( jammerTimer > 0 ) set jammerTimer to jammerTimer - getSecondsPassed
ELSE
;// after 15 seconds, Elliot pushes the button again or the jammer is off IF ( DLC05TercorienREF.getDead == 1 ) set DLC05BridgeLD.teleportBlock to 0 playgroup specialIdle 0
ENDIF
;// fix the button set jammerInit to 0
ENDIF ENDIF
END

scn DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigSCRIPT
short onLoad short triggerHit ref myLink
short mark short hitMark short reset
short askQuestion short killEm short leaveEm short useEm
short elliotIsDead
short squadDead
short runFromSquad
short findCryoStuff
short timerInit float timer
short playerInPos short elliotInPos
float elliotSpeakDelayTimer1
Begin GameMode
if (onLoad == 0) set myLink to getLinkedRef set elliotSpeakDelayTimer1 to 3 set timer to 3 set onLoad to 1 endif
;Check if elliot is dead if (elliotIsDead == 0) && (DLC05TercorienRef.GetDead == 1) ;Elliot is dead set elliotIsDead to 1 endif
;If the squad is dead stop elliot from running away if (squadDead == 0) && (DLC05CryoBecketREF.GetDead == 1) && (DLC05CryoDanielREF.GetDead == 1) set runFromSquad to 0 DLC05TercorienREF.EVP set squadDead to 1 endif
if (killEm == 1) ;If the player chooses to put them out of their misery set DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage to 35 set reset to 35 set mark to 35 set killEm to 2 endif
if (leaveEm == 1) ;If the player chooses to leave them set DLC05MZ2.MZ2TercorienFollow to 1 DLC05TercorienRef.EVP set leaveEm to 2 endif
if (useEm == 1) ;If the player chooses to use them set DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage to 50 set reset to 50 set mark to 50 set useEm to 2 endif
;When the player hits the trigger... if (triggerHit == 0) if (myLink.GetDisabled == 0) set triggerHit to 1 endif endif
;If elliot is still alive, and is in the cell, enable the trigger that fires off the squad scene If (DLC05TercorienRef.GetInCell DLC05CryoLab01 == 1) && (elliotIsDead == 0) if (playerInPos == 1) && (elliotInPos == 1) DLC05CryoLabTriggerSquadSceneREF.enable set playerInPos to 2 set elliotInPos to 2 endif endif
;If elliot is not in this cell, or if he is dead, just wait for the player into position. If (DLC05TercorienRef.GetInCell DLC05CryoLab01 == 0) || (elliotIsDead == 1) if (playerInPos == 1) DLC05CryoLabTriggerSquadSceneREF.enable set playerInPos to 2 set elliotInPos to 2 endif endif
;Locked the doors and start the squad sequence if (triggerHit == 1) set DLC05CryoQ.elliotDoorsTriggered to 1 set DLC05MZ2.MZ2TercorienFollow to 0 set mark to 5 set reset to 5 set DLC05CryoLab01MasTrigREF.elliotReset to 45 set DLC05CryoLab01MasTrigREF.ElliotMark to 50 set DLC05CryoQ.elliotTalkStage to 60 set DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage to 5 DLC05CryoLabAutopsyDoor01REF.SetOpenState 0 DLC05CryoLabAutopsyDoor01REF.Lock 255 DLC05CryoLabAutopsyDoor02REF.SetOpenState 0 DLC05CryoLabAutopsyDoor02REF.Lock 255 DLC05CryoSquadRedLightOff03REF.disable 0 DLC05CryoSquadRedLightOff04REF.disable 0 DLC05CryoSquadRedLightOn03REF.enable 0 DLC05CryoSquadRedLightOn04REF.enable 0 DLC05CryoSquadRedLight03REF.enable DLC05CryoSquadRedLight04REF.enable
If (DLC05TercorienRef.GetInCell DLC05CryoLab01 == 0) || (elliotIsDead == 1) set timerInit to 1 endif
set triggerHit to 2 endif
if (triggerHit == 2)
;Elliot notices squad and says his line if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage == 5) && (mark == 5) if (reset == 5) DLC05TercorienRef.EVP DLC05TercorienRef.SayTo Player DLC05CryoElliotFoundSquadSpeak 0 0 set reset to 10 endif endif
if (hitMark == 5) && (reset == 10) set mark to 10 set hitMark to -1 endif
;Elliot runs up to pods and says something if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage == 10) && (mark == 10) if (reset == 10) DLC05TercorienRef.EVP
set reset to 15 endif endif
if (hitMark == 10) && (reset == 15) set mark to 15 DLC05TercorienRef.SayTo Player DLC05CryoElliotFoundSquadSpeak 0 0 set hitMark to -1 endif
;Elliot runs over to terminals and says something if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage == 15) && (mark == 15) if (reset == 15) DLC05TercorienRef.EVP DLC05TercorienRef.SayTo Player DLC05CryoElliotFoundSquadSpeak 0 0 set reset to 20 endif endif
if (hitMark == 15) && (reset == 20) set mark to 20 set hitMark to -1 endif
;Elliot continues talk at same terminal if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage == 20) && (mark == 20) if (reset == 20) DLC05TercorienRef.EVP DLC05TercorienRef.SayTo Player DLC05CryoElliotFoundSquadSpeak 0 0 set reset to 25 endif endif
if (hitMark == 20) && (reset == 25) set mark to 25 set hitMark to -1 endif
;Elliot runs to different terminal and says something if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage == 25) && (mark == 25) if (reset == 25) DLC05TercorienRef.EVP DLC05TercorienRef.SayTo Player DLC05CryoElliotFoundSquadSpeak 0 0 set reset to 30 endif endif
if (hitMark == 25) && (reset == 30) set askQuestion to 1 set mark to 30 set hitMark to -1 endif
;Elliot run to player and force greets if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage == 30) && (mark == 30) if (reset == 30) DLC05TercorienRef.EVP set reset to 35 endif endif
if (hitMark == 30) && (reset == 35) set mark to 35 set hitMark to -1 endif
;------------------------------- ;---Elliot Kills Squad ;-------------------------------
;Elliot runs to the terminals saying he's going to put the soldiers out of their misery if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage == 35) && (mark == 35) if (reset == 35) DLC05TercorienRef.SayTo Player DLC05CryoElliotFoundSquadSpeak 0 0 DLC05TercorienRef.EVP set reset to 40 endif endif
if (hitMark == 35) && (reset == 40) set mark to 40 set hitMark to -1 endif
;Elliot runs to the terminals again, and says he's putting the soldier out of thier misery if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage == 40) && (mark == 40) if (reset == 40) DLC05TercorienRef.SayTo Player DLC05CryoElliotFoundSquadSpeak 0 0 DLC05TercorienRef.EVP set reset to 45 endif endif
if (hitMark == 40) && (reset == 45) set mark to 45 set hitMark to -1 endif
;Elliot runs up to the pods and says something emotional if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage == 45) && (mark == 45) if (reset == 45) DLC05TercorienRef.EVP DLC05CryoBecketREF.SetAV Variable05 3 DLC05CryoDanielREF.SetAV Variable05 3 set reset to 50 endif endif
if (hitMark == 45) && (reset == 50) DLC05TercorienRef.SayTo Player DLC05CryoElliotFoundSquadSpeak 0 0 set hitMark to -1 endif
;------------------------------- ;---Elliot Uses Squad ;-------------------------------
;Elliot runs to terminal to check squads vitals if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage == 50) && (mark == 50) if (reset == 50) DLC05TercorienRef.EVP set reset to 55 endif endif
if (hitMark == 50) && (reset == 55) DLC05TercorienRef.SayTo Player DLC05CryoElliotFoundSquadSpeak 0 0 set mark to 55 set hitMark to -1 endif
;Elliot runs to the pods, telling the player to open them if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage == 55) && (mark == 55) if (reset == 55) DLC05TercorienRef.SayTo Player DLC05CryoElliotFoundSquadSpeak 0 0 set useEm to 3 set DLC05CryoQ.squadRevived to 1 DLC05TercorienRef.EVP set reset to 60 endif endif
if (hitMark == 55) && (reset == 60) set mark to 60 set hitMark to -1 endif
;Elliot stands at the pods, explaining the situation to the squad - 1 if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage == 60) && (mark == 60) && (DLC05CryoSquadSwitchREF.switchFlipped == 1) if (reset == 60) if (elliotSpeakDelayTimer1 < 0) DLC05TercorienRef.SayTo Player DLC05CryoElliotFoundSquadSpeak 0 0 set DLC05CryoDanielREF.timerInit to 1 set DLC05CryoBecketREF.timerInit to 1 DLC05TercorienRef.EVP set reset to 65 else set elliotSpeakDelayTimer1 to (elliotSpeakDelayTimer1 - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif endif
if (hitMark == 60) && (reset == 65) set mark to 65 set hitMark to -1 endif
;Elliot stands at the pods, explaining the situation to the squad - 2 if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage == 65) && (mark == 65) if (reset == 65) DLC05TercorienRef.SayTo Player DLC05CryoElliotFoundSquadSpeak 0 0 DLC05TercorienRef.EVP set reset to 70 endif endif
if (hitMark == 65) && (reset == 70) set mark to 70 set hitMark to -1 endif
;Elliot stands at the pods, explaining the situation to the squad - 3 if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage == 70) && (mark == 70) if (reset == 70) DLC05TercorienRef.SayTo Player DLC05CryoElliotFoundSquadSpeak 0 0 DLC05CryoDanielREF.AddItemHealthPercent WeapChineseAssaultRifle 1 .23 DLC05CryoBecketREF.AddItemHealthPercent WeapChineseAssaultRifle 1 .19 DLC05CryoDanielREF.AddItem Ammo556mm 32 DLC05CryoBecketREF.AddItem Ammo556mm 32 DLC05TercorienRef.EVP set reset to 75 endif endif
if (hitMark == 70) && (reset == 75) set mark to 75 set hitMark to -1 endif
;Elliot tells the squad to move out if (DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage == 75) && (mark == 75) if (reset == 75) DLC05TercorienRef.SayTo Player DLC05CryoElliotFoundSquadSpeak 0 0 DLC05TercorienRef.EVP set reset to 80 endif endif
if (hitMark == 75) && (reset == 80) set mark to 80 DLC05TercorienRef.EVP set hitMark to -1 endif
endif
;Elliot finds cryo parts if (triggerHit == 3) if (findCryoStuff == 0) set findCryoStuff to 1 DLC05TercorienRef.SayTo Player DLC05CryoWeaponsFound 0 0 set DLC05CryoQ.elliotPickedUpCryoParts to 1 DLC05TercorienREF.EVP set triggerHit to 4 else set triggerHit to 4 endif endif
;Open locked doors to cryo storage if (triggerHit == 5) DLC05CryoSquadRedLightOff01REF.enable 0 DLC05CryoSquadRedLightOff02REF.enable 0 DLC05CryoSquadRedLightOn01REF.disable 0 DLC05CryoSquadRedLightOn02REF.disable 0 DLC05CryoSquadRegLight01REF.enable DLC05CryoSquadRedLight01REF.disable DLC05CryoSquadRegLight02REF.enable DLC05CryoSquadRedLight02REF.disable DLC05CryoDoorTo02AREF.unlock DLC05CryoDoorTo02BREF.unlock set DLC05CryoQ.elliotTalkStage to 55 set triggerHit to 6 endif
;If elliot dies after the locked doors have been triggered just open the locked doors. if (triggerHit >= 1) if (triggerHit < 5) if (elliotIsDead == 1) set triggerHit to 5 endif endif endif
;this timer run if the player triggers the locked doors and elliot is dead/not in cell. Then the doors unlock. if (timerInit == 1) if (timer < 0) set triggerHit to 5 set timerInit to 2 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
End

scn DLC05CryoPodDoorSquadSCRIPT
short activationState short onLoad short itsAlive
ref myLink ref actorLink
float timer
Begin onActivate
if (activationState == 0) playgroup forward 1 set activationState to 1 endif
End
Begin GameMode
if (onLoad == 0) set myLink to getLinkedRef set actorLink to myLink.GetLinkedRef set timer to 2 set itsAlive to 1 set onLoad to 1 endif
if (itsAlive == 1) myLink.SetUnconscious 1 myLink.MoveTo actorLink set itsAlive to 2 endif
if (itsAlive == 2) && (activationState == 1)
if (timer < 0) if (DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF.useEm < 3) myLink.SetAV Aggression 4 endif myLink.SetUnconscious 0 set itsAlive to 3 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
End

scn DLC05CryoSquadSwitchSCRIPT
short doOnceA short switchFlipped ref myLink
Begin onActivate
if (doOnceA == 0) set myLink to getLinkedRef playgroup Forward 1
if (DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF.useEm < 3) DLC05TercorienRef.SayTo Player DLC05CryoElliotDontPress 0 0 set DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF.mark to -1 set DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF. reset to -1 set DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage to -1 set DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF.runFromSquad to 1 DLC05TercorienRef.Setav Confidence 0 DLC05TercorienRef.Setav Assistance 0 DLC05TercorienRef.EVP else DLC05CryoDanielREF.AddToFaction PlayerFaction 1 DLC05CryoBecketREF.AddToFaction PlayerFaction 1 endif
Activate myLink.enable set doOnceA to 1 endif
End
Begin GameMode
if (doOnceA == 1) if (IsAnimPlaying Forward == 0) PlayGroup Backward 0 set switchFlipped to 1 set doOnceA to 2 endif endif
End

scn DLC05CryoSquadSCRIPT
short timerInit short onLoad float timer short doOnceA short doOnceB
short killSelf
Begin GameMode
if (onLoad == 0) set timer to 3 set onLoad to 1 endif
if (timerInit == 1)
if (timer < 0) DamageAV health 3 set timer to 3 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
endif
if (killSelf == 0) && (DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF.killEm == 3) && (GetUnconscious == 0) Kill set killSelf to 1 endif
End
Begin OnHit Player
if (doOnceA == 0) && (DLC05CryoQ.elliotMadBothKilled == 0)
if (DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF.leaveEm == 2) set DLC05CryoQ.elliotMadKilledAfterLeave to 1 set doOnceA to 1 else set DLC05CryoQ.elliotMadPlayerKilled to 1 set doOnceA to 1 endif
endif
;ShowWarning "Player hit me!"
End
Begin OnHit DLC05TercorienREF
if (doOnceB == 0)
if (DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF.leaveEm == 2) set DLC05CryoQ.elliotMadKilledAfterLeave to 1 set doOnceB to 1 else set DLC05CryoQ.elliotMadBothKilled to 1 set DLC05CryoQ.elliotMadPlayerKilled to 0 set doOnceB to 1 endif
endif
;ShowWarning "Elliot hit me!"
End

scn DLC05HangarBossDoorControlSCRIPT
short activationState
BEGIN ONACTIVATE
IF ( activationState == 0 ) playgroup forward 0 set activationState to 1 if getStageDone DLC05HQ 111 == 1 activate else setstage dlc05HQ 100 DLC05HangarAlarmREF.enable DLC05HangarKlaxonRef.activate DLC05HangarKlaxonRef 1 DLC05HangarKlaxonLightRef.activate DLC05HangarKlaxonLightRef 1 playmusic tension endif ENDIF
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
IF ( activationState == 1 ) IF ( isAnimPlaying forward == 0 ) set activationState to 0 playgroup specialIdle 0
ENDIF ENDIF
END

scn DLC05GeneratorMainSwitchSCRIPT
ref myLink short activationState short onLoad
BEGIN ONACTIVATE
IF ( activationState == 0 ) playgroup forward 0 set activationState to 1 activate ELSE ;Do Nothing
ENDIF
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
IF ( onLoad == 0 ) set myLink to GetLinkedRef set onLoad to 1
ENDIF
IF ( activationState == 1 ) IF ( isAnimPlaying forward == 0 ) set activationState to 2 myLink.PlayGroup Forward 1 playgroup backward 1
ENDIF ENDIF
END

scn DLC05DoorControlSCRIPT
short activationState ref linkedRef ref actionRef
BEGIN ONACTIVATE
set linkedRef to getLinkedRef set actionRef to getActionRef IF ( activationState == 0 ) playgroup forward 0 set activationState to 1 linkedRef.activate actionRef ENDIF
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
IF ( activationState == 1 ) IF ( isAnimPlaying forward == 0 ) set activationState to 0 playgroup specialIdle 0
ENDIF ENDIF
END

scn DLC05CoreSceneScript
short running ;0 = unset, 1 = scene is running, -1 = scene has finished short stage ;scene stage short paulsonFollowing ;0 = unset, 1 = Paulson was following player when we started scene, might need to forcibly pull him through the door short backAway ;0 = unset, 1 = Sally should back away, -1 Sally backed away

scn DLC05CoreSceneAlienScript
;-----This is the same as on other Aliens Begin OnHit
if IsSpellTarget DLC05AlienArmorSpell == 1 cios DLC05AlienArmorSpellBurst endif
End
Begin GameMode
;------------This controls the Engine Core scene
if DLC05CoreScene.running == 1
;if Paulson was following player and hasn't come through the door, forcibly move him if DLC05CoreScene.PaulsonFollowing == 1 if DLC05PaulsonRef.GetInSameCell player == 0 DLC05PaulsonRef.moveto player endif
set DLC05CoreScene.PaulsonFollowing to -1 endif
;if any of the dependent people get into combat or die, end the scene if DLC05CoreSceneAlienRef.getDead == 1 || DLC05PaulsonRef.getDead == 1 || DLC05SomahRef.getDead == 1 || DLC05TercorienRef.getDead == 1 || DLC05CoreSceneAlienRef.IsInCombat == 1 || DLC05PaulsonRef.IsInCombat == 1 || DLC05SomahRef.IsInCombat == 1 || DLC05TercorienRef.IsInCombat == 1 set DLC05CoreScene.running to -1
elseif DLC05CoreScene.stage == 0
if getDistance player < 700 set DLC05CoreScene.stage to 1 DLC05TercorienRef.sayTo DLC05CoreSceneAlienRef DLC05CoreScene01 endif
endif
elseif DLC05CoreScene.running == -1 if getStageDone DLC05CoreScene 200 == 0 setStage DLC05CoreScene 200 endif
endif
End
Begin OnHit
if DLC05CoreScene.backAway == 0 set DLC05CoreScene.backAway to 1 DLC05SallyRef.evp endif
End

ScriptName DLC05MZ1SallyCoreTriggerScript
short DoOnce
Begin OnTriggerEnter
if ( DoOnce == 0 ) if ( IsActionRef DLC05SallyREF == 1 ) Set DoOnce to 1 Set DLC05MZ1.DLC05MZ1SallyCoreUpdate to 1 DLC05SallyREF.EVP endif endif
End

scn DLC05ActivateOnTriggerScript
short doOnce ref myself begin onTriggerEnter
if doOnce != 1 set myself to getself activate myself set doOnce to 1 endif
end

scn DLC05TrigHangarStage50SCRIPT
int doOnce int doOnce02
begin onTriggerEnter player if doOnce02 == 0 setstage DLC05HQ 112 set doOnce02 to 1 endif
end begin onTriggerEnter DLC05PaulsonRef
if doOnce == 0 && DLC05MZ2.MZ2PaulsonFollow == 1 setstage DLC05HQ 50 set doOnce to 1 endif
end

scn DLC05TrigHangarStage25SCRIPT
int doOnce
begin onTriggerEnter Player
if doOnce == 0 && DLC05MZ2.MZ2PaulsonFollow == 1 setstage DLC05HQ 25 set doOnce to 1 endif
end

scn DLC05SteamSallyIgnoreSCRIPT
BEGIN ONTRIGGERENTER PLAYER
;//////////////// ;// if player doesn't let sally blow up the first enemies ;//////////////// IF ( getSelf == DLC05SteamSallyIgnoreRef0 && getStage DLC05SteamworksLD != 9 )
set DLC05SteamworksLD.sallyIgnored to 1 DLC05SallyREF.sayTo player DLC05SteamSallyIgnored ;modified by jesse, sally says this instead of the talking activator. setstage dlc05SteamworksLD 8 ;added by Jesse, allows Sally to actually crawl into the vent dlc05SallyREF.evp ;added by Jesse, evp sally ;// make'em hostile DLC05SteamQS05A.setAV Aggression 2 DLC05SteamQS05B.setAV Aggression 2 DLC05SteamQS05C.setAV Aggression 2
ENDIF
;//////////////// ;// if player doesn't wait for sally to open the door ;//////////////// IF ( getSelf == DLC05SteamSallyIgnoreRef05 && getStage DLC05SteamworksLD == 15)
set DLC05SteamworksLD.sallyIgnored to 5 DLC05SteamSallyIgnoreTACT05.sayTo player DLC05SteamSallyIgnored
;// spawn in the guys ahead of the player DLC05SteamQS15A.enable 0 DLC05SteamQS15A.setAV aggression 2 DLC05SteamQS15B.enable 0 DLC05SteamQS15B.setAV aggression 2 DLC05SteamQS15C.enable 0 DLC05SteamQS15C.setAV aggression 2
DLC05SteamSallyIgnoreRef07.disable
;// turn off the automatic door shut DLC05SteamQuestStep16.disable DLC05SteamQuestStep20.disable
;// set the aliens to hostile DLC05SteamQS20A.setAV variable07 1 DLC05SteamQS20A.EVP DLC05SteamQS20B.setAV variable07 1 DLC05SteamQS20B.EVP DLC05SteamQS20C.setAV variable07 1 DLC05SteamQS20C.EVP
ENDIF
;//////////////// ;// if player doesn't sneak left ;//////////////// IF ( getSelf == DLC05SteamSallyIgnoreRef07 && getStage DLC05SteamworksLD == 20 && DLC05SteamworksLD.sallyIgnored != 5 )
set DLC05SteamworksLD.sallyIgnored to 7 DLC05SteamSallyIgnoreTACT05.sayTo player DLC05SteamSallyIgnored
;// set the aliens to hostile DLC05SteamQS20A.setAV variable07 1 DLC05SteamQS20A.EVP DLC05SteamQS20B.setAV variable07 1 DLC05SteamQS20B.EVP DLC05SteamQS20C.setAV variable07 1 DLC05SteamQS20C.EVP
ENDIF
;//////////////// ;// if player goes through the work's main doors ;//////////////// IF ( getSelf == DLC05SteamSallyIgnoreRef10 && getStage DLC05SteamworksLD == 25)
set DLC05SteamworksLD.sallyIgnored to 10 DLC05SteamSallyIgnoreTACT05.sayTo player DLC05SteamSallyIgnored
;// make the aliens active DLC05SteamWorksEngineerA.setAV variable07 1 DLC05SteamWorksEngineerA.EVP DLC05SteamWorksEngineerB.setAV variable07 1 DLC05SteamWorksEngineerB.EVP DLC05SteamWorksEngineerC.setAV variable07 1 DLC05SteamWorksEngineerC.EVP
ENDIF
;//////////////// ;// if player doesn't hop through the door ;//////////////// IF ( getSelf == DLC05SteamSallyIgnoreRef13 && getStage DLC05SteamworksLD == 35)
set DLC05SteamworksLD.sallyIgnored to 13 DLC05SteamSallyIgnoreTACT05.sayTo player DLC05SteamSallyIgnored
;// make the aliens active DLC05SteamWorksEngineerA.setAV variable07 1 DLC05SteamWorksEngineerA.EVP DLC05SteamWorksEngineerB.setAV variable07 1 DLC05SteamWorksEngineerB.EVP DLC05SteamWorksEngineerC.setAV variable07 1 DLC05SteamWorksEngineerC.EVP
ENDIF
;// kill the trigger disable
END
BEGIN ONTRIGGERENTER DLC05SteamQS05A
;//////////////// ;// if player doesn't let sally blow up the first enemies ;//////////////// IF ( getSelf == DLC05SteamSallyIgnoreRef0 && getStage DLC05SteamworksLD != 9 )
set DLC05SteamworksLD.sallyIgnored to 1 DLC05SallyREF.sayTo player DLC05SteamSallyIgnored ;modified by jesse, sally says this instead of the talking activator. setstage dlc05SteamworksLD 8 ;added by Jesse, allows Sally to actually crawl into the vent dlc05SallyREF.evp ;added by Jesse, evp sally ;// make'em hostile DLC05SteamQS05A.setAV Aggression 2 DLC05SteamQS05B.setAV Aggression 2 DLC05SteamQS05C.setAV Aggression 2
ENDIF
END

scn DLC05TriggerHangarAnimControlSCRIPT ; ;this handles the initial ship animation ;this synchs up the doors, ship, and explosions. ; ;================ int stage float timer01 float timer02 int init int idleReset int bDown float downTimer
begin onLoad
if init == 0 set stage to 0 set timer01 to 2.5 ;time between set init to 1 set timer02 to 5.7 set bDown to 1 endif
end
begin gameMode
if bDown == 1 if downTimer < 0 DLC05HangarUFO.playgroup backward 1 ;stay down set downTimer to 1.5 else set downtimer to downTimer - getsecondspassed endif endif
if getStageDone DLC05HQ 200 ;player hits the trigger to start, which sets stage 200 if stage == 0 DLC05HangarDoorsREF.playgroup Backward 1 ;open doors DLC05HangarUFO.playgroup backward 1 ;stay down set stage to 1 elseif stage == 1 if timer01 > 0 set timer01 to timer01 - getSecondsPassed ;wait timer else set stage to 2 set bDown to 0 ;stop playing down anim. ; DLC05HangarUFO.enable 0 endif elseif stage == 2 ; if DLC05HangarUFO.HasLoaded3D ;wait until 3d has loaded DLC05HangarUFO.playgroup Backward 1 ;rise up set stage to 3 ; endif elseif stage == 3 if timer02 > 0 set timer02 to timer02 - getSecondsPassed ;bumper #1 timer else set stage to 4 endif elseif stage == 4 BumperSwitchF.activate player ;hit bumper #1 set timer02 to 0.3 set stage to 5 elseIf stage == 5 if timer02 > 0 set timer02 to timer02 - getSecondsPassed ;bumper #1 timer else BumperSwitchB.activate player ;hit bumper #2 set stage to 6 endif elseIf stage == 6 if DLC05HangarUFO.IsAnimPlaying backward == 0 ;idle animation reset script DLC05HangarUFO.playgroup specialIdle 1 ;play idle set stage to 7 endif endif
endif
if DLC05HangarUFO.IsAnimPlaying forward ;idle animation reset script if idleReset == 0 set idleReset to 1 endif elseif idleReset == 1 set idleReset to 0 DLC05HangarUFO.playgroup specialIdle 1 endif
end

scn DLC05CoreSceneDoorScript
;// the person teleporting ref user
;// the teleporter ref telepad
float timer short animCheck
short DoOnce
short onLoad ref mySelf
Begin OnActivate
set user to getActionRef
;----------Handles door in Bridge for Samurai Scene if getIsReference DLC05SamuraiSceneDoorRef == 1 if isActionRef player == 1 Showmessage GenericDoorActivatedElsewhereMsg endif
return
endif ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
if IsActionRef player == 1
;!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!-------IMPORTANT NOTE: THIS SAME FUNCTIONALITY IS IN DLC05TeleporterDoor02Script ANY CHANGES HERE SHOULD BE REFLECTED IN THAT SCRIPT ALSO-----------------
;If the player has found teh sword, or the third generator has been destroyed, disable the samurai if ( DoOnce == 0 ) if ( DLC05Conversations.DLC05SwordFound == 2 ) DLC05SamuraiRef.Disable Set DLC05MZ2.MZ2SamuraiGone to 1 setstage DLC05SamuraiScenes 5 ;handles the sword if player hasn't found it yet Set DoOnce to 1 elseif ( DLC05MZ2.MZ2ThirdGenerator == 1 ) DLC05SamuraiRef.Disable set DLC05MZ2.MZ2SamuraiGone to 1 setstage DLC05SamuraiScenes 5 ;handles the sword if player hasn't found it yet set DoOnce to 1 endif endif
;the first time you go through this door, back into the engine core, and DLC05FF01.coreStage == 1, the core alien scene will start if (DLC05FF01.coreStage == 1) if (DLC05CoreScene.running == 0) setstage DLC05CoreScene 1 endif endif
;the third time you enter the engine core after either destroying a generator or exploring the cell ; two aliens will spawn and attack the survivors. The following script will make sure that they ; spawn on the opposite side of the engine core as the player if (DLC05FF01.CoreStage == 3)
;Player comes from hangar if (mySelf == DLC05HangartoCoreRef) set DLC05FF01.playerFromHangar to 1 endif
;Player comes from Cargo Bay if (mySelf == DLC05CargotoCoreRef) set DLC05FF01.playerFromCargo to 1 endif
;;;;;;;---Functionality moved into DLC05TeleporterDoor02Script -- please make changes there. ; ;Player comes from Sewer Bay ; if (mySelf == DLC05SewertoCoreRef) ; set DLC05FF01.playerFromSewer to 1 ; endif ;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;Player comes from Robot Assembly if (mySelf == DLC05AsmtoCoreRef) set DLC05FF01.playerFromAsm to 1 endif
;Player comes from Engine Room if (mySelf == DLC05EnginetoCoreRef) set DLC05FF01.playerFromEngine to 1 endif
;Player comes from Cryo Labs if (mySelf == DLC05CryotoCoreRef) ;Do Nothing, the aliens are already in place for this instance endif
endif
Activate
else
;// activate Activate endif
End
Begin GameMode
;----------Handles door in Bridge for Samurai Scene if getIsReference DLC05SamuraiSceneDoorRef == 1 if DLC05SamuraiScenes.openDoor == 2 && (GetOpenState != 1 && GetOpenState != 2) ;activate mySelf setOpenState 1 set DLC05SamuraiScenes.openDoor to -1 endif endif ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
End

scn DLC05SteamSallyTutorialSCRIPT
BEGIN ONTRIGGERENTER PLAYER
;// the healing arch tutorial IF ( getSelf == DLC05SteamSallyTutorial00 ) DLC05SteamSallyTutorialTACT00.sayTo player DLC05SteamSallyGunTut set DLC05SteamworksLD.sallyGunTut to 5
ENDIF
;// the gun recharge tutorial part 1 IF ( getSelf == DLC05SteamSallyTutorial05 ) DLC05SteamSallyTACTQS45.sayTo player DLC05SteamSallyGunTut set DLC05SteamworksLD.sallyGunTut to 10
ENDIF
;// the gun recharge tutorial part 2 IF ( getSelf == DLC05SteamSallyTutorial15 ) set DLC05SteamworksLD.sallyGunTut to 15 DLC05SteamSallyTACTGT15.sayTo player DLC05SteamSallyGunTut
ENDIF
;// one shot! disable
END

scn DLC05FF01cartMasterSCRIPT
; master script to control the dumpster cart sequence ; =============================================== ; ==// Sequence Key: ; ==// 1 - Nothing, just show that the shutters open to rooms ; ==// 2 - Single alien, notices you two but caught off guard ; ==// 3 - Cows? Room full of Brahmin ; ==// 4 - Placeholder room for Great Idea #34 ; ==// 5 - Big combat through shutter window with aliens ; ===============================================
short init
short bumpGen float bumpTimer
short seq01 ; flag to control sequence #1 short seq01init float seq01timer
short stop01 ; flag to control stop event #1 short stop01init float stop01timer
short seq02 ; flag to control sequence #2 short seq02init float seq02timer
short stop02 ; flag to control stop event #2 short stop02init float stop02timer
short seq03 ; flag to control sequence #3 short seq03init float seq03timer
short stop03 ; flag to control stop event #3 short stop03init float stop03timer
short seq04 ; flag to control sequence #4 short seq04init float seq04timer
short stop04 ; flag to control stop event #4 short stop04init float stop04timer
short seq05 ; flag to control sequence #5 short seq05init float seq05timer
short stop05 ; flag to control stop event #5 short stop05init float stop05timer short fightFlag float fightTimer ; timer to control fight
short sallyExits ; flag for when Sally climbs out of the cart short sallyExitState ; state tracker (similar to init flags elsewhere) float sallyExitTimer ; timer for sally's exit anim
short seqFall ; flag for the falling sequence. short seqFallState float transTimer ; transition timer from black fade to anim sequence short fallImpact ; flag set for the impact point in the fall? float fallTimer ; timer for the actual fall from the cart short fallTimerStage ; stage for the fall timer float afterFallTimer ; timer for the getup anim after falling from the cart short fallBumpStage ; stages for bumping the player around the cart on fall
SHORT DEBUGINIT SHORT DEBUGVAR
;===============================================; ;===============================================;
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;================================ ;==// Initialization Block if init == 0 FF01cartREF.playgroup left 0 ; open the door DLC05FF01Dumpster02.playgroup left 0 ; also leave the door to the second dumpster open. set init to 1 endif
;================================ ;==// Player steps into cart and kicks off the event. if DLC05FF01.inCartFlag == 1 set DLC05FF01.inCartFlag to 2 ; kill this variable DLC05FF01BackWallREF.enable set seq01 to 1 ; kick off sequence 01 DLC05SallyRef.sayTo player DLC05FF01xcartGetGoing ; sally makes her "we're moving" comment set bumpGen to 1 endif
;================================ ;==// Sequence Number ONE - ;====// The cart starts down the track. if seq01 == 1 if seq01init == 0 ; intialization for everything FF01cartREF.playgroup right 1 ; close the door set seq01init to 1 endif
if FF01cartREF.isAnimplaying == 0 && seq01init == 1 DLC05FF01cartMotionSFX.PlaySound AMBDLC05DumpsterCartStart ; play "dumpster starting to move" sound set bumpGen to 1 ; start the bump maker FF01set00.disable ; disable the room we've just left. set seq01timer to 5 set seq01init to 2 endif
if seq01init == 2 if seq01timer > 0 set seq01timer to (seq01timer - getSecondsPassed) else set bumpGen to 0 set bumpTimer to 0 set seq01 to 0 set stop01 to 1 endif endif
endif
;================================ ;==// Stop and Look Event 001 if stop01 == 1 if stop01init == 0 DLC05FF01cartMotionSFX.PlaySound AMBDLC05DumpsterCartStop ; play "dumpster stopping" sound FF01cartREF.playgroup forward 0 ; open the window up FF01set01.enable ; enable the first look-to room set stop01init to 1 endif
if stop01init == 1 if FF01cartREF.isanimPlaying forward != 1 DLC05SallyREF.sayTo player DLC05FF01xcartFirstComment set stop01timer to 4 set stop01init to 2 endif endif
if stop01init == 2 if stop01timer > 0 set stop01timer to (stop01timer - getSecondsPassed) else set bumpGen to 1 set stop01 to 0 set seq02 to 1 endif endif
endif
;================================ ;==// Sequence Number TWO if seq02 == 1 if seq02init == 0 ; intialization for everything FF01cartREF.playgroup backward 0 ; close the shutter set seq02init to 1 endif
if FF01cartREF.isAnimplaying == 0 && seq02init == 1 ;DLC05FF01cartMotionSFX.PlaySound AMBDLC05DumpsterCartStart ; play "dumpster starting to move" sound set bumpGen to 1 ; start the bump maker FF01set01.disable ; disable the room we've just left. set seq02timer to 5 set seq02init to 2 endif
if seq02init == 2 if seq02timer > 0 set seq02timer to (seq02timer - getSecondsPassed) else set bumpGen to 0 set bumpTimer to 0 set seq02 to 0 set stop02 to 1 endif endif
endif
;================================ ;==// Stop and Look Event 002 if stop02 == 1 if stop02init == 0 ;DLC05FF01cartMotionSFX.PlaySound AMBDLC05DumpsterCartStop ; play "dumpster stopping" sound FF01cartREF.playgroup forward 0 ; open the window. FF01set02.enable ; enable the 2nd look-to room DLC05FF01AlienSpawn01.moveTo DLC05FF01Patrol01 set stop02init to 1 endif
if stop02init == 1 if FF01cartREF.isAnimPlaying forward == 0 set stop02timer to 4 set stop02init to 2 endif endif
if stop02init == 2 if stop02timer > 0 set stop02timer to (stop02timer - getSecondsPassed) else DLC05SallyREF.sayTo player DLC05FF01xcartSawUs set bumpGen to 1 set stop02 to 0 set seq03 to 1 endif endif
endif
;================================ ;==// Sequence Number THREE if seq03 == 1 if seq03init == 0 ; intialization for everything FF01cartREF.playgroup backward 0 ; close the shutter set seq03init to 1 endif
if FF01cartREF.isAnimplaying == 0 && seq03init == 1 ;DLC05FF01cartMotionSFX.PlaySound AMBDLC05DumpsterCartStart ; play "dumpster starting to move" sound set bumpGen to 1 ; start the bump maker FF01set02.disable ; disable the room we've just left. FF01set03.enable ; enable the third look-to room set seq03timer to 10 set seq03init to 2 endif
if seq03init == 2 if seq03timer > 0 set seq03timer to (seq03timer - getSecondsPassed) else set bumpGen to 0 set bumpTimer to 0 set seq03 to 0 set stop03 to 1 endif endif
endif
;================================ ;==// Stop and Look Event 003 if stop03 == 1 if stop03init == 0 FF01cartREF.playgroup forward 0 set stop03init to 1 endif
if stop03init == 1 ; wait for shutter to fully open for comment and timer if FF01cartREF.isAnimPlaying forward == 0 ;DLC05FF01cartMotionSFX.PlaySound AMBDLC05DumpsterCartStop ; play "dumpster stopping" sound DLC05SallyRef.sayTo player DLC05FF01xcartCows ; Sally comments on cow pen. How strange! set stop03timer to 3 set stop03init to 2 endif endif
if stop03init == 2 if stop03timer > 0 set stop03timer to (stop03timer - getSecondsPassed) else set bumpGen to 1 set stop03 to 0 set seq04 to 1 endif endif
endif
;================================ ;==// Sequence Number FOUR if seq04 == 1 if seq04init == 0 ; intialization for everything FF01cartREF.playgroup backward 0 ; close the shutter set seq04init to 1 endif
if FF01cartREF.isAnimplaying == 0 && seq04init == 1 ;DLC05FF01cartMotionSFX.PlaySound AMBDLC05DumpsterCartStart ; play "dumpster starting to move" sound set bumpGen to 1 ; start the bump maker FF01set03.disable ; disable the room we've just left. FF01set04.enable ; enable the 4th look-to room set seq04timer to 5 set seq04init to 2 endif
if seq04init == 2 if seq04timer > 0 set seq04timer to (seq04timer - getSecondsPassed) else set bumpGen to 0 set bumpTimer to 0 set seq04 to 0 set stop04 to 1 endif endif
endif
;================================ ;==// Stop and Look Event 004 if stop04 == 1 if stop04init == 0 ;DLC05FF01cartMotionSFX.PlaySound AMBDLC05DumpsterCartStop ; play "dumpster stopping" sound FF01cartREF.playgroup forward 0 ; open the cart window set stop04init to 1 set stop04timer to 3 endif
if stop04timer > 0 set stop04timer to (stop04timer - getSecondsPassed) else set bumpGen to 1 set stop04 to 0 set seq05 to 1 endif
endif
;================================ ;==// Sequence Number FIVE if seq05 == 1 if seq05init == 0 ; intialization for everything FF01cartREF.playgroup backward 0 ; close the shutter set seq05init to 1 endif
if FF01cartREF.isAnimplaying == 0 && seq05init == 1 ;DLC05FF01cartMotionSFX.PlaySound AMBDLC05DumpsterCartStart ; play "dumpster starting to move" sound set bumpGen to 1 ; start the bump maker FF01set04.disable ; disable the room we've just left. FF01set5aliens.enable ; aliens early-enable to avoid pop-in set seq05timer to 5 set seq05init to 2 endif
if seq05init == 2 if seq05timer > 0 set seq05timer to (seq05timer - getSecondsPassed) else set bumpGen to 0 set bumpTimer to 0 set seq05 to 0 set stop05 to 1 endif endif
endif
;================================ ;==// Stop and Look Event 005 if stop05 == 1 if stop05init == 0 ;DLC05FF01cartMotionSFX.PlaySound AMBDLC05DumpsterCartStop ; play "dumpster stopping" sound FF01set05.enable ; enable the 5th/final look-to room FF01cartREF.playgroup forward 0 ;DLC05set02Alien01.moveTo DLC05FF01Patrol01 ; try moving aliens to their editor locations ;DLC05set02Alien02.moveTo DLC05FF01Patrol01 ;DLC05set02Alien03.moveTo DLC05FF01Patrol01 DLC05set02Alien01.startcombat player DLC05set02Alien02.startcombat player DLC05set02Alien03.startcombat player DLC05set02Alien01.evp DLC05set02Alien02.evp DLC05set02Alien03.evp set stop05init to 1
elseif stop05init == 1 if FF01cartREF.isanimPlaying forward != 1 DLC05SallyRef.sayTo player DLC05FF01xcartAliensLookout ; Sally warns the player - Aliens!!! set fightTimer to 45 ; if the fight goes longish, magically kill aliens for the player. set stop05timer to 1 set fightFlag to 1 set stop05init to 2 endif
elseif stop05init == 2 if stop05timer > 0 set stop05timer to (stop05timer - getSecondsPassed) else set stop05 to 0 set sallyExits to 1 endif endif endif
;================================== ;==// Safety timer for the multi-alien battle.
if fightFlag == 1 ; safety timer just in case the player can't kill ihs opponents. if fightTimer > 0 set fightTimer to fightTimer - getSecondsPassed else DLC05set02Alien01.kill DLC05set02Alien02.kill DLC05set02Alien03.kill set fightFlag to 0 endif endif
;================================ ;==// Sally Bails out of cart if sallyExits == 1 if sallyExitState == 0 if DLC05set02Alien01.getDead == 1 if DLC05set02Alien02.getDead == 1 if DLC05set02Alien03.getDead == 1 set sallyExitState to 1 endif endif endif elseif sallyExitState == 1 ; sally climbs out! DLC05cartPanelMarker.disable ; disable marker to kick her out of idle anim. setStage DLC05FF01 40 DLC05SallyRef.evp DLC05SallyREF.sayTo player DLC05FF01xcartGettingOut ; sally says "we're stuck" set sallyExitState to 2 set sallyExitTimer to 4.5 ; should roughly sync up with climb-out animation duration elseif sallyExitState == 2 if DLC05SallyRef.getSitting == 2 ; tracks when Sally is interacting with the furniture climb-out marker set sallyExitState to 3 endif elseif sallyExitState == 3 if sallyExitTimer > 0 set sallyExitTimer to (sallyExitTimer - getSecondsPassed) else set sallyExits to 0 set seqFall to 1 endif endif endif
;================================ ;==// Shut the window and begin the fall sequence if seqFall == 1 if seqFallState == 0 FF01cartREF.playgroup backward 0 ; close the shutter set seqFallState to 10 elseif seqFallState == 10 if FF01cartRef.isAnimPlaying backward == 1 ; still closing. else ;set seqFallState to 1 IMod DLC05LongBlackout ;DEBUG DEBUG DisablePlayerControls 1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1 DLC05FF01sallycartBarker.sayTo player DLC05FF01xcartUhOh ;DLC05FF01cartMotionSFX.PlaySound AMBDLC05DumpsterCartStart ; play "dumpster starting to move" sound set bumpGen to 1 set transTimer to 6 ; this value should roughly sync w/audio ride and blackout length set seqFallState to 20 endif elseif seqFallState == 20 if transTimer > 0 set transTimer to (transTimer - getSecondsPassed) else set bumpGen to 0 ;DLC05FF01cartMotionSFX.PlaySound AMBDLC05DumpsterCartStop ; play "dumpster stopping" sound DLC05FF01Dumpster02.playgroup left 0 FF01bumpGenerator.placeatMe DLC05FF01cartLurch FF01bumpGenerator.placeatMe DLC05FF01cartLurch DLC05SallyRef.moveTo DLC05FF01SallyBalcony player.moveto DLC05FF01PlayerRideMarker player.addScriptPackage DLC05FF01PlayerRidePKG set fallTimer to 23 ; this must sync up with falling out animation length set seqFallState to 30 endif elseif seqFallState == 30 if (fallTimer < 11.5) && (fallTimerStage == 0) DLC05FF01DumpsterFallDebrisEnabler01.Enable ; enabler debris to fall with player DLC05FF01DumpsterFallDebrisEnabler01.PlaceAtMe FakeForceBallNudge set fallTimerStage to 10 endif
if (fallTimer < 9) && (fallTimerStage == 10) DLC05FF01DumpsterFallDebrisEnabler04.Enable ; enabler debris to fall with player DLC05FF01DumpsterFallDebrisEnabler04.PlaceAtMe FakeForceBallNudge set fallTimerStage to 20 endif
if (fallTimer < 8) && (fallTimerStage == 20) DLC05FF01DumpsterFallDebrisEnabler02.Enable ; enabler debris to fall with player DLC05FF01DumpsterFallDebrisEnabler02.PlaceAtMe FakeForceBallNudge set fallTimerStage to 30 endif
if (fallTimer < 20) && (fallBumpStage == 0) IMOD DLC05SewerSlamIntoWall set fallBumpStage to 10 endif
if (fallTimer < 13.75) && (fallBumpStage == 10) IMOD DLC05SewerSlamIntoWall set fallBumpStage to 20 endif
if fallTimer < 3.5 && fallImpact == 0 ; time this for the bang of impact IMod DLC05SlamToBlack ; quick Fade-To-Black on impact ;player.damageAV perceptionCondition 100 IMOD DLC05SewerSlamIntoWall player.damageAV leftMobilityCondition 100 endif
if fallTimer < 0 player.moveTo DLC05FF01PlayerLandsHere ; player gets moved to landing point player.removeScriptPackage ; script package gets removed DLC05FF01DumpsterFallDebrisEnabler03.Enable ; enabler debris to fall with player DLC05FF01DumpsterFallDebrisEnabler03.PlaceAtMe FakeForceBallNudge set seqFallState to 40 else set fallTimer to (fallTimer - getSecondsPassed) endif elseif seqFallState == 40 set afterFallTimer to 8 IMOD DLC05SewerGetUp player.addScriptPackage DLC05FF01playerAfterRidePKG ; player playes "get up" anim enablePlayerControls set seqFallState to 50 elseif seqFallState == 50 if afterFallTimer < 0 player.RemoveScriptPackage setStage DLC05FF01 45 ; trigger for Sally's "you okay?" dialog DLC05SallyRef.moveTo DLC05FF01SallyBalcony DLC05SallyREF.evp set seqFall to 0 else set afterFallTimer to (afterFallTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif endif
;================================ ;==// Bump Generator if bumpGen == 0 ; switch off. if DLC05FF01cartMotionSFX.getDisabled == 0 DLC05FF01cartMotionSFX.disable FF01bumpGenerator.placeatMe DLC05FF01cartLurch playSound AMBDLC05DumpsterCartStop DLC05lightStrip01.playgroup right 0 ;DLC05lightStrip01.disable ;DLC05SallyRef.playIdle MTHitTorsoA endif endif
if bumpGen == 1 || bumpGen == 2
if bumpGen == 1 ; stuff we just want to do once per. DLC05FF01cartMotionSFX.enable FF01bumpGenerator.placeatMe DLC05FF01cartLurch playSound AMBDLC05DumpsterCartStart ;DLC05lightStrip01.enable DLC05lightStrip01.playgroup forward 0 ;DLC05SallyRef.playIdle MTHitTorsoA set bumpGen to 2 endif
if bumpTimer > 0 set bumpTimer to (bumpTimer - getSecondsPassed) else if bumpGen != 0 FF01bumpGenerator.placeatMe DLC05FF01cartShake set bumpTimer to 0.75 else endif endif endif
END
;=============================================== ;===============================================

scn DLC05FF01cartTrigSCRIPT

if DLC05FF01.inCartFlag == 0 ;set DLC05FF01.inCartFlag to 1 endif
end

scn DLC05SpaceWalkLevitateTrigSCRIPT
short doOnce short onLoad
short timerInit short timerStage float timer
Begin onTriggerEnter Player if doOnce == 0 DisablePlayerControls 1 0 1 1 0 0 0 IMOD TrapToiletShockISFX Player.MoveTo DLC05SpaceLevitatePlayerStart DLC05SpaceGravLightBeamREF.disable 0 set timerInit to 1 set doOnce to 1 endif End
Begin GameMode
if (onLoad == 0) set timerStage to 5 set timer to .25 set onLoad to 1 endif
if (timerInit == 1)
if (timerStage == 5) if (timer < 0) Player.AddScriptPackage DLC05SpaceWalkPlayerLevitate set timer to 2.75 set timerStage to 10 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
if (timerStage == 10) if (timer < 0) set timer to 2 set timerStage to 15 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
if (timerStage == 15) if (timer < 0) ;DLC05SpaceIrisDoor03REF.PlayGroup Forward 1 set timer to 2.5 set timerStage to 20 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
if (timerStage == 20) if (timer < 0) DLC05SpaceIrisDoor02REF.PlayGroup Forward 1 IMOD DLC05SpaceFadeToWhite set timer to 4 set timerStage to 30 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
if (timerStage == 30) if (timer < 0) Player.RemoveScriptPackage DLC05SpaceWalkPlayerLevitate Player.MoveTo DLC05SpacePlayerStartAfterLevitationREF set timer to 6 set timerStage to 40 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
endif
End

scn DLC05SpaceFloatToDeathTRIGSCRIPT
short onLoad short timerInit short timerStage float timer
short quickDeath
short doOnce
Begin onTriggerEnter Player
if doOnce == 0 IMOD DLC05SpaceFadeToBlack ;DisablePlayerControls 1 1 1 1 1 1 1 set timerInit to 1 set doOnce to 1 endif
End
Begin GameMode
if (onLoad == 0) set timerStage to 1 set timer to .25 set onLoad to 1 endif
if (timerInit == 1)
if (timerStage == 1) if (timer < 0) set quickDeath to 1 DLC05SpaceFallToDeathEnabler.Enable DLC05SpaceFloatToDeathLightREF.Enable Player.MoveTo DLC05SpaceFloatToDeathMrkREF set timerStage to 2 set timer to .1 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
if (timerStage == 2) if (timer < 0) DLC05SpaceWalkFloatFurnREF.Activate Player set timerStage to 3 set timer to .1 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
if (timerStage == 3) if (timer < 0) DLC05SpaceWalkFloatFurnREF.Activate Player set timerStage to 4 set timer to .1 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
if (timerStage == 4) if (timer < 0) DLC05SpaceWalkFloatFurnREF.Activate Player Player.PlaySound MUSDeath set timerStage to 5 set timer to 7 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
if (timerStage == 5) if (timer < 0) IMOD DLC05SpaceFadeToBlackLong set timerStage to 6 set timer to 5 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
if (timerStage == 6) if (timer < 0) Player.Kill set timerStage to 7 set timer to 6 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
endif
End

begin onTriggerEnter player
if doOnce == 0 setStage DLC05FF01 10 DLC05SallyRef.moveTo DLC05FF01shutterMarker DLC05SallyRef.evp set doOnce to 1 endif
end

scn DLC05ConvScript
;This quest script is available to help run any sort of timers or scripted gamemode issues for entire quest duration
short DLC05CryoTime ;1= Start the Cryo Timer 0= Cryo Stuff ready for first time (3 Hour) short DLC05CryoTimeFirst ;1= Start the Cryo Timer 0= Cryo Stuff ready for first time (1 Hour) short DLC05CryoWpnReady ;1= Cryo Weapons are ready to be given short DLC05CryoWpnDone ;1= Cryo Weapons have been made for the first time (for Timer use) short DLC05GelMake ;1= Start making Biogel short DLC05Number ;x= How many Alien Biogels are being turned into Adpated Biogel Short DLC05SwordFound ;1= Player has found Samurai's sword, sets dialogue
short DLC05GenWalkthru ;updated if player asks for generator walkthrough from Sallly
float DLC05CryoTimerFirst ;The first timer is only 1 hour (Set when Player first talks about weapons) float DLC05CryoTimer ;The second timer is 3 hours (Set when Player collects weapons every other time) float DLC05CryoHour ;float for timer float DLC05CryoDay ;float for timer
short cryoReturnTeleEnabled ;Required for cryo return teleport - Daryl
begin gamemode
;These blocks handle Tercorien's creation of the Cryo Weapons
; if ( DLC05CryoTime == 1 ) && ( DLC05CryoTimerFirst > 0 ) ; Set DLC05CryoTimerFirst to ( DLC05CryoTimerFirst - GetSecondsPassed ) ; elseif ( DLC05CryoTime == 1 ) && ( DLC05CryoTimerFirst <= 0 ) ; Set DLC05CryoWpnReady to 1 ; Set DLC05CryoWpnDone to 1 ; Set DLC05CryoTime to 0 ; endif
; if ( DLC05CryoWpnDone == 1 ) ; if ( DLC05CryoTime == 1 ) && ( DLC05CryoTimer > 0 ) ; Set DLC05CryoTimer to ( DLC05CryoTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) ; elseif ( DLC05CryoTime == 1 ) && ( DLC05CryoTimer <= 0 ) ; Set DLC05CryoWpnReady to 1 ; Set DLC05CryoTime to 0 ; endif ; endif
if ( DLC05CryoTimeFirst == 1 ) if ( DLC05CryoHour >= 23 ) if GameDay >= DLC05CryoDay + 1 Set DLC05CryoWpnReady to 1 Set DLC05CryoTimeFirst to -1 elseif GameHour > ( DLC05CryoHour - 23 ) Set DLC05CryoWpnReady to 1 Set DLC05CryoTimeFirst to -1 endif elseif GameHour > ( DLC05CryoHour + 1 ) Set DLC05CryoWpnReady to 1 Set DLC05CryoTimeFirst to -1 endif endif endif
if ( DLC05CryoTime == 1 ) if ( DLC05CryoHour >= 21 ) if GameDay >= DLC05CryoDay + 1 Set DLC05CryoWpnReady to 1 Set DLC05CryoTime to 0 elseif GameHour > ( DLC05CryoHour - 21 ) Set DLC05CryoWpnReady to 1 Set DLC05CryoTime to 0 endif elseif GameHour > ( DLC05CryoHour + 3 ) Set DLC05CryoWpnReady to 1 Set DLC05CryoTime to 0 endif endif endif
;These blocks deal with Tercorien's creation of the Adapted Biogel
if ( DLC05GelMake == 1 ) if ( Player.GetItemCount DLC05AlienBiogel >= 1 ) Set DLC05Number to ( Player.GetItemCount DLC05AlienBiogel ) Set DLC05GelMake to 2 endif endif
if ( DLC05GelMake == 2 ) Player.RemoveItem DLC05AlienBiogel DLC05Number Player.AddItem DLC05AlienBiogelAdapted DLC05Number set DLC05GelMake to 0 set DLC05Number to 0 endif
end

scn DLC05EngineRoomGasTrapSCRIPT
short timerInit float timer
BEGIN ONTRIGGERENTER PLAYER
IF ( getSelf == DLC05EERoomGasTrapA && timerInit == 0 )
;// close and lock the doors DLC05ERoomGasTrapADoorA.setOpenState 0
DLC05ERoomGasTrapADoorB.setOpenState 0
;// start the steam DLC05EERoomGasTrapAXMRK.enable set timerInit to 1 set timer to 5
ENDIF
IF ( getSelf == DLC05EERoomGasTrapC && timerInit == 0 )
DLC05ERoomGasTrapCDoorA.setOpenState 0 DLC05ERoomGasTrapCDoorB.setOpenState 0
;// start the steam DLC05EERoomGasTrapCXMRK.enable set timerInit to 1 set timer to 5 ENDIF
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
IF ( timerInit == 1 ) IF ( timer > 5 ) set timer to timer - getSecondsPassed ELSE
;// enable the proper gas traps IF ( getSelf == DLC05EERoomGasTrapA ) DLC05EERoomGasTrapATrapA.enable DLC05EERoomGasTrapATrapB.enable DLC05EERoomGasTrapATrapC.enable DLC05EERoomGasTrapATrapD.enable
ELSEIF ( getSelf == DLC05EERoomGasTrapC ) DLC05EERoomGasTrapCTrapA.enable DLC05EERoomGasTrapCTrapB.enable DLC05EERoomGasTrapCTrapC.enable DLC05EERoomGasTrapCTrapD.enable DLC05EERoomGasTrapCTrapE.enable DLC05EERoomGasTrapCTrapF.enable DLC05EERoomGasTrapCTrapG.enable DLC05EERoomGasTrapCTrapH.enable
ENDIF
set timerInit to 0 disable
ENDIF ENDIF
END

scn DLC05ERoomGasTrapControlSCRIPT
short activationState
BEGIN ONACTIVATE
IF ( getSelf == DLC05ERoomGasTrapControlA && isActionRef player == 1 ) DLC05EERoomGasTrapAXMRK.disable
DLC05ERoomGasTrapADoorA.unlock DLC05ERoomGasTrapADoorB.unlock DLC05ERoomGasTrapADoorB.setOpenState 1
playgroup forward 0
ELSEIF ( getSelf == DLC05ERoomGasTrapControlB && isActionRef player == 1 )
playgroup forward 0
IF ( activationState == 1 )
DLC05EERoomGasTrapBJetA.disable DLC05EERoomGasTrapBJetB.disable DLC05EERoomGasTrapBJet.disable
DLC05ERoomGasTrapBDoor.setOpenState 1 ELSE set activationState to 1
DLC05EERoomGasTrapBJet.enable DLC05EERoomGasTrapBJetA.enable DLC05EERoomGasTrapBJetB.enable DLC05ERoomGasTrapBTrap.enable
DLC05ERoomGasTrapBDoor.setOpenState 0 ENDIF ELSEIF ( getSelf == DLC05ERoomGasTrapControlC && isActionRef player == 1 ) ;this entire if statement section was put in by Jesse. It should get reviewed in case something was done wrong.
playgroup forward 0
DLC05EERoomGasTrapCTrapG.disable DLC05EERoomGasTrapCTrapH.disable DLC05EERoomGasTrapCTrapF.disable DLC05EERoomGasTrapCTrapE.disable DLC05EERoomGasTrapCTrapD.disable DLC05EERoomGasTrapCTrapC.disable DLC05EERoomGasTrapCTrapB.disable DLC05EERoomGasTrapCTrapA.disable DLC05EERoomGasTrapCXMRK.disable
DLC05ERoomGasTrapCDoorB.setOpenState 1 ENDIF
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
IF ( activationState == 2 ) IF ( isAnimPlaying forward == 0 ) set activationState to 0 playgroup specialIdle 0
ENDIF ENDIF
END

ScriptName DLC05MZ3ViewscreenScript
float timer
Begin SayToDone DLC05MZ3CaptainViewscreenSpeech
if ( DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3ViewscreenSpeechStep == 1 ) Set DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3ViewscreenSpeechStep to 2 Playgroup Right 1 DLC05MZ3ViewscreenREF.Sayto Player DLC05MZ3CaptainViewscreenSpeech elseif ( DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3ViewscreenSpeechStep == 2 ) Set DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3ViewscreenSpeechStep to 3 Playgroup Right 1 DLC05MZ3ViewscreenREF.Sayto Player DLC05MZ3CaptainViewscreenSpeech elseif ( DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3ViewscreenSpeechStep == 3 ) Set DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3ViewscreenSpeechStep to 4 Playgroup Right 1 DLC05MZ3ViewscreenREF.Sayto Player DLC05MZ3CaptainViewscreenSpeech elseif ( DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3ViewscreenSpeechStep == 4 ) Set DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3ViewscreenSpeechStep to 5 Playgroup Right 1 DLC05MZ3ViewscreenREF.Sayto Player DLC05MZ3CaptainViewscreenSpeech elseif ( DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3ViewscreenSpeechStep == 5 ) Set DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3ViewscreenSpeechStep to 6 Playgroup Right 1 DLC05MZ3ViewscreenREF.Sayto Player DLC05MZ3CaptainViewscreenSpeech elseif ( DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3ViewscreenSpeechStep == 6 ) ; ShowMessage DLC05MZ3TEMPLabMessage2 Playgroup backward 1 set DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3ViewscreenTimer to 1
Set DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3ViewscreenSpeechStep to 7 ;script now hands off to MZ3 quest script
endif
End
Begin GameMode
if ( DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3ViewScreenTrigger == 1 ) if ( DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3ViewscreenSpeechStep == 0 ) Set DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3ViewScreenSpeechStep to 1 SayTo Player DLC05MZ3CaptainViewscreenSpeech Playgroup Left 1 endif endif
if ( DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3ViewscreenSpeechStep > 0 ) && ( DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3ViewScreenSpeechStep < 6 ) if ( IsAnimPlaying right == 0 ) && ( IsAnimPlaying left == 0 ) && ( IsAnimPlaying ReloadA == 0 ) Playgroup ReloadA 1 endif endif
if ( DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3ViewScreenSpeechStep == -1 ) if ( DLC05SomahRef.GetDead == 0 ) set DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3ViewScreenSpeechStep to -2 DLC05SomahRef.EVP elseif ( DLC05TercorienRef.GetDead == 0 ) set DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3ViewScreenSpeechStep to -3 DLC05TercorienRef.EVP elseif ( DLC05PaulsonRef.GetDead == 0 ) set DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3ViewScreenSpeechStep to -4 DLC05PaulsonRef.EVP else set DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3ViewScreenSpeechStep to -5 endif endif
End

Scn DLC05DeathRayGeneratorCoreSCRIPT
ref myLink ref nextLink short onLoad short openState ;1 - enabled, 2 - opening, 3 - opened and playing looping anim short enableDestruction
short overheatStage float overheatTimer
float flashTimer short flashStage short flashUpdate short flashFreq
float hitTimer
begin GameMode
if (onLoad == 0) set myLink to GetLinkedRef set nextLink to myLink.GetLinkedRef set overheatTimer to 1 disable set onLoad to 1 endif
if (openState == 3) && (myLink.IsAnimPlaying Backward == 1) PlayGroup Backward 1 set enableDestruction to 0 set openState to 1 endif
if (openState == 0) && (myLink.IsAnimPlaying Forward == 1) ;If my linked generator is opening... enable ;i should enable myself set openState to 1 endif
if (openState == 1) && (myLink.IsAnimPlaying Forward == 1) && (hasLoaded3D) ;once my 3d is loaded... PlayGroup Forward 1 ;i should play my animation too set openState to 2 endif
if (openState == 2) && (IsAnimPlaying Forward == 0) ;If i am fully opened... PlayGroup Left 1 ;play the loop anim... set openState to 3 set enableDestruction to 1 ;and check which destruction stage i'm at if (GetDestructionStage == 1) PlayGroup ReloadA 1 endif
if (GetDestructionStage == 2) PlayGroup ReloadB 1 endif
if (GetDestructionStage == 3) PlayGroup ReloadC 1 endif
if (GetDestructionStage == 4) ;ShowWarning "4" PlayGroup ReloadD 1 endif
if (GetDestructionStage == 5) PlayGroup ReloadE 1 endif
if (GetDestructionStage == 6) ;ShowWarning "6" PlayGroup ReloadF 1 endif
if (GetDestructionStage == 7)
disable myLink.disable myLink.PlaceAtMe DLC05MZRmGeneratorACTDestroyed myLink.PlaceAtMe DLC05MZRmGeneratorACTHavok nextLink.PlaceAtMe DLC05GeneratorExplosion
;ShowWarning "BOOM"
endif
endif
;Flash the core if it's hit if (hitTimer < 0) sms DLC05AlienArmorSpellFlareShader ;myLink.sms DLC05AlienShieldShader else set hitTimer to (hitTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
;If coolant switches are off start overheating the core if (myLink.GetIsReference DLC05DeathRayGen01REF == 1) set overheatStage to DLC05DeathRayGen01REF.activatedSwitches endif
if (myLink.GetIsReference DLC05DeathRayGen02REF == 1) set overheatStage to DLC05DeathRayGen02REF.activatedSwitches endif
if (myLink.GetIsReference DLC05DeathRayGen03REF == 1) set overheatStage to DLC05DeathRayGen03REF.activatedSwitches endif
if (myLink.GetIsReference DLC05DeathRayGen04REF == 1) set overheatStage to DLC05DeathRayGen04REF.activatedSwitches endif
;Damage core every second depending on overheatStage if (overheatTimer < 0) if (overheatStage == 1) if (isAnimPlaying Left == 1) || (isAnimPlaying ReloadA == 1) || (isAnimPlaying ReloadB == 1) || (isAnimPlaying ReloadC == 1) || (isAnimPlaying ReloadD == 1) || (isAnimPlaying ReloadE == 1) || (isAnimPlaying ReloadF == 1) do 15 endif endif if (overheatStage == 2) if (isAnimPlaying Left == 1) || (isAnimPlaying ReloadA == 1) || (isAnimPlaying ReloadB == 1) || (isAnimPlaying ReloadC == 1) || (isAnimPlaying ReloadD == 1) || (isAnimPlaying ReloadE == 1) || (isAnimPlaying ReloadF == 1) do 35 endif endif if (overheatStage == 3) if (isAnimPlaying Left == 1) || (isAnimPlaying ReloadA == 1) || (isAnimPlaying ReloadB == 1) || (isAnimPlaying ReloadC == 1) || (isAnimPlaying ReloadD == 1) || (isAnimPlaying ReloadE == 1) || (isAnimPlaying ReloadF == 1) do 55 endif endif set overheatTimer to 1 else set overheatTimer to (overheatTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
;Timed flash to show that disabling the coolant is actually damaging it
if (overheatStage == 1) && (flashUpdate == 0) set flashStage to 1 set flashFreq to 1.5 set flashUpdate to 1 endif
if (overheatStage == 2) && (flashUpdate == 1) set flashFreq to 1 set flashUpdate to 2 endif
if (overheatStage == 3) && (flashUpdate == 2) set flashFreq to .5 set flashUpdate to 3 endif
if (flashStage == 1) if (flashTimer < 0) pms DLC05AlienArmorSpellFlareShader set flashTimer to .25 set flashStage to 2 else set flashTimer to (flashTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
if (flashStage == 2) if (flashTimer < 0) sms DLC05AlienArmorSpellFlareShader set flashTimer to flashFreq set flashStage to 1 else set flashTimer to (flashTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
End
Begin OnHit
pms DLC05AlienArmorSpellFlareShader ;myLink.pms DLC05AlienShieldShader set hitTimer to .15
End
Begin OnDestructionStageChange
if (enableDestruction == 1) ;Only update destruction stages... ;if the core is fully open
if (GetDestructionStage == 1) PlayGroup ReloadA 1 endif
if (GetDestructionStage == 2) PlayGroup ReloadB 1 ;ShowWarning "2" endif
if (GetDestructionStage == 3) PlayGroup ReloadC 1 endif
if (GetDestructionStage == 4) ;ShowWarning "4" PlayGroup ReloadD 1 endif
if (GetDestructionStage == 5) PlayGroup ReloadE 1 endif
if (GetDestructionStage == 6) ;ShowWarning "6" PlayGroup ReloadF 1 endif
if (GetDestructionStage == 7)
disable myLink.disable myLink.PlaceAtMe DLC05MZRmGeneratorACTDestroyed myLink.PlaceAtMe DLC05MZRmGeneratorACTHavok nextLink.PlaceAtMe DLC05GeneratorExplosion
;ShowWarning "BOOM"
endif
endif
endif
End

scn DLC05DeathRayGenCoolantSwitchSCRIPT
ref myLink short onLoad short openState ;1 is opening, 2 is open short closeState ;1 is closing, 2 is closed short neverOpen
short linkDestroyed
Begin GameMode
if (onLoad == 0) set myLink to GetLinkedRef ;PlayGroup SpecialIdle 1 set onLoad to 1 endif
if (myLink.IsAnimPlaying Forward == 1) && (openState == 0) ;If the generator is opening... if (neverOpen == 0) ;make this switch open too PlayGroup Forward 1 ;unless it's been turned off set openState to 1 endif endif
if (openState == 1) if (IsAnimPlaying Forward == 0) ;when i'm done opening... PlayGroup Left 1 ;loop the smoke effects set openState to 2 endif endif
if (openState == 2) && (myLink.IsAnimPlaying Backward == 1) set openState to 0 PlayGroup Backward 1 endif
if (IsAnimPlaying Backward == 1) && (closeState == 0) ;i must have been activated... set closestate to 1 ;so set me to the "closing" state endif
if (closeState == 1) ;i'm now closing... if (IsAnimPlaying Backward == 0) ;so when this animation stops i'm fully closed... ;and i can set the "activatedSwitches" to +1 on myLink if (neverOpen == 1) if (myLink.GetIsReference DLC05DeathRayGen01REF == 1) set DLC05DeathRayGen01REF.activatedSwitches to (DLC05DeathRayGen01REF.activatedSwitches + 1) set closeState to 2 endif
if (myLink.GetIsReference DLC05DeathRayGen02REF == 1) set DLC05DeathRayGen02REF.activatedSwitches to (DLC05DeathRayGen02REF.activatedSwitches + 1) set closeState to 2 endif
if (myLink.GetIsReference DLC05DeathRayGen03REF == 1) set DLC05DeathRayGen03REF.activatedSwitches to (DLC05DeathRayGen03REF.activatedSwitches + 1) set closeState to 2 endif
if (myLink.GetIsReference DLC05DeathRayGen04REF == 1) set DLC05DeathRayGen04REF.activatedSwitches to (DLC05DeathRayGen04REF.activatedSwitches + 1) set closeState to 2 endif endif
endif endif
if (myLink.GetDisabled == 1) && (linkDestroyed == 0) PlayGroup right 1 set linkDestroyed to 1 endif
End
Begin OnActivate Player
if (IsAnimPlaying Left == 1) PlayGroup Backward 1 set openState to 0 set neverOpen to 1 else ;Do Nothing endif
End

scn DLC05MZRmGeneratorWin01SCRIPT
;This script just makes the window mimmic what it's linked ref is doing (forward/backward)
ref myLink
short OpenClose short disabled short onLoad
Begin GameMode
if (onLoad == 0) set myLink to GetLinkedRef set onLoad to 1 endif
if (myLink.IsAnimPlaying Forward == 1) && (OpenClose == 0) PlayGroup Forward 1 set OpenClose to 1 endif
if (myLink.IsAnimPlaying Backward == 1) && (OpenClose == 1) PlayGroup Backward 1 set OpenClose to 0 endif
;If the generator is destroyed i should disappear if (myLink.GetDisabled == 1) && (disabled == 0) Disable 0 set disabled to 1 endif
End

scn DLC05MZRmGeneratorACTHavokSCRIPT
short onLoad
short timerInit float timer
Begin GameMode
if (onLoad == 0) set timerInit to 1 set timer to 10 set onLoad to 1 endif
if (timerInit == 1)
if (timer < 0) disable 1 set timerInit to 0 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
endif
End

scn DLC05LabTeleporterControlSCRIPT
short activationState short MZ3Move
float MoveTimer
BEGIN ONACTIVATE
IF ( activationState == 0 ) playgroup forward 0 set activationState to 1 if ( DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3LabTeleporterActive == 0 ) set DLC05ExLab04to01Ref.state to 1 set DLC05ExLab01to04Ref.state to 1 set DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3LabTeleporterActive to 1 set MZ3Move to 1 endif ENDIF
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
if ( MZ3Move == 1 ) DLC05SallyRef.EVP set MoveTimer to 5 set MZ3Move to 2 elseif ( MZ3Move == 2 ) if MoveTimer <= 0 DLC05SomahRef.EVP Set MoveTimer to 5 set MZ3Move to 3 else set MoveTimer to ( MoveTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif elseif ( MZ3Move == 3 ) if ( MoveTimer <= 0 ) DLC05PaulsonRef.EVP Set MoveTimer to 5 set MZ3Move to 4 else set MoveTimer to ( MoveTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif elseif ( MZ3Move == 4 ) if ( MoveTimer <= 0 ) DLC05TercorienRef.EVP Set MZ3Move to -1 else set MoveTimer to ( MoveTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif endif
IF ( activationState == 1 ) IF ( isAnimPlaying forward == 0 ) set activationState to 0 playgroup specialIdle 0
ENDIF ENDIF
END

ScriptName DLC05LabTeleportDoorScript
;!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! OBSOLETE !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
short Active
;// the teleport states for user ;// 0 = fresh ;// 1 = In Trigger ;// 2 = Activated ;// 3 = Arrived
short stage short lastStage short startTeleport
;// the person teleporting ref user
;// the teleporter ref telepad
float timer short animCheck
Begin OnLoad
if ( Active == 0 ) Playgroup Left 1 endif
End
Begin OnActivate
set user to getActionRef
if ( IsActionREf Player == 1 ) if ( DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3LabTeleporterActive == 0 ) ShowMessage DLC05MZ3CoreTeleporterMessage return else Activate playgroup forward 0 endif else Activate endif
End
BEGIN ONTRIGGERENTER
;// get the person who entered set user to getActionRef
;// play the light if they're on the pad IF ( user.getAV variable08 == 0 ) user.pms DLC05teleportLightFXShader user.setAV variable08 -1 ENDIF
;// if they're teleporting in IF ( user.getAV variable08 == 2 ) user.setAV variable08 3 set startTeleport to 1 set stage to 3 ENDIF
END
BEGIN ONTRIGGERLEAVE
IF ( user.getAV variable08 != 2 ) user.sms DLC05teleportLightFXShader user.sms DLC05teleportInFXShader user.setAV variable08 0 user.saa 1 ENDIF
END
Begin GameMode
If ( DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3LabTeleporterActive == 1 ) if ( Active == 0 ) set Active to 1 Playgroup Right 1 endif endif
if ( Active == 1 ) if ( IsAnimPlaying Right == 0 ) set Active to 2 Playgroup SpecialIdle 1 endif endif
;////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// ;// THE TELEPORTATION EFFECTS // ;///////////////////////////////////////////////////////// IF ( startTeleport == 1 )
IF ( stage == 0 ) .playgroup forward 1 set animCheck to 1
;// Turn on fx shader out on alien user.pms DLC05teleportOutFXShader user.sms DLC05teleportLightFXShader
;//time to pause before next stage set timer to 1.5
;// Store stage variable while toggled to -1 for timed pause set lastStage to stage set stage to -1
ELSEIF ( stage == 1 )
;// Turn off fx shader user.sms DLC05teleportOutFXShader activate user user.setAV variable08 2
set timer to 3 set lastStage to stage set stage to -1
ENDIF
;////////// ;// Teleport in -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ;//////////
;////////// ;// stage 3 IF ( stage == 3 )
telepad.playgroup backward 1 set animCheck to 1
;// Shader on user.saa 0 user.pms DLC05teleportInFXShader set timer to 1.5 set lastStage to stage set stage to -1 ENDIF
;////////// ;// stage 4 IF ( stage == 4 ) user.pms DLC05teleportLightFXShader user.sms DLC05teleportInFXShader user.saa 0 user.saa 1
set timer to 8 set lastStage to stage set stage to -1 ENDIF ENDIF
;// Timer loop to pause between stages--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- IF ( stage == -1 ) IF ( timer > 0 ) set timer to ( timer - getSecondsPassed )
ELSE ;// Return to stages where you left off or at beginning IF ( lastStage == 1 || lastStage == 4 ) set stage to 0 set startTeleport to 0 ENDIF
set stage to ( lastStage + 1 )
ENDIF ENDIF
;// Loop to restart idle after teleport machine anim plays------------------------------------------------------------------------- IF ( animCheck == 1) IF ( DLC05teleportTestObjectREF.isAnimPlaying forward == 0 && DLC05teleportTestObjectREF.isAnimPlaying backward == 0) .playgroup specialIdle 1 set animCheck to 0 ENDIF ENDIF
END

ScriptName DLC05MZ3TeleporterUpdateTriggerScript
Begin OnTriggerEnter
if ( IsActionRef DLC05SallyRef == 1 ) if ( DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3LabTeleporterUpdate == 0 ) set DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3LabTeleporterUpdate to 1 DLC05SallyRef.EVP endif endif
End

ScriptName DLC05BridgeTeleportDoorScript
;!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! OBSOLETE !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
short Active
Begin OnLoad
if ( Active == 0 ) Playgroup Left 1 endif
End
;// the teleport states for user ;// 0 = fresh ;// 1 = In Trigger ;// 2 = Activated ;// 3 = Arrived
short stage short lastStage short startTeleport
;// the person teleporting ref user
;// the teleporter ref telepad
float timer short animCheck
Begin OnActivate
set user to getActionRef
if ( IsActionREf Player == 1 ) if ( DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3BridgeTeleporterActive == 0 ) ShowMessage DLC05MZ3CoreTeleporterMessage return else
Activate playgroup forward 0
endif else
Activate
endif
End
BEGIN ONTRIGGERENTER
;// get the person who entered set user to getActionRef
;// play the light if they're on the pad IF ( user.getAV variable08 == 0 ) user.pms DLC05teleportLightFXShader user.setAV variable08 -1 ENDIF
;// if they're teleporting in IF ( user.getAV variable08 == 2 ) user.setAV variable08 3 set startTeleport to 1 set stage to 3 ENDIF
END
BEGIN ONTRIGGERLEAVE
IF ( user.getAV variable08 != 2 ) user.sms DLC05teleportLightFXShader user.sms DLC05teleportInFXShader user.setAV variable08 0 user.saa 1 ENDIF
END
Begin GameMode
If ( DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3BridgeTeleporterActive == 1 ) if ( Active == 0 ) set Active to 1 Playgroup Right 1 endif endif
if ( Active == 1 ) if ( IsAnimPlaying Right == 0 ) set Active to 2 Playgroup SpecialIdle 1 endif endif
;////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// ;// THE TELEPORTATION EFFECTS // ;///////////////////////////////////////////////////////// IF ( startTeleport == 1 )
IF ( stage == 0 ) .playgroup forward 1 set animCheck to 1
;// Turn on fx shader out on alien user.pms DLC05teleportOutFXShader user.sms DLC05teleportLightFXShader
;//time to pause before next stage set timer to 1.5
;// Store stage variable while toggled to -1 for timed pause set lastStage to stage set stage to -1
ELSEIF ( stage == 1 )
;// Turn off fx shader user.sms DLC05teleportOutFXShader activate user user.setAV variable08 2
set timer to 3 set lastStage to stage set stage to -1
ENDIF
;////////// ;// Teleport in -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ;//////////
;////////// ;// stage 3 IF ( stage == 3 )
telepad.playgroup backward 1 set animCheck to 1
;// Shader on user.saa 0 user.pms DLC05teleportInFXShader set timer to 1.5 set lastStage to stage set stage to -1 ENDIF
;////////// ;// stage 4 IF ( stage == 4 ) user.pms DLC05teleportLightFXShader user.sms DLC05teleportInFXShader user.saa 0 user.saa 1
set timer to 8 set lastStage to stage set stage to -1 ENDIF ENDIF
;// Timer loop to pause between stages--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- IF ( stage == -1 ) IF ( timer > 0 ) set timer to ( timer - getSecondsPassed )
ELSE ;// Return to stages where you left off or at beginning IF ( lastStage == 1 || lastStage == 4 ) set stage to 0 set startTeleport to 0 ENDIF
set stage to ( lastStage + 1 )
ENDIF ENDIF
;// Loop to restart idle after teleport machine anim plays------------------------------------------------------------------------- IF ( animCheck == 1) IF ( DLC05teleportTestObjectREF.isAnimPlaying forward == 0 && DLC05teleportTestObjectREF.isAnimPlaying backward == 0) .playgroup specialIdle 1 set animCheck to 0 ENDIF ENDIF
END

scn DLC05AlienDoorControlSCRIPT
;// menu vars short menuSelect short button
;// overload timer vars float overloadTimer short overloadSeq
;// linked door ref myRef ref myDoor
;// the science skill needed float skillLevel
BEGIN ONLOAD
;// how hard is the door to open? IF ( getIsID DLC05AlienDoorControlEASY == 1 ) set skillLevel to 25
ELSEIF ( getIsID DLC05AlienDoorControlAVERAGE == 1 ) set skillLevel to 50
ELSEIF ( getIsID DLC05AlienDoorControlHARD == 1 ) set skillLevel to 75
ELSEIF ( getIsID DLC05AlienDoorControlVERYHARD == 1 ) set skillLevel to 100
ENDIF
;// a link to the door set myDoor to getLinkedRef set myRef to getSelf
END
BEGIN ONACTIVATE PLAYER
;////////// ;// check to see if the player's science is high enough ;////////// IF ( player.getAV science >= skillLevel ) set menuSelect to 1 showMessage DLC05AlienDoorControlMSG
ELSE showMessage DLC05InteractLowSkillScienceMsg skillLevel
ENDIF
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;//////////// ;// check for the player's menu input ;//////////// IF ( menuSelect == 1 ) set button to getButtonPressed
IF ( button > - 1 ) set menuSelect to 0
;// if they activate the door IF ( button == 1 ) IF ( myDoor.getOpenState == 1 ) myDoor.activate myRef 1 ELSE myDoor.activate myRef 1 ENDIF
;// if theyre overloading the terminal ELSEIF ( button == 2) set overloadSeq to 1 set overloadTimer to 5
ENDIF ENDIF ENDIF
;//////////// ;// if the player decides to overload ;//////////// IF ( overloadSeq == 1 ) IF ( overloadTimer > 0 ) set overloadTimer to overloadTimer - getSecondsPassed
ELSE
;// swap the mine and the terminal placeAtMe dlc05AlienControllerMine 1 disable set overloadSeq to 2
ENDIF ENDIF
;// on destroyed, open the door IF ( myRef.getDestructionStage == 1 ) myDoor.unlock myDoor.setOpenState 1 disable ENDIF
END

scn DLC05TelepadActivatorSCRIPT
int init int state ref linkedRef float spawnTimer
begin OnLoad
if init == 0 set linkedRef to getLinkedRef playgroup left 1 set init to 1 set spawntimer to 1.2 endif
end
begin onActivate
if isActionRef player showmessage DLC05MZ3CoreTeleporterMessage else if state == 0 set state to 1 endif endif end
begin gameMode
if state == 1 playgroup right 1 set state to 2 endif
if state == 2 if isAnimPlaying right == 0 playgroup forward 1 set state to 3 endif endif
if state == 3 if spawnTimer > 0 set spawntimer to spawnTimer - getSecondsPassed else linkedRef.enable linkedRef.addspell DLC05TeleportSpell
endif
if isAnimPlaying forward == 0 playgroup left 1 if linkedRef.getLinkedRef != 0 set linkedRef to linkedRef.GetLinkedRef ;move up the linked ref chain set state to 0 ;ready to spawn in the next linked ref else set state to 4 endif endif endif
if state == 1
endif
end

scn DLC05ERoomSayToSCRIPT
