ELSEIF ( DLC05SomahRef.getInCell DLC05EngineRoom == 1 && DLC05SomahRef.getDead == 0 ) DLC05SomahRef.sayTo player DLC05ConvERoomFirstRoom
ELSEIF ( DLC05SomahRef.getInCell DLC05EngineRoom == 1 && DLC05TercorienRef.getDead == 0 ) DLC05TercorienRef.sayTo player DLC05ConvERoomFirstRoom
ENDIF ENDIF
;/////////////////// ;// trigger for the big filthy room at the beginning ;/////////////////// IF ( getSelf == DLC05ERoomSayToFilthyStructures )
;// have the appropriate NPC say their line IF ( DLC05PaulsonRef.getInCell DLC05EngineRoom == 1 && DLC05PaulsonRef.getDead == 0 ) DLC05PaulsonRef.sayTo player DLC05ConvERoomFilthyStructures
ELSEIF ( DLC05SomahRef.getInCell DLC05EngineRoom == 1 && DLC05SomahRef.getDead == 0 ) DLC05SomahRef.sayTo player DLC05ConvERoomFilthyStructures
ELSEIF ( DLC05SomahRef.getInCell DLC05EngineRoom == 1 && DLC05TercorienRef.getDead == 0 ) DLC05TercorienRef.sayTo player DLC05ConvERoomFilthyStructures
ENDIF ENDIF
;/////////////////// ;// trigger for the first gas trap ;/////////////////// IF ( getSelf == DLC05ERoomSayToGasTrap )
;// have the appropriate NPC say their line IF ( DLC05PaulsonRef.getInCell DLC05EngineRoom == 1 && DLC05PaulsonRef.getDead == 0 ) DLC05PaulsonRef.sayTo player DLC05ConvERoomGasTrap
ELSEIF ( DLC05SomahRef.getInCell DLC05EngineRoom == 1 && DLC05SomahRef.getDead == 0 ) DLC05SomahRef.sayTo player DLC05ConvERoomGasTrap
ELSEIF ( DLC05SomahRef.getInCell DLC05EngineRoom == 1 && DLC05TercorienRef.getDead == 0 ) DLC05TercorienRef.sayTo player DLC05ConvERoomGasTrap
ENDIF ENDIF
;/////////////////// ;// trigger for when you first see the engine ;/////////////////// IF ( getSelf == DLC05ERoomSayToEngine )
;// have the appropriate NPC say their line IF ( DLC05PaulsonRef.getInCell DLC05EngineRoom == 1 && DLC05PaulsonRef.getDead == 0 ) DLC05PaulsonRef.sayTo player DLC05ConvERoomEngine
ELSEIF ( DLC05SomahRef.getInCell DLC05EngineRoom == 1 && DLC05SomahRef.getDead == 0 ) DLC05SomahRef.sayTo player DLC05ConvERoomEngine
ELSEIF ( DLC05SomahRef.getInCell DLC05EngineRoom == 1 && DLC05TercorienRef.getDead == 0 ) DLC05TercorienRef.sayTo player DLC05ConvERoomEngine
ENDIF ENDIF
;/////////////////// ;// trigger for the engine gas trap ;/////////////////// IF ( getSelf == DLC05ERoomSayToEngineGasTrap )
;// have the appropriate NPC say their line IF ( DLC05PaulsonRef.getInCell DLC05EngineRoom == 1 && DLC05PaulsonRef.getDead == 0 ) DLC05PaulsonRef.sayTo player DLC05ConvERoomEngineGasTrap
ELSEIF ( DLC05SomahRef.getInCell DLC05EngineRoom == 1 && DLC05SomahRef.getDead == 0 ) DLC05SomahRef.sayTo player DLC05ConvERoomEngineGasTrap
ELSEIF ( DLC05SomahRef.getInCell DLC05EngineRoom == 1 && DLC05TercorienRef.getDead == 0 ) DLC05TercorienRef.sayTo player DLC05ConvERoomEngineGasTrap
ENDIF ENDIF
;/////////////////// ;// trigger to point out the epoxy cache ;/////////////////// IF ( getSelf == DLC05ERoomSayToEpoxy )
;// have the appropriate NPC say their line IF ( DLC05PaulsonRef.getInCell DLC05EngineRoom == 1 && DLC05PaulsonRef.getDead == 0 ) DLC05PaulsonRef.sayTo player DLC05ConvERoomEpoxy
ELSEIF ( DLC05SomahRef.getInCell DLC05EngineRoom == 1 && DLC05SomahRef.getDead == 0 ) DLC05SomahRef.sayTo player DLC05ConvERoomEpoxy
ELSEIF ( DLC05SomahRef.getInCell DLC05EngineRoom == 1 && DLC05TercorienRef.getDead == 0 ) DLC05TercorienRef.sayTo player DLC05ConvERoomEpoxy
ENDIF ENDIF
END

scn DLC05HealingArchTriggerScript
;GLOBALS ;DLC05HealingArchCoolDown -- how many seconds an arch has to cool down before it can be used again
short init
short coolingDown ;0 = unset / not cooling down, 1 = cooling down, player can't heal yet float timerCoolDown ;0 = unset, <=0 timer done, >0 timer counting down... set in GameMode block, starts equal to DLC05HealingArchCoolDown global
short sciskill ;science skill needed to overload archway -- set in OnLoad block short overload ;0 = unset, 1 = player overloaded archway short overhealsLeft ;set in init block and every time the player uses the archway if he's overloaded it short burnedOut ;0 = unset, 1 = broken and will not work again, player used too many times after overloading
short menuselect short button
;FX short FX ;num value = meaning ; Playgoup normal / Playgroup overloaded
;0 = Ready ;SpecialIdle / ReloadB ;1 = Warm up ;Forward / ReloadA ;2 = Use ;Backward / ReloadC ;3 = Cool down ;Left / Right
;4 = Burned out ;ReloadD
short FXUsingArch ;1 = as soon as the "use" anim is done playing, kick into the "cool down" loop short FXWarmingUp ;1 = as soon as the "warm up" anim is done playing, kick into the "ready" loop short FXReady ;0 = not ready, 1 = ready to use
short FXPrevious ;used in the SFX section of the game mod block to help determine if a new visual FX is playing so that we play the proper sound effect ref sfxIdleRef ;holds the placeatme ref to the sound effect so we can enable/disable it ref sfxChargingRef ;holds the placeatme ref to the sound effect so we can enable/disable it
Begin OnLoad
if init == 0 set sciskill to 75 set overHealsLeft to 3 set FXready to 1
;SFX--------- set sfxIdleRef to placeatme OBJDLC05HealingArchIdleLP 1 set sfxChargingRef to placeatme OBJDLC05HealingArchChargingLP 1 sfxIdleRef.disable sfxChargingRef.disable ;/SFX--------
set init to 1 endif
End
Begin GameMode
;FX--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
if FXUsingArch == 1 && (isAnimPlaying Backward == 0 && isAnimPlaying ReloadC== 0) ;the "use" anim is done and we should start the "cool down" anim set FXUsingArch to 0 set FX to 3 endif
if FXWarmingUp == 1 && (isAnimPlaying Forward == 0 && isAnimPlaying ReloadA == 0) ;the "warm up" anim is done and we should start the "ready" anim set FXWarmingUp to 0 set FX to 0 set FXready to 1 ;so the OnTrigger logic knows the player can use the arch endif
if BurnedOut == 1 ;check to see if Archway is BurnedOut if FX != 4 ;if we aren't playing the BurnedOut anim if isAnimPlaying Backward == 0 && IsAnimPlaying ReloadC == 0 ;and we aren't actively playing the use Anim set FX to 4 endif endif
endif
if FX == 0 ;READY if overload == 0 && isAnimPlaying SpecialIdle == 0 playgroup SpecialIdle 1
elseif overload == 1 && isAnimPlaying ReloadB == 0 playgroup ReloadB 1 endif
;SFX----------- turn on the ready sound if sfxIdleRef.getDisabled == 1 sfxIdleRef.enable sfxChargingRef.disable endif ;/SFX----------
elseif FX == 1 ;WARM UP if overload == 0 && isAnimPlaying Forward == 0 playgroup Forward 1 set FXWarmingUp to 1
elseif overload == 1 && isAnimPlaying ReloadA == 0 playgroup ReloadA 1 set FXWarmingUp to 1 endif
;SFX----------- turn on the ready sound if sfxIdleRef.getDisabled == 1 sfxIdleRef.enable sfxChargingRef.disable endif ;/SFX----------
elseif FX == 2 ;USE if overload == 0 && isAnimPlaying Backward == 0 playgroup Backward 1 set FXUsingArch to 1
elseif overload == 1 && isAnimPlaying ReloadC== 0 playgroup ReloadC 1 set FXUsingArch to 1 endif
set FXready to 0
;SFX----------- turn off idling sounds if sfxIdleRef.getDisabled == 0 || sfxChargingRef.getDisabled == 0 sfxIdleRef.disable sfxChargingRef.disable endif ;/SFX----------
elseif FX == 3 ;COOL DOWN if overload == 0 && isAnimPlaying Left == 0 playgroup Left 1
elseif overload == 1 && isAnimPlaying Right == 0 playgroup Right 1 endif
;SFX----------- turn on the charging sound if sfxChargingRef.getDisabled == 1 sfxChargingRef.enable sfxIdleRef.disable endif ;/SFX----------
elseif FX == 4 ;BURNED OUT if isAnimPlaying ReloadD == 0 playgroup ReloadD 1 endif
;SFX----------- turn off idling sounds if sfxIdleRef.getDisabled == 0 || sfxChargingRef.getDisabled == 0 sfxIdleRef.disable sfxChargingRef.disable endif ;/SFX----------
endif
;/FX--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
if coolingDown == 1 && burnedOut == 0 if timerCoolDown > 0 set timerCoolDown to timerCoolDown - getSecondsPassed elseif timerCoolDown <= 0 set coolingDown to 0 ;FX ---------------------------------------------------------- set FX to 1 ;/FX ----------------------------------------------------------
endif
endif
;Get Button Pressed if Message is showing if menuselect == 1 set button to GetButtonPressed
if button == 0 RewardXP 50 set Overload to 1
;SFX------------------------ playsound3D OBJDLC05HealingArchHack ;/SFX------------------------
set menuselect to 0 elseif button == 1 set menuselect to 0 endif endif
End
Begin OnActivate
if IsActionRef Player == 1 if overLoad == 0 if player.getav science >= sciskill showmessage DLC05Healingarchoverloadmessage set menuSelect to 1 ;see GameMode block which captures button press else showmessage DLC05Healingarchlowskillmessage, sciskill endif
elseif overLoad == 1 && burnedOut == 0 if overHealsLeft > 1 showmessage DLC05HealingArchOverloadedHealsRemainingMessage overhealsLeft else showmessage DLC05HealingArchOverloadedHealsOneRemainingMessage endif
elseif overLoad == 1 && burnedOut == 1 showmessage DLC05HealingArchBurnedOutMessageBox
endif endif
End
Begin OnTriggerEnter
if IsActionRef player == 1
if burnedOut == 1 showMessage DLC05HealingArchBurnedOutMessage
;SFX------------------------ playsound3D OBJDLC05HealingArchHealFail ;/SFX------------------------
elseif coolingDown == 0 && FXready == 1 if Overload == 1
if overhealsLeft > 0 set overhealsLeft to overhealsLeft - 1 set DLC05AlienTechFunctions.overheal to 1 setstage DLC05AlienTechFunctions 10 ;heal player and weapon
;FX ---------------------------------------------------------- set FX to 2 ;/FX ----------------------------------------------------------
set timerCoolDown to DLC05HealingArchCoolDown set coolingDown to 1
if overhealsLeft == 0
set burnedOut to 1
;FX ---------------------------------------------------------- set FX to 4 ;/FX ----------------------------------------------------------
;SFX------------- ;Normally the healing sound effect is baked into the animation, since when its burned out the healing anim doesn't play, we are playing it in the script player.playsound3D OBJDLC05HealingArchHeal ;/SFX-----------
set coolingDown to 0
endif
endif
elseif OverLoad == 0 set DLC05AlienTechFunctions.overheal to 0 setstage DLC05AlienTechFunctions 10 ;heal player and weapon
;FX ---------------------------------------------------------- set FX to 2 ;/FX ----------------------------------------------------------
set timerCoolDown to DLC05HealingArchCoolDown set coolingDown to 1
endif
elseif coolingDown == 1 || FXReady == 0
showMessage DLC05HealingArchCoolDownMessage
;SFX------------------------ playsound3D OBJDLC05HealingArchHealFail ;/SFX------------------------
endif
endif
End

scn DLC05TelepadActivatorHangarSCRIPT
int init int state ref linkedRef float spawnTimer ref spellref
begin OnLoad
if init == 0 set linkedRef to getLinkedRef playgroup left 1 set init to 1 set spawntimer to 1.2 endif
end
begin onActivate
if state == 0 set state to 1 endif
end
begin gameMode
if state == 1 playgroup right 1 set state to 2 endif
if state == 2 if isAnimPlaying right == 0 playgroup forward 1 set state to 3 endif endif
if state == 3 if spawnTimer > 0 set spawntimer to spawnTimer - getSecondsPassed else set DLC05HQ.numActive to DLC05HQ.numActive + 1 set DLC05HQ.track to DLC05HQ.track + 1 set DLC05HQ.numEnemies to DLC05HQ.numEnemies + 1 set spellRef to linkedref.placeLeveledActorAtMe DLC05HangarLvlSiege DLC05HQ.spawnDiff spellRef.addspell DLC05TeleportSpell
set state to 4 endif endif
if state == 4 if isAnimPlaying forward == 0 playgroup left 1 set state to 0 endif endif
end

scn DLC05RobotPodScript ;This controls the linked ref helper bot. ;Should work relatively similar to protectron pod, but with no dialog ; ;forward open, backward closed ;==========================
;This script is the handler for the Robot Pods ;related global DLC05RobotActive (1= A robot is already following the Player)
short Button
ref actionRef ref linkedRef
int init int bOpen int bAnimating
begin OnLoad if init == 0 set init to 1 ; playgroup forward 1 set bOpen to 0 set linkedRef to GetLinkedRef linkedRef.Setunconscious 1 endif end
begin onActivate set actionRef to getActionRef if actionRef == player if ( Player.GetItemCount DLC05RobotControlItem >= 1 ) if ( DLC05RobotActive == 0 ) ShowMessage DLC05AsmRobotPodWithDevice elseif ( DLC05RobotActive > 0 ) ShowMessage DLC05AsmRobotPodAlreadyActive endif elseif ( Player.GetItemCount DLC05RobotControlItem <= 0 ) ShowMessage DLC05AsmRobotPodNoDevice endif else ;activated by something other than the player if bOpen == 0 set bOpen to 1 playgroup forward 1 set bAnimating to 1 else set bOpen to 0 playgroup backward 1 set bAnimating to 1 endif endif end
begin gameMode
set Button to GetButtonPressed
if ( Button == 0 ) elseif ( Button == 1 ) if bAnimating == 0 if bOpen == 0 set bOpen to 1 playgroup forward 1 set bAnimating to 1 else set bOpen to 0 playgroup backward 1 set bAnimating to 1 endif endif endif
if bAnimating == 1 if (isAnimPlaying Forward == 0) && (isAnimPlaying Backward == 0) set bAnimating to 0 if bOpen == 1 if linkedRef.getDead == 0 set DLC05RobotActive to DLC05RobotActive + 1 linkedRef.Setunconscious 0 linkedRef.SetAV Variable08 1 set DLC05ExLab.botFollowerRef to linkedRef endif endif endif endif
end

scn DLC05RobotPodOpenScript ;open version of the pod. Don't use robots with this. ; ; ;;forward open, backward closed ;========================== ref actionRef ref linkedRef
int init int bOpen int bAnimating

begin onActivate
set actionRef to getActionRef
if actionRef == player if player.getItemCount DLC05RobotControlItem > 0 && bAnimating == 0 if bOpen == 0 set bOpen to 1 playgroup forward 1 set bAnimating to 1 else set bOpen to 0 playgroup backward 1 set bAnimating to 1 endif endif endif

end

scn DLC05AlienControllerAsmSCRIPT
;// menu vars short menuSelect short button
;// turret variables ref linkedTurret ref linkedTurret02 short turretAttached
;// overload timer vars float overloadTimer short overloadSeq
;// the science skill needed float skillLevel
BEGIN ONLOAD
set linkedTurret to getLinkedRef set linkedTurret02 to linkedTurret.getLinkedRef set overloadTimer to 0 set overloadSeq to 0
;// get the attached turret to see which menu we throw out IF ( linkedTurret.getIsCreatureType 6 == 1 && linkedTurret.getDead == 0) set turretAttached to 1
ELSE set turretAttached to 0
ENDIF
set skillLevel to 50.0
END
BEGIN ONACTIVATE if IsActionRef player ;////////// ;// check to see if the player's science is high enough ;////////// IF ( player.getAV science >= 50 )
;// check to see which message to use (turret or no turret) and start the menu poll IF ( turretAttached == 0 ) showMessage DLC05trapAlienCommMSG set menuSelect to 1
ELSEIF ( turretAttached == 1 && linkedTurret.getDead == 0 && linkedTurret.getUnconscious == 0 ) showMessage DLC05trapAlienCommTurretMSG set menuSelect to 1
ENDIF ELSE showMessage DLC05InteractLowSkillScienceMsg skillLevel ENDIF
endif END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;//////////// ;// check for the player's menu input ;//////////// IF ( menuSelect == 1 ) set button to getButtonPressed
IF ( button > - 1 ) set menuSelect to 0
;// if theyre overloading the terminal IF ( button == 1 ) set overloadSeq to 1 set overloadTimer to 5
;// if theyre overloading the turret and it's still alive ELSEIF ( button == 2) IF ( linkedTurret.getDead == 0 )
;// get the turret, kill it and update the variable set linkedTurret to getLinkedRef linkedTurret.kill player linkedTurret.placeatme grenadePlasmaExplosion 1 linkedTurret02.kill player linkedTurret02.placeatme grenadePlasmaExplosion 1
set turretAttached to 0
ENDIF ENDIF ENDIF ENDIF
;//////////// ;// if the player decides to overload ;//////////// IF ( overloadSeq == 1 ) IF ( overloadTimer > 0 ) set overloadTimer to overloadTimer - getSecondsPassed
ELSE
;// swap the mine and the terminal placeAtMe dlc05AlienControllerMine 1 disable set overloadSeq to 2
ENDIF ENDIF
END
BEGIN ONDEATH
;// if the player manually kills the controller, frenzy the turret linkedTurret.damageAV braincondition 100
END

scn DLC05TelepadActivatorAsmSCRIPT
int init int state ref linkedRef float spawnTimer
begin OnLoad
if init == 0 set linkedRef to getLinkedRef playgroup left 1 set init to 1 set spawntimer to 1.2 endif
end
begin onActivate
if state == 0 set state to 1 endif
end
begin gameMode
if state == 1 playgroup right 1 set state to 2 endif
if state == 2 if isAnimPlaying right == 0 playgroup forward 1 set state to 3 DLC05SomahRef.cios DLC05TeleportOutSpell endif endif
if state == 3 if spawnTimer > 0 set spawntimer to spawnTimer - getSecondsPassed else ;DLC05AsmTeleDoor01.activate DLC05SomahRef DLC05SomahRef.moveto DLC05AsmSomahMovetoMarker DLC05SomahRef.addspell DLC05TeleportSpell endif
if isAnimPlaying forward == 0 playgroup left 1 set state to 4 endif endif
if state == 1
endif
end
scn DLC05PowerControlSCRIPT

scn DLC05BridgePowerControlSCRIPT
;// 1 = animating short buttonState
;// only do the load stuff once short loadOnce short localPower
BEGIN ONLOAD
IF ( loadOnce == 0 )
IF ( getSelf == DLC05BridgePowerMiddle ) DLC05BridgePowerMiddle.playGroup backward 0
ELSE DLC05BridgePowerShields.playGroup specialIdle 0 DLC05BridgePowerGun.playGroup specialIdle 0
ENDIF
set dlc05BridgeLD.powerCurrentState to 1 set loadOnce to -1
ENDIF
END
BEGIN ONACTIVATE PLAYER
;////////////////////////////////////////// ;// POWER TO SHIELDS IF ( getSelf == DLC05BridgePowerShields && buttonState == 0 )
IF ( dlc05BridgeLD.powerCurrentState == 0 )
ELSE
IF ( dlc05BridgeLD.powerCurrentState != -1 ) ;// the anims DLC05BridgePlayerShipShields.enable 0
IF ( DLC05BridgeLD.playerShipPrev == 1 ) DLC05BridgePlayerShipEven.disable
ELSEIF ( DLC05BridgeLD.playerShipPrev == 2 ) DLC05BridgePlayerShipGuns.disable ENDIF
set dlc05BridgeLD.powerCurrentState to 0
ENDIF
;// activate this one, turn the others on set localPower to 0 set buttonState to 1 ACTIVATE set DLC05BridgeLD.playerShipPrev to 0
ENDIF
;////////////////////////////////////////// ;// POWER TO MIDDLE ELSEIF ( getSelf == DLC05BridgePowerMiddle && buttonState == 0 )
IF ( dlc05BridgeLD.powerCurrentState == 1 )
ELSE
IF ( dlc05BridgeLD.powerCurrentState != -1 )
;// the anims DLC05BridgePlayerShipEven.enable 0
IF ( DLC05BridgeLD.playerShipPrev == 0 ) DLC05BridgePlayerShipShields.disable
ELSEIF ( DLC05BridgeLD.playerShipPrev == 2 ) DLC05BridgePlayerShipGuns.disable
ENDIF
set dlc05BridgeLD.powerCurrentState to 1
ENDIF
;// activate this one, turn the others on ACTIVATE set localPower to 1 set buttonState to 1 set DLC05BridgeLD.playerShipPrev to 1
ENDIF
;////////////////////////////////////////// ;// POWER TO GUNS ELSEIF ( getSelf == DLC05BridgePowerGun && buttonState == 0 )
IF ( dlc05BridgeLD.powerCurrentState == 2 )
ELSE
IF ( dlc05BridgeLD.powerCurrentState != -1 )
;// the anims DLC05BridgePlayerShipGuns.enable 0
IF ( DLC05BridgeLD.playerShipPrev == 0 ) DLC05BridgePlayerShipShields.disable
ELSEIF ( DLC05BridgeLD.playerShipPrev == 1 ) DLC05BridgePlayerShipEven.disable
ENDIF
set dlc05BridgeLD.powerCurrentState to 2
ENDIF
;// activate this one, turn the others on set localPower to 2 ACTIVATE set buttonState to 1 set DLC05BridgeLD.playerShipPrev to 2
ENDIF
ENDIF
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;// after we've pressed the button, turn it off IF ( buttonState == 1 ) IF ( isAnimPlaying forward == 0 ) set buttonState to 0 playgroup backward 0
IF ( localPower == 0 ) DLC05BridgePowerMiddle.playGroup specialIdle 0 DLC05BridgePowerGun.playGroup specialIdle 0
ELSEIF ( localPower == 1 ) DLC05BridgePowerShields.playGroup specialIdle 0 DLC05BridgePowerGun.playGroup specialIdle 0
ELSEIF ( localPower == 2 ) DLC05BridgePowerShields.playGroup specialIdle 0 DLC05BridgePowerMiddle.playGroup specialIdle 0
ENDIF
ENDIF ENDIF
END

scn DLC05BridgeGeneratorControlSCRIPT
short loadOnce short popOn short activationState
BEGIN ONLOAD
IF ( loadOnce == 0 ) set loadOnce to 1
playgroup backward 0 ENDIF
END
BEGIN ONACTIVATE
IF ( DLC05BridgeLD.powerCurrentState == -1 && activationState == 0 ) playgroup forward 0 set activationState to 1
ACTIVATE
;// positive reinforcement, ohh yeah IF ( DLC05BridgeLD.generatorCount == 0 ) IF ( DLC05SomahREF.getDead == 0 ) DLC05SomahREF.sayTo player DLC05BridgeEMPHitAlt
ELSE DLC05SallyREF.sayTo player DLC05BridgeEMPHitAlt ENDIF ENDIF
set DLC05BridgeLD.generatorCount to DLC05BridgeLD.generatorCount + 1
;// turn off the buttons IF ( getSelf == DLC05BridgeGeneratorControlA ) DLC05BridgeGeneratorControlAHolo.disable
ELSEIF ( getSelf == DLC05BridgeGeneratorControlB ) DLC05BridgeGeneratorControlBHolo.disable
ELSEIF ( getSelf == DLC05BridgeGeneratorControlC ) DLC05BridgeGeneratorControlCHolo.disable
ELSEIF ( getSelf == DLC05BridgeGeneratorControlD ) DLC05BridgeGeneratorControlDHolo.disable
ENDIF
ELSE showMessage DLC05BridgeGeneratorOnlineMSG
ENDIF
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
IF ( activationState == 1 ) IF ( isAnimPlaying forward == 0 ) playgroup backward 0
ENDIF ENDIF
;//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// ;// CHECK TO SEE IF WE SHOULD POP ON IF ( popOn == 0 && DLC05BridgeLD.powerCurrentState == -1 ) playgroup specialIdle 0 set popOn to 1
ENDIF
END

scn DLC05DeathRayTeleAttackWaveSCRIPT
int init int state ref linkedRef float spawnTimer
short numberSpawnedMax short numberSpawnedCurrent
begin OnLoad
if init == 0 set linkedRef to getLinkedRef playgroup left 1 set init to 1 set spawntimer to 1.2 set numberSpawnedMax to 5 endif
end
begin onActivate
if state == 0 set state to 1 endif
end
begin gameMode
if (numberSpawnedCurrent != numberSpawnedMax)
if state == 1 playgroup right 1 set state to 2 endif
if state == 2 if isAnimPlaying right == 0 playgroup forward 1 set state to 3 endif endif
if state == 3 if spawnTimer > 0 set spawntimer to spawnTimer - getSecondsPassed else if (numberSpawnedCurrent == 0) || (numberSpawnedCurrent == 2) || (numberSpawnedCurrent == 4) linkedref.placeLeveledActorAtMe DLC05DeathRayLvlAlienRandomSpawn01 1 endif if (numberSpawnedCurrent == 1) || (numberSpawnedCurrent == 3) || (numberSpawnedCurrent == 5) linkedref.placeLeveledActorAtMe DLC05DeathRayLvlAlienRandomSpawn02 1 endif set state to 4 endif endif
if state == 4 if isAnimPlaying forward == 0 playgroup left 1 if (numberSpawnedCurrent == numberSpawnedMax) set state to 0 else set numberSpawnedCurrent to (numberSpawnedCurrent + 1) set state to 1 endif endif endif
endif
end

if ( IsActionRef Player == 1 ) If ( DLC05Conversations.DLC05SwordFound == 0 ) set DLC05Conversations.DLC05SwordFound to 1 Activate else Activate endif else Activate endif
End

ScriptName DLC05PostQuestScript
short DLC05PQSomahDead short DLC05PQPaulsonDead short DLC05PQTercorienDead
Short DLC05PQSallySupplies Short DLC05PQSallyDay Short DLC05PQElliottSupplies Short DLC05PQElliottDay Short DLC05PQPlayerLeft
Short DLC05PQTeleport
Short DLC05PQMS16Check
short DLC05PQUpdate ;4= time to update player about teleporter, 10 = package has been triggered
Begin GameMode
if ( DLC05PQTeleport == 3 ) if ( Player.GetInCell DLC05Bridge == 1 ) EnablePlayerControls Set DLC05PQTeleport to 0 endif endif
if ( DLC05SomahREF.GetDead == 1 ) if ( DLC05PQSomahDead == 0 ) Set DLC05PQUpdate to ( DLC05PQUpdate + 1 ) set DLC05PQSomahDead to 1 endif endif
if ( DLC05PaulsonREF.GetDead == 1 ) if ( DLC05PQPaulsonDead == 0 ) Set DLC05PQUpdate to ( DLC05PQUpdate + 1 ) set DLC05PQPaulsonDead to 1 endif endif
if ( DLC05TercorienREF.GetDead == 1 ) if ( DLC05PQTercorienDead == 0 ) Set DLC05PQUpdate to ( DLC05PQUpdate + 1 ) set DLC05PQTercorienDead to 1 endif endif
if ( DLC05PQUpdate == 4 ) if ( DLC05TercorienRef.GetDead == 0 ) set DLC05PQUpdate to 8 DLC05TercorienRef.EVP else Set DLC05PQUpdate to 10 DLC05SallyRef.EVP endif endif
;Check if player has left the ship, update supplies if time has gone by
if ( DLC05PQPlayerLeft == 1 ) if ( DLC05PQElliottSupplies == 1 ) if ( DLC05PQElliottDay != GameDay ) set DLC05PQElliottSupplies to 0 endif endif if ( DLC05PQSallySupplies == 1 ) if ( DLC05PQSallyDay != GameDay ) set DLC05PQSallySupplies to 0 endif endif
endif
End

ScriptName DLC05PostTeleporterUpdateTriggerScript
Begin OnTriggerEnter
if ( IsActionRef Player == 1 ) if ( GetQuestRunning DLC05Post == 1 ) if ( DLC05Post.DLC05PQUpdate < 4 ) && ( DLC05Post.DLC05PQUpdate >= 0 ) if ( DLC05TercorienRef.GetDead == 0 ) Set DLC05Post.DLC05PQUpdate to 8 DLC05TercorienRef.EVP else Set DLC05Post.DLC05PQUpdate to 4 DLC05SallyRef.EVP endif endif endif endif
End

ScriptName DLC05ClawNPCScript

Return
End

scn DLC05CryoPodSwitchSCRIPT
;One press and it turns itself off after activating ;It's also syncs up with it's linked ref (which should be another button if it's activating the same thing)... ;so that it turns off if it's linked ref has already been used
short pressed short myLinkPressed short onLoad ref myLink
Begin onActivate
if (pressed == 0) && (IsAnimPlaying SpecialIdle == 1) playgroup Forward 1 Activate if (myLink == DLC05CryoLab02toCryoLab01Ref) set DLC05Conversations.cryoReturnTeleEnabled to 1 set DLC05CryoLab02toCryoLab01Ref.state to 1 ;makes the actual teleport door available for use set DLC05CryoLab01toCryoLab02Ref.state to 1 ;makes the actual teleport door available for use endif myLink.enable set pressed to 1 endif
End
Begin GameMode
if (onLoad == 0) set myLink to GetLinkedRef set onLoad to 1 endif
if (pressed == 1) && (IsAnimPlaying Forward == 0)
if (myLink == DLC05CryoPodSwitchLeftREF) set DLC05CryoLab01MasTrigREF.cryoPodLeftNumber to (DLC05CryoLab01MasTrigREF.cryoPodLeftNumber + 1) endif
PlayGroup Backward 1 set pressed to 2 endif
if (myLink.IsAnimPlaying Backward == 1) && (myLinkPressed == 0) PlayGroup Backward 1 set myLinkPressed to 1 endif
End

scn DLC05CryoPodSwitchOFFSCRIPT
;One press and it turns itself off after activating ;It's also syncs up with it's linked ref (which should be another button if it's activating the same thing)... ;so that it turns off if it's linked ref has already been used
short pressed short myLinkPressed short onLoad ref myLink
Begin onActivate
if (pressed == 0) && (IsAnimPlaying SpecialIdle == 1) playgroup Forward 1 Activate myLink.enable set pressed to 1 endif
End
Begin GameMode
if (onLoad == 0) set myLink to GetLinkedRef PlayGroup Backward 1 set onLoad to 1 endif
if (pressed == 1) && (IsAnimPlaying Forward == 0) PlayGroup Backward 1 set pressed to 2 endif
if (myLink.IsAnimPlaying Backward == 1) && (myLinkPressed == 0) PlayGroup Backward 1 set myLinkPressed to 1 endif
End

scn DLC05spaceSuitbreathingSCRIPT
short onLoad
; script controls player's breath noise when wearing space suit in zero G
BEGIN gameMode
if (onLoad == 0) if (player.GetInCell DLC05SpaceBridge01) && (DLC05SpaceWalkQ.breathSFXon == 1) DLC05SpacesuitBreath01.enable endif if (player.GetInCell DLC05SpaceBridge02) && (DLC05SpaceWalkQ.breathSFXon == 1) DLC05SpacesuitBreath02.enable endif if (player.GetInCell DLC05ExLab01) && (DLC05SpaceWalkQ.breathSFXon == 1) DLC05SpacesuitBreath03.enable endif set onLoad to 1 endif
if DLC05SpaceWalkQ.breathSFXon == 0 if DLC05SpaceWalkQ.zeroAtmo == 1 && player.getEquipped DLC05AstronautSuit == 1 if (player.GetInCell DLC05SpaceBridge01) DLC05SpacesuitBreath01.enable DLC05SpacesuitBreath01.moveto Player endif if (player.GetInCell DLC05SpaceBridge02) DLC05SpacesuitBreath02.enable DLC05SpacesuitBreath02.moveto Player endif if (player.GetInCell DLC05ExLab01) DLC05SpacesuitBreath03.enable DLC05SpacesuitBreath03.moveto Player endif set DLC05SpaceWalkQ.breathSFXon to 1 endif else if player.getEquipped DLC05AstronautSuit == 0 if (player.GetInCell DLC05SpaceBridge01) DLC05SpacesuitBreath01.disable endif if (player.GetInCell DLC05SpaceBridge02) DLC05SpacesuitBreath02.disable endif if (player.GetInCell DLC05ExLab01) DLC05SpacesuitBreath03.disable endif set DLC05SpaceWalkQ.breathSFXon to 0 endif if DLC05SpaceWalkQ.zeroAtmo == 0 if (player.GetInCell DLC05SpaceBridge01) DLC05SpacesuitBreath01.disable endif if (player.GetInCell DLC05SpaceBridge02) DLC05SpacesuitBreath02.disable endif if (player.GetInCell DLC05ExLab01) DLC05SpacesuitBreath03.disable endif set DLC05SpaceWalkQ.breathSFXon to 0 endif endif
END

scn DLC05MarksZetaLaserSCRIPT
short stepper short lastStep short startAnims short doOnce short markTest short flareStepper short damageStepper short rumbleInit short rumbleStepper
float timer float flareTimer float damageTimer float rumbleTimer
begin gamemode
IF ( rumbleStepper == 0) IF ( rumbleInit == 0 ) set rumbleTimer to 48 set rumbleInit to 1 ENDIF
IF ( rumbleTimer > 0 ) set rumbleTimer to rumbleTimer - getSecondsPassed
DLC05EMPPowerDown.placeAtMe DLC05FF01cartShake 1
ELSE set rumbleStepper to 1
ENDIF ENDIF
if marktest == 1
if flareStepper == 0 set flareTimer to 28.5 set flareStepper to 1
elseif flareStepper == 1 if flareTimer > 0 set flareTimer to flareTimer - getsecondspassed else set flareStepper to flareStepper + 1 imod DLC05ZetaBoosterISFX endif endif
; if damageStepper == 0 ;; set damageTimer to 5 ; set damageStepper to 1 ; elseif damageStepper == 1 ; if damageTimer > 0 ; set damageTimer to damageTimer - getsecondspassed ; else ; DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF01.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion01 1 ; DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF02.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion02 1 ; DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF03.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion03 1 ; DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF04.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion01 1 ; DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF05.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion02 1 ; DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF06.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion03 1 ; DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF07.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion01 1 ; DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF08.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion02 1 ; ; DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF11.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion01 1 ; DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF12.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion02 1 ; DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF13.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion03 1 ; DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF14.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion01 1 ; DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF15.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion02 1 ; DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF16.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion03 1 ; DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF17.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion01 1 ; DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF18.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion02 1 ; DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF10.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion03 1 ; ; set damageStepper to 0 ; endif ; endif
if DLC05BridgeEnemyShipREF.isanimplaying backward == 1
if stepper == 0 DLC05BridgeEnemyShipREF.sms DLC05ZetaShieldsFXShader set timer to 3 set lastStep to stepper set stepper to -1
elseif stepper == 1 DLC05ZetaLaserAimBridge.fireweapon DLC05ZetaLaserLevel2 DLC05BridgeEnemyShipREF.pms DLC05ZetaShieldsFXShader set timer to 3 set lastStep to stepper set stepper to -1
elseif stepper == 2 DLC05FXZetaShieldsWindowREF.playgroup forward 1 DLC05BridgeEnemyShipREF.fireweapon DLC05ZetaEnemyLaserLevel2
DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF01.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion01 1 DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF02.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion02 1 DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF03.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion03 1 DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF04.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion01 1 DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF05.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion02 1 DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF06.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion03 1 DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF07.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion01 1 DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF08.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion02 1
DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF11.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion01 1 DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF12.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion02 1 DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF13.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion03 1 DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF14.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion01 1 DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF15.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion02 1 DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF16.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion03 1 DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF17.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion01 1 DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF18.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion02 1 DLC05BridgeDamageSpotREF10.placeatme DLC05ZetaBridgeDamageExplosion03 1
set timer to .5 set lastStep to stepper set stepper to 0
elseif stepper == -1 if timer > 0 set timer to timer - getsecondspassed else set stepper to lastStep + 1 endif
endif
endif
if startAnims == 0 DLC05ZetaLaserAimBridge.playgroup forward 1 DLC05BridgeEnemyShipREF.playgroup forward 1 set startAnims to 1 endif
if DLC05BridgeEnemyShipREF.isanimplaying forward == 0 && DLC05BridgeEnemyShipREF.isanimplaying backward == 0 DLC05ZetaLaserAimBridge.playgroup backward 1 DLC05BridgeEnemyShipREF.playgroup backward 1 endif
endif
end

scn DLC05ZetaDeadSCRIPT
short stepper short lastStep
float timer
begin gamemode
if stepper == 0 playgroup forward 1 ; pms DLC05ZetaDeadFXShader set timer to 25 set lastStep to stepper set stepper to -1
elseif stepper == 1 do 10 set timer to 5 set lastStep to stepper set stepper to -1
elseif stepper == 2 do 10 set timer to 10 set lastStep to stepper set stepper to -1
elseif stepper == 3 do 10 set timer to 15 set lastStep to stepper set stepper to -1
elseif stepper == 4 do 10 set timer to 5 set lastStep to stepper set stepper to -1
elseif stepper == 5 && isAnimPlaying forward == 0 disable 0 set timer to 5 set lastStep to stepper set stepper to -1
elseif stepper == 6 markForDelete set timer to 5 set lastStep to stepper set stepper to -1
elseif stepper == -1 if timer > 1 set timer to timer - getsecondspassed else set stepper to lastStep + 1 endif endif
end

scn DLC05BridgeStarSpinSCRIPT
float angleX float angleY float angleZ
short spinBack float spinSpeedY float spinSpeedZ
short loadOnce short spinPhase
;// spinSpeed globals float spinSpeedFASTY float spinSpeedFASTZ float spinSpeedMIDY float spinSpeedMIDZ float spinSpeedSLOWY float spinSpeedSLOWZ
;// ship rumble timer short rumbleInit short rumbleControl float rumbleTimer
;// the ship's flare short flareStepper float flareTimer
BEGIN ONLOAD
;// the default spin speeds IF ( loadOnce == 0 )
;// setup the default spinspeeds set spinSpeedFASTY to .004 set spinSpeedFASTZ to .004
set spinSpeedMIDY to .004 set spinSpeedMIDZ to .002
set spinSpeedSLOWY to .004 set spinSpeedSLOWZ to .001
set spinSpeedY to spinSpeedFASTY set spinSpeedZ to spinSpeedFASTZ set spinPhase to 4
set spinBack to 0 set DLC05BridgeLD.spinControl to 1 set loadOnce to 1
ENDIF
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;// spin for 75 rotations, when we hit 100, spin the other way IF ( DLC05BridgeLD.spinControl <= 75 && spinBack == 1) set spinBack to 0 ELSEIF ( DLC05BridgeLD.spinControl >= 75 && spinBack == 0 ) set spinBack to 1 ENDIF
; ;// ramp up and ramp down ; IF ( spinBack == 0 ) ; ; ;// speed up at the beginning ; IF ( DLC05BridgeLD.spinControl >= 5 && spinPhase == 1 ) ; set spinSpeedY to spinSpeedSLOWY ; set spinSpeedZ to spinSpeedSLOWZ ; set spinPhase to 2 ; ; ELSEIF ( DLC05BridgeLD.spinControl >= 10 && spinPhase == 2 ) ; set spinSpeedY to spinSpeedMIDY ; set spinSpeedZ to spinSpeedMIDZ ; set spinPhase to 3 ; ; ELSEIF ( DLC05BridgeLD.spinControl >= 15 && spinPhase == 3 ) ; set spinSpeedY to spinSpeedFASTY ; set spinSpeedZ to spinSpeedFASTZ ; set spinPhase to 4 ; ENDIF ; ; ;// slow down at the end ; IF ( DLC05BridgeLD.spinControl >= 85 && spinPhase == 4 ) ; set spinSpeedY to spinSpeedFASTY ; set spinSpeedZ to spinSpeedFASTZ ; set spinPhase to 5 ; ; ELSEIF ( DLC05BridgeLD.spinControl >= 90 && spinPhase == 5 ) ; set spinSpeedY to spinSpeedMIDY ; set spinSpeedZ to spinSpeedMIDZ ; set spinPhase to 6 ; ; ELSEIF ( DLC05BridgeLD.spinControl >= 95 && spinPhase == 6 ) ; set spinSpeedY to spinSpeedSLOWY ; set spinSpeedZ to spinSpeedSLOWZ ; set spinPhase to 7 ; ENDIF ; ; ELSEIF ( spinBack == 1 ) ; ; ;// speed up at the beginning ; IF ( DLC05BridgeLD.spinControl >= 95 && spinPhase == 7 ) ; set spinSpeedY to spinSpeedSLOWY ; set spinSpeedZ to spinSpeedSLOWZ ; set spinPhase to 6 ; ; ELSEIF ( DLC05BridgeLD.spinControl >= 90 && spinPhase == 6 ) ; set spinSpeedY to spinSpeedMIDY ; set spinSpeedZ to spinSpeedMIDZ ; set spinPhase to 5 ; ; ELSEIF ( DLC05BridgeLD.spinControl >= 85 && spinPhase == 5 ) ; set spinSpeedY to spinSpeedFASTY ; set spinSpeedZ to spinSpeedFASTZ ; set spinPhase to 4 ; ENDIF ; ; ;// slow down at the end ; IF ( DLC05BridgeLD.spinControl >= 15 && spinPhase == 4 ) ; set spinSpeedY to spinSpeedFASTY ; set spinSpeedZ to spinSpeedFASTZ ; set spinPhase to 3 ; ; ELSEIF ( DLC05BridgeLD.spinControl >= 10 && spinPhase == 3 ) ; set spinSpeedY to spinSpeedMIDY ; set spinSpeedZ to spinSpeedMIDZ ; set spinPhase to 2 ; ; ELSEIF ( DLC05BridgeLD.spinControl >= 5 && spinPhase == 2 ) ; set spinSpeedY to spinSpeedSLOWY ; set spinSpeedZ to spinSpeedSLOWZ ; set spinPhase to 1 ; ENDIF ; ; ENDIF
;// determine the spin direction IF ( spinBack == 0 )
;// spin the Y axis set angleY to DLC05BridgeDome1.getAngle y set angleY to ( angleY + spinSpeedY )
;// spin the Z axis set angleZ to DLC05BridgeDome1.getAngle z set angleZ to ( angleZ + spinSpeedZ )
set DLC05BridgeLD.spinControl to ( DLC05BridgeLD.spinControl + getSecondsPassed )
ELSEIF ( spinBack == 1 )
;// spin the Y axis set angleY to DLC05BridgeDome1.getAngle y set angleY to ( angleY - spinSpeedY )
;// spin the Z axis set angleZ to DLC05BridgeDome1.getAngle z set angleZ to ( angleZ - spinSpeedZ )
set DLC05BridgeLD.spinControl to ( DLC05BridgeLD.spinControl - getSecondsPassed )
ENDIF
DLC05BridgeDome1.setangle y, angleY DLC05BridgeDome2.setangle y, angleY DLC05BridgeDome3.setangle y, angleY DLC05BridgeDome4.setangle y, angleY DLC05BridgeDome5.setangle y, angleY DLC05BridgeDome6.setangle y, angleY DLC05BridgeDome7.setangle y, angleY DLC05BridgeDome8.setangle y, angleY
DLC05BridgeDome1.setangle z, angleZ DLC05BridgeDome2.setangle z, angleZ DLC05BridgeDome3.setangle z, angleZ DLC05BridgeDome4.setangle z, angleZ DLC05BridgeDome5.setangle z, angleZ DLC05BridgeDome6.setangle z, angleZ DLC05BridgeDome7.setangle z, angleZ DLC05BridgeDome8.setangle z, angleZ
;///////////////////////////////////////////////////// ;// THE SHIP'S RUMBLE TIMER // ;///////////////////////////////////////////////////// IF ( getStage DLC05BridgeLD == 51 && DLC05BridgeLD.rumbleControl == 1 ) IF ( rumbleInit == 0 ) set rumbleTimer to 60 set rumbleInit to 1 ENDIF
IF ( rumbleTimer > 0 ) set rumbleTimer to rumbleTimer - getSecondsPassed
DLC05EMPPowerDown.placeAtMe DLC05FF01cartShake 1
ELSE set DLC05BridgeLD.rumbleControl to 2 ENDIF ENDIF
;///////////////////////////////////////// ;// ENGINE FLARE IMOD // ;///////////////////////////////////////// IF ( DLC05BridgeLD.flareStepper > 0 )
IF ( DLC05BridgeLD.flareStepper == 1 ) set flareTimer to 27 set DLC05BridgeLD.flareStepper to 2
ELSEIF ( DLC05BridgeLD.flareStepper == 2 )
IF ( flareTimer > 0 ) set flareTimer to flareTimer - getsecondspassed ELSE set DLC05BridgeLD.flareStepper to 3 imod DLC05ZetaBoosterISFX ENDIF
ENDIF ENDIF
;/////////////////////////////////////////// ;// GIVE THE ALIEN HEAD // ;////////////////////////////////////////// IF ( DLC05BridgeLD.alienHoloState >= 1 )
;// idle between the warnings IF ( DLC05BridgeHoloHead.isAnimPlaying right == 0 && DLC05BridgeHoloHead.isAnimPlaying left == 0 && DLC05BridgeHoloHead.isAnimPlaying right == 0 && DLC05BridgeHoloHead.isAnimPlaying reloadA == 0 ) DLC05BridgeHoloHead.playgroup reloadA 0 ENDIF
ENDIF
END

setally playerFaction DLC05RobotPodFaction setenemy DLC05AlienFaction DLC05RobotPodFaction setenemy DLC05RobotFaction DLC05RobotPodFaction

scn DLC05TeleporterDoorScripted01SCRIPT
;!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! OBSOLETE !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
;// the teleport states for user ;// 0 = fresh ;// 1 = In Trigger ;// 2 = Activated ;// 3 = Arrived
short stage short lastStage short startTeleport
;// the person teleporting ref user
;// the teleporter ref telepad
float timer short animCheck
short teleEnabled ref myLink
short Active ref user
Begin OnLoad
if ( DLC05Conversations.cryoReturnTeleEnabled == 0 ) set myLink to GetLinkedRef Playgroup Left 1 endif
End
BEGIN ONACTIVATE
set user to getActionRef
if ( IsActionRef Player == 1 ) if ( teleEnabled == 0 ) ShowMessage DLC05MZ3CoreTeleporterMEssage return else Activate playgroup forward 0 endif else Activate
endif
END
BEGIN ONTRIGGERENTER
;// get the person who entered set user to getActionRef
;// play the light if they're on the pad IF ( user.getAV variable08 == 0 ) user.pms DLC05teleportLightFXShader user.setAV variable08 -1 ENDIF
;// if they're teleporting in IF ( user.getAV variable08 == 2 ) user.setAV variable08 3 set startTeleport to 1 set stage to 3 ENDIF
END
BEGIN ONTRIGGERLEAVE
IF ( user.getAV variable08 != 2 ) user.sms DLC05teleportLightFXShader user.sms DLC05teleportInFXShader user.setAV variable08 0 user.saa 1 ENDIF
END
Begin GameMode
if ( isAnimPlaying Right == 1 ) && ( teleEnabled == 0 ) set teleEnabled to 1 endif
if ( DLC05Conversations.cryoReturnTeleEnabled == 1 ) if ( Active == 0 ) set Active to 1 set teleEnabled to 1 Playgroup Right 1 endif endif
if ( Active == 1 ) if ( IsAnimPlaying Right == 0 ) set Active to 2 Playgroup SpecialIdle 1 endif endif
;////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// ;// THE TELEPORTATION EFFECTS // ;///////////////////////////////////////////////////////// IF ( startTeleport == 1 )
IF ( stage == 0 ) .playgroup forward 1 set animCheck to 1
;// Turn on fx shader out on alien user.pms DLC05teleportOutFXShader user.sms DLC05teleportLightFXShader
;//time to pause before next stage set timer to 1.5
;// Store stage variable while toggled to -1 for timed pause set lastStage to stage set stage to -1
ELSEIF ( stage == 1 )
;// Turn off fx shader user.sms DLC05teleportOutFXShader activate user user.setAV variable08 2
set timer to 3 set lastStage to stage set stage to -1
ENDIF
;////////// ;// Teleport in -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ;//////////
;////////// ;// stage 3 IF ( stage == 3 )
telepad.playgroup backward 1 set animCheck to 1
;// Shader on user.saa 0 user.pms DLC05teleportInFXShader set timer to 1.5 set lastStage to stage set stage to -1 ENDIF
;////////// ;// stage 4 IF ( stage == 4 ) user.pms DLC05teleportLightFXShader user.sms DLC05teleportInFXShader user.saa 0 user.saa 1
set timer to 8 set lastStage to stage set stage to -1 ENDIF ENDIF
;// Timer loop to pause between stages--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- IF ( stage == -1 ) IF ( timer > 0 ) set timer to ( timer - getSecondsPassed )
ELSE ;// Return to stages where you left off or at beginning IF ( lastStage == 1 || lastStage == 4 ) set stage to 0 set startTeleport to 0 ENDIF
set stage to ( lastStage + 1 )
ENDIF ENDIF
;// Loop to restart idle after teleport machine anim plays------------------------------------------------------------------------- IF ( animCheck == 1) IF ( DLC05teleportTestObjectREF.isAnimPlaying forward == 0 && DLC05teleportTestObjectREF.isAnimPlaying backward == 0) .playgroup specialIdle 1 set animCheck to 0 ENDIF ENDIF
END

scn DLC05RobotPodExLabScript ;This controls the linked ref helper bot. ;Should work relatively similar to protectron pod, but with no dialog ; ;forward open, backward closed ;==========================
;This script is the handler for the Robot Pods ;related global DLC05RobotActive (1= A robot is already following the Player)
short Button
ref actionRef ref linkedRef
int init int bOpen int bAnimating
begin OnLoad if init == 0 set init to 1 ; playgroup forward 1 set bOpen to 0 set linkedRef to GetLinkedRef linkedRef.Setunconscious 1 endif end
begin onActivate if bOpen == 0 set bOpen to 1 playgroup forward 1 set bAnimating to 1 endif end
begin gameMode
if bAnimating == 1 if (isAnimPlaying Forward == 0) && (isAnimPlaying Backward == 0) set bAnimating to 0 if bOpen == 1 if linkedRef.getDead == 0 linkedRef.Setunconscious 0 endif endif endif endif
end

scn DLC05crusherSCRIPT ;======================================================================; ; basic script to make this thing smashy. ; you know I always say these things will be "simple" and that's like a guarantee it's going to get complicated. ;======================================================================; short powerOn short init short active short activeSetup short playerHit ref actronaut float timer float rand float max ; max interval between smashes float min ; min interval between smashes ;======================================================================; BEGIN onActivate
if powerOn == 0 set powerOn to 1 ; turn me ON set active to 1 else set powerOn to 0 ; turn me OFF set active to 0 set timer to 0 endif
END ;======================================================================; BEGIN gameMode
if init == 0 set powerOn to 1 set active to 1 set min to 0.25 set max to 2 set init to 1 endif
if powerOn == 1 if active == 1 if activeSetup == 0 playgroup forward 0 ; animate down to smash set activeSetup to 1 endif
if isAnimPlaying forward == 0 ; set up timer to control how long until we reset. set rand to getRandomPercent set rand to (min + GetRandomPercent * (max - min) / 99) set timer to rand ; reset flags set active to 0 set playerHit to 0 set activeSetup to 0 endif elseif active == 0 if timer > 0 set timer to (timer - getSecondsPassed) else set active to 1 endif endif endif
END ;======================================================================; BEGIN onTriggerEnter ; using onTrigger to deliver damage
set actronaut to getActionRef
if actronaut == player if playerHit == 0 player.say Hit placeatme FakeForceBall250 imod GetHit player.DamageAV health 45 set playerHit to 1 ; player can only get hit once per activation if player.getDead == 1 player.killactor player 0 ; pop off limbs, I don't care who or what you are. player.killactor player 1 player.killactor player 2 player.killactor player 3 player.killactor player 4 player.killactor player 5 player.killactor player 6 player.killactor player 7 player.killactor player 8 player.killactor player 9 player.killactor player 10 player.killactor player 11 player.killactor player 12 player.killactor player 13 player.killactor player 14 endif endif else actronaut.do 45 ; in case not an actor. Let this damage grenades, etc. actronaut.killactor player 0 ; pop off limbs, I don't care who or what you are. actronaut.killactor player 1 actronaut.killactor player 2 actronaut.killactor player 3 actronaut.killactor player 4 actronaut.killactor player 5 actronaut.killactor player 6 actronaut.killactor player 7 actronaut.killactor player 8 actronaut.killactor player 9 actronaut.killactor player 10 actronaut.killactor player 11 actronaut.killactor player 12 actronaut.killactor player 13 actronaut.killactor player 14 placeatme FakeForceBall250 endif
END ;======================================================================; ;======================================================================;

scn DLC05crusherSCRIPTalternate ;======================================================================; ; basic script to make this thing smashy. ; you know I always say these things will be "simple" and that's like a guarantee it's going to get complicated. ; ALTERNATE - this is a dumb copy with no variation in timing. ;======================================================================; short powerOn short init short active short activeSetup short playerHit ref actronaut float timer float rand float max ; max interval between smashes float min ; min interval between smashes ;======================================================================; BEGIN onActivate
if powerOn == 0 set powerOn to 1 ; turn me ON set active to 1 else set powerOn to 0 ; turn me OFF set active to 0 set timer to 0 endif
END ;======================================================================; BEGIN gameMode
if init == 0 set powerOn to 1 set active to 1 set min to 0.5 set max to 0.5 set init to 1 endif
if powerOn == 1 if active == 1 if activeSetup == 0 playgroup forward 0 ; animate down to smash set activeSetup to 1 endif
if isAnimPlaying forward == 0 ; set up timer to control how long until we reset. set rand to getRandomPercent set rand to (min + GetRandomPercent * (max - min) / 99) set timer to rand ; reset flags set active to 0 set playerHit to 0 set activeSetup to 0 endif elseif active == 0 if timer > 0 set timer to (timer - getSecondsPassed) else set active to 1 endif endif endif
END ;======================================================================; BEGIN onTriggerEnter ; using onTrigger to deliver damage
set actronaut to getActionRef
if actronaut == player if playerHit == 0 player.say Hit placeatme FakeForceBall250 imod GetHit player.DamageAV health 45 set playerHit to 1 ; player can only get hit once per activation if player.getDead == 1 player.killactor player 0 ; pop off limbs, I don't care who or what you are. player.killactor player 1 player.killactor player 2 player.killactor player 3 player.killactor player 4 player.killactor player 5 player.killactor player 6 player.killactor player 7 player.killactor player 8 player.killactor player 9 player.killactor player 10 player.killactor player 11 player.killactor player 12 player.killactor player 13 player.killactor player 14 endif endif else actronaut.do 45 ; in case not an actor. Let this damage grenades, etc. actronaut.killactor player 0 ; pop off limbs, I don't care who or what you are. actronaut.killactor player 1 actronaut.killactor player 2 actronaut.killactor player 3 actronaut.killactor player 4 actronaut.killactor player 5 actronaut.killactor player 6 actronaut.killactor player 7 actronaut.killactor player 8 actronaut.killactor player 9 actronaut.killactor player 10 actronaut.killactor player 11 actronaut.killactor player 12 actronaut.killactor player 13 actronaut.killactor player 14 placeatme FakeForceBall250 endif
END ;======================================================================; ;======================================================================;

ref user

End

ScriptName DLC05HomingBeaconScript
Short DoOnce
float timer
Begin OnActivate
if ( IsActionRef Player == 1 ) Set DLC05Post.DLC05PQTeleport to 1 DisablePlayerControls
if ( JerichoRef.HasBeenHired == 1 ) set JerichoRef.Waiting to 1 set Followers.FollowerWaitingLeaveDay to ( GameDaysPassed + FollowerWaitTime ) endif if ( CharonRef.HasBeenHired == 1 ) set CharonRef.Waiting to 1 set Followers.FollowerWaitingLeaveDay to ( GameDaysPassed + FollowerWaitTime ) endif if ( DogmeatRef.HasBeenHired == 1 ) set DogmeatRef.Waiting to 1 set Followers.FollowerWaitingLeaveDay to ( GameDaysPassed + FollowerWaitTime ) endif if ( ButchRef.HasBeenHired == 1 ) set ButchRef.Waiting to 1 set Followers.FollowerWaitingLeaveDay to ( GameDaysPassed + FollowerWaitTime ) endif if ( CloverRef.HasBeenHired == 1 ) set CloverRef.Waiting to 1 set Followers.FollowerWaitingLeaveDay to ( GameDaysPassed + FollowerWaitTime ) endif if ( RL3Ref.HasBeenHired == 1 ) set RL3Ref.Waiting to 1 set Followers.FollowerWaitingLeaveDay to ( GameDaysPassed + FollowerWaitTime ) endif if ( MQ08FawkesRef.HasBeenHired == 1 ) set MQ08FawkesRef.Waiting to 1 set Followers.FollowerWaitingLeaveDay to ( GameDaysPassed + FollowerWaitTime ) endif if ( StarPaladinCrossRef.HasBeenHired == 1 ) set StarPaladinCrossRef.Waiting to 1 set Followers.FollowerWaitingLeaveDay to ( GameDaysPassed + FollowerWaitTime ) endif
set timer to 3 else ;do nothing endif
End
Begin GameMode
if ( DLC05Post.DLC05PQTeleport == 1 ) DLC05TeleporterWastelandToShip.Playgroup Forward 1 if ( DoOnce == 0 ) set DoOnce to 1 endif set DLC05Post.DLC05PQTeleport to 2 elseif ( DLC05Post.DLC05PQTeleport == 2 ) if ( timer <= 0 ) set DLC05Post.DLC05PQTeleport to 3 if ( RadioGalaxyNewsRef01.GetDisabled == 0 ) RadioGalaxyNewsRef01.Disable endif if ( RadioGalaxyNewsRef02.GetDisabled == 0 ) RadioGalaxyNewsRef02.Disable endif if ( MS16Vault101ExternalRadioREF.GetDisabled == 0 ) set DLC05Post.DLC05PQMS16Check to 1 MS16Vault101ExternalRadioREF.Disable endif RadioEnclaveRef.Disable if ( MS17RadioRef.GetDisabled == 0 ) MS17RadioRef.Disable endif
PipBoyRadioOff
IMOD DLC05TeleportInISFX DLC05TeleporterWastelandToShip.Activate Player else set timer to ( timer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif endif
if ( DoOnce == 1 ) if ( IsAnimPlaying Forward == 0 ) if ( IsAnimPlaying SpecialIdle == 0 ) PlayGroup SpecialIdle 1 endif endif endif
End

scn DLC05WasteTeleporterDoorSCRIPT
;// the teleport states for user ;// 0 = fresh ;// 1 = In Trigger ;// 2 = Activated ;// 3 = Arrived
short stage short lastStage short startTeleport
;// the person teleporting ref user
;// the teleporter ref telepad
float timer short animCheck
short Active
Begin OnLoad
if ( Active == 0 ) Playgroup Left 1 endif
End
BEGIN ONACTIVATE
set user to getActionRef
if ( IsActionRef Player == 1 ) if ( Active < 3 ) ShowMessage DLC05MZ3CoreTeleporterMEssage return else
Activate playgroup forward 0 endif else Activate
endif
END
BEGIN ONTRIGGERENTER
;// get the person who entered set user to getActionRef
;// play the light if they're on the pad IF ( user.getAV variable08 == 0 ) user.pms DLC05teleportLightFXShader user.setAV variable08 -1 ENDIF
;// if they're teleporting in IF ( user.getAV variable08 == 2 ) user.setAV variable08 3 set startTeleport to 1 set stage to 3 ENDIF
END
BEGIN ONTRIGGERLEAVE
IF ( user.getAV variable08 != 2 ) user.sms DLC05teleportLightFXShader user.sms DLC05teleportInFXShader user.setAV variable08 0 user.saa 1 ENDIF
END
Begin GameMode
if ( Active == 1 ) set Active to 2 Playgroup Right 1
elseif ( Active == 2 ) if ( IsAnimPlaying Right == 0 ) set Active to 3 Playgroup SpecialIdle 1 endif endif
IF ( startTeleport == 1 )
IF ( stage == 0 ) .playgroup forward 1 set animCheck to 1
;// Turn on fx shader out on alien user.pms DLC05teleportOutFXShader user.sms DLC05teleportLightFXShader
;//time to pause before next stage set timer to 1.5
;// Store stage variable while toggled to -1 for timed pause set lastStage to stage set stage to -1
ELSEIF ( stage == 1 )
;// Turn off fx shader user.sms DLC05teleportOutFXShader activate user user.setAV variable08 2
set timer to 3 set lastStage to stage set stage to -1
ENDIF
;////////// ;// Teleport in -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ;//////////
;////////// ;// stage 3 IF ( stage == 3 )
telepad.playgroup backward 1 set animCheck to 1
;// Shader on user.saa 0 user.pms DLC05teleportInFXShader set timer to 1.5 set lastStage to stage set stage to -1 ENDIF
;////////// ;// stage 4 IF ( stage == 4 ) user.pms DLC05teleportLightFXShader user.sms DLC05teleportInFXShader user.saa 0 user.saa 1
set timer to 8 set lastStage to stage set stage to -1 ENDIF ENDIF
;// Timer loop to pause between stages--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- IF ( stage == -1 ) IF ( timer > 0 ) set timer to ( timer - getSecondsPassed )
ELSE ;// Return to stages where you left off or at beginning IF ( lastStage == 1 || lastStage == 4 ) set stage to 0 set startTeleport to 0 ENDIF
set stage to ( lastStage + 1 )
ENDIF ENDIF
;// Loop to restart idle after teleport machine anim plays------------------------------------------------------------------------- IF ( animCheck == 1) IF ( DLC05teleportTestObjectREF.isAnimPlaying forward == 0 && DLC05teleportTestObjectREF.isAnimPlaying backward == 0) .playgroup specialIdle 1 set animCheck to 0 ENDIF ENDIF
END

ENDIF

ENDIF

set timer to 8 set lastStage to stage set stage to -1 ENDIF ENDIF
;// Timer loop to pause between stages--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- IF ( stage == -1 ) IF ( timer > 0 ) set timer to ( timer - getSecondsPassed )
ELSE ;// Return to stages where you left off or at beginning IF ( lastStage == 1 || lastStage == 4 ) set stage to 0 set startTeleport to 0 ENDIF
set stage to ( lastStage + 1 )
ENDIF ENDIF
;// Loop to restart idle after teleport machine anim plays------------------------------------------------------------------------- IF ( animCheck == 1) IF ( DLC05teleportTestObjectREF.isAnimPlaying forward == 0 && DLC05teleportTestObjectREF.isAnimPlaying backward == 0) .playgroup specialIdle 1 set animCheck to 0 ENDIF ENDIF
END

scn DLC05TriggerExLabGalleryControlSCRIPT ; ;this handles the spawning cycle. ;needToSpawn makes sure that this isn't processing at the same time as a quest stage ; ;================
begin onActivate setstage dlc05ExLab 1 end
begin gameMode
if DLC05ExLab.active == 1 ;&& (getStageDone DLC05ExLab 10 == 0) ;this needs to be set to active before the spawn will run if DLC05ExLab.targetIndex >= 15 setstage DLC05ExLab 10 endif if DLC05ExLab.needToSpawn == 1 if DLC05ExLab.spawnTime <= 0 set DLC05ExLab.needToSpawn to 0 setstage DLC05ExLab 2 ;spawn else set DLC05ExLab.spawnTime to DLC05ExLab.spawnTime - getSecondsPassed endif endif endif
end

scn DLC05TelepadActivatorExLabSCRIPT
int init int state ref linkedRef float spawnTimer ref spellRef
begin OnLoad
if init == 0 set linkedRef to getLinkedRef playgroup left 1 set init to 1 set spawntimer to 1.2 endif
end
begin onActivate
if isActionRef player showmessage DLC05MZ3CoreTeleporterMessage else if state == 0 set state to 1 endif endif end
begin gameMode
if state == 1 playgroup right 1 set state to 2 endif
if state == 2 if isAnimPlaying right == 0 playgroup forward 1 set state to 3 endif endif
if state == 3 if spawnTimer > 0 set spawntimer to spawnTimer - getSecondsPassed else if getRandomPercent > 20 set spellRef to linkedref.placeLeveledActorAtMe DLC05ExLabWaveSpawn DLC05HQ.spawnDiff else set spellRef to linkedref.placeLeveledActorAtMe DLC05ExLabWaveSpawnCreature DLC05HQ.spawnDiff endif spellRef.addspell DLC05TeleportSpell set DLC05ExLab.TargetIndex to DLC05ExLab.TargetIndex + 1 set state to 4 endif endif
if state == 4 if isAnimPlaying forward == 0 playgroup left 1 set state to 0 endif endif
end
