scn DLC05schematicsWorkbenchScript
;workbench to create customized weapons ; 1. Which schematics does the player have? Display as buttons. ; 2. If has items needed to create, do it; otherwise display "error" message
short HasItems short Button
short item1 short item2 short item3 short item4
float weaponCondition ; calculate what condition the weapon is at when created
; how many of these weapons has the player made? ;short countBottlecap ;short countDartGun ;short countDeathclaw ;short countNuka ;short countRailway ;short countRockit ;short countShishkebab
ref link
BEGIN ONLOAD set link to getLinkedRef
END
Begin OnActivate ; if ( IsActionRef player == 1 || IsActionRef link == 1 ) ; display message box of possible weapons set HasItems to 0
if GetHasNote SchematicsBottlecapMineNote == 1 || GetHasNote SchematicsDartGunNote == 1 || GetHasNote SchematicsDeathclawGauntletNote == 1 set HasItems to 1 endif if GetHasNote SchematicsNukaCocktailNote == 1 || GetHasNote SchematicsRailwayRifleNote == 1 || GetHasNote SchematicsRockitLauncherNote == 1 || GetHasNote SchematicsShishkebabNote == 1 set HasItems to 1 endif if GetHasNote SchematicsBottlecapMineNote10 == 1 || GetHasNote SchematicsDartGunNote10 == 1 || GetHasNote SchematicsDeathclawGauntletNote10 == 1 set HasItems to 1 endif if GetHasNote SchematicsNukaCocktailNote10 == 1 || GetHasNote SchematicsRailwayRifleNote10 == 1 || GetHasNote SchematicsRockitLauncherNote10 == 1 || GetHasNote SchematicsShishkebabNote10 == 1 set HasItems to 1 endif if GetHasNote SchematicsBottlecapMineNote20 == 1 || GetHasNote SchematicsDartGunNote20 == 1 || GetHasNote SchematicsDeathclawGauntletNote20 == 1 || GetHasNote SchematicsRockitLauncherNote30 == 1 set HasItems to 1 endif if GetHasNote SchematicsNukaCocktailNote20 == 1 || GetHasNote SchematicsRailwayRifleNote20 == 1 || GetHasNote SchematicsRockitLauncherNote20 == 1 || GetHasNote SchematicsShishkebabNote20 == 1 set HasItems to 1 endif
if HasItems == 1 ShowMessage SchematicsWorkbenchMsg else ShowMessage SchematicsWorkbenchNoneMsg endif ; endif
End
Begin GameMode
set Button to GetButtonPressed
if ( Button >0 ) ; base condition is just repair skill set weaponCondition to (player.getav Repair)/100
if button == 1 ; bottlecap mine ; 1. check for schematics if GetHasNote SchematicsBottlecapMineNote == 0 && GetHasNote SchematicsBottlecapMineNote10 == 0 && GetHasNote SchematicsBottlecapMineNote20 == 0 ShowMessage SchematicsWorkbenchFailureGenericMsg else ; 2. check for components if ( player.GetItemCount LunchBox > 0 ) && ( player.GetItemCount CherryBomb > 0 ) && ( player.GetItemCount SensorModule > 0 ) && ( player.GetItemCount Caps001 >= 10 ) ; 3. make it ShowMessage SchematicsWorkbenchSuccessBottlecapMsg player.RemoveItem LunchBox 1 1 player.RemoveItem CherryBomb 1 1 player.RemoveItem SensorModule 1 1 player.RemoveItem Caps001 10 1 ; Mines and Grenades are always 100% if player.gethasNote SchematicsBottlecapMineNote player.AddItemHealthPercent WeapMineBottlecap 1 100 elseif player.gethasNote SchematicsBottlecapMineNote10 player.AddItemHealthPercent WeapMineBottlecap 2 100 elseif player.gethasNote SchematicsBottlecapMineNote20 player.AddItemHealthPercent WeapMineBottlecap 3 100 endif PlaySound UIRepairWeapon ; increment count ModPCMiscStat "Weapons Created" 1 set countBottlecap to countBottlecap + 1
;If the player has made one of each item, add Achievement 40 if countWeapAchievement == 0 if countBottlecap >= 1 && countDartgun >= 1 && countDeathclaw >= 1 && countNuka >= 1 && countRailway >= 1 && countRockit >= 1 && countShishkebab >= 1 addachievement 40 set countWeapAchievement to 1 endif endif
else ; 4. failure message set item1 to player.GetItemCount LunchBox set item2 to player.GetItemCount CherryBomb set item3 to player.GetItemCount SensorModule set item4 to player.GetItemCount Caps001
ShowMessage SchematicsWorkbenchFailureBottlecapMsg, item1, item2, item3, item4 ShowMessage SchematicsWorkbenchMsg endif endif elseif button == 2 ; dart gun ; 1. check for schematics if GetHasNote SchematicsDartGunNote == 0 && GetHasNote SchematicsDartGunNote10 == 0 && GetHasNote SchematicsDartGunNote20 == 0 ShowMessage SchematicsWorkbenchFailureGenericMsg else ;2. check for components if ( player.GetItemCount PaintGun > 0 ) && ( player.GetItemCount RadscorpionPoisonGland > 0 ) && ( player.GetItemCount ToyCar > 0 ) && ( player.GetItemCount SurgicalTubing > 0 ) ;3. make it ;message "Dart Gun created." ShowMessage SchematicsWorkbenchSuccessDartGunMsg player.RemoveItem PaintGun 1 1 player.RemoveItem RadscorpionPoisonGland 1 1 player.RemoveItem ToyCar 1 1 player.RemoveItem SurgicalTubing 1 1 ; calculate condition set weaponCondition to (weaponCondition * countDartGunBonus) if weaponCondition > 100 set weaponCondition to 100 endif player.AddItemHealthPercent WeapDartGun 1 weaponCondition PlaySound UIRepairWeapon ; increment count ModPCMiscStat "Weapons Created" 1 set countDartgun to countDartgun + 1
;If the player has made one of each item, add Achievement 40 if countWeapAchievement == 0 if countBottlecap >= 1 && countDartgun >= 1 && countDeathclaw >= 1 && countNuka >= 1 && countRailway >= 1 && countRockit >= 1 && countShishkebab >= 1 addachievement 40 set countWeapAchievement to 1 endif endif
else ;failure message set item1 to player.GetItemCount PaintGun set item2 to player.GetItemCount RadscorpionPoisonGland set item3 to player.GetItemCount ToyCar set item4 to player.GetItemCount SurgicalTubing ShowMessage SchematicsWorkbenchFailureDartGunMsg, item1, item2, item3, item4 ShowMessage SchematicsWorkbenchMsg endif endif elseif button == 3 ; deathclaw gauntlet ; 1. check for schematics if GetHasNote SchematicsDeathclawGauntletNote == 0 && GetHasNote SchematicsDeathclawGauntletNote10 == 0 && GetHasNote SchematicsDeathclawGauntletNote20 == 0 ShowMessage SchematicsWorkbenchFailureGenericMsg else ; 2. check for components if ( player.GetItemCount WonderGlue > 0 ) && ( player.GetItemCount DeathclawHand > 0 ) && ( player.GetItemCount LeatherBelt > 0 ) && ( player.GetItemCount MedicalBrace > 0 ) ; 3. make it ;message "Deathclaw Gauntlet created." ShowMessage SchematicsWorkbenchSuccessDeathclawMsg player.RemoveItem WonderGlue 1 1 player.RemoveItem DeathclawHand 1 1 player.RemoveItem LeatherBelt 1 1 player.RemoveItem MedicalBrace 1 1 ; calculate condition set weaponCondition to (weaponCondition * countDeathclawBonus) if weaponCondition > 100 set weaponCondition to 100 endif player.AddItemHealthPercent WeapDeathclawGauntlet 1 weaponCondition PlaySound UIRepairWeapon ; increment count ModPCMiscStat "Weapons Created" 1 set countDeathclaw to countDeathclaw + 1
;If the player has made one of each item, add Achievement 40 if countWeapAchievement == 0 if countBottlecap >= 1 && countDartgun >= 1 && countDeathclaw >= 1 && countNuka >= 1 && countRailway >= 1 && countRockit >= 1 && countShishkebab >= 1 addachievement 40 set countWeapAchievement to 1 endif endif
else ; 4. failure message set item1 to player.GetItemCount WonderGlue set item2 to player.GetItemCount DeathclawHand set item3 to player.GetItemCount LeatherBelt set item4 to player.GetItemCount MedicalBrace
ShowMessage SchematicsWorkbenchFailureDeathclawMsg, item1, item2, item3, item4 ShowMessage SchematicsWorkbenchMsg endif endif elseif button == 4 ; nuka grenade ; 1. check for schematics if GetHasNote SchematicsNukaCocktailNote == 0 && GetHasNote SchematicsNukaCocktailNote10 == 0 && GetHasNote SchematicsNukaCocktailNote20 == 0 ShowMessage SchematicsWorkbenchFailureGenericMsg else ; 2. check for components if ( player.GetItemCount MS05NukaColaQtm > 0 ) && ( player.GetItemCount TinCan01 > 0 ) && ( player.GetItemCount Turpentine > 0 ) && ( player.GetItemCount AbraxoCleaner > 0 ) ; 3. make it ;message "Nuka Cocktail created." ShowMessage SchematicsWorkbenchSuccessNukaCocktailMsg player.RemoveItem MS05NukaColaQtm 1 1 player.RemoveItem TinCan01 1 1 player.RemoveItem Turpentine 1 1 player.RemoveItem AbraxoCleaner 1 1 ; Mines and Grenades are always 100% if player.gethasNote SchematicsNukaCocktailNote player.AddItemHealthPercent WeapNukaCocktail 1 100 elseif player.gethasNote SchematicsNukaCocktailNote10 player.AddItemHealthPercent WeapNukaCocktail 2 100 elseif player.gethasNote SchematicsNukaCocktailNote20 player.AddItemHealthPercent WeapNukaCocktail 3 100 endif PlaySound UIRepairWeapon ; increment count ModPCMiscStat "Weapons Created" 1 set countNuka to countNuka + 1
;If the player has made one of each item, add Achievement 40 if countWeapAchievement == 0 if countBottlecap >= 1 && countDartgun >= 1 && countDeathclaw >= 1 && countNuka >= 1 && countRailway >= 1 && countRockit >= 1 && countShishkebab >= 1 addachievement 40 set countWeapAchievement to 1 endif endif
else ; 4. failure message set item1 to player.GetItemCount MS05NukaColaQtm set item2 to player.GetItemCount TinCan01 set item3 to player.GetItemCount Turpentine set item4 to player.GetItemCount AbraxoCleaner
ShowMessage SchematicsWorkbenchFailureNukaCocktailMsg, item1, item2, item3, item4 ShowMessage SchematicsWorkbenchMsg endif endif elseif button == 5 ; railway rifle ; 1. check for schematics if GetHasNote SchematicsRailwayRifleNote == 0 && GetHasNote SchematicsRailwayRifleNote10 == 0 && GetHasNote SchematicsRailwayRifleNote20 == 0 ShowMessage SchematicsWorkbenchFailureGenericMsg else ; 2. check for components if ( player.GetItemCount Crutch > 0 ) && ( player.GetItemCount SteamGaugeAssembly > 0 ) && ( player.GetItemCount FissionBattery > 0 ) && ( player.GetItemCount PressureCooker > 0 ) ; 3. make it ;message "Railway Rifle created." ShowMessage SchematicsWorkbenchSuccessRailwayRifleMsg player.RemoveItem Crutch 1 1 player.RemoveItem SteamGaugeAssembly 1 1 player.RemoveItem FissionBattery 1 1 player.RemoveItem PressureCooker 1 1 ; calculate condition set weaponCondition to (weaponCondition * countRailwayBonus) if weaponCondition > 100 set weaponCondition to 100 endif player.AddItemHealthPercent WeapRailwayRifle 1 weaponCondition PlaySound UIRepairWeapon ; increment count ModPCMiscStat "Weapons Created" 1 set countRailway to countRailway + 1
;If the player has made one of each item, add Achievement 40 if countWeapAchievement == 0 if countBottlecap >= 1 && countDartgun >= 1 && countDeathclaw >= 1 && countNuka >= 1 && countRailway >= 1 && countRockit >= 1 && countShishkebab >= 1 addachievement 40 set countWeapAchievement to 1 endif endif
else ; 4. failure message set item1 to player.GetItemCount Crutch set item2 to player.GetItemCount SteamGaugeAssembly set item3 to player.GetItemCount FissionBattery set item4 to player.GetItemCount PressureCooker
ShowMessage SchematicsWorkbenchFailureRailwayRifleMsg, item1, item2, item3, item4 ShowMessage SchematicsWorkbenchMsg endif endif elseif button == 6 ; rock-it launcher ; 1. check for schematics if GetHasNote SchematicsRockItLauncherNote == 0 && GetHasNote SchematicsRockItLauncherNote10 == 0 && GetHasNote SchematicsRockItLauncherNote20 == 0 && GetHasNote SchematicsRockItLauncherNote30 == 0 ShowMessage SchematicsWorkbenchFailureGenericMsg else ; 2. check for components if ( player.GetItemCount VacuumCleaner > 0 ) && ( player.GetItemCount LeafBlower > 0 ) && ( player.GetItemCount FirehoseNozzle > 0 ) && ( player.GetItemCount Conductor > 0 ) ; 3. make it ;message "Rock-It Launcher created." ShowMessage SchematicsWorkbenchSuccessRockItMsg player.RemoveItem VacuumCleaner 1 1 player.RemoveItem LeafBlower 1 1 player.RemoveItem FirehoseNozzle 1 1 player.RemoveItem Conductor 1 1 ; calculate condition set weaponCondition to (weaponCondition * countRockitBonus ) if weaponCondition > 100 set weaponCondition to 100 endif player.AddItemHealthPercent WeapRockItLauncher 1 weaponCondition PlaySound UIRepairWeapon ; increment count ModPCMiscStat "Weapons Created" 1 set countRockit to countRockit + 1
;If the player has made one of each item, add Achievement 40 if countWeapAchievement == 0 if countBottlecap >= 1 && countDartgun >= 1 && countDeathclaw >= 1 && countNuka >= 1 && countRailway >= 1 && countRockit >= 1 && countShishkebab >= 1 addachievement 40 set countWeapAchievement to 1 endif endif
else ; 4. failure message set item1 to player.GetItemCount VacuumCleaner set item2 to player.GetItemCount LeafBlower set item3 to player.GetItemCount FirehoseNozzle set item4 to player.GetItemCount Conductor
ShowMessage SchematicsWorkbenchFailureRockItMsg, item1, item2, item3, item4 ShowMessage SchematicsWorkbenchMsg endif endif elseif button == 7 ; Shishkebab ; 1. check for schematics if GetHasNote SchematicsShishkebabNote == 0 && GetHasNote SchematicsShishkebabNote10 == 0 && GetHasNote SchematicsShishkebabNote20 == 0 ShowMessage SchematicsWorkbenchFailureGenericMsg else ; 2. check for components if ( player.GetItemCount MotorcycleGasTank > 0 ) && ( player.GetItemCount PilotLight > 0 ) && ( player.GetItemCount LawnmowerBlade > 0 ) && ( player.GetItemCount MotorcycleHandbrake > 0 ) ; 3. make it ;message "Shishkebab created." ShowMessage SchematicsWorkbenchSuccessShishkebabMsg player.RemoveItem MotorcycleGasTank 1 1 player.RemoveItem PilotLight 1 1 player.RemoveItem LawnmowerBlade 1 1 player.RemoveItem MotorcycleHandBrake 1 1 ; calculate condition set weaponCondition to (weaponCondition * countShishkebabBonus ) if weaponCondition > 100 set weaponCondition to 100 endif player.AddItemHealthPercent WeapShishkebab 1 weaponCondition PlaySound UIRepairWeapon ; increment count ModPCMiscStat "Weapons Created" 1 set countShishkebab to countShishkebab + 1
;If the player has made one of each item, add Achievement 40 if countWeapAchievement == 0 if countBottlecap >= 1 && countDartgun >= 1 && countDeathclaw >= 1 && countNuka >= 1 && countRailway >= 1 && countRockit >= 1 && countShishkebab >= 1 addachievement 40 set countWeapAchievement to 1 endif endif
else ; 4. failure message set item1 to player.GetItemCount MotorcycleGasTank set item2 to player.GetItemCount PilotLight set item3 to player.GetItemCount LawnmowerBlade set item4 to player.GetItemCount MotorcycleHandbrake
ShowMessage SchematicsWorkbenchFailureShishkebabMsg, item1, item2, item3, item4 ShowMessage SchematicsWorkbenchMsg endif endif endif endif
End

scn DLC05TeleporterDoorMasterScript
;NOTE ABOUT BASE OBJECTS ;DLC05TeleporterDoorScripted01 is for doors that need to start ENABLED ;DLC05TeleporterDoorScripted02 is for doors that need to start DISABLED
ref triggerRef ;used by trigger script
ref userRef ;used by activate script
short state ;0 = unsert default ("on") ;1 = on ;-1 = off
short animToPlay ;0 = unset (default SpecialIdle) ;1 = on SpecialIdle (looping) ;2 = actively "teleporting" Forward ;3 = spooling down to off Left ;4 = spooling up to on Right ;-n = actively playing that anim ;-999 done should be looping on SpecialIdle now
;LIGHT & SOUND short lightState ;0= unset, ;1 = light should be on ;-1 light should be off
ref myLightRef ref mySoundRef
;special handling variables short doOnce ;this is not a generic variable, is used by special handling for core scene (see onActivate block) short active ;this is used to turn on the specific door from core to sewers: DLC05hubToSewer01 no one else should use this var
;----------------ACTIVATOR
Begin OnLoad
;LIGHT set myLightRef to placeAtMe DLC05TeleporterLight01 1
;SOUND if mySoundRef == 0 set mySoundRef to placeatme DRSDLC05TeleporterIdleLP 1 mySoundRef.disable endif
;On/Off state if state == 0 if getIsID DLC05TeleporterDoorScripted02 == 1 set state to -1 else set state to 1 endif
endif
End
Begin GameMode
;LIGHT & SOUND if state == 1 if myLightRef.getIsID DLC05TeleporterLight01 == 1 if lightState != 1 myLightRef.playgroup Forward 1 mySoundRef.enable set lightState to 1 endif endif
elseif state == -1 if myLightRef.getIsID DLC05TeleporterLight01 == 1 if lightState != -1 myLightRef.playgroup Backward 1 mySoundRef.disable set lightState to -1 endif endif endif
;ANIMATION SCRIPTING---------------------------------------- if state == -1 ;should be powered down, if not make it so if isAnimPlaying != 0 if isAnimPlaying Left == 0 set animToPlay to 3 endif endif else ;state is on, if nothing is playing, kick it on if isAnimPlaying == 0 ;it's not playing anything if animToPlay == 0 || animToPlay == -999 ;it's not deciding to play something set animToPlay to 4 endif endif endif
;Play the correct animation if animToPlay > 0 if animToPlay == 1 playgroup SpecialIdle 1 elseif animToPlay == 2 playgroup Forward 1 elseif animToPlay == 3 playgroup Left 1 elseif animToPlay == 4 playgroup Right 1 endif set animToPlay to (0 - animToPlay) ;makes it negative endif
;If we are playing a special anim, once it's done, play the normal SpecialIdle if animToPlay == -1 ;do nothing set animToPlay to -999
elseif animToPlay == -2 ;if the anim is done playing, set it to play the specialidele if isAnimPlaying Forward == 0 playgroup SpecialIdle 1 set animToPlay to -999 endif
elseif animToPlay == -3 if IsAnimPlaying Left == 0 set animToPlay to -999 endif
elseif animToPlay == -4 if IsAnimPlaying Right == 0 playgroup SpecialIdle 1 set animToPlay to -999 endif
endif ;/ANIMATION SCRIPTING----------------------------------------
End
Begin OnActivate
set userRef to getActionRef
if userRef != player if userRef.getInSameCell player == 1 ;Do nothing else ;I'm activating a door in different cell from the player, so give me a spell effect in case I show up in the cell with the player it looks like I'm teleporting in userRef.addspell DLC05TeleportSpell endif
set animToPlay to 2 ;play the "actively teleporting" anim
activate userRef
else ;userRef is player
;check to make sure teleporter is active, if not throw a message if state == -1 showmessage DLC05MZ3CoreTeleporterMessage
else ;activate door and play image space mod IMOD DLC05TeleportInISFX set animToPlay to 2
;SPECIAL HANDLING---------------------------------------------------------------------
;door to Maintenance section----------- if getIsReference DLC05hubToSewer01 == 1 setStage DLC05MZ2 2 endif ;/door to Maintenance section-----------
;door to wasteland handling-------------- if getIsReference DLC05TeleporterToWasteland == 1
DLC05SallyRef.EVP DLC05TercorienREF.EVP
if ( JerichoRef.HasBeenHired == 1 ) if JerichoRef.Waiting == 1 set JerichoRef.Waiting to 0 JerichoRef.EVP endif endif if ( CharonRef.HasBeenHired == 1 ) if CharonRef.Waiting == 1 set CharonRef.Waiting to 0 CharonRef.EVP endif endif if ( DogmeatRef.HasBeenHired == 1 ) if DogmeatRef.Waiting == 1 set DogmeatRef.Waiting to 0 DogmeatRef.EVP endif endif if ( ButchRef.HasBeenHired == 1 ) if ButchRef.Waiting == 1 set ButchRef.Waiting to 0 ButchRef.EVP endif endif if ( CloverRef.HasBeenHired == 1 ) if CloverRef.Waiting == 1 set CloverRef.Waiting to 0 CloverRef.EVP endif endif if ( RL3Ref.HasBeenHired == 1 ) if RL3Ref.Waiting == 1 set RL3Ref.Waiting to 0 RL3Ref.EVP endif endif if ( MQ08FawkesRef.HasBeenHired == 1 ) if MQ08FawkesRef.Waiting == 1 set MQ08FawkesRef.Waiting to 0 MQ08FawkesRef.EVP endif endif if ( StarPaladinCrossRef.HasBeenHired == 1 ) if StarPaladinCrossRef.Waiting == 1 set StarPaladinCrossRef.Waiting to 0 StarPaladinCrossRef.EVP endif endif
;check stage in MQ09; if player hasn't left yet, enable radio again ;otherwise check RRDestroy var
if ( GetStage MQ09 < 60 ) RadioEnclaveRef.Enable else if ( MQ09.RRDestroy == 0 ) RadioEnclaveRef.Enable endif endif
;check whether player did MQ02 or not, and enable the proper ref
if ( GNRDishDone == 0 ) RadioGalaxyNewsRef01.Enable elseif ( GNRDishDone == 1 ) RadioGalaxyNewsRef02.Enable endif
;Re-enable Agatha's station if that was running prior to entering the sim
if ( GetStageDone MS17 100 == 1 ) MS17RadioRef.Enable endif
;finally, check if MS16 is running. If so, re-enable radio ref
if ( DLC05MZ1.DLC05MS16Check == 1 ) MS16Vault101ExternalRadioREF.Enable elseif ( DLC05Post.DLC05PQMS16Check == 1 ) MS16Vault101ExternalRadioREF.Enable endif
if ( DLC05Post.DLC05PQPlayerLeft == 0 ) Set DLC05Post.DLC05PQPlayerLeft to 1 if ( DLC05PaulsonRef.GetDisabled == 0 ) if ( DLC05PaulsonRef.GetDead == 0 ) DLC05PaulsonRef.Disable endif endif if ( DLC05SomahRef.GetDisabled == 0 ) if ( DLC05SomahRef.GetDead == 0 ) DLC05SomahRef.Disable endif endif endif
endif ;/door to wasteland handling--------------
;core scene handling-------------------------- if getIsReference DLC05SewertoCoreRef == 1 || DLC05TeleportDoorSewer01toCoreRef == 1
;If the player has found teh sword, or the third generator has been destroyed, disable the samurai if ( DoOnce == 0 ) if ( DLC05Conversations.DLC05SwordFound == 2 ) DLC05SamuraiRef.Disable Set DLC05MZ2.MZ2SamuraiGone to 1 setstage DLC05SamuraiScenes 5 ;handles the sword if player hasn't found it yet Set DoOnce to 1 elseif ( DLC05MZ2.MZ2ThirdGenerator == 1 ) DLC05SamuraiRef.Disable set DLC05MZ2.MZ2SamuraiGone to 1 setstage DLC05SamuraiScenes 5 ;handles the sword if player hasn't found it yet set DoOnce to 1 endif endif
;the first time you go through this door, back into the engine core, and DLC05FF01.coreStage == 1, the core alien scene will start if (DLC05FF01.coreStage == 1) if (DLC05CoreScene.running == 0) setstage DLC05CoreScene 1 endif endif
;the third time you enter the engine core after either destroying a generator or exploring the cell ; two aliens will spawn and attack the survivors. The following script will make sure that they ; spawn on the opposite side of the engine core as the player if (DLC05FF01.CoreStage == 3) ;Player comes from Sewer Bay if (getIsReference DLC05SewertoCoreRef == 1) set DLC05FF01.playerFromSewer to 1 endif endif
endif ;/core scene handling---------------------------
;/SPECIAL HANDLING---------------------------------------------------------------------
activate userRef ;player
endif endif
End
;---------------TRIGGER
Begin OnTriggerEnter set triggerRef to getActionRef
;apply spell effects - player gets a glow, others are assumed to be teleporting if triggerRef == player if state != -1 triggerRef.cios DLC05TeleportGlowSpell endif
elseif state != -1 ;triggerRef is not the player
if triggerRef.isSpellTarget DLC05TeleportSpell ;then do nothing because he already has effects for the "teleporting in"
else ;otherwise, give him "teleporting out" effects triggerRef.cios DLC05TeleportOutSpell
endif
endif End
Begin OnTriggerLeave set triggerRef to getActionRef
;remove spell effects applied when entering if triggerRef == player triggerRef.dispel DLC05TeleportGlowSpell
else triggerRef.dispel DLC05TeleportOutSpell saa 1 endif
End

scn DLC05TeleportOutBaseEffectScript
float shaderTimer float saaTimer
short shaderDone
Begin ScriptEffectStart pms DLC05teleportOutFXShader playsound3D AMBDLC05Dematerialize
set shaderTimer to 2
End
Begin ScriptEffectUpdate
if shaderDone == 0 if shaderTimer > 0 set shaderTimer to shaderTimer - getSecondsPassed else sms DLC05teleportOutFXShader set shaderDone to 1 set saaTimer to 1 endif endif
if shaderDone == 1 if saaTimer > 0 set saaTimer to saaTimer - getSecondsPassed else saa 1 dispel DLC05TeleportOutSpell endif endif
End
Begin ScriptEffectFinish sms DLC05teleportOutFXShader saa 1
End

scn DLC05TeleportInBaseEffectScript
float timer
Begin ScriptEffectStart pms DLC05teleportInFXShader set timer to 10
End
Begin ScriptEffectUpdate
if timer > 0 set timer to timer - getSecondsPassed
else dispel DLC05TeleportInSpell endif
End
Begin ScriptEffectFinish sms DLC05teleportInFXShader saa 1
End

scn DLC05TeleportBaseEffectScript
short shaderOn float shaderTimer
float saaTimer
Begin ScriptEffectStart
saa 0
End
Begin ScriptEffectUpdate
;I'm an ability that was added when I activated a teleport door in cell the player was not ;Therefore if I am ever in the cell with the player, I can assume I've teleported in if shaderOn == 0 if getInSameCell player == 1 if HasLoaded3D == 1 pms DLC05TeleportInFXShader set shaderOn to 1 set shaderTimer to 1.5
saa 1
playsound3D AMBDLC05Materialize
endif endif endif
;Once the shader is on, I should remove this ability which will then remove the shader after a short period of time if shaderOn == 1 if shaderTimer > 0 set shaderTimer to shaderTimer - getSecondsPassed else sms DLC05TeleportInFxShader set shaderOn to -1 set saaTimer to 1
endif endif
if shaderOn == -1 if saaTimer > 0 set saaTimer to saaTimer - getSecondsPassed else saa 1 removespell DLC05TeleportSpell endif endif
End
Begin ScriptEffectFinish
;for safety kill the shader and return the alpha to 1 when the spell ends sms DLC05TeleportInFxShader saa 1
End

scn DLC05TeleportTriggerScript
ref myActionRef
Begin OnTriggerEnter set myActionRef to getActionRef
if myActionRef == player myActionRef.cios DLC05TeleportGlowSpell else
if myActionRef.isSpellTarget DLC05TeleportSpell ;then do nothing because he already has effects for the "teleporting in"
else ;otherwise, give him "teleporting out" effects myActionRef.cios DLC05TeleportOutSpell
endif
endif End
Begin OnTriggerLeave set myActionRef to getActionRef
if myActionRef == player myActionRef.dispel DLC05TeleportGlowSpell
else
myActionRef.dispel DLC05TeleportOutSpell saa 1
endif End

scn DLC05TeleportGlowBaseEffectScript
Begin ScriptEffectStart pms DLC05TeleportLightFxShader
End
Begin ScriptEffectFinish sms DLC05TeleportLightFxShader
End

scn DLC05SteamAlienPatrollersSCRIPT
BEGIN ONTRIGGERENTER
;// if its one of the patrollers, set them as aggressive IF ( isActionRef DLC05SteamQS15A == 1 || isActionRef DLC05SteamQS15B == 1 || isActionRef DLC05SteamQS15C == 1 ) DLC05SteamQS15A.setAV aggression 2 DLC05SteamQS15B.setAV aggression 2 DLC05SteamQS15C.setAV aggression 2
;// do it once disable
ENDIF
END

scn DLC05ExLabSpawnSCRIPT
int bAlienHit int bPlayerHit
begin OnDeath
if bPlayerHit == 1 ;player has hit if bAlienHit == 1 ;hit with alien weapon setstage dlc05ExLab 3 ;pass, increment counter else setstage dlc05ExLab 4 ;fail endif else ;player hasn't touched, don't penalize ; setstage dlc05ExLab 5 ;decrement counter and spawn another guy endif end
begin onHit player set bPlayerHit to 1 end
begin onHitWith DLC05AllAlienWeaponsList set bAlienHit to 1 end

scn DLC05TriggerExLabGalleryEscapeSCRIPT
ref actionRef
begin OnTriggerEnter
set actionRef to getActionRef actionRef.disable setstage DLC05ExLab 4 playsound3d DRSDLC05TeleporterOpen end

ScriptName DLC05AlienRadioBeaconScript
float timer
; intermittently broadcasting radio beacon
begin gamemode if GetDestroyed == 0 if timer > 0 set timer to timer - GetSecondsPassed else DLC05AlienRadioBeaconREF.startRadioConversation ;showWarning "Beginning Play" set timer to 5 endif endif end

scn DLC05RobotFriendMoveTriggerSCRIPT
int init ref bot
begin onLoad if init == 0 set bot to DLC05ExLab.botFollowerRef set init to 1 if bot.getDead == 0 bot.moveto player endif endif end

scn DLC05MZ2NPCTriggerMaintScript
short CheckPaulson short CheckSomah short CheckTercorien
begin OnTriggerEnter
if ( IsActionRef Player == 1 ) if ( DLC05MZ2.MZ2PaulsonFollow == 1 ) set CheckPaulson to 1 elseif ( DLC05MZ2.MZ2TercorienFollow == 1 ) set CheckTercorien to 1 elseif ( DLC05MZ2.MZ2SomahFollow == 1 ) set CheckSomah to 1 endif endif
end
begin Gamemode
if ( CheckSomah == 1 ) if ( DLC05SomahRef.GetInCell DLC05Sewer01 == 1 ) set DLC05MZ2.MZ2SomahFollow to 0 Set DLC05MZ2.MZ2Follow to 0 set DLC05MZ2.MZ2SomahTrigger to 1 DLC05TercorienRef.Evp set CheckSomah to 0 endif elseif ( CheckTercorien == 1 ) if ( DLC05TercorienRef.GetInCell DLC05Sewer01 == 1 ) set DLC05MZ2.MZ2TercorienFollow to 0 Set DLC05MZ2.MZ2Follow to 0 set DLC05MZ2.MZ2TercorienTrigger to 1 DLC05TercorienRef.Evp set CheckTercorien to 0 endif elseif ( CheckPaulson == 1 ) if ( DLC05PaulsonRef.GetInCell DLC05Sewer01 == 1 ) set DLC05MZ2.MZ2PaulsonFollow to 0 Set DLC05MZ2.MZ2Follow to 0 set DLC05MZ2.MZ2PaulsonTrigger to 1 DLC05PaulsonRef.Evp set CheckPaulson to 0 endif endif
end

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Log Entry 4-11-2063
They think we're stupid; that we have no idea what they're up to. But we know. Barbed wire topped fences and security cameras be damned! We'll get the truth to come out if it's the last thing we do! The Conspiracy has to end, and we will be the ones who drag it from the shadows and cast it into the spotlight for all to see. They deny everything. They deny the place even exists! But here we are, faced with armed guards who patrol the dunes and robotic sentries calculating our every move. They're careful, but not careful enough. I've found a loophole, a way in, and I mean to exploit it soon.
ESP.TRADUIT:
登录日志 4-11-2063
他们以为我们是傻瓜；以为我们不知道他们在干什么。 但其实我们知道。带刺的电线栅栏和监控摄像头真他妈该死！把我们逼急了的话，我们要让真相大白于天下。阴谋该结束了，而我们将成为把真相揭露出来大白于天下的人。他们否认一切，他们甚至否认这地方的存在！但是我们就在这里，面对的是在走廊上巡逻的全副武装的卫兵和监视着我们一举一动的机器哨兵。它们确实非常小心翼翼，但仍然不够小心。我已经找到了一个漏洞，一条可以进去的通道，我的意思是我这就要去探索它。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Log Entry 4-15-2063
We've done it! We have it in our hands! The smoking gun... the evidence we need to prove that everything they've told the world is a lie! Now let's try to see them weasel their way out of this one and make petty excuses. The only reason they've been so successful this long is because of the lack of proof on our part. Now that's all over. As soon as the coast is clear, we're bringing this thing to the press. But for now, we need to lay low. No telling how long it'll take before they discover how we did it.
ESP.TRADUIT:
登录日志 4-15-2063
我们做到了！我们把它到手了！ 发烟抢...正是我们需要的用来证明他们对世界说的每一句话都是谎言的证据！现在让我们看看他们为自己开脱而制造漂亮的借口吧。他们长期以来如此成功的原因不外乎是因为我们缺乏支持我们的证据。 现在一切都结束了 。只要时机成熟，我们就把这件事抖给媒体。至于现在，我们需要静观其变。不知道还要多长时间他们就会发现我们是怎么做到的。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Log Entry 4-16-2063
They're closing in! How did they find out? What did we miss? I thought we'd covered our tracks, but there must be something we'd forgotten. The security logs were completely erased, the inventory files were rewritten... that only leaves Doctor Morley! That bastard! He approached us saying he wanted to crack The Conspiracy wide open, and all the while he was playing us like fools! He just wanted to expose us, to bring us out into the open so they could eliminate us! Well, it's not going to work! They'll never find us and they'll never get their hands on the item!
ESP.TRADUIT:
登录日志 4-16-2063
他们正在逼近！他们是怎么发现的？ 我们哪里疏忽了？ 我想我已经掩盖了我们的行踪，一定有地方被我们疏忽了。安全日志已经被完全抹掉了，目录文件也已被改写... 那只有莫雷博士了！那个杂种！他接近我们说他想让密谋败露，他一直把我们当傻瓜一样耍！他只是想让我们暴露，好让他们消灭我们！不过,他们不会得逞的！他们别想找到我们，他们也别想得到那东西！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Log Entry 5-01-2063
Banks is dead. Combs is dead. I'm the only member of Quaere Verum left. I'm not certain how much longer I'll be safe here. I'm placing the item inside a specially constructed safe with a remote lock trigger. It'll take a damn genius hacker to get into this terminal and the safe can withstand anything they throw at it. Tomorrow I take the terminal and the safe, and I'm going to bury it out in the desert where they'll never find it. Hopefully, one day, someone else will discover the item and realize that they hold the key to unlocking the truth. All they need to do is succeed where we have failed. Good luck to us all.
ESP.TRADUIT:
登录日志 5-01-2063
班克斯死了。康姆也死了。 我是唯一幸存的真理探求者成员。我不知道呆在这儿还能安全多久。我把那东西放在了有远程触发机所控制的特别构筑的保险箱里。只有那个天杀的天才黑客才能侵入那个终端机，而保险箱可以承受他们的施予它的任何打击。明天我将带走终端机和保险箱 我将把它埋在一个他们永远也找不到的地方。希望总有一天，其他人能够发现这东西，并意识到他们掌握了开启真相的钥匙。他们要做的就是在我们失败的地方成功，祝我们所有人好运。

ESP.ORIGINAL: MPLX "Novasurge" Prototype Plasma Pistol
ESP.TRADUIT: MPLX新星波动枪

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Project Name: MPLX (Military Plasma Experimental) "Novasurge" Item: Prototype Plasma Pistol Section: A61 Dept. Head: Doctor Aldwin Morley Report Number: 040663-02
The Novasurge has proven to be a tough nut to crack. The output is still very high, causing massive injury to targets, but it's drawing far to much power from its energy cells. We also need to get the weight down on the weapon, as it's a bit heavy for a simple replacement sidearm. The problem still seems to be the coolant coils which are accounting for almost 50% of the weapon's weight. The good news is that the housing for the weapon has been approved, and this is likely the final design. Unfortunately, I need to increase our staff's hours to 7 days a week again so we can have the final prototype ready for testing by the end of the year.
ESP.TRADUIT:
工程项目名称：MPLX（即军用电浆实验）“新星波动”原型电浆手枪 物件：电浆手枪样枪 部门：A61 部门首脑：奥尔德温·莫利博士 报告编号：040663
新星波动计划被证明是一项艰巨的任务，输出仍然很高，产生对目标的巨大破坏力，但它的能量消耗高得惊人。我们也需要减轻该武器的重量，因为它对于一件简单的副武器来说有点笨重。问题仍然出在那个占去整件武器重量百分之五十的冷冻线圈上，好消息是武器的外壳设计终于被通过了，这很可能是最终的定型设计。不幸的是，我又得增加我手下工作人员的工作时间，让他们一周工作七天这样，我才能在年底前使最终型做好测试的准备工作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: GREETING
ESP.TRADUIT: 问好

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess they're already looking for us... I can sneak past them in the vents, but you're too big to fit. We'll have to figure out how to get around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜它们早就在找我们了…我可以从通风口绕过它们，可是你太大了。我们只能想办法躲开它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steamworksld_greeting_00007b95_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set dlc05SteamWorksLD.sallyIgnoreVent to 1
I'll stay here until it's safe, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会留在这里直到安全为止，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steamworksld_greeting_0000ac16_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shh! We don't want them to hear us!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘘！我们不要让它们听见！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steamworksld_greeting_00007b96_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The kid's right... this kind of does look a bit like that TV show.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这孩子是对的…这一切这真有点像在像电视里演的那样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05bridgeld_greeting_000054b0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean, not that I watched it a lot or anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的意思是，我什么也没看到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05bridgeld_greeting_000054b0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, uhh, sorry. What should I do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，呃，抱歉。我该怎么做?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05bridgeld_greeting_000054b0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stella Skyfire reporting for duty! She's Captain Cosmos' second in command, at least for the first few episodes...
ESP.TRADUIT: 史黛拉·天火报告！他是宇宙舰长的副手，至少在前几季里是这样…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05bridgeld_greeting_0000a886_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05SallyRef.playIdle LooseSalute
What do you need?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05bridgeld_greeting_000055cd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05bridgeld_greeting_000055ce_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sir?
ESP.TRADUIT: 长官。 ?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05bridgeld_greeting_000058c4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, that's the last of those turrets.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，这是最后一个炮塔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B003392]DLC05Asm) Robot Assembly Scripting/Staging Support Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05asm_greeting_000039b2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looks like we've got a problem though. The aliens have shut down the teleporters and I can't bring them back up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过看起来我们有了点小麻烦。外星人关闭了传送装置，我不能把它们带回来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B003392]DLC05Asm) Robot Assembly Scripting/Staging Support Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05asm_greeting_000039b2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We may have to look around for another way through.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来我们的想想其他办法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B003392]DLC05Asm) Robot Assembly Scripting/Staging Support Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05asm_greeting_000039b2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, now that things have quieted down, I'll see if there's something up here I can push to stop more of those tin cans showing up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，好了，现在事情已经平息了。我要看看这上面有什么东西，可以拿来抵挡一下那些铁皮罐头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B003392]DLC05Asm) Robot Assembly Scripting/Staging Support Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05asm_greeting_00003713_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe I can turn off some other stuff too. And maybe I'll find a way back down. You keep looking for that generator!
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我可以关闭一些东西。也许我能找到一条回去的路。你继续寻找那个发电机！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B003392]DLC05Asm) Robot Assembly Scripting/Staging Support Quest

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage dlc05asm 15
Feels like someone's twisted my insides into a knot...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我感觉五脏六腑像拧在一起了似的…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Daniels [0B006C6B] (mod) NPC : Private Beckett [0B006C6C] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_greeting_00006c02_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sick to my stomach, but I'll manage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有点不舒服，但是我会控制住的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Daniels [0B006C6B] (mod) NPC : Private Beckett [0B006C6C] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_greeting_00006e59_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It hurts... can't seem to catch my breath.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好疼…好象不能呼吸了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Daniels [0B006C6B] (mod) NPC : Private Beckett [0B006C6C] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_greeting_00006e5a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's keep going. I don't know how long I have.
ESP.TRADUIT: 继续走吧，我不确定我还能坚持多长时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Daniels [0B006C6B] (mod) NPC : Private Beckett [0B006C6C] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_greeting_00006e5b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn it. This... this burns like hell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死。我…烧得象地狱一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Daniels [0B006C6B] (mod) NPC : Private Beckett [0B006C6C] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_greeting_00006e5c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry... I can keep going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要担心…我能坚持走下去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Daniels [0B006C6B] (mod) NPC : Private Beckett [0B006C6C] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_greeting_00006e5d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh man, I wish I had something for the pain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我真希望有点止痛药。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Daniels [0B006C6B] (mod) NPC : Private Beckett [0B006C6C] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_greeting_00006e5e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tatakai no kachimake ha, seme to seme no hazama ni aru.
ESP.TRADUIT: 战斗的胜负，取决于攻击的间隙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toshiro Kago [0B0032FC] (mod) Quest : ([0B007D27]DLC05SamuraiScenes) 0B007D27 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : annoyed his meditation is being interrupted EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesamurai\dlc05samur_greeting_00007e15_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hajimari ni ketsumatu wo mi, ketsumatsu ni hajimari wo miru. Soremade wa dojite wa naran.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由始见末，由末见始。否则不可妄动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toshiro Kago [0B0032FC] (mod) Quest : ([0B007D27]DLC05SamuraiScenes) 0B007D27 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : annoyed his meditation is being interrupted EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesamurai\dlc05samur_greeting_00007e16_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mokuteki naki okonai wa tadano kaze, ketsui aru okonai wa hue no shirabe to naru.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随意施为犹如风过无痕，心存决意方能奏响笛音。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toshiro Kago [0B0032FC] (mod) Quest : ([0B007D27]DLC05SamuraiScenes) 0B007D27 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : in meditation EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesamurai\dlc05samur_greeting_00007e17_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kotoba de wa tamashii wo iyasezu. Chinshi mokko aru nomi.
ESP.TRADUIT: 言语不能治愈灵魂。沉思冥想方可奏效。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toshiro Kago [0B0032FC] (mod) Quest : ([0B007D27]DLC05SamuraiScenes) 0B007D27 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : in meditation EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesamurai\dlc05samur_greeting_00007e18_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shiii!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toshiro Kago [0B0032FC] (mod) Quest : ([0B007D27]DLC05SamuraiScenes) 0B007D27 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : in meditation EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesamurai\dlc05samur_greeting_00007e19_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Holy shit... Look at this place. I get the feeling we're in way over our heads.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的…看这地方。我有种不祥的预感，这事咱们可处理不了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_greeting_000076bd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are we better or worse off than we were before? I honestly can't tell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们比以前好还是比以前更糟？坦白说，我告诉不了你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_greeting_0000aba1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well... at least we're not locked in a cell anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: …至少我们不再被关在囚室里了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_greeting_0000aba2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen, I know how this shit works. We all go together, and we all get wiped out at the same time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听，我知道这该死的东西怎么开动。我们会被赶到一起，一下子都被消灭掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_greeting_0000aba3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No offense, but I'm gonna hang back for a bit. You need someone to keep an eye out behind you anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有冒犯你的意思，不过我得在这殿后。得有人在后面掩护你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_greeting_0000aba3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry, I'll catch up with you soon enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心，我很快就能赶上你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_greeting_0000aba3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you still doing here? Follow the girl and make some progress, or else we're never getting out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还站在那里干嘛？跟着那个女孩，找找法子，不然我们别想从这里出去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_greeting_000076be_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, kid. You're supposed to be heading towards the engine core, or whatever the hell it is. Get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来吧，孩子。你现在应该去那个该死的工程中枢。赶快走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_greeting_000076bf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I already told you, I'll catch up with you. Get outta here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经告诉你了，我能赶上你。快出去！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_greeting_000076c0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're supposed to be heading for the engine core place, right? So get going!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该是前往工程中枢，对不对？所以，继续！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_greeting_000076c1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What're you waiting for? Let the kid out already!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还在等什么？让这孩子出去！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_greeting_0000a8dc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Might as well let the kid out. No sense leaving her stuck in there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不妨让孩子出去。让她留在这里没有任何意义。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_greeting_0000a8dd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, this is it. Pretty neat, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这样。漂亮整洁，是吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_greeting_00007060_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never had the courage to wake them up, but I think you're going to need to. The spaceman has a suit, and we need him to use it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从来就没有勇气去叫醒他们，但我认为你需要去。那个太空人有一套宇航服，我们需要他来使用它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_greeting_00007060_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aw, nuts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，笨蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_greeting_00007061_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They turned it off! Last time I was here, I used this to get to the top of the ship.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们把它关闭了！上次我在这里，我用这个去飞船的顶部。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_greeting_00007061_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's kind of like an elevator, only it doesn't just go up and down. Feels sort of tingly, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就像电梯，只是它不仅仅用来上去和下来。还让人感觉有点刺痛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_greeting_00007061_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They must be pretty angry that we're exploring...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的侦察一定让它们很生气…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_greeting_00007061_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I know! Come on, I know another way up!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我知道了！快点，我知道其他上去的路！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_greeting_00007061_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05MZ1.DLC05MZ1SallyCoreUpdate to 3
Over here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这里！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_greeting_00007062_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, I'll show you what I found. If you want to get out of here, I think it'll help. Come on, follow me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好把，我给你看我的发现。如果你想从这里出去，我想这会有帮助。来吧，跟着我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_greeting_00007063_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set DLC05MZ1.DLC05MZ1SallyCoreUpdate to 2
Come on, we're almost there!
ESP.TRADUIT: 快点，我们快到了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_greeting_00007064_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want to get to the control room, right? Well, then you need to see the engine room first. I know how to get there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想去控制室，对吧？很好，首先你需要先去看看引擎室。我知道怎么到那。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_greeting_000076c2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See? I told you I could help!
ESP.TRADUIT: 看见没？我告诉过你我能帮上忙！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_greeting_00006de3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks! Are you escaping? Do you want to see the rest of this place? I've seen a bunch. I can show you if you want.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢！你在逃跑？你想不想看看这艘船的其他部分？我去过很多地方。想去哪儿，我带你去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_greeting_00003417_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveCompleted DLC05MZ1 40 1
You need my help to get out of here, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要我的帮助来逃出这里，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_greeting_00004e57_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I told you I can help. I'm super good at helping.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我告诉过你我能帮上忙。我是超级好帮手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_greeting_00004e57_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, we've gotta find a way out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我们找条出去的路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_greeting_00006de4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I'm glad we're still alive too, but can we celebrate later? Like, maybe after we actually get out of here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我也很高兴我们都还活着，但能晚点庆祝吗？比如等我们真的逃出去了以后？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_greeting_0000a71b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How about you pay less attention to me, and more to finding a way to get out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还是少关心点我，多想想怎么从这出去吧?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_greeting_0000a71c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Man, what the hell is this place? What do they want with all these people?
ESP.TRADUIT: 伙计，这到底是什么地方？它们想要对这些人干什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_greeting_0000a71d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, come on! We don't have time to waste! Get your shit, and let's get moving!
ESP.TRADUIT: 快点，快点！我们没有时间可以浪费！带上你的破烂，快点出发！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_greeting_00006b10_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Grab anything useful, and let's go. Who knows how long it'll be before they send more after us!
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿走那些有用的，我们走吧。它们马上就会派更多家伙来追杀我们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_greeting_00003e35_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage DLC05MZ1 30
I'm thinking maybe now you can understand it's a good idea to get the hell out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜你也认为离开这鬼地方是个好主意吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay against the wall, and get the hell away from me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 靠墙站着，别他妈惹我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_greeting_0000683d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me guess: you can't find a way out, and so you're ready to go along with my plan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我猜下：你找不到出去的路，所以你准备参加我的计划。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_greeting_00001606_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Am I right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说的对吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_greeting_00001606_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: 'bout time you woke up. I was starting to think maybe they'd fried your brains or something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你终于清醒了，我还以为它们把你的脑袋拿去油炸了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_greeting_000033b2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got a headache, right? Don't worry, that'll get better. I don't know if it'll matter, but it'll get better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你头疼，对吗？别担心，会好转的。我不知它有没有关系，但会好起来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_greeting_000033b2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They must really like you... at least they let me keep my clothes. Looks like they stripped you of everything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们一定对你很感兴趣…至少它们没拿走我的衣服。看上去它们把你扒了个精光。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_greeting_000033b2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: EnablePlayerControls DLC05SomahRef.RemoveScriptPackage DLC05MZ1SomahInitialGreet
Hey, I didn't know you were exploring, too! You don't know where we are, do you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，我不知道你也在这探险呢！你不知道我们在哪儿，对吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B005C70]DLC05FF01) Steerage Rats Comment (NAM2) : she is completely lost EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05ff01_greeting_0000aac5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, let's get out of this place!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好把，让我们从这里出去！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B005C70]DLC05FF01) Steerage Rats EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05ff01_greeting_00007eb8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey! Hey, are you okay? Skinned knee or anything like that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨！嗨，你还好把？擦破膝盖还是怎么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B005C70]DLC05FF01) Steerage Rats EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05ff01_greeting_00007eb9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk later, okay? We should be careful around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 迟点再说，行吗？在这我们还是小心点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B005C70]DLC05FF01) Steerage Rats EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05ff01_greeting_00007eba_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, it's done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恩，搞定了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05post_greeting_0000a750_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not much for talking, so I'll get to it. I owe you. Without you, I'd be dead, or worse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不怎么会说话，但我得说两句。我欠你一个人情。没有你，我早就死了，说不定更糟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05post_greeting_0000a750_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now if you'll excuse me, I'm going to see if I can find a way off this thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在如果你不介意的话，我想看看能不能想个法子搞定它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05post_greeting_0000a750_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05post_greeting_0000aba4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, I thought you should know... Someone must've hit a button during the fight just now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，我想你该知道…在战斗的时候好像有人按了那个按钮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05post_greeting_0000a988_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I understood the display correctly, I think we sort of launched a homing beacon of some kind down to the surface. Landed just outside DC.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我对显示屏上的理解正确的话，我们大概是发射了一个归航信标到地表。就在特区附近。.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05post_greeting_0000a988_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wouldn't mention it, except that I think... Like I said, I'm not sure... I think it's a way to get back to earth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可没说，但我认为…就像我说的，我不知道…我认为这是回到地球的一种方法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05post_greeting_0000a988_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seems like there's a teleporter in the Captain's quarters... I mean, I guess they're your quarters now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好像有一个传送装置在舰长的指挥台那…我的意思是，你现在不就是舰长吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05post_greeting_0000a988_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I guess you can go home if you want. Don't worry, I'll stick around up here and keep an eye on things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我认为，如果你想的话，你可以用那个回家，不用担心，我会在这待一阵子看看有什么新情况。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05post_greeting_0000a988_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage DLC05Post 10 Set DLC05Post.DLC05PQUpdate to -1 DLC05SallyRef.EVP
We did it! We really did it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们做到了！我们真的做到了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05post_greeting_0000a987_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh man, I can't believe it! I never thought we'd make it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我真不敢相信！我从没想过我们会成功。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05post_greeting_0000a987_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're the best. The absolute best. I'd be dead without you, or worse. Thank you so much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最棒了。绝对是最棒的。要不是你，我早就死了，甚至更糟。太谢谢你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05post_greeting_0000a987_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Need something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 需要什么吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05post_greeting_0000a986_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Always good to see you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 见到你很高兴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05post_greeting_0000aba5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see you're still in one piece.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看你还是好好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05post_greeting_0000aba6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, guess what? You can go home!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，猜猜是什么?你能回家了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05post_greeting_0000a989_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was looking at the controls on the bridge here, and most of it doesn't make any sense to me because it's in that weird alien language.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看了下舰桥上的那堆开关，大部分对我来说根本没用，因为上面全是些奇怪的外星语言。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05post_greeting_0000a989_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But there's this one thing I saw, and I think maybe I accidentally pushed a button while we were fighting that big ship.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是有一个按钮，我想在我们跟那艘大船打仗的时候我不小心按了它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05post_greeting_0000a989_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And I think maybe the button I pushed sent some kind of a thing back down to earth. I didn't mean to, honest. But this is a good thing!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为也许我按的按钮发送了某种东西返回到地球上。说实话，我不是有意的。但是，这看上去是一件好事！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05post_greeting_0000a989_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think now you can use the teleporter in the Captain's quarters to get back to earth. Pretty great, isn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想现在你可以使用舰长的传送装置来返回地球。很好，不是吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05post_greeting_0000a989_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, I just thought I should tell you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管如何，我想我应该告诉你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05post_greeting_0000a989_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage DLC05Post 10 Set DLC05Post.DLC05PQUpdate to -1 DLC05TercorienRef.EVP
Yay! We won! I knew we could do it, I knew we could beat them!
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了！我们赢了！我知道我们做的到的，我知道我们能打败它们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05post_greeting_0000abaa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're even better than Captain Cosmos!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你比考斯莫思舰长还厉害！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05post_greeting_0000abaa_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello there, Captain! What can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好，舰长！我能为你做些什么吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05post_greeting_0000aba7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's going on?
ESP.TRADUIT: 发生了什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05post_greeting_0000aba8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi there!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好啊!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05post_greeting_0000aba9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear there's a way off this boat. I'll let you go first, just to make sure it works, and then I'm outta here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听到一个离开这艘船的办法。我会让你先走，确保此方法有效后，我再离开这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05post_greeting_0000abab_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice work, kid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得好，年轻人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05post_greeting_0000a751_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If there's more of them out there, that'll make 'em think twice about attacking us again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果它们还有同伙的话，这下它们绝对不敢轻易惹我们了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05post_greeting_0000a751_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And it looks like you're now in charge of your very own spaceship. Well, what's left of it anyway. Congrats.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来你现在是这艘飞船的头了。当然了，这也没剩下什么。管他呢，恭喜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05post_greeting_0000a751_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can I do for you, Mr. Hot-shot space captain?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能为你做什么？伟大的舰长先生？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05post_greeting_0000abac_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If there's more of them out there, that'll make 'em think twice about attacking us again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果它们还有同伙的话，这下它们绝对不敢轻易惹我们了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05post_greeting_0000abac_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And it looks like you're now in charge of your very own spaceship. Well, what's left of it anyway. Congrats.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来你现在是这艘飞船的头了。当然了，这也没剩下什么。管他呢，恭喜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05post_greeting_0000abac_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jyama wo suru na.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要烦我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toshiro Kago [0B0032FC] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesamurai\dlc05mz2_greeting_00007982_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Onushi wa nanimono? Koko wa doko da?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？这是哪里？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toshiro Kago [0B0032FC] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesamurai\dlc05mz2_greeting_00007981_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sessha no ken! Sessha no ken wa dokoda?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在下的剑！在下的剑在哪里？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toshiro Kago [0B0032FC] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesamurai\dlc05mz2_greeting_00007981_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05MZ2.MZ2SamuraiTalk to 1
Nanto? Nani wo nozonde orunoda. Nani yue, onushi no iu koto ga wakaranu noda?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么？看什么看。老大说的话难道你听不懂吗？真他妈让人生气，老子拿刀砍你信不信。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toshiro Kago [0B0032FC] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesamurai\dlc05mz2_greeting_0000a94b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ken wo ubawarete shimatta, taegataki kutsujoku!
ESP.TRADUIT: 剑被夺去了。难以忍受的耻辱！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toshiro Kago [0B0032FC] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesamurai\dlc05mz2_greeting_0000ab9e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ken wo sugu torimodo saneba naranu!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不快点找回剑不行！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toshiro Kago [0B0032FC] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesamurai\dlc05mz2_greeting_0000ab9e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nani ga okotta noka, kento ga tsukanu.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有剑，用不了剑术。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toshiro Kago [0B0032FC] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesamurai\dlc05mz2_greeting_00007983_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Youjutsu de sessha wo toraeta youkai me. Kono mama de wa okanu zo!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不能放任用妖术抓了在下的妖怪不管！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toshiro Kago [0B0032FC] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesamurai\dlc05mz2_greeting_00007983_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Youkai kara mi wo mamoru niwa, ken ga iru.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从妖怪手中保护自己需要剑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toshiro Kago [0B0032FC] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesamurai\dlc05mz2_greeting_00007984_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hito wo azakeru na. Onushi no monoii wa sappari wakaran.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别耍我，完全不知你说的啥。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toshiro Kago [0B0032FC] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesamurai\dlc05mz2_greeting_00007985_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sessha wo tasuke takuba, sessha no ken wo sagashi dase!
ESP.TRADUIT: 想帮在下就把在下的剑找出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toshiro Kago [0B0032FC] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesamurai\dlc05mz2_greeting_00007985_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Woah, hang on a tick. I don't know anythin' about anythin' in this section, so I'm headin' back to the Engine Core.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇哦，上勾了。我不知道这些，我还是去工程核心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_greeting_0000397a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05MZ2.MZ2PaulsonTrigger to 0
Good work. But don't get cocky.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得好。但不要太自大。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_greeting_00008abc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still one generator to blow up... Figure you should be off doing that instead of hanging around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有一个发电机要去炸毁…你应该去干这件事而不是在这里无所事事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_greeting_00008abd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can pat yourself on the back when you've blown up all the generators, not just one of 'em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等你搞定所有三个发电机的时候再高兴吧，现在才弄完了一个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_greeting_00008abe_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where are they? Where are the little buggers?
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们在哪？那些小臭虫们去哪了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_greeting_00005efe_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well? What do you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 恩？你想要干什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_greeting_0000397b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak your piece.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说说你的意见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_greeting_0000a626_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah? What is it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？什么事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_greeting_0000a627_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, wait. I have no idea how I'm going to be of any help in this part of the ship, so I'm going to stay behind in the Engine Core.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，等等。我也不知道我要如何处理这部分的飞船，所以我打算继续留在工程中枢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_greeting_0000397c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05MZ2.MZ2TercorienTrigger to 0
Now that all three generators are destroyed, you're going to have to take a walk outside. I just hope that old spacesuit is still sealed properly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，所有的三个发电机都被摧毁了，你将到外面走一走。我只希望那旧宇航服封严了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_greeting_00008abf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hurry up taking out the last generator if you can. I don't feel comfortable staying near that giant engine core for much longer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果可以的话赶快干掉最后的发电机。待在那巨大工程中枢时间太长了，我感觉很不舒服。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_greeting_00008ac0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, you're doing great... only two more generators and we can move on. Just hang in there, I know this is rough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，你做的很好…只剩两个发电机，我们就可以继续前进。坚持住，我知道这不容易。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_greeting_00008ac1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's... what's going on? Who are all these people?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是？发生什么事了？它们都是谁？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_greeting_00005eff_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's on your mind?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在想什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_greeting_0000397d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh hey. What's up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨。怎么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_greeting_0000a628_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey there... what did you need?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好…你需要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_greeting_0000a629_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't really think I'm going to be of any use here, so I'm heading back to the Engine Core.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真不觉得我去那能干什么，所以我继续留在工程中枢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_greeting_0000397e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05MZ2.MZ2SomahTrigger to 0
Just do what the girl says... get them out of those things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 按女孩说的做…把这些东西弄出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_greeting_00005f00_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess it's time for your space walk. Lucky you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想现在你该去太空行走了。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars Comment (NAM2) : sarcasm EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_greeting_00008ac2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One more generator and we can get to the top of this ship. Then we can hit the aliens where it really hurts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再搞定一个发电机，我们就可以到飞船的顶部。然后可以把外星人狠狠揍一顿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_greeting_00008ac3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice work taking out that generator. Only two more to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得好。还有二个发电机要去炸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_greeting_00008ac4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hope this is important.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望这很重要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_greeting_000055fe_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you got something you want to say, spit it out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想要什么东西你就说，痛快点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_greeting_0000a62a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah? Something bugging you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 耶？什么事让你心烦？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_greeting_0000a62b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow, you did it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇哦，你做到了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now you're gonna have to go outside of the ship. I know it looks scary, but that's the only way to the top.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在你要从飞船里出去。我发现这看起来很可怕，但是这是唯一一条去顶部的路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh! Make sure you wear a spacesuit before you go out there or you could die! Don't forget!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦！在出飞船前先确保你穿着宇航服，否则你会死！别忘记了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveCompleted DLC05MZ2 60 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed DLC05MZ2 70 1
Yay! Only one more of those generators is all you need to take care of and we can get to the bridge and kick some alien butt!
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了！再干掉一个发电机，我们能赶到舰桥去踢一些外星人的屁股！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars

ESP.ORIGINAL: I knew it! I knew it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白了！我懂了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars

ESP.ORIGINAL: The lights went out for a few seconds and I just KNEW you took out one of those generators. All you have to do is two more and we can leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 灯光熄灭了几秒钟，我就知道你搞定了一个发电机。只要你再搞定二个以上的发电机，我们就可以离开了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here it is! This is the stuff I hid in here. You can have all of it, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那！这是我藏在这里的东西。你可以全带走，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set DLC05MZ2.MZ2SallyStash to -1
