Come on, I'll show you where the stuff is!
ESP.TRADUIT: 来啊，我给你看看我藏了什么东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars

ESP.ORIGINAL: Didja need something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 要点什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatcha want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 想要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hang on, hang on! I can't get the doors unlocked THAT fast. Sheesh!
ESP.TRADUIT: 坚持，坚持！我没法那么快就把门打开。该死 ！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz2_greeting_0000acfa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh no! That poor astronaut! Those freezers are so dangerous... sometimes people don't wake up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，不！那个可怜的宇航员！这些冷冻仓很危险……有时候里面的人就醒不过来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz2_greeting_00003980_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess you'd better take his suit. You're going to have to go if he can't. But first you have to get to the door to the outside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜你最好带上他的衣服。如果他不能，就得你去。但是你必须先到达通向外面的门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz2_greeting_00003980_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They'll be waiting for you, but you can suck out all the air in part of the ship so they won't get in your way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们会等着抓你，但是你可以把飞船部分舱室的空气吸走，这样它们就不能妨碍你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz2_greeting_00003980_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They have these generator things that power parts of the ship and make sure it has air. You'll have to turn some of them off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们用这些发电机供给飞船部分区域的电能并且为它们提供空气。你必须把关掉一些。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz2_greeting_00003980_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's one in the Cryo Lab, one in the Hangar Bay and one where they make the robots... the Robot Assembly area.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个在低温实验室，一个在机库和还有一个在机器人…机器人装配车间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz2_greeting_00003980_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once they're all broken, you can get through that door to the outside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦它们都坏了，你可以通过那个通向外面的门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz2_greeting_00003980_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And then once you get to the top of the ship, you can turn the teleporter thing back on, and I can catch up to you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦你到达了飞船的顶部，你能把传送装置恢复，然后我能赶上你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz2_greeting_00003980_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess it's time for me to get those doors unlocked for you now. This is fun!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想现在该我为你把门打开了。这真好玩！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz2_greeting_00003980_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05FF01.sallyCrawl to 1
You need to wake up the spaceman there. We can't get up to the top of the ship unless he uses his space suit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要唤醒宇航员。我们不能到飞船顶部，除非他用他的太空服。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz2_greeting_00003981_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well now, that was something...
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在好了，那是什么东西…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz3_greeting_000076c3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Holy shit, did you see that? What was that thing? Some crazy alien Death Ray?
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，你看到了没?那是什么玩意？某种疯狂的外星“死光”？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz3_greeting_000076c7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, great. Another dark and scary part of the ship.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，好极了。这船上的另外一个又黑又吓人的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz3_greeting_00007e21_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well at least it's someplace different, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 至少地方不同了，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz3_greeting_00007e21_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're going through that next teleporter first, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会先穿过下一个传送装置，对吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz3_greeting_0000a73e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So we're going to follow you through that next one, huh? Okay. I'll... I'll go through last.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我们跟着你去下一个，呃？很好。我…我最后一个走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz3_greeting_0000a73f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't care for these "teleporter" things at all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一点也不在乎这些个"传送装置"。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz3_greeting_0000a740_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's hope this is over soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望快点结束。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz3_greeting_0000a741_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ready when you are. Be right behind you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等你准备好。紧紧跟着你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz3_greeting_0000a742_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glad to see you're holding up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴看见你还能撑得住。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz3_greeting_0000a743_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We didn't get much opposition, so either they don't know exactly where we are, or they're busy with something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们并没有遭到太多的抵抗，它们也许不知道我们到底在哪里，或者它们忙于其他事情去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz3_greeting_0000a743_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looks like they're still trying to keep us out of the teleporters, huh? Only one way to go. Might as well take it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来它们一直在试图阻止我们接近传送装置，你说呢？就算只有一条路可走，我们也得闯一闯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz3_greeting_0000a743_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go on ahead through. We'll be right behind you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 往前走吧。我们是你的后盾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz3_greeting_0000a744_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guess they know what we're up to, so they're shutting off the teleporters. Trying to cut us off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们一定是猜到我们要干的事，所以它们关闭了传送装置以阻隔我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz3_greeting_0000a745_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Which means they're probably waiting on the other side of that door.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这意味着它们很可能在那扇门的另一边等着我们呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz3_greeting_0000a745_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll hold this point. You go on ahead and see if you can find the controls for this teleporter. We'll make sure they don't sneak up behind you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们守住这里。你去吧，看看你能不能找到传送装置的开关。我们来确保它们不会从后面偷袭你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz3_greeting_0000a745_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're kind of pinned down here until you find the other end of that teleporter. You might want to get working on that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们可以说是被困在这了，你必须找到另一头的传送装置。你可能得启动它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz3_greeting_00007e22_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow... did you see that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇…你看到没?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz3_greeting_000076c4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Scary, but also kind of a stupid move on their part, don't you think?
ESP.TRADUIT: 挺吓人的，但是这么干也挺愚蠢的，你说呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz3_greeting_000076c4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well hey there, fancy meeting you here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，没想到在会这见到你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz3_greeting_00003ca3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice work. Now what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得好。现在怎么做？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz3_greeting_00003ca3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're really good at this. I hope it wasn't too scary...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真的对这个很在行。我希望那不是太可怕…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz3_greeting_0000573f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3LabTeleporterActive to 2
Oh no, they turned this one off too!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，不，它们把这个也关了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz3_greeting_0000a746_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're going to have to find the other end and turn it back on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要去寻找剩下的并把它们都打开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz3_greeting_0000a746_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3LabTeleporterUpdate to 2
Did you see that? Did you see that big gun they just fired?
ESP.TRADUIT: 看到没？你看到那大跑刚才开火了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz3_greeting_00007e23_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We need to turn off that big Death Ray thing before they blow up the whole Earth!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们必须关掉那大死光，在它们毁灭地球之前！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz3_greeting_00007e23_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage DLC05MZ3 20
I knew you'd get it. Good job!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你会办到的。干得好！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz3_greeting_00005740_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now we have to get to the bridge, where their leader is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我们必须去舰桥，那里有它们的首领。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz3_greeting_00005740_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait here. I'll get the door!
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等。我去开门！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz3_greeting_00005740_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is crazy, right? It's not just me? We're actually trying to escape from a spaceship? Crazy...
ESP.TRADUIT: 真疯狂，是不是？不只是我？我们正尝试从太空船逃出去？太疯狂了…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz3_greeting_00007e3f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know the odds of getting out of this alive are pretty small, right? I'm just saying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你找到从这里出去的路而且生还的几率是很小的，对吧？我只是随便说说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz3_greeting_00007e40_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just between you and me, I'm surprised at how well I'm coping. I mean, I think I'm coping. Unless I've just lost my mind already...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你我之间，我很惊讶目前为止我干得这么好。我是说，我觉得我应付得了。除非我是疯了…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz3_greeting_00007e41_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aliens... who'd have believed it? This is nuts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 外星人…会有人相信吗？真是疯了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz3_greeting_00007e42_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We need to make 'em pay. Every last one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们必须让那群外星绿脑袋付出代价，一个也别想逃！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz3_greeting_00007e43_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This ain't the time for standing around and talking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在不是站在这里说话的时候。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz3_greeting_00007e44_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's just keep moving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们继续行动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz3_greeting_00007e45_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Quite a little band of misfits we've got here, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这有点儿不适应，呃？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz3_greeting_00007e24_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I get out of here, no one's going to believe this. Hell, I'm not sure I believe it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我能出去，没有一个人会相信。可恶，连我自己都不怎么确信。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz3_greeting_00007e46_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think we're getting close. Just gotta keep moving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我们快到了，继续前进。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz3_greeting_00007e47_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So if we do manage to get off this ship, then what? We just go back home like nothing happened? I don't know if I can do that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以如果我们设法摆脱这艘船，然后呢？我们就像刚刚回家一样，什么事情也没发生吗？我不知道我是否能做到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz3_greeting_00007e48_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not quite sure where to go, but I think if we keep going this way we'll find what we're looking for.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不十分清楚，但我想如果继续，我们会找到要找的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz3_greeting_00007e49_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is kind of exciting, isn't it? I've never seen this part of the ship before!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这让人真兴奋，不是吗？我从来都没见过飞船的这一区域！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz3_greeting_00007e25_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I sure hope they don't figure out where we are. This time I don't think they're going to put me back in the cell...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真希望它们不会发觉我们现在在哪。如果它们抓住我们，我想不会只把我们扔回牢房了事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz3_greeting_00007e26_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't be real... this can't be happening...
ESP.TRADUIT: 不可能是真的…这不该发生…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rivet City Security [0B007E50] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations Comment (NAM2) : scared, shocked EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcfemalegeneric1\dlc05conve_greeting_00007e3c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll wake up any minute now... just need to wake up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会醒来，任何时间…只是需要醒来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rivet City Security [0B007E50] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations Comment (NAM2) : scared, shocked EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcfemalegeneric1\dlc05conve_greeting_00007e3d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nope, nope. Not real, none of it is real. Can't hurt me if it's not real.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，不是。不是真实的，全是假的。如果它不是真的，就不能伤害我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rivet City Security [0B007E50] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations Comment (NAM2) : scared, shocked EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcfemalegeneric1\dlc05conve_greeting_00007e3e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, follow me! I'll show you what the generators do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来把，跟着我！我会告诉你怎么弄发电机。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05conve_greeting_0000a6f5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Test
ESP.TRADUIT: 测试
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [000615C5] (ID) Quest : ([0B000801]DLC05CreatorQuest) 0B000801 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: HELLO
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Almost there!
ESP.TRADUIT: 几乎都在！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steamworksld_hello_0000ac14_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is it safe yet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这还安全吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steamworksld_hello_0000ac15_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is a fine mess we're in, isn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这真是一团糟，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_hello_00007e57_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't lose it, okay? We can get through this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要灰心，好吗？我们能渡过难关的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_hello_00007e58_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've gotta get out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们必须离开这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_hello_00007e59_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for letting me out!
ESP.TRADUIT: 多谢你放我出来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_hello_0000ac03_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is exciting, isn't it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 真爽，不是吗！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_hello_00007e5a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be careful, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 小心点，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_hello_00007e5b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I sure hope we don't get caught!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的希望我们不会被抓住。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_hello_00007e5c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Captain on the bridge!
ESP.TRADUIT: 舰长就位！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05post_hello_0000ab4f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All systems normal, Captain!
ESP.TRADUIT: 所有系统正常，舰长！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05post_hello_0000ab50_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi there!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好啊!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05post_hello_0000ab51_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome home, Captain!
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎回家，舰长！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05post_hello_0000ab52_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Astronaut Sally, at your service!
ESP.TRADUIT: 宇航员莎莉，为你服务！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05post_hello_0000ab53_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, good to see you again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，真高兴又见到你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05post_hello_0000ab54_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't even want to know what it's like down there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我根本不想知道下面现在什么样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05post_hello_0000ab55_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome aboard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎登船。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05post_hello_0000ab56_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything I can help with?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能帮着干点什么吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05post_hello_0000ab57_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where are they? I'll kill those little bastards!
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们在哪？我要干掉这些杂种。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_hello_00005600_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess we're done down here. Time to take the fight to the aliens.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我们该做的都做完了。是时候和外星人开战了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_hello_00008ac7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not too shabby, kid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得不错，孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_hello_00008ac8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got one, eh? Well, it's a start.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干掉一个，好，这才刚开个头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_hello_00008ac9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Flyin' ships... now I've seen everything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在天上飞的船…我现在真算是长见识了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_hello_00005601_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That generator has to be around here somewhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个发电机一定在这附近的什么地方…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_hello_00008aca_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's more aliens in here... I can smell 'em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这有更多的外星人…我都能闻到它们了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_hello_00008acb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wish we knew how to use of these flyin' ships. Would have been a lot easier than sneakin' around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望我们知道怎么开这些飞船，这比在附近躲藏容易多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_hello_00008acc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's troublin' ya?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么麻烦吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_hello_00008acd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Somethin' on your mind?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在想什么吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_hello_00005602_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_hello_00005603_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you lookin' at?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在看什么呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_hello_00005604_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, get that suit on and get outside. The sooner we get out of here the better!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，穿上那套太空服然后出去。我们越快离开这儿越好！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_hello_00008ace_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only one more of those damn generators to go and we can get the hell out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就差一个该死的发电机了，搞定它我们就可以离开这鬼地方了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_hello_00008acf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One down! Way to go!
ESP.TRADUIT: 搞定！可以走了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_hello_00008ad0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Huh... wha? Where am I?
ESP.TRADUIT: 额…什么？我在哪？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars Comment (NAM2) : in a daze EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_hello_00005605_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know about you, but I'd like to find that generator and get back to the engine core.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可不了解你，但我还是想找到那个发电机，然后回去工程中枢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_hello_00005606_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Freezing people then bringing them back to life. Amazing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让被冻起来的人起死回生。真是神奇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_hello_00008ad1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: These aliens... why are they experimenting on us? What do they want to do to us?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些外星人……他们为什么在我们身上做实验？他们想把我们怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_hello_00008ad2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we would have had access to this kind of medical technology back on earth, so many people wouldn't have died in the war.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们能获得这种医疗技术带回地球，很多人就不必在战争中死去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_hello_00008ad3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh... hi.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦…嗨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars Comment (NAM2) : in a daze EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_hello_00008ad4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This place... it's giving me the creeps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个地方…让我毛骨悚然…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars Comment (NAM2) : in a daze EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_hello_00005607_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gah! Don't sneak up on me like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊！别偷偷摸摸对我做那种事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars Comment (NAM2) : startled EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_hello_00005608_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope we get out of here soon. I don't know how much more of this I can take.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望我们尽快离开这里。我不知道我还能坚持多久。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_hello_00005609_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got all the generators, huh? Time to take a walk outside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 已经摧毁所有发电机了，是吧？现在差不多该去外头溜达溜达了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_hello_00008ad5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice work... one more generator and we can get the heck out of the engine core.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得漂亮…再干掉一个发电机，我们就可以回到该死的工程中枢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_hello_00008ad6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One generator down and two to go. Keep it up, kid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 搞定一个发电机了，还有两个。继续努力，孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_hello_00008ad7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow, I'd love to get my hands on some of this equipment. I could make a fortune back on earth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇喔，我真想抱走一些这样的设备。等回到地球上我就可以好好赚上一笔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_hello_0000560a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those assembly lines remind me of the pens we kept our slav... ummm, I mean our prisoners in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些流水线让我想起了咱们关押我们的奴隶的围栏…喔，我的意思是我们的犯人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars Comment (NAM2) : slaves being cut off (catch herself) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_hello_00008ad8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've never seen anything like this place. Everything builds itself... crazy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从未见过任何像这样的事。每样东西都在自行生产…真是疯狂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_hello_00008ad9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Holy shit. If I'd had even a few of these robots back home...
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的。如果我能带那堆机器人里的一些回家的话…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_hello_00008ada_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah? Need something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？需要什么吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_hello_00008adb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope that little girl knows what she's talking about, or we're in for some serious trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望那个小女孩知道她在说什么，否则我们可就要有大麻烦了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_hello_0000560b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This ship is huge. How did they build something this big?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这艘船如此巨大。他们究竟是如何制造出这么大的东西的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_hello_0000560c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't believe I'm saying this, but I actually miss those old Salisbury Steaks back home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不敢相信我会这么说，不过我确实想念家乡的老索尔兹伯里牛排了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_hello_0000560d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You did it! You did it! Whoohoo!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你做到了！你做到了！哇哦！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz2_hello_00005efd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only one more of those generators to go! Wow!
ESP.TRADUIT: 还差一个发电机了！哇！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz2_hello_00008adc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You blew up one of the generators! We might actually get out of here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你引爆了一个发电机！我们也许能够回家了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz2_hello_00008add_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hiya, Mister.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好呀，先生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz2_hello_0000560e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hiya, Lady.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好呀，女士。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz2_hello_0000560f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hope we find what we're looking for soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望我们马上找到我们找的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz3_hello_0000a721_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't get off this ship fast enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有足够的时间下船。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz3_hello_0000a722_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are we there yet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们现在在哪？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz3_hello_0000a723_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: At least I'm still in one piece...
ESP.TRADUIT: 至少我还安然无恙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz3_hello_0000a724_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think we're getting closer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为我们正在接近。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz3_hello_0000a725_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is everything okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 一切都好吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz3_hello_0000a726_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey there, little one. So, are your parents anywhere aboard this ship?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，小家伙，你的父母在这飞船上吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05conversations_hello_00005412_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey Somah, can you tell me how it all ends up? You know, what happens down there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，舒马赫。你能告诉我这一切是怎么结束的吗？那么，你知道下面发生什么了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05conversations_hello_00005413_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey there, ummm... I don't mean to bother you and all... ummm...
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，呃…我不是故意打扰你的…呃…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations Comment (NAM2) : meek, nervous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05conversations_hello_00005414_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow, so you were down there when all this started. Right before the bombs fell. That's crazy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，那么说来这一切发生之前你就在那里？就在核弹落下之前。太疯狂了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conversations_hello_00005415_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey sweetie, can I talk to you a second?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，甜心，我能和你聊几句吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conversations_hello_00005416_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what's your story, tough guy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 硬汉，你的故事呢?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conversations_hello_00005417_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you have to help a lot of people who were hurt when you were in the war?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在战争中曾经必须得去救助一大堆伤残人士吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05conversations_hello_00005418_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Somah, what's it like down there? Is it still the same?
ESP.TRADUIT: 舒马赫，下面现在什么样？还是老样子吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05conversations_hello_00005419_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, mister? Are you a real cowboy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，先生。你真的是个牛仔吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05conversations_hello_0000541a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have to go now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在要走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll stay right with you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会和你在一起的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_goodbye_00007b9c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's keep moving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 咱们接着走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, come on!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，来吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_goodbye_00007e5d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's keep moving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 咱们接着走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05post_goodbye_0000ab64_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05post_goodbye_0000ab94_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sir, yes sir!
ESP.TRADUIT: 长官，是，长官！ !
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05post_goodbye_0000ab95_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay!
ESP.TRADUIT: Ok。 !
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05post_goodbye_0000ab65_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See you later!
ESP.TRADUIT: 回头见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05post_goodbye_0000ab66_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll keep an eye on the ship for you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会替你看着这飞船的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05post_goodbye_0000ab67_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yep, not like I'm going anywhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我哪也不想去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05post_goodbye_0000ab68_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll be here if you need us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你需要我们的话，我们会在这的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05post_goodbye_0000ab69_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be careful down there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那小心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05post_goodbye_0000ab6a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just hurry up and find us a way off of this ship before we all end up frozen again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我们再次被它们抓去冻起来之前赶紧想办法离开这艘船。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_goodbye_00003984_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, just watch my back and I'll watch yours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，那就看紧我身后，而我也会看着你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_goodbye_0000a62c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay. Tell me if you need medical assistance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，如果你需要医疗援助就找我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_goodbye_0000a62d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go on, don't let me stop you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来吧，别让我拦着你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_goodbye_00003985_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, sure. I'll keep your spot warm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，当然。我会尽量让你那好过点的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_goodbye_0000a62e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, yeah. Just don't think about ditching me... we're in this together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，当然。只要别想着抛弃我…我们在这一块儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_goodbye_0000a62f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You go do what you have to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你去干你该干的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_goodbye_00003989_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine... I'll be here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好…我会待在这儿的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_goodbye_0000a630_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Suit yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_goodbye_0000a631_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Remember to wear the spacesuit before you go outside or you could die!
ESP.TRADUIT: 去外面前记得穿上宇航服不然你会死的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz2_goodbye_00003988_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't go alone... those generators are in scary places. Take one of the grown-ups with you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 别自己一个人去…那些发电机在可怕的地方。最好让大人陪你去！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz2_goodbye_0000a632_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry, I'll be safe with these guys. They seem pretty neat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不用担心。我和这些家伙在一起会很安全的。他们看上去很厉害。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz2_goodbye_00003986_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I hope we can find my sister somewhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，我真希望能在哪里找到我姐姐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz2_goodbye_0000a633_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be careful, lady.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小心，女士。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz2_goodbye_0000a634_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be careful, mister.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小心，先生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz2_goodbye_00003987_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be careful!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当心！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz3_goodbye_00007e20_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're doing a great job. Really.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你干得真棒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz3_goodbye_0000a727_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's hope they don't figure out where we are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真希望它们找不到我们的藏身之处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz3_goodbye_0000a728_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just keep cool, and we'll get through this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 保持冷静，我们会撑过去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz3_goodbye_0000a729_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, I'll make sure they don't cut us off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，我确保它们不会把我们隔断的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz3_goodbye_0000a72a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They know we're coming, so be careful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们知道我们要来了，小心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz3_goodbye_0000a72b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We might actually make it...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们应该能让它…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz3_goodbye_0000a72c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope we can find that Death Ray before they use it again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望能在它们再次使用死光前找到它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz3_goodbye_0000a72d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: First aliens, now Death Rays. This is like a crazy TV show.
ESP.TRADUIT: 先是外星人，现在是死光。就像一个疯狂的电视节目。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz3_goodbye_0000a72e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good idea.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好主意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz3_goodbye_0000a72f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know where to find me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道在哪里能找到我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz3_goodbye_0000a730_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I sure hope so, for all our sakes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我当然希望如此，看在我们所有人的份上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05conversations_goodbye_00005421_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No one asked you to thaw me out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没人让你把我解冻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05conversations_goodbye_00005422_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, at least down there we're free... well, most of us anyway. So let's just get the hell out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，至少在那里我们是自由的…嗯，反正至少是我们中的大多数。所以让咱们离开这鬼地方吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations Comment (NAM2) : Say second part of first sentence almost to self. She's an ex-slaver, so her statement is irony. Perk up on last sentence. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conversations_goodbye_00005423_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, you'll just have to learn to deal with it like the rest of us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，你得向其他人学着处理它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conversations_goodbye_00005424_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell you what. I'll do the shooting, and you do the patching. It's the only way we're gonna make it out of here alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉你，我来射击，你来修理。这是我们活着从这里出去的唯一方法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conversations_goodbye_0000a63e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, sure. Don't worry. Don't worry...
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，当然。别担心，别担心…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations Comment (NAM2) : Veiled uncertainty. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05conversations_goodbye_00005425_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, uh... well, glad we talked. I know I feel better... ummm... ok...
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，嗯…很好，很高兴与你谈心，我感觉好多了…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations Comment (NAM2) : nervous meek, trail off at the end EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05conversations_goodbye_00005426_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's okay, Somah. It's my problem... I'll deal with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，索玛。这是我的问题…我会处理的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05conversations_goodbye_00005427_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aw, thanks Somah! You're the best!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，谢谢你，索玛！你是最棒的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05conversations_goodbye_00005428_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks, Mr. Tercorien. I knew you'd help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你，特克里安先生。我知道你会帮上忙的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05conversations_goodbye_00005429_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Attack
ESP.TRADUIT: 攻击

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, make it look good!
ESP.TRADUIT: 来吧，尝尝我的厉害！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_attack_0000994c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hit me! Come on, hit me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 打我啊！来打我啊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_attack_0000994d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, we're really fighting now, aren't we?
ESP.TRADUIT: 耶，我们现在准备开打了是吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_attack_0000994e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Youkai me oujo sei!
ESP.TRADUIT: 保护小姐！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toshiro Kago [0B0032FC] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesamurai\dlc05conversations_attack_00007986_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Towaaaaaa!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toshiro Kago [0B0032FC] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesamurai\dlc05conversations_attack_00007995_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oryaaaaaa!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toshiro Kago [0B0032FC] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesamurai\dlc05conversations_attack_00007996_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tear 'em up!
ESP.TRADUIT: 撕碎它们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conversations_attack_00007be8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take 'em out!
ESP.TRADUIT: 干掉他们。 !
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conversations_attack_00007be9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aim for the head!
ESP.TRADUIT: 瞄准脑袋打！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conversations_attack_00007bea_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're mine, sucker!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是我的了，蠢货！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conversations_attack_00007beb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got somethin' special for ya!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我给你弄了点特别的礼物！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conversations_attack_00007bec_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: StartCombatResponse
No, I'm not going to fight you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我不会跟你打的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You gotta be kidding me. You've already looked, haven't you? You know there's no way out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在开玩笑吧。你已经知道了，对不对？你已经知道是死路一条。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahfigh_0000293d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My plan's gonna work. You gotta trust me, kid!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的计划可行，你得信任我，孩子！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahfigh_0000293d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, see now you're getting me frustrated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你现在让我感到沮丧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahfigh_000039a9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You look around here, you tell me there's some other way to do this, and I'll listen. But I'm telling you this'll work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看看四周，告诉我些别的办法我会采纳的。但是我告诉你只有这样才最有效。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahfigh_000039a9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage DLC05MZ1 20
Okay, go ahead and hit me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，尽管来揍我吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. I'll hold back on you, make sure you don't get too roughed up, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我会帮你的。但请温柔点，好吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahfigh_00002933_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And you be ready. Soon as they come in to get us, you take 'em down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要准备好。一旦它们冲向我们，你就把它们解决。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahfigh_00002933_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set DLC05MZ1.DLC05MZ1Fight to 1 DLC05SomahRef.STartCombat Player
Okay, let's give it a try.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我们来试试吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, good girl.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，女孩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahfigh_00002935_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now let's not get too rough here, okay? Gotta make it look good, but don't want to do any serious damage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，我们不要太粗鲁，好吧？恰到好处，不要下手太重。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahfigh_00002935_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, good boy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，男孩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahfigh_00002936_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now let's not get too rough here, okay? Gotta make it look good, but don't want to do any serious damage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，我们不要太粗鲁，好吧？恰到好处，不要下手太重。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahfigh_00002936_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So if I kill you, that'll bring the guards?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，如果我把你给杀了，就会引来守卫吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, whoa now. Let's not go down that road, sweetie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，啊。我们不要采用这办法，甜心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahfigh_0000292b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take a second and think before you start sayin' stuff that'll get you killed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想清楚，你再说这事会要了你的命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahfigh_0000292b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm telling you, we're gonna have to work together. You keep talkin' like this and I'm gonna have to get out of here on my own, after I put you down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我告诉你，我们必须共同努力。如果你还这样说，我就把你干掉自己离开这儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahfigh_0000292b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So are you in, or what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要来真的，还是怎么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahfigh_0000292b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do I know I can trust you? What if you try to kill me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我怎么知道我能信任你？你要是打算杀了我怎么办？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've gotta be kidding me. You always this paranoid?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一定在开玩笑吧，你总是这么固执？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahfigh_00002934_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Think about it. You been lyin' here a while now, out cold. If I wanted you dead, why wait till now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 想想看，你在这里躺着不动那么久。如果我想杀你，何必要等到现在呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahfigh_00002934_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could've just made sure you never woke up. No fuss at all. But I didn't, did I?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我刚刚以为你不会醒了。别在意，我错了，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahfigh_00002934_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So yeah, I'm thinkin' you can afford to show me a little trust. Now are we doin' this, or what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我想你应该多信赖我点。现在我们该怎么做？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahfigh_00002934_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is stupid. There must be another way out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这太愚蠢了。一定还有别的出路。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you kidding me? Kid, I've looked. Trust me. Ain't no other way out of this little box they got us in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在开玩笑吗？我看过了，请相信我，没有其他办法能逃出这个小盒子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahfigh_00002930_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You wanna satisfy your curiosity, fine. Go ahead. You poke your little nose around and see what you come up with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想满足你的好奇心，好吧，随便。你也不看看自己在什么地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahfigh_00002930_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage DLC05MZ1 20
You really think this will work?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真觉得这可行？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think it's worth a try. What's the worst that could happen? Nothing changes, only we've got a few more bruises. Big deal. Let's give it a shot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为这值得一试。再糟也不会怎么样，我们顶多会有几处擦伤。没什么大不了的，试试看吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahfigh_00002939_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I promise I'll go easy on you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我保证我会好好对你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahfigh_00002939_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, so we get out of this cell, and then what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，那么我们离开这个囚室，然后呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell if I know. But at least it's a start. It's better than sitting here waiting for them to experiment on us even more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我知道真是见鬼了。但至少这是一个开始，这比坐在这里等着它们拿我们开刀好多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahfigh_00002929_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're kidding me. That's the best you've got?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在跟我开玩笑吧？这就是你最好的计划？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, that's what I've got. I don't see you coming up with anything brilliant, Mr. I've Been Here Five Whole Minutes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，那就是我想到的。我看不出你能想出什么来，先生。我可等了整整五分钟了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahfigh_0000292d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, that's what I've got. I don't see you coming up with anything brilliant, Miss I've Been Here Five Whole Minutes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，那就是我想到的。我看不出你能想出什么来，小姐。我可等了整整五分钟了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahfigh_0000292e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you tell me what you have in mind, and I'll think it over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么不告诉我你在想什么，让我来好好考虑一下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, sure. Take your time. No rush, not like we're about to be sliced and diced by... who the hell knows what.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，当然，慢慢来。别急，不要急得像要被刀切那样…鬼知道呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahplan_00002928_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. So they've kept us alive this long for a reason, right? Seems to me they'd want to make sure we stay alive for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，它们让我们活那么久是有原因的，对吗？看来这就是它们要我们活着的理由。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahplan_00002928_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you and me, we have ourselves a little fist-fight. Trick 'em into thinkin' one of us ain't going to last too long.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你和我，我们假装打架，让它们以为我们中的一个不会活得太长了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahplan_00002928_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Make 'em come in here and break it up. And when they do, we turn on 'em. We take out the guards, and get ourselves the hell out of this box.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把它们吸引过来。当它们进来时我们就打倒它们，伪装成警卫，这样我们就能离开这了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahplan_00002928_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, fine. What's your plan?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，好吧，你的计划是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: They want us alive for... something. Who knows what. Point is, if it looks like one of us is gonna kill the other, they'll step in to stop it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们让我们活着是为了…某些原因，但如果有人要杀死对方，它们会出来阻止。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahplan_00002938_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So that's what we do. We throw a few punches, make it look real, and then jump 'em when they come in to break it up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是我们要做的。我们假装互相挥拳头，等它们进来，就动手对付它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahplan_00002938_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have a plan, or are you just making this up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是真的有计划，还是只想吹牛？

ESP.ORIGINAL: A little of both. It's always worked for me in the past, no reason to second guess it now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 都是。这一直都很有效，所以别怀疑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahadva_00002927_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What kind of advantage?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么优势？

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're keeping an eye on us, you know? Watching us. So I say we give 'em a little show.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们正在监视我们，知道吗？监视我们。那我给它们来点表演。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahadva_0000292f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give 'em a reason to pay a little extra attention to us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给它们点注意我们的理由。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahadva_0000292f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not looking for a sidekick, okay? I just want to get out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可没想要找个什么搭档，明白吗？我只想从这儿出去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sidekick? Who the hell said anything about a sidekick?
ESP.TRADUIT: 搭档？谁说过要做你他妈的搭档？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahadva_0000292a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a shitty attitude, kid, because unless you're willing to work with me, you're going a whole lot of no place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 态度真够差的，小子。因为你除了和我一起之外，可没的选择了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahadva_0000292a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's going to take both of us to get out of this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们两个都要离开这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahadva_0000292a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do they want with us?
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们想从我们身上得到什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your guess is as good as mine. I can't understand what they're saying. I don't remember half of what they did to me, and that might be a good thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和你想的不同。我不明白它们在说什么，不记得它们对我做了什么，但可能是件好事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahtalk_0000293c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know we ain't the only ones in here; there's a whole bunch of us in here. They'll pluck folks out every now and then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道不只是我们在这里，还有一大群人。它们时不时会挑出一个带走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahtalk_0000293c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes they bring 'em back... Sometimes they don't. Either way, I ain't keen to find out what they're doing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时会被带回来…有时不会。不管怎么，我不想知道它们在干什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahtalk_0000293c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you, and why are you in here with me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？你为什么和我一起被困在这里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got it all wrong, kid. You're in here with me. This is my little slice of heaven, not yours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你完全错了，孩子。你和我在这儿，这是我的小天堂而不是你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahtalk_00002932_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...not a good time for jokes, I guess.
ESP.TRADUIT: …现在别开玩笑了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahtalk_00002932_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I don't know why they put you in here with me. Maybe it's another experiment. Not like I can ask them to find out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我不知道它们为什么把你和我放在一起，可能是另一个实验。我可以问问它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahtalk_00002932_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But since you asked, name's Somah. Beyond that, I'm thinkin' not much matters if we're gonna stay stuck in here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然你问了，我叫索玛，此外，如果我们要留在这不会有什么问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahtalk_00002932_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05MZ1.DLC05MZ1SomahName to 1
So how do we get out of here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们该怎么逃出去？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been here for a little while, but haven't found a way to...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经在这里待了一会，但还是想不到办法…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahtalk_0000683a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit. You hear that? It's coming again... Get back against the wall, now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，你听到吗？又要来了。现在快靠墙站好！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahtalk_0000683a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05MZ1.DLC05MZ1ClawFlag to 1 DLC05ClawNPCRef.Moveto DLC05ClawAnimMarker DLC05ClawNPCRef.EVP
Now you're talkin'.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在你说吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahtalk_0000293a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can tell you there ain't an easy way out of here. I've looked around, and I can't find any panels, wires, circuits... nothing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我告诉你从这里出去不容易。我看过四周，什么都有没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahtalk_0000293a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm thinkin' they did us a favor, putting us together in here like this. And I say we use it to our advantage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想它们帮了我们，把我们放在一起。我的意思是我们应该好好利用这机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahtalk_0000293a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And for the record, the name's Somah. Nice to meet you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 记好了，我叫索玛，很高兴见到你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahtalk_0000293a_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05MZ1.DLC05MZ1SomahName to 1
Okay, yeah. Yeah, let's do something about getting out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，好吧。让我们想办法从这里出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahtalk_0000293b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, there ain't no easy way out. Trust me, I've looked. Can't even find anything to pry open, see what's blocking the doorway.
