ESP.TRADUIT: 我告诉你从这里出去不容易，相信我，我看过了。甚至找不到任何可以橇开的地方，门也被堵死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahtalk_0000293b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm thinkin' they did us a favor, putting us together in here like this. And I say we use it to our advantage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想它们帮了我们，把我们放在一起。我的意思是我们应该好好利用这机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahtalk_0000293b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have to get out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我必须离开这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You and me both, kid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和我，我们两个，孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahgree_00002926_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wish I'd never heard that damn radio signal. Thought I could scav some tech from whatever it came from. Sure as hell wasn't expecting this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真希望从没听到过那该死的电台信号。我以为可以从中弄到一些科技技术。没想到会是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahgree_00002926_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This can't be happening. I mean... aliens?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是真的。我是说…外星人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Crazy, ain't it? I thought I'd seen some shit out there in the Wastes, but nothin' like this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很荒唐，不是吗？我以为能在废墟上找到一些垃圾，但似乎不是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahgree_0000292c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not a whole lot of good news goin' around right now. If you're lucky, they'll leave you alone for a while. If not...
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有太多好消息。幸运的话，它们会离开你一会。如果不是…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahgree_0000292c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, then it's been nice chatting with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，很高兴和你谈心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahgree_0000292c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you? What are you doing here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？你在这里做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me? I'm the same as you, I figure. Went pokin' around someplace I shouldn't have, and now I'm payin' for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我？我想我和你一样。我不该去那地方，现在我为此付出了代价。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahgree_00002931_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you and me? We're stuck here, until they decide they want to prod us some more, or worse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只有你和我？被困在这里等它们来拿我们开刀，或者更糟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahgree_00002931_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Man, I can't believe this. This is what you call... what is it, irony? Hell, I don't know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 伙计，我不敢相信，这是你所说的…那是什么？讽刺？该死，我不知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahgree_00002931_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This has to be a bad dream...
ESP.TRADUIT: 这一定是个噩梦……

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah? Well then wake the hell up, 'cause I'm tired of being stuck in it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是吗？那么清醒点，我厌倦了被困在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahgree_00002937_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry kid, but this is really happening. You're stuck here, just like me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，孩子，但这真的发生了。你被困在这里，和我一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahgree_00002937_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05MZ1SallyRelease
Hello? Hi! Hi there! Listen, can you let me out of here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 喂？嗨！嘿！听着，你能把我从这放出去吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallyrele_0000330a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage DLC05MZ1 40
Please let me out. I can help, honest!
ESP.TRADUIT: 请放我出去！我会帮上忙的，真的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallyrele_00009a10_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you let me out of here? Please?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能让我离开这里吗？拜托？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallyrele_00009a11_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, kid. Lead the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，孩子，带路吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好极了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallygree_000036de_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05MZ1.DLC05MZ1SallyDoor to 1
DLC05AsmSomahPartB
DLC05AsmElliottTeleFix
I'm not totally sure what I'm doing here, but I'll try and tinker with it. You just make sure I don't get shot, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是很确定我要做什么，但我会尽力折腾。你只要确保我不挨枪子就行，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B003392]DLC05Asm) Robot Assembly Scripting/Staging Support Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05asm_dlc05asmsomahtele_00003714_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set DLC05Asm.SomahGo to 1 SetStage DLC05Asm 5
DLC05AsmElliottDark
Do you know anything helpful about the other sections of the ship?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道飞船的其他区域有什么有用的东西么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a pretty big place, and I've only seen some of it. They always catch me before I can see the whole thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里真的很大，我只看过它的一部分。它们总是在我要全部看完的时候逮到我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tllevelkn_00003973_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've seen the Cryo Lab... that's where they freeze people and cut them up and stuff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看到过低温实验室，那里是它们冷冻人和进行切割的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tllevelkn_00003973_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And the Hangar... That has the aliens's flying ships and all the stuff they need to fly them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是机库…那有外星人的飞船和它们飞行所需要的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tllevelkn_00003973_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And the Robot Assembly is where they build the big metal robots they use.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们用机器装配车间制造大机器人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tllevelkn_00003973_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But the real important stuff is on the top of the ship. I've never been there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是真正重要的东西在飞船上部。我从没去过那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tllevelkn_00003973_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think you should remain in the Engineering Core for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想你现在应该留在工程中枢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay. Whatever you think is best.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。你想的都是最好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlnevermi_0000398a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05MZ2.MZ2Follow to 0 set DLC05MZ2.MZ2TercorienFollow to 0
Putting me on guard duty, huh? Swell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我执勤，是吧？很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlnevermi_0000398b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05MZ2.MZ2Follow to 0 set DLC05MZ2.MZ2SomahFollow to 0
Fine. If I see any aliens, I'll say hello for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。 要是我遇到些外星人，我会代你向它们问好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlnevermi_0000398c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05MZ2.MZ2Follow to 0 set DLC05MZ2.MZ2PaulsonFollow to 0
I may need an extra gun in the Hangar Bay. Can you lend a hand?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在机库需要多个能开枪的家伙帮忙。你能帮把手吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gun? No thanks. I've spent enough time patching up the mess that guns make. I'm no killer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 枪？不，谢谢。我已经花了够长的时间修修补补一团糟的枪了。我可不是杀手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlhelphan_00003990_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guns were never quite my thing. There were... let's just say there were other folks to take care of that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 枪从来不关我的事，有其他家伙关心这些。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlhelphan_00003991_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Might want to ask somebody else to help with that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或许可以叫些其他人来帮忙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlhelphan_00003991_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now you're speakin' my language. Hell yeah, I'll come with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正合我意。地狱什么的，我会跟着你一起去的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlhelphan_00003992_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05MZ2.MZ2Follow to 1 set DLC05MZ2.MZ2PaulsonFollow to 1
I need some help in the Robot Assembly area. You in?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在机器人装配车间需要些帮手。你来吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never was really good with those tin cans. I deal with blood and guts better than wires and gizmos. That's why I became a doctor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些瓶瓶罐罐从来就没什么用处。相对于电线和小玩意，我对鲜血和内脏更感兴趣。这就是我要成为医生的理由。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlhelpass_00003998_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I would have been helpful, but seems like you already did plenty of damage in there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我也许会帮帮忙。但好像你已经在这做了大量破坏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlhelpass_00003999_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heck yeah. I can take apart and put together a Protectron with my eyes shut. I'll go with you. Lead on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哎呀！我可以闭着眼睛拆装钢铁护卫。我会和你一起去的。领路！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlhelpass_00007bc3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05MZ2.MZ2Follow to 1 set DLC05MZ2.MZ2SomahFollow to 1
Whatever they're assembling in there, I ain't gonna be much good to you. I never was much of a builder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论它们在哪里聚集，对你都没什么好处，我从来就不是什么建筑工。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlhelpass_0000399a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to get through the Cryo Labs. Think you can help me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要穿过低温实验室。我想你可以帮助我，是吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the point? You already did a good bit of the place. Nah... I'll just stay here and guard the Engine Core.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么意思？你做了很多。嗯…我就留在这儿看守工程中枢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlhelpcry_00003994_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmmm. Sounds like I may be of some use in there. If there are other people in stasis, I could help revive them or something. Just watch my back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯。听起我有些用处。如果有其他人有麻烦，我可以救助他们。只要保护好我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlhelpcry_00007a6a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05MZ2.MZ2Follow to 1 set DLC05MZ2.MZ2TercorienFollow to 1
I was never very good at the science stuff. But let me know if you need me to fix anything... that's my specialty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从来就不擅长科技玩意。假如你有什么东西要修理跟我说一声，那是我的专长。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlhelpcry_00003995_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well seein' as I don't even know what a Cryo or a Lab is, I'm guessin' no.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来像是什么低温实验室，我觉得应该不是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlhelpcry_00003996_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me how you were captured by these aliens.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我你是怎么被那些外星人抓住的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doesn't matter now. Only important thing is... Well, I guess it's revenge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系，唯一要做的事是…我想是复仇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlabducte_00003976_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, it was getting dark... we had spent the day out in the trenches keeping as many of the guys alive as we could.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，变暗了…我们整天都在战壕里以保证尽可能多的人活着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlabducte_00003977_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Chinese had been pounding on us all day with artillery from these huge guns they had up on the mountains. It was really a mess.
ESP.TRADUIT: 中国军队整天用架设在山顶上的大炮轰炸我们。这真是糟透了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlabducte_00003977_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, we pitched our tents and stowed our gear to try and catch some shuteye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，我们搭建了帐篷储藏我们的装备，以求能休息一会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlabducte_00003977_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I woke up suddenly to Private Dawkins screaming... he was bathed in some kind of blue light coming from the sky.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我醒来时大兵多金斯突然大叫…。他被来自天空的某种蓝色光柱笼罩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlabducte_00003977_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All of us just froze as he just... well... vanished. We didn't know what happened. Did the Chinese come up with some new weapon?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们所有人都看着他…消失了。我们不知道发生了什么。中国人发明了新武器吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlabducte_00003977_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Moments later, all of us were in the blue light too... the rest you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 之后，我们所有的人也都被蓝色光柱…后来的事你都知道了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlabducte_00003977_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not much to tell. I heard that radio signal, thought I'd check it out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么可说的，我收到了电台信号，想过来看看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlabducte_00007e56_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thought maybe I could pull some scrap from whatever was sending the signal. Got a little more than I bargained for.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想也许可以受到些来自废墟的信号，希望有点意外所获。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlabducte_00007e56_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you tell me more about where you're from?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我你从哪儿来的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No sense in dwelling on it now. Let's just get out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 待在那毫无意义，让我们离开这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlbackgro_00003970_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you for telling me about what happened to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你告诉我你身上发生的事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't say as it matters, or that I'd feel like telling you anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不能说很重要。但我想还是告诉你吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlbackgro_0000abbe_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me? Well, I was a medic with the 108th Infantry Battalion stationed at Anchorage, Alaska.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我? 好吧，我是一名医疗兵，隶属驻阿拉斯加-安克雷奇的第108步兵营。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlbackgro_00003971_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was with a squad of five other medics... our job was to patch everyone up after the Commies gunned them down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和其他五名医疗兵在一个小队…我们的工作就是救治被共军大炮炸伤的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlbackgro_00003971_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was pretty bloody... nothing at all like I expected when I gave up my hospital job to enlist in the Army.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那太血腥了…和我当时放弃医院的工作去参军时预想的完全不同。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlbackgro_00003971_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Does it really matter?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这真的很重要吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars Comment (NAM2) : defensive EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlbackgro_00007e55_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean, we're fighting to stay alive here. Whatever I did before we got to this point doesn't mean a whole lot right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的意思是我们争取在这里生活。在我们达到这个目的前，我做的并不一定很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars Comment (NAM2) : defensive EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlbackgro_00007e55_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Does it really matter?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这真的很重要吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars Comment (NAM2) : defensive EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlbackgro_0000abec_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean, we're fighting to stay alive here. Whatever I did before we got to this point doesn't mean a whole lot right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的意思是我们争取在这里生活。在我们达到这个目的前，我做的并不一定很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars Comment (NAM2) : defensive EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlbackgro_0000abec_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I swear, if you don't calm down, I'll stuff you back in the freezer!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我发誓，如果你不冷静下来的话，我会把你重新塞回去冷冻。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, no! Don't do it... don't do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，不！别这样。别这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003979_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's just that this whole situation is... unbelievable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这一切只是…无法想象。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003979_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I need a few minutes to take a breather...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要休息一下…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003979_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just relax. Let me see what I can do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 放松，让我看看能做什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay... okay. Whew.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧…好吧，噢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003962_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry about all this... I just can't believe this is happening.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对之前的事道歉…我真不敢相信会发生这些事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003962_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry, we ARE in this together, and I will help you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心，我们在一起，而且我会帮你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you. Thanks so much. Sorry about all this... I just can't believe this is happening.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢，非常感谢。我对之前的事道歉…我真不敢相信会发生这些事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_0000396c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My guess is the aliens had them for a snack... or worse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜是那些外星人拿他们当零食了…也许更糟……

ESP.ORIGINAL: No... no. I'm responsible for those men. They were my team.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不…不行。我要对他们负责，他们是我的队友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_0000398f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, if you mean what you say... that we're all in this together... then you've got to help me find out what happened to them!
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托，如果你真这样想…我们同病相怜…你一定要帮我找出他们怎么了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_0000398f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nope.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What if they're lost... or frozen like I was... or even dead? I'm responsible for them!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他们失踪了…或者像我一样被冰冻了…甚至是死了？我要对他们负责！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003972_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, if you mean what you say... that we're all in this together... then you've got to help me find out what happened to them!
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托，如果你真这样想…我们同病相怜…你一定要帮我找出他们怎么了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003972_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm afraid not. All I've found are these people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想没有。我就找到这些人了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh my god, I'm responsible for them and now they're lost... or dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，天啊，我得对他们负责，而现在他们不是失踪就是死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003961_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, if you mean what you say... that we're all in this together... then you've got to help me find out what happened to them!
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托，如果你真这样想…我们同病相怜…你一定要帮我找出他们怎么了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003961_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine... I'll just put you back in stasis!
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好…我要让你重新躺下别动！

ESP.ORIGINAL: No! Please don't. It's horrible in there! To think I was just sitting there, frozen like that... I thought I was dead!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不！请不要这么做。这太可怕了！我只是被冰冻地矗立着…我以为我已经死了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003975_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just help me get the hell out of this place. I want to get back home... back to my squad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 帮我离开这个鬼地方。我想回家…回到我的部队。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003975_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait a minute! My men... my unit! Have you seen them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下！老兄…我的部队！你见过他们吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003975_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I promise you, all I want to do is get off this ship and get back home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我向你保证，我想做的只是逃离这艘船回家而已。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You do? Then you're telling me the truth. Those... aliens took you too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你被做了？你告诉我真相，那些…外星人也对你做了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003966_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I just want to get out of here and get back to things the way they were. Back with my guys...
ESP.TRADUIT: 瞧，我只想离开这儿然后回到原来的生活，和我的朋友们一起…。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003966_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait a minute! My men... my unit! Have you seen them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下！老兄…我的部队！你见过他们吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003966_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I were with the aliens, the last thing I would have done is release you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我跟外星人是一伙的，我刚才就不会把你给放了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I suppose so.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我…我想也是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003983_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, all I want to do is get back home and back to the rest of my squad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我要做的就是回家，然后回到我的部队。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003983_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait a minute! My men... my unit! Have you seen them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下！老兄…我的部队！你见过他们吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003983_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do I look like an alien?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看起来像个外星人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha! That doesn't mean anything!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈！这没有任何意义！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_0000396e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You could be one of those little green guys in human form... or maybe you ARE human and they just took over your mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你也许是一个人类外表的绿人…或者你是人类，它们控制了你的思想！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_0000396e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We have no idea how limitless their powers are!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不知道它们的力量有多大！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_0000396e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a doctor and you can't tell from looking at me that I'm no alien?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是个医生，而你光看外表还不能确定我是不是外星人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, you could be one of those little green guys in human form... or maybe you ARE human and they just took over your mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，你也许是一个人类外表的绿人…或者你是人类，它们控制了你的思想！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_0000398d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We have no idea how limitless their powers are!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不知道它们的力量有多大！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_0000398d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can promise you I am not an alien. In fact, I was abducted like you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以向你保证，我不是外星人。事实上，我是跟你一样被抓来的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I dunno, I dunno... maybe you assumed human form. I heard they could do that... or you are human but they took over your mind!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道，我不知道…也许你只有人类的躯体，我听说它们能做到的…或者你是人类，它们控制了你的思想！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_0000396f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We have no idea how limitless their powers are!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不知道它们的力量有多大！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_0000396f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a prisoner like the rest of us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是个囚犯，跟我们一样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Prisoner? Last thing I remember I was being outside our bunker and then... oh my god!
ESP.TRADUIT: 囚犯？我最后记得的事是我在我们在碉堡外面然后…我的天！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003967_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aliens! I was taken by aliens! You! You must be the aliens trying to get into my mind... well that's not gonna work!
ESP.TRADUIT: 外星人！我被外星人带走了！你！你一定是试图进入我思想的外星人…你不会得逞的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003967_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Private Elliott Tercorien, U.S. Army Medic, Serial Number 3477809. That's all I'm telling you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 二等兵艾略特·特克里安，美国陆军医疗兵，编号3477809。这就是我能告诉你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003967_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your uniform... it looks familiar, but I can't place it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的制服…看起来很眼熟，但是我记不清楚了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: My what? Who the hell are you... oh my god.... wait a minute!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我什么？你他妈到底是谁…我的天…等一下！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003997_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aliens! I was taken by aliens! You! You must be the aliens trying to get into my mind... well that's not gonna work!
ESP.TRADUIT: 外星人！我被外星人带走了！你！你一定是试图进入我思想的外星人…你不会得逞的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003997_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Private Elliott Tercorien, U.S. Army Medic, Serial Number 3477809. That's all I'm telling you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 二等兵艾略特·特克里安，美国陆军医疗兵，编号3477809。这就是我能告诉你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003997_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's okay, we're not going to hurt you... We're friends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别害怕，我们不会伤害你的。我们是朋友。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? I've never seen any of you before in my life. Last people I saw were... oh my god!
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？我这辈子从没见过你。我最后看到的人是…我的天！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003982_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aliens! I was taken by aliens! You! You must be the aliens trying to get into my mind... well that's not gonna work!
ESP.TRADUIT: 外星人！我被外星人带走了！你！你一定是试图进入我思想的外星人…你不会得逞的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003982_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Private Elliott Tercorien, U.S. Army Medic, Serial Number 3477809. That's all I'm telling you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 二等兵艾略特·特克里安，美国陆军医疗兵，编号3477809。这就是我能告诉你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003982_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want 'em dead and so do I. Let me see what I can do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想它们死，我也想。来看看我能做些什么吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sit tight, and I'll see what I can find out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 坐稳了，我来看看我能找到些什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry Paulson, I will help you find your family. Just hang in there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心，保尔森。我会帮你找到你的家人的。耐心等等。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't give guarantees. You want out of here, you stick with me. Period.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从不作保证。想离开，跟紧我。就这样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got a funny way of talkin', kid. But you know what, I think you're my best bet to get the hell back home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的话真幼稚，孩子。你知道什么，我觉得你最好回到你那该死的老家。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2paulsongr_0000398e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell you what... I usually ride solo, but I'll stick with you for now. You try and pull anythin' stupid and I'll bury you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉你…我总是单枪匹马的。但现在我会看着你，你要是做出什么蠢事我就把你活埋了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2paulsongr_0000398e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I were working with the aliens, why would I set you free?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我跟外星人是一伙话，为什么我要放了你呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got a point there, kid. Lettin' me out of that... thing does count for something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说的很对，孩子，我真想逃离这里，我真是受够了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2paulsongr_0000396d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell you what... I usually ride solo, but I'll stick with you for now. You try and pull anythin' stupid and I'll bury you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉你…我总是单枪匹马的。但现在我会看着你，你要是做出什么蠢事我就把你活埋了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2paulsongr_0000396d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, all I want to do is work together as a team so we can get home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我们应该团结一心，才能回家。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only teams I know are cattle and they get led to the slaughter. That's why I work alone, kid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只知道它们会像牛一样被屠杀。这就是为什么我单干，孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2paulsongr_00003969_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, you did let me out of that... thing, so it counts for somethin'.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，你让我出…出来，是为了某些事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2paulsongr_00003969_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell you what... I usually ride solo, but I'll stick with you for now. You try and pull anythin' stupid and I'll bury you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉你…我总是单枪匹马的。但现在我会看着你，你要是做出什么蠢事我就把你活埋了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2paulsongr_00003969_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not a shit-kicking cowboy, that's for sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是个傻蛋牛仔，绝对不是。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got a smart mouth kid. I like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你很健谈，孩子。我喜欢这一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2paulsongr_00003965_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What I don't like is I don't know you from a hole in the wall. How do I know you ain't workin' with those little green bastards?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不喜欢的是我不知道你从墙上的洞来，我怎么知道你不是和那些绿色杂种是一伙的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2paulsongr_00003965_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a human, like you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是人类，跟你一样的人类。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Human like me, huh? And just how do I know you aren't workin' with the little green bastards that stuck me in that thing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 像我的人类，对吧？我怎么知道你不是为那些绿色杂种工作的，好让我被困在这？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2paulsongr_00003978_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm trapped on this ship, just like you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我被困在这艘飞船上了，跟你一样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do I really look that stupid, kid? This ain't a ship. I don't hear water and I sure as hell don't feel us rocking. So tell me another one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看上去真的那么蠢吗，孩子？这不是一艘船，我没听到水声、没感觉到该死的摇晃。请告诉我真相。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, you don't look trapped to me. How do I know you ain't workin' with those little green bastards?
ESP.TRADUIT: 此外，你看起来不像在给我设圈套。我怎么知道你不是为那些绿色杂种工作的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2paulsongr_00003963_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're called aliens, hayseed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们是外星人，乡巴佬。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aliens... Green Men... hell, you can call 'em piles of horse shit for all I care.
ESP.TRADUIT: 外星人…绿人…该死，我宁愿你叫它们马粪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2paulsongr_00003974_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you woke me, huh? Who the hell are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是你把我吵醒的，对吧？你他妈到底是谁？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2paulsongr_00003974_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're talking about the aliens, you'll see them soon enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你要谈那些外星人，你马上就会见到它们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You call those little weird men aliens?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你叫那些又小又怪的人为外星人？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2paulsongr_0000396a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you woke me, huh? Who the hell are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是你把我吵醒的，对吧？你他妈到底是谁？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2paulsongr_0000396a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The aliens? They're all over the place. That's why I woke you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 外星人？它们到处都是！所以我才把你给弄醒的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aliens? That what you call 'em?
ESP.TRADUIT: 外星人？你这么叫它们?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2paulsongr_00003964_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you woke me, huh? Who the hell are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是你把我吵醒的，对吧？你他妈到底是谁？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2paulsongr_00003964_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm open to suggestions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我洗耳恭听。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmmm, maybe we could destroy a section of the assembly line and punch through to the next room.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，也许我们可以破坏流水线的一部分，打穿墙进到隔壁房间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B003392]DLC05Asm) Robot Assembly Scripting/Staging Support Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05asm_dlc05asmsomahchoi_000039b3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Other than that, your guess is as good as mine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除此之外，你想的和我一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B003392]DLC05Asm) Robot Assembly Scripting/Staging Support Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05asm_dlc05asmsomahchoi_000039b3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05MZ3SallyLabTriggerTopic
Looks like this door's locked, too. Hang on, I'll see if I can get it from the other side.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来这扇门也是锁着的，坚持住。我看能不能从另一边打开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3sallylabt_00003ca4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll get the door!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会给你开门的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3sallylabt_0000573c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay back! Stay away from me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 退后！离我远点！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoa, whoa. Settle down there, kid. I'm not gonna hurt you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇哦，哇哦，冷静，孩子。我不会伤害你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahgree_0000409f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take a second, look around, and you'll notice that I'm stuck in here with you, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看周围，你会意识到这里只有我和你，懂吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahgree_0000409f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're okay for now. At least until they decide they want to poke at you some more, or worse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在还好，至少当时它们没有多捅你几下或者更糟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahgree_0000409f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05HQPaulsonButtons01
Holy hell... those towers made outta lightnin' or somethin'?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的天…那些塔在制造闪电还是什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B0041CC]DLC05HQ) Hangar Scripting/Staging Support Quest Comment (NAM2) : Paulson sees the player activate a bumper for the first time. Giant explosion occurs. EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05hq_dlc05hqpaulsonbutt_00004274_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, come on. You going to play with those buttons all day? We need to keep moving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 快来，快来，你要一直捣鼓那些按钮吗？我们得继续赶路了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B0041CC]DLC05HQ) Hangar Scripting/Staging Support Quest Comment (NAM2) : irritated EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05hq_dlc05hqpaulsonbutt_00004275_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: BumperSwitchB.activate DLC05PaulsonRef
setStage DLC05HQ 42
DLC05HQPaulsonBumper01
Woah. I dunno what those tall shiny things are, but I'd stay away from them if I was you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇喔。我不知道那些亮晶晶的高大玩意是什么，但如果我是你的话就离它们远远的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B0041CC]DLC05HQ) Hangar Scripting/Staging Support Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05hq_dlc05hqpaulsonbump_00004273_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05HQPaulsonTeleSwitch
Now, let's see. One of these buttons has to turn those shiny discs back on... then we can zap ourselves around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，让我们想想。这里边有一个按钮肯定是让那些发光碟子重置的…那样我们就能处理掉咱们自己周围的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B0041CC]DLC05HQ) Hangar Scripting/Staging Support Quest Comment (NAM2) : If it's already known that the teleporters are off, Paulson gives a more detailed suggestion. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05hq_dlc05hqpaulsontele_00004271_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a whole bunch of important looking gizmos up there. That's gotta be where the generator machine is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里有一大堆重要的小玩意。发电机一定在这。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B0041CC]DLC05HQ) Hangar Scripting/Staging Support Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05hq_dlc05hqpaulsontele_00004272_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05HQPaulsonTele01
Damn, looks like that thing isn't working. We'll have to find another way to get up to the top.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，那东西好象坏了。我们得另想办法上去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B0041CC]DLC05HQ) Hangar Scripting/Staging Support Quest Comment (NAM2) : The player approaches a teleporter that's off. Paulson states the obvious. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05hq_dlc05hqpaulsontele_00004270_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05HQPaulsonEnemyUpstairs
The hell if we're dyin' up here... take 'em out!
ESP.TRADUIT: 要是我们非得死在这地狱…也得拉它们垫背！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B0041CC]DLC05HQ) Hangar Scripting/Staging Support Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05hq_dlc05hqpaulsonenem_00004784_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep hittin' those buttons and take 'em down when you can!
ESP.TRADUIT: 继续按那些按钮，把它们都震下去！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B0041CC]DLC05HQ) Hangar Scripting/Staging Support Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05hq_dlc05hqpaulsonenem_0000a622_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on you alien sons-of-bitches!
ESP.TRADUIT: 来吧你们这些外星杂种！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B0041CC]DLC05HQ) Hangar Scripting/Staging Support Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05hq_dlc05hqpaulsonenem_0000a623_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm trying to hold 'em off!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我设法牵制它们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B0041CC]DLC05HQ) Hangar Scripting/Staging Support Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05hq_dlc05hqpaulsonenem_0000a624_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn aliens got up here again!
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的外星人又爬起来了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B0041CC]DLC05HQ) Hangar Scripting/Staging Support Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05hq_dlc05hqpaulsonenem_0000a625_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here comes another one off of those shiny discs!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这儿又来了一个闪光碟子！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B0041CC]DLC05HQ) Hangar Scripting/Staging Support Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05hq_dlc05hqpaulsonenem_00004785_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heads up, more aliens comin' in!
ESP.TRADUIT: 看上边，更多外星人冲进来了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B0041CC]DLC05HQ) Hangar Scripting/Staging Support Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05hq_dlc05hqpaulsonenem_00004786_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tricky bastards are comin' outta the woodwork!
ESP.TRADUIT: 杂种们正疯了似的从门框里冲过来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B0041CC]DLC05HQ) Hangar Scripting/Staging Support Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05hq_dlc05hqpaulsonenem_00004787_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Watch it! They're comin' up here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当心！它们要从那上来了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B0041CC]DLC05HQ) Hangar Scripting/Staging Support Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05hq_dlc05hqpaulsonenem_00004788_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How many of these things are there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些东西还有多少？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B0041CC]DLC05HQ) Hangar Scripting/Staging Support Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05hq_dlc05hqpaulsonenem_0000710f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05MZ1SomahWaitForSally
What the hell? Where's she going?
ESP.TRADUIT: 见鬼？她去哪了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahwait_00009945_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, great. Well, so much for that idea. She suckered you good, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，好极了。够了。她一直在欺骗你，对吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahwait_000047bb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05MZ1SomahAttackGuard
Okay, now's our chance! GET 'EM!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，机会来了！干掉它们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahatta_000047bc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05MZ1.DLC05MZ1Fight to 6
DLC05MZ1AlienGuardLine
set DLC05MZ1.DLC05MZ1Fight to 3
DLC05SteamSallyFinal
Hi, I'm back again!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，我又回来了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steam_dlc05steamsally_00004982_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll catch up once it's safe, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦安全我就赶上来，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steam_dlc05steamsally_00007278_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05SteamworksLD.sallyFinal to 1
Hurry up, we're almost there!
ESP.TRADUIT: 赶快，我们要到了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steam_dlc05steamsally_00004983_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You go ahead. I'll wait here until it's a little safer. I don't want to get hurt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你引路，我等那边安全点再过去。我不想受伤。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steam_dlc05steamsally_00007279_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05SteamSallyWorks
Oops! I didn't see those two. There's a door on the left I can open though. You should try and go that way. Sorry!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哎呀！我没看到这两个。不过我可以打开左侧的大门。对不起！你应该尝试走那条路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steam_dlc05steamsally_00004978_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait here for just a second. I can do something to distract them. When you hear the noise, go to your left, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等在这一会，我可以做一些事来分散它们的注意力。当你听到的响动，去左边，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steam_dlc05steamsally_00004979_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go go go!
ESP.TRADUIT: 冲，冲，冲！ !
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steam_dlc05steamsally_00005e79_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Use that door on the left! Hurry!
ESP.TRADUIT: 用左侧的大门！快点！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steam_dlc05steamsally_0000497a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're not looking. Run down the stairs and out the door at the bottom.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们松懈了。跑下楼梯，再跑过底下那扇门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steam_dlc05steamsally_0000497b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage DLC05SteamworksLD 43
Don't worry about those aliens, they won't hurt you. You should just leave them alone, okay? No reason to be mean to them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要担心那些外星人，它们不会伤害你。您别理会这些，好吗？不要考虑它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steam_dlc05steamsally_0000a6d2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This vent goes a different way, so you'll be by yourself for a while. Don't worry, I'll catch up! Be careful!
ESP.TRADUIT: 通风口通向另一条路，你得靠你自己一会。别担心，我会马上赶上来的！小心！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steam_dlc05steamsally_0000497c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't believe you killed him, he has it just as bad as us. I'll see you later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不敢相信你杀死了他，他和我们一样。迟点见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steam_dlc05steamsally_0000a6d3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05SteamSallyDoor
Wait! I think there are more coming down the hall. Just stay here, and I'll try and get this door open for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等！还有更多从走廊那来。留在这，我会尽力为你打开这扇门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steam_dlc05steamsally_00004984_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm, maybe it's this other wire...
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，也许是其它的电线…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steam_dlc05steamsally_00004985_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There it is! Go on, get in!
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那里！继续，来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steam_dlc05steamsally_00004986_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whew, that was a close one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，接近了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steam_dlc05steamsally_00004987_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be careful when you come out, there are still a few to your right. If you can, sneak through the door on your left.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你出来的时候小心点，它们还有些仍在你的右边。可以的话，偷偷从左边的门出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steam_dlc05steamsally_00004988_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05SteamSallyGuide
Wait here for a second... There's more of them coming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 待在这…更多家伙过来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steam_dlc05steamsally_0000497d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks!
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steam_dlc05steamsally_0000497f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, go get their attention.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，去吸引它们的注意力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steam_dlc05steamsally_00004980_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: BOOM!
ESP.TRADUIT: 砰！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steam_dlc05steamsally_00004981_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Try to page Elliot
ESP.TRADUIT: 试着呼叫艾略特

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05BridgeTopicPaulson
DLC05BridgeTopicElliot
DLC05BridgeTopicSally
DLC05Bridge
Page Elliot
ESP.TRADUIT: 呼叫艾略特

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get a move on it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 赶快行动！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aye aye!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，好！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgeinte_00004e72_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 了解。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgeinte_000055cc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgeinte_000058c7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是长官！.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgeinte_000058c8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry for doubting you. Can you help now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 很抱歉之前怀疑你了。你现在能帮帮我么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。 !
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallygree_00004e54_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05MZ1.DLC05MZ1SallyDoor to 1
How exactly are you going to help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你到底是要怎么帮忙？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Watch, you'll see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看着吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallygree_00004e55_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05MZ1.DLC05MZ1SallyDoor to 1
I think I've got this under control.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我可以控制住这东西了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can help, honest!
ESP.TRADUIT: 老实说，我能帮上忙！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallygree_00004e56_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should wait here. It's too dangerous for a little girl.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该在这里老实等着。对一个小姑娘来说外面太危险了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No it's not. They almost never catch me. You'll see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，不是。它们从来没有抓到我。你知道的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallygree_00004e58_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05MZ1.DLC05MZ1SallyDoor to 1
Page Paulson
ESP.TRADUIT: 呼叫保尔森

ESP.ORIGINAL: Page Somah
ESP.TRADUIT: 呼叫索玛

ESP.ORIGINAL: Page Sally
ESP.TRADUIT: 呼叫莎莉

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05AsmSomahExploded
Wow! That thing really blew up! I'm going to hang back here until you clear out the next room.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇！那东西真的爆炸了！在你扫清隔壁房间前，我都会留在这里等你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B003392]DLC05Asm) Robot Assembly Scripting/Staging Support Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05asm_dlc05asmsomahexpl_00005145_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actually, let me head for the controls and you just stay close.
ESP.TRADUIT: 确实，让我直接杀向控制中心，你只要跟紧我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, I'll take all the help I can get.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我会接受我能得到的一切帮助。

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05ConvTercorienAltResponsesLevel03
DLC05ConvTercorienAltResponsesLevel02
Then I don't really have anything to go back to, do I? I mean, my family's gone, my friends are gone... everything I knew is gone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有什么理由回去了，对吗？我的意思是，我的家人没了，我的朋友也没了…这一切我都清楚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05conve_dlc05convtercor_00005401_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, don't worry. If she's up here, we're going to find her. Okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，别担心。如果她在这里，我们会找到她。好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05conve_dlc05convtercor_00005402_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05ConvTercorienAltResponsesLevel01
So they don't know who started it or who won?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，它们不知道是谁挑起的或谁赢了这次战争？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05conve_dlc05convtercor_000053ee_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your sister's up here? Have you seen her?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你姐姐在这里？你见过她吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05conve_dlc05convtercor_000053ef_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05ConvSomahAltResponsesLevel03
Well then, I'll help you keep an eye out for her. Okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我会帮你留意她的，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conve_dlc05convsomaha_000053ec_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, yeah I guess so. Sorry. I keep forgetting this is different for you. I grew up in the ruins and you didn't.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我也是这样想。对不起，我总是忘记我和你是不同的。我成长在废墟里，而你不是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conve_dlc05convsomaha_000053ed_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05ConvSomahAltResponsesLevel02
Your sister? How do you know that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你姐姐？你怎么知道？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conve_dlc05convsomaha_0000540e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't get it 'cause you've never been down there! It's all gone, Tercorien. Doesn't matter who won or who started it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不会知道的，因为你根本没经历过！全都消失了，特克里安。谁开的头或谁赢了都不重要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conve_dlc05convsomaha_0000540f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05ConvSomahAltResponsesLevel01
You seem like you know your way around this ship. Have you been looking for something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来好象认识这艘飞船内部的通路，你一直在找什么吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conve_dlc05convsomaha_000053f9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I dunno... all I heard was that one side or the other started dropping bombs and it just all went to shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道…我听说一方开始扔核弹，然后就全搞砸了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conve_dlc05convsomaha_000053fa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05ConvSallyAltResponsesLevel03
We were together when the aliens took us from home. I saw her on the table next to mine when I woke up on this ship.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当时一起时，外星人把我们从家里带走。当我在这艘飞船上醒来时，我清楚见到她就在我旁边的手术台上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05conve_dlc05convsallya_00005406_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05ConvSallyAltResponsesLevel02
Yeah. My sister. I think she's on this ship somewhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我姐姐。我想她在这艘飞船上的某个地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05conve_dlc05convsallya_0000540c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I saw her once. When I first woke up on this ship, but I haven't seen her since.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，当我第一次在这艘飞船上醒来时曾见过她一面，但从此以后就没有再见过她了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05conve_dlc05convsallya_0000540d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05ConvSallyAltResponsesLevel01
Sure, what did ya want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 行啊，你想怎么样?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05conve_dlc05convsallya_00005407_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Naw. Just me and my sister. I dunno what happened to my parents.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，只有我和我姐姐。我不知道我的父母怎么了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05conve_dlc05convsallya_00005408_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05ConvTercorienResponsesLevel03
No, no, no. Don't worry. Nothing's going to happen to you. Everything's going to be just fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，不，不，别担心。没什么会发生在你身上，一切都会很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations Comment (NAM2) : Trying to divert subject EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05conve_dlc05convtercor_00005410_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once. I had no choice. It was either him or me. I hope I never have to do it again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 曾经，我别无选择，不是你死就是我活。我希望永远不要再来一次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05conve_dlc05convtercor_00005411_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05ConvTercorienResponsesLevel02
Well... I mean... sometimes they're hurt so bad, there's nothing I can do. The human body is very hard to, um, hard to "fix."
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯…我的意思是…有时他们伤的太重，我会束手无策。人的身体太复杂了。只能尽力去治疗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations Comment (NAM2) : trying to reason with a child EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05conve_dlc05convtercor_000053f0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Join? I was forced into service. I worked in a hospital before I was in the army. They put the gun in my hand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 参军？我是被迫的。我以前曾在一家医院工作，它们硬把枪塞进我的手里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05conve_dlc05convtercor_000053f1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I just thought...
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，我只是想说…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05conve_dlc05convtercor_000053f2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05ConvTercorienResponsesLevel01
Yeah... all the time. I was a doctor, so it was my job to try and make everyone feel better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊…总是这样。我是一个医生，这是我的工作，我试着让大家感觉更好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05conve_dlc05convtercor_0000542c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess so. I can't believe they went ahead with the nukes. I mean, they wiped everything out! How stupid could they be?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想是的，我不相信他们竟然使用核武器。我的意思是，他们毁掉了一切！他们怎么能这么蠢！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05conve_dlc05convtercor_0000542d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well... I just thought, ummm... we should get to know each other. I mean after all, we're watching each other's backs. So...
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯…我只是想，嗯… 我们应该互相了解。我的意思是，我们要相互依靠，所以…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations Comment (NAM2) : nervous, meek EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05conve_dlc05convtercor_0000542e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05ConvSallyResponsesLevel03
Aw, don't worry. I always pick good friends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，不用担心。我总是选择最好的朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05conve_dlc05convsallyr_000053f3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe we should just stay up here then! I hated when it was like that!
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我们应该待在这里！我讨厌那样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05conve_dlc05convsallyr_000053f4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you promise to fix me if I get hurt?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以如果我受伤的话，你答应为我治疗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05conve_dlc05convsallyr_000053f5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05ConvSallyResponsesLevel02
That's funny, sounds like the way people can be too!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那很可笑，听起来就像是人都可以！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05conve_dlc05convsallyr_0000541e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sigh. I wish that they could fix that. I hated being down there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哎。我希望它们能够解决。我讨厌去那下面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05conve_dlc05convsallyr_0000541f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So if I get hurt, will I die?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，如果我受伤了，我会死吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05conve_dlc05convsallyr_00005420_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05ConvSallyResponsesLevel01
Wow! So you got to ride horses? Real, living horses? I've never even seen a real living horse. What are they like?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇！所以，你会骑马？真的，活生生的马？我从来没见过真正的马。它们是什么样子?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05conve_dlc05convsallyr_000053fb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah. I mean, everything was all blown up and really dirty. There were lotsa sick people everywhere too, and lotsa people crying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊。我的意思是，一切都被炸的乱七八糟了。到处都是生病和哭喊的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05conve_dlc05convsallyr_000053fc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How come people still die then after they get hurt even when a doctor is around?
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然当时医生就在附近，怎么还会有人因为伤重而死？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05conve_dlc05convsallyr_000053fd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05ConvSomahResponsesLevel03
There isn't anyone left to fix anything. Everything's in ruins, people are still fighting to survive and I don't see anything that can change that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有任何人留下来解决问题。一切都被摧毁了，人们仍然为了生存而战斗，我不知道什么办法可以解决此事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conve_dlc05convsomahr_0000542a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, fine. I get the message. You know, you were warmer when you were frozen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，好的。我明白了。你还是被冻着的时候比较亲切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conve_dlc05convsomahr_0000542b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05ConvSomahResponsesLevel02
That about sums it all up. The world is still a huge mess.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那大概概括了一切。这世界仍然一片混乱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conve_dlc05convsomahr_0000541b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, cowboy. We need to work together to get out of here. So like it or not, you're stuck with us. You can drop the "lone gunman" routine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，牛仔。我们必须一起逃出这里。不管你喜不喜欢，你和我们在一条船上了。你可以丢掉“孤胆枪手”这个称号了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conve_dlc05convsomahr_0000541c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ever pull the trigger on that gun? You know, ever kill someone?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你曾经扣下过扳机吗？你曾经杀过人吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conve_dlc05convsomahr_0000541d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05ConvSomahResponsesLevel01
Same as when you were down there you mean?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当时你怎么想的?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conve_dlc05convsomahr_000053f6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I mean what's your deal? Where are you from? We don't know anything about you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我的意思是你想怎么样？你从哪儿来？我们不知道任何你的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conve_dlc05convsomahr_000053f7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't seem the soldier type, Tercorien. Why the heck did you join the army in the first place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好象不是当兵的料，特克里安。你究竟为什么要参军上前线？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conve_dlc05convsomahr_000053f8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05ConvPaulsonResponsesLevel03
You know, for a little lady, you're pretty smart. I just hope you were smart enough to pick the right horse when you broke this stranger out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道，作为一个小女人，你算是很聪明了。我只希望你够聪明到和人混熟时能选对马。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05conve_dlc05convpaulso_00005403_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just stay out of the way of my bullets when I'm shooting the aliens, and you'll do just fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我射这群外星人的时候你只需要学会别挡我的子弹就行，你会做得到的。
