ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05conve_dlc05convpaulso_00005404_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, see, that's your problem. You thought, but you're wrong. Now, isn't there some bandages you should be makin' or somethin'?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，看，那是你的问题。你想过了，但你错了。现在，你是不是该弥补下还是干点别的什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05conve_dlc05convpaulso_00005405_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05ConvPaulsonResponsesLevel02
Well, I guess if you find the right one, it'll be your friend for life. Find the wrong one, and it'd rather throw you than carry you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我想如果你找到一个合适的，它将是你一生的朋友。找到不合适的，它就会拖累你而不是帮助你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05conve_dlc05convpaulso_00005409_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, I aim to keep it that way. I'll work with you, but I'm not here to make friends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，我要保持这样。我会和你一起工作，但是我不在这里交朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05conve_dlc05convpaulso_0000540a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, you do the healin' and I do the killin'. Besides that, what do we have to talk about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，你治伤，我杀人。除此之外，我们还有什么好谈的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05conve_dlc05convpaulso_0000540b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05ConvPaulsonResponsesLevel01
Well, yeah. I suppose you could say that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，是的。我想你可以那么说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05conve_dlc05convpaulso_000053fe_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My story? Same as you. I don't know where the heck I am and I want to go home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的故事？和你一样。我也不知道我到底在哪，还有我想要回家。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05conve_dlc05convpaulso_000053ff_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah? What is it? Spit it out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是吗？是什么？说来听听。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05conve_dlc05convpaulso_00005400_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05BridgeTopicMainScreen
DLC05BridgeHoloHead.playgroup right 0
;// up the count, spawn the first two set DLC05BridgeLD.mainScreen to 1 set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
DLC05BridgeHoloHead.playgroup right 0
set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
DLC05BridgeHoloHead.playgroup right 0
set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
DLC05BridgeHoloHead.playgroup left 0
set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
set DLC05BridgeLD.mainScreen to 2 set DLC05BridgeLD.sallyCommandHold to 3 DLC05BridgeEnemyShipREF.enable 1 DLC05BridgeHoloHead.playgroup left 0
set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
How are you holding up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还撑得住吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could use one of those stimpaks if you don't mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你没意见，我就用下治疗针。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_000055d1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: if player.getitemcount stimpak > 0 player.removeitem stimpak 1 DLC05PaulsonRef.additem stimpak 1 endif
Would you mind watching our backs?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不介意掩护一下我们吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it means we all live through this, then yeah. Be happy to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这意味着我们都能全身而退的话，那么好吧。乐意效劳。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_000055d0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05BridgeLD.interPaulson to 1 DLC05PaulsonRef.EVP
Status report?
ESP.TRADUIT: 状态报告 ?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who the hell knows, these controls are just a mess.
ESP.TRADUIT: 鬼知道！这些开关简直让人一头雾水。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_0000a936_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm working on it, all right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我正在努力，行了吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_0000a937_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck you and this whole fucking situation. They'll work when they work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他妈的一团糟，需要它们时就能运作了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_0000a938_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's this thing do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这玩意是做什么用的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm, looks like I'm at the helm. I'll have these controls figured out in no time at all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，看起来这是舵轮室，我马上就能弄明白应该如何操控这些开关。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_000055cf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05BridgeLD.interSomah to 1
Can we hit that thing with our death ray?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们能用死光攻击那玩意吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I have that ship targeted, but you'll have to find the firing control.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我瞄准了那飞船，但你得找到发射开关。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_000054b1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05BridgeLD.interSally to 1
How you holding up Sergeant?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的状况如何，中士？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have these buttons pointing at that big blob, I think that's right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看这些按钮都指着那个大粒子团，我觉得那应该没错了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05bridg_dlc05brigetopic_000055cb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was scared for a while, but this is awesome!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我被吓了一跳，不过这真棒！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05bridg_dlc05brigetopic_00005af2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05TopicSallyDeathRayPrep
Do you think you'll be able to assist us medically if we need it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们需要医疗，你能帮助我们吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd really like to, but when I woke up on this ship for the first time all of my medical gear was gone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真想，可是当我在飞船上第一次醒来的时候，我的医疗装备就都不见了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05conve_dlc05convtlterc_000055f5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I saw that the aliens on this ship have some sort of viscous stuff they slather onto wounds; some kind of biological gel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看到飞船上的外星人用一些粘性物质涂抹伤口—一种生物凝胶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05conve_dlc05convtlterc_000055f5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get me some of that, and I might be able to mess around with it, make some sort of Adapted Biogel we can use on ourselves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我一些，我捣一下，制造一些我们能自己使用的适应性凝胶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05conve_dlc05convtlterc_000055f5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, here you go. They should work pretty well... but watch out for side effects.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，给你。它应该很有效…但要注意副作用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05conve_dlc05convtlterc_000055f6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05Conversations.DLC05GelMake to 1
Could you make me some Adapted Biogel?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能给我提供一些改良型生物凝胶吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm still going to need more alien biogel before I can make any more of the healing gel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还需要更多的外星生物凝胶才能继续制造医疗凝胶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05conve_dlc05convtlterc_00007a65_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Could you make me some Adapted Biogel?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能给我提供一些改良型生物凝胶吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没门。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. I'll be waiting for you to change your mind when your equipment starts to fall apart.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我等着你的装备烂掉的时候改变主意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conve_dlc05convtlsoma_000055ff_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, I give in. I'll pay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我认输了，我会付钱的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. Let me see what you have.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，让我看看你有什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conve_dlc05convtlsoma_000055f4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05SomahRepairGo to 1
ShowRepairMenu
No way, Somah. This is ridiculous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没门，索玛。这太荒唐了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Suit yourself. Maybe you can ask one of the aliens to help you. Or, when you come to your senses, you can ask me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随你的便，也许你可以请外星人来帮你。或者，当你明白过来时，可以找我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conve_dlc05convtlsoma_000055f8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I guess you're right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我想你是对的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, I'm glad we see eye to eye. Now, let me see what you need fixed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，很高兴我们的看法一致。现在，让我看看你要修些什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conve_dlc05convtlsoma_000055f3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05SomahRepairGo to 1
ShowRepairMenu
You've got to be kidding me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一直在耍我…….

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh come off it, kid. If and when we get off this ship, I'm going to need something to keep me alive down there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 省省吧，孩子。如果我们离开这艘飞船，我需要些能让我活下去的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conve_dlc05convtlsoma_000055fc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You and I both know that there's no handouts in the Wasteland. It's every woman for herself. Take it or leave it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和我都知道废墟上没有施舍，人人都为自己，要不要随你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conve_dlc05convtlsoma_000055fc_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, fine, whatever. Just take a look.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，好吧，随便了。看一看吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, I'd be glad to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我很乐意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conve_dlc05convtlsoma_000055fd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05SomahRepairGo to 1
ShowRepairMenu
Well, given the circumstances, doesn't that seem kind of pointless?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，在这种情况下，这不是显得很没有意义么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe to you it does, but hey... I gotta think about the future. If we get back down there and I'm broke, how am I going to survive?
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许对你来说是这样。但是…我必须考虑未来。如果我们回到那里，我破产了，怎么生存？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conve_dlc05convtlsoma_000055f7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know as well as I do that there are no handouts in the Wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和我都清楚，废土上没有施舍。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conve_dlc05convtlsoma_000055f7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Since you seem so familiar with my gear, do you know how to repair it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来很熟悉我的装备，你知道怎么修理它们吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actually, I do. I used to tinker with all sorts of junk back home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 确实，我是的，我以前经常在家修理一些破烂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conve_dlc05convtlsoma_000055f9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd be glad to take a look at what you need fixed, but it's going to cost you some caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很乐意帮你修理，但这要花费一些瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conve_dlc05convtlsoma_000055f9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure. Let me see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，我看看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conve_dlc05convtlsoma_000055fb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ShowRepairMenu
Got some more gear for you to fix.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还有些装备要你帮忙修理。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah. So, you want to take me up on it or not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，所以，你想这么做吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conve_dlc05convtlsoma_000055fa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you still insisting on charging me caps for repairs?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你仍然坚持要收瓶盖才能帮我修理吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05Cryo
What the hell are those aliens doing in there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些外星人在搞什么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab Comment (NAM2) : Responding to seeing Aliens, through a window, patrolling a room and monitoring something. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00005612_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look at all these cryogenic chambers. They must be planning to fill them all with specimens from our planet!
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看这些冷冻舱。它们肯定计划用我们地球上的标本去填满它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab Comment (NAM2) : Responds after just entering a room full of cryo pods. Keep in mind he will soon enter a room with 10x this many pods. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00005613_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that some kind of operating room? Wait a minute... what the... no... NO!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是某种手术室吗？等一下…这是什么…不…不！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab Comment (NAM2) : Responds after looking through the window to see some aliens performing some type of procedure on some bodies on medical beds. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00005614_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's my squad in there! What the hell are the aliens doing to them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是我在那的战友！外星人到底对他们做了什么可怕的事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab Comment (NAM2) : Runs up to the glass and says this. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00005615_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You green bastards! Get your hands off them!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们这群绿杂种！把你的手拿开！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab Comment (NAM2) : Says this as he backs up and fires at the glass. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00005616_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There has to be a way to release their containment seal! Maybe there's a button or something on this console.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一定有办法脱离他们的控制！或许会有个按钮或其他什么在那控制台上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab Comment (NAM2) : Says this as he runs up and presses the button in front of the window. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00005617_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you like that, you fucks!? How's it feel to be on the other end for a change!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你很喜欢这样吧，杂种！？享受下另外一边立场的感觉怎么样吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab Comment (NAM2) : Says this as gas fills the room the aliens are in and he notices they are dying. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00005618_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Experiment on this, you sons of bitches!
ESP.TRADUIT: 试试这个，你这狗杂碎！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab Comment (NAM2) : Says this after he enters the room and is firing at one of the dead aliens bodies. Could be something like, "For the Corps!" or something. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00005619_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh my god... no... I can't believe they did this to you. Why wasn't I here sooner? I could have stopped them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的上帝啊…不…我无法相信你竟然做出这样的事。为什么我没有更早到这里？我可以阻止这发生…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab Comment (NAM2) : Says something emotional while standing over one of his soldier's bodies. EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_0000561a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's it. I'm sick of running. Let's finish these aliens off and get the hell home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是那样。我已经厌烦了逃跑。让我们送这些外星人滚回地狱里去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab Comment (NAM2) : Says this as he returns to the players side. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_0000561b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No... it can't be. Is this their plan? To capture THIS many people from earth? Oh my god.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不…不可能。这就是它们的计划？从地球上捕捉人类？哦，我的上帝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab Comment (NAM2) : Said as he enters the huge cryo warehouse. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_0000561d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're flanking us from behind. Quick, find some cover.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们正从后面包抄我们两侧。快，寻找掩护。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab Comment (NAM2) : Says this toward the end of the cryo warehouse when he notices they are coming in from behind where the player just came from. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006c0e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So that's the generator. Now how the heck do we destroy it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就是发电机。我们现在该怎么摧毁这鬼东西？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab Comment (NAM2) : Says this as he enters the generator room and sees the generator. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_0000561e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05MZ3ExLabSceneOpeningLine
Get a load of this!
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿上这个！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... Comment (NAM2) : amazed EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3exlabscen_00005741_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would ya look at that...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看那个……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... Comment (NAM2) : amazed EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3exlabscen_00005742_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3exlabscen_00005743_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was hoping you'd know what to do next.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你知道下一步该做什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kid, I think I made it pretty clear that my advice became irrelevant once we got out of that cell they stuck us in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 孩子，我很清楚地告诉过你在我们离开了牢房后我的建议就无关紧要了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3somahgree_0000573d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm happy to tag along and help you out, but I got NO interest in leading this operation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴能跟着你帮助你，但我没兴趣指挥这次行动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3somahgree_0000573d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm flying by the seat of my pants here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在靠着自己的直觉驾驶。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha ha. Very funny.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈哈。很有趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3somahgree_0000573b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you've got nothing, then ask the kid. She's been helpful so far.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你什么也不懂，问问那孩子，她已经帮我们很多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3somahgree_0000573b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now we take over the ship.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我们接管了这艘船了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, if you say so. Lead the way, kid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，按你所说，带路吧，孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3somahgree_0000573e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05MZ3CaptainViewscreenSpeech
;set DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3ViewscreenSpeechStep to -1
;set DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3ViewscreenSpeechStep to ( DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3ViewscreenSpeechStep + 1 )
;set DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3ViewscreenSpeechStep to ( DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3ViewscreenSpeechStep + 1 )
;set DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3ViewscreenSpeechStep to ( DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3ViewscreenSpeechStep + 1 )
;set DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3ViewscreenSpeechStep to ( DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3ViewscreenSpeechStep + 1 )
;set DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3ViewscreenSpeechStep to ( DLC05MZ3.DLC05MZ3ViewscreenSpeechStep + 1 )
DLC05MZ3ExLabSceneLines
Sorry, I should get the door. Hang on, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，我会搞定这门的。稍等，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3exlabscen_000058a7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not really the time for gawking...
ESP.TRADUIT: 没时间发楞了…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3exlabscen_00007b88_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Didn't think I'd ever see something like this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没想到我会见到这样的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... Comment (NAM2) : awed EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3exlabscen_00005d37_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's really something. Almost enough to make you forget we're running for our lives up here...
ESP.TRADUIT: 那可真太不起了。几乎都让你忘了我们正在逃命…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... Comment (NAM2) : awed EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3exlabscen_000058a8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's so pretty, isn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这可真漂亮，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3exlabscen_000058a9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05BridgeEmpHit
One of those shots must have hit the core, all power is down!
ESP.TRADUIT: 肯定有一发命中了中枢，所有的动力都停止了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgeemph_000058b4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05BridgeTeleporterA.placeAtMe DLC05BridgeTeleporter 1 DLC05BridgeTeleporterB.placeAtMe DLC05BridgeTeleporter 1 set DLC05BridgeLD.teleportBlock to 0 set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
Lights out! They must have hit something and now nothing is working!
ESP.TRADUIT: 灯灭了！它们一定击中了什么，所有设备都停止运转了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgeemph_00007030_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05BridgeTeleporterA.placeAtMe DLC05BridgeTeleporter 1 DLC05BridgeTeleporterB.placeAtMe DLC05BridgeTeleporter 1 set DLC05BridgeLD.teleportBlock to 0 set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
DLC05BridgeAliensInEngineRoom
How's the jammer holding?
ESP.TRADUIT: 干扰器运行得如何？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's holding fine for now, I guess. It should help with the bastards teleporting onto the ship.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜它现在运行得好极了，它能够帮你传送到飞船顶部。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_000058c6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What have you got there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你从那搞到了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh man, I don't know... a teleport jammer, maybe? Right, space ships have those, don't they?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，伙计，我不知道… 或许是一台传送干扰器？对，飞船上有，没错吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_000058c5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, sure. a teleport jammer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，当然。一台传送干扰器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_000058c5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05BridgeLD.interElliot to 1 DLC05BridgeJammerControlREF.activate player
DLC05SpaceWalkTopic
Hey, don't forget to put on the Astronaut's Suit before starting the decompression sequence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，在减压前不要忘了穿上宇航服。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Speaker [0B0059C9] (mod) Quest : ([0B00422E]DLC05SpaceWalkQ) Space Walk EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05space_dlc05spacewalkt_000058e9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05SpaceWalkQ.spaceTopicStage to 10
Yeah, I can see that. I'll get us through.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，我明白了。我会帮大家度过难关的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, okay. Just trying to lend a hand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，好吧。帮把手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B003392]DLC05Asm) Robot Assembly Scripting/Staging Support Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05asm_dlc05asmsomahchoi_00005ae5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05BridgeTopicDeathRay
I got it! The deathray is working and will be fully charged in 30 seconds!
ESP.TRADUIT: 知道了！死光正在运行，还需要30秒才能充能完毕！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_00005aeb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
All right, it's all ready to fire! Push your big blue button and lets end this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好极了，开火准备完毕！按下那个蓝色的大按钮，让我们来终结它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_00005aec_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05BridgeLD.deathRay to 3 set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
DLC05BridgeTopicShipHealth
70%, we need to end this fast.
ESP.TRADUIT: 70%，我们得尽快搞定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_00005aef_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05BridgeLD.shipSay to 1 set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
This ship's half dead and if that death ray isn't online soon we're dead right along with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 飞船快被打烂了，如果死光不能马上就绪，我们就要和飞船一起完蛋了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_00005af1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05BridgeLD.shipSay to 2 set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
20% and plummeting, we're losing systems like crazy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 20%，持续下降中，系统快要崩溃了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_0000703d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05BridgeLD.shipSay to 3 set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
We're at about 70%.
ESP.TRADUIT: 耐久度约为70%。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_00007041_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05BridgeLD.shipSay to 1 set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
Ship's at 50%, we can't take much more of this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 飞船耐久度50%，我们挨不了几炮了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_00007043_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05BridgeLD.shipSay to 2 set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
20%. I hope you've got a plan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 20%。我希望你另有打算。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_00007046_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05BridgeLD.shipSay to 3 set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
Can't be sure if I'm reading this right, but it looks like they're hitting us pretty hard. Hull integrity is at about 90%.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不确定这读数是否正确，不过看起来它们正在猛攻我们。飞船耐久度约为90%。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_00005aed_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05BridgeLD.shipSay to 1 set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
Hull integrity looks to be about 80% and falling.
ESP.TRADUIT: 飞船耐久度约为80%，持续下降中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_00005aee_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05BridgeLD.shipSay to 2 set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
The hull's at around 60%, we need that death ray online now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 飞船耐久度约为60%，我们需要死光准备完毕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_00005af0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05BridgeLD.shipSay to 4 set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
40%, do something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 40%，做点什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_00006c84_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05BridgeLD.shipSay to 6 set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
Ship's at 30%. I hope you have something up your sleeve.
ESP.TRADUIT: 飞船耐久度30%。你最好抓紧时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_0000703c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05BridgeLD.shipSay to 7 set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
10%, we're about to lose life support systems!
ESP.TRADUIT: 10%，我们快要失去生命维持系统了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_0000703e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
Looks like they're doing a number on the ship, hull is at 90% and falling.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来它们对飞船造成了伤害，飞船耐久度90%，持续下降中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_0000703f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05BridgeLD.shipSay to 1 set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
80%, you should try one of these consoles, it might be shields or something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 80%，你应该试试那堆控制终端，可能有护盾或别的什么功能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_00007040_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05BridgeLD.shipSay to 2 set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
At about 60%. Do something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 飞船耐久度约为60%。做点什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_00007042_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05BridgeLD.shipSay to 4 set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
The ship's at 40%, we're goners.
ESP.TRADUIT: 飞船耐久度40%，我们死定了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_00007044_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05BridgeLD.shipSay to 6 set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
30%. This is not good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 30%。大事不妙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_00007045_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05BridgeLD.shipSay to 7 set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
10% and the ship's failing!
ESP.TRADUIT: 10%，飞船正在下坠！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_00007047_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05BridgeLD.shipSay to 9 set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
DLC05FF01moreBehindYou
Watch out, more are coming from behind you. I'll try to block their progress.
ESP.TRADUIT: 保持警觉，你后面还有更多。我会试着挡住它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [0B005C75] (mod) Quest : ([0B005C70]DLC05FF01) Steerage Rats EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05ff01_dlc05ff01morebeh_00005bc0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05FF01ambush01c
Oh yeah, they definitely know we're here. Don't let them sneak up on you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢耶，它们肯定知道我们在哪。不要让它们偷袭！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [0B005C75] (mod) Quest : ([0B005C70]DLC05FF01) Steerage Rats EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05ff01_dlc05ff01ambush0_00005bc1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05FF01ambush01
DLC05FF01Bark01c
What's this button.. Whoa! Hey, can you hear me down there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是什么按钮…哇！嗨，你在那能听到我吗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [0B005C75] (mod) Quest : ([0B005C70]DLC05FF01) Steerage Rats EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05ff01_dlc05ff01bark01c_00005bc2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05FF01bark01
FF01bark01
DLC05MZ3ExLabDeathRayLines
Are you kidding me? That was stupid of them. Now we know they're getting desperate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很明显，不是吗？它们在恐吓我们。你能从刚才它的语气里听出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3exlabdeat_00005d38_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pretty effective threat, if you ask me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要我说的话，这恐吓挺漂亮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3exlabdeat_00005d39_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's obvious, isn't it? They're threatening us. You could tell just by the way he sounded.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在开玩笑吗？它们太蠢了，我们知道它们已经要绝望了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3exlabdeat_00005d3a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Holy SHIT. What was that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，那是什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3exlabdeat_00005d3b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05FF01AirlockVox01
Give me a minute, I'll try to get these doors open for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我点时间，我会尽快为你打开这些门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [0B005C75] (mod) Quest : ([0B005C70]DLC05FF01) Steerage Rats EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05ff01_dlc05ff01airlock_000060b3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05FF01AirlockVox02
Wow, that looks dangerous. See if you can turn it off while I try and figure this door out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，这看起来好危险。看看在我解决这扇门时你能不能关掉它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [0B005C75] (mod) Quest : ([0B005C70]DLC05FF01) Steerage Rats EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05ff01_dlc05ff01airlock_000060ac_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05FF01AirlockVox03
Uh-oh. I think they found a way to get to you. I'll try and get the next door open fast!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，我认为它们可能采用了某种限制。我到隔壁去看看能不能更快打开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [0B005C75] (mod) Quest : ([0B005C70]DLC05FF01) Steerage Rats EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05ff01_dlc05ff01airlock_000060ab_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05FF01AirlockVox04
Hang on! One of these buttons has got to open that door...
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等！其中一个按钮能打开那扇门…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [0B005C75] (mod) Quest : ([0B005C70]DLC05FF01) Steerage Rats EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05ff01_dlc05ff01airlock_000060ae_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05FF01PreArenaVox
Their radios got quiet all of a sudden. I'd be careful if I were you...
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们的电台讯号突然消失了。如果我是你，我就会小心点…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [0B005C75] (mod) Quest : ([0B005C70]DLC05FF01) Steerage Rats EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05ff01_dlc05ff01prearen_000060ad_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05FF01moveForward
Okay!
ESP.TRADUIT: Ok。 !
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [0B005C75] (mod) Quest : ([0B005C70]DLC05FF01) Steerage Rats EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05ff01_dlc05ff01movefor_000060af_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go, go!
ESP.TRADUIT: 冲，冲！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [0B005C75] (mod) Quest : ([0B005C70]DLC05FF01) Steerage Rats EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05ff01_dlc05ff01movefor_000060b0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you waiting for?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还在等什么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [0B005C75] (mod) Quest : ([0B005C70]DLC05FF01) Steerage Rats EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05ff01_dlc05ff01movefor_000060b1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get a move on!
ESP.TRADUIT: 抓紧时间！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [0B005C75] (mod) Quest : ([0B005C70]DLC05FF01) Steerage Rats EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05ff01_dlc05ff01movefor_000060b2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the hell was that thing? Where are they taking that guy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是什么鸟东西？它们从哪儿抓来那家伙的！

ESP.ORIGINAL: What, you've never seen a giant metal claw scoop somebody up and carry him off to who-knows-where?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么，你从没见过一个巨大的金属铲子把人抓起来然后扔到什么鬼地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahtalk_0000683b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know where they're taking him, and I'm not interested in staying here long enough to find out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道它们正在找他，我不想在这寻找太久。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahtalk_0000683b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We gotta get out of here, kid. Now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们现在必须离开这里，孩子！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahtalk_0000683b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05arenaBetweenWaves
More could bust in at any second. Get ready!
ESP.TRADUIT: 随时都可能有更多家伙冲进来，做好准备！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [0B005C75] (mod) Quest : ([0B005C70]DLC05FF01) Steerage Rats EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05ff01_dlc05arenabetwee_00006adf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05FF01SallyAmbushWarning
I told you so! Ambush!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我告诉过你的！有埋伏！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [0B005C75] (mod) Quest : ([0B005C70]DLC05FF01) Steerage Rats EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05ff01_dlc05ff01sallyam_00006ae1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05FF01PostArenaVox
We're almost out of here! I'll meet you up ahead. Hurry!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们就快能离开这里了！我会在前面和你碰头。快点！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [0B005C75] (mod) Quest : ([0B005C70]DLC05FF01) Steerage Rats EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05ff01_dlc05ff01postare_00006ae0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05CryoElliotDontPress
What the hell are you doing?! Don't press that!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在搞什么鬼？！不要按那个！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006c0b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05CryoSquadTalk
Elliott... Is that you? What... What's going on? Where the hell are we?
ESP.TRADUIT: 艾略特…是你吗？发生了什么？我们在哪？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Daniels [0B006C6B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryosquadt_00006c07_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Agh...feels like someone rearranged my insides. What happened to us?
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊…感觉像是有人重新整合了我的内脏。我们怎么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Beckett [0B006C6C] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryosquadt_00006c08_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We have an objective, soldier! We leave immediately.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们有我们的任务，士兵！我们现在就走！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I guess you're right. Let's get the fuck out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我…我想你是对的。让我们离开这个鬼地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab Comment (NAM2) : choking back anger EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006c03_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF.leaveEm to 1 set DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF.askQuestion to 0 set DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF.mark to -1 set DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF. reset to -1 set DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage to -1 set DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF.triggerHit to 3
Let me ask you something before I decide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我决定之前让我问你几个问题吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. What is it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。什么问题？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006c05_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave them! Our objective is to destroy the generator.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别管他们！我们的目标是摧毁发电机。

ESP.ORIGINAL: End it... put them out of their misery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 结束吧…让他们得到解脱！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose you're right. Don't worry, they won't feel a thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想你是对的。别担心，他们不会有感觉的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006c06_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF.killEm to 1 set DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF.askQuestion to 0
Revive them and let them fight with us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让他们复苏，和我们一起战斗。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just remember they won't be alive long so we need to keep moving as fast as we can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 记住他们不会活太久，所以我们必须赶快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006c01_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to need to watch their vitals carefully as I use the medical console to pump them full of the correct fluids and bring them back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我必须观察他们是否复苏，我要用医疗控制台向舱内灌入适当溶液让他们苏醒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006c01_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I give the signal, you open the tubes with that switch. Don't open them until I tell you or the results could be unpredictable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我给信号，你就用开关打开管子。直到我示意前不要打开，否则结果将无法想像的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006c01_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF.useEm to 1 set DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF.askQuestion to 0
We should just put them out of their misery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们应该把他们从苦难中拯救出来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I was considering that too. We can't let the aliens experiment on them any more. It just isn't right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我也在想。我们不能让外星人对他们做实验了。这太糟了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006c09_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But maybe we should give them a chance to fight with us. It's better to die that way than to live through years of agony.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但也许可以让他们和我们共同战斗，那样的死法至少比在这里活受罪要好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006c09_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How long can they last if you revive them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你让他们复苏，他们能坚持多久？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know for certain. I can get them on their feet and moving for maybe a few minutes at best.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不敢确定。我最多能让他们恢复基本能力并活动上几分钟时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006c0f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's no way for me to tell what the aliens have already subjected them to. I can't understand these readouts. Their pain could be horrible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我无法描述他们遭受了那些外星人怎样的对待。我无法理解这些参数。他们的痛苦多半非常骇人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006c0f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This technology is out of my league so I'm just going to have to improvise. It's the best I can do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这技术实在超出我的能力，我只能做到这程度。但我会尽力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006c0f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05CryoElliotGreet01
I don't know what to do. These guys are the last of my squad... they're my friends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道该怎么办。这些伙计是我仅存的战友… 他们是我的伙伴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006c04_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I revive them maybe they could help us. I'm not sure they'll last very long, but if we leave them... you saw what the aliens did to the others...
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我复苏他们，也许他们能帮助我们。我不确定他们能坚持多久，但如果我们离开他们…你看到了外星人对其他人做了什么…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006c04_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05CryoElliotFoundSquadSpeak
Wait! I think that's some more of my squad!
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等！我想那是我的战友！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab Comment (NAM2) : Notices that the actors in the pods are his squad mates. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_0000561c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's Daniels and Beckett!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是丹尼尔斯和贝克特！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006c10_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's got to be a way to revive them with their memories intact so they won't attack us on sight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一定有办法让他们复苏并恢复记忆，这样他们看到我们就不会攻击了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab Comment (NAM2) : Said as he runs toward a terminal and investigates. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006c11_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I may be able to use this medical equipment to bring them out of stasis properly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我可以用这些医疗设备把他们从冬眠室里复苏过来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab Comment (NAM2) : Scanning the terminals nearby EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006c12_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The aliens have already injected them with all sorts of compounds I don't recognize... I don't know how it will affect them when they awaken.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没想到外星人已经给他们注射了这么多的化合物…我不知道它们醒来后会有受到什么影响。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab Comment (NAM2) : Scanning more terminal screens EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006c13_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The tubes are filled with an oxygen compound to sustain them. If I just shut it down, they won't feel a thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 管子里充满了氧气化合物为他们供给。如果只是关掉，他们不会感到异常。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab Comment (NAM2) : Putting the soldiers to sleep. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006c14_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's it then. They're... they're gone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是那样。他们…他们已经逝去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab Comment (NAM2) : Choking back tears... lump in throat. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006c15_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rest in peace men. You deserve it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 安息吧。这是你应得的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006c16_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, let's see. This must initiate the thawing process. Blood pressure looks normal. Heart rate...normal enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，让我们看看。必须启动解冻程序。血压看来正常，心率…足够好了。.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab Comment (NAM2) : Monitors the squads vitals just before telling the player to open the pods EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006c17_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whew. I hope to god this works... Open the tubes. If I did everything right, they'll still be alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，我只求上帝保佑这奏效…打开这筒子，如果我都做对了，他们还会活着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab Comment (NAM2) : As he runs toward the pods he tells the player to open them EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006c18_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right squad, listen up. I know you have no idea what's going on, but you'll just have to trust me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，伙计们，听好了。我知道你们不明白是怎么回事，但你们只需要相信我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab Comment (NAM2) : Tells the squad what they need to know EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006c19_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We were captured by the aliens... the things that grabbed us from Anchorage and now we're free.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们成了外星人的俘虏…从我们在安克雷奇被俘开始，而现在我们自由了 。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab Comment (NAM2) : Tells the squad what they need to know EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006c1a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, take these weapons and follow me. Let's show them what some motivated U.S. soldiers can do!
ESP.TRADUIT: 给，拿上这些武器跟着我。让它们瞧瞧美国大兵的厉害！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab Comment (NAM2) : Tells the squad what they need to know EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006c1b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: On me, squad! Let's go!
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟着我，伙计们。我们上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab Comment (NAM2) : Tells the squad to take action EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006c1c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay. Lets put these guys to use.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。让我们带着这些伙计。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab Comment (NAM2) : Says this when returning to follow the player. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006c1d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05BridgeElliotDown
They hit something big! Shields and Elliott are down!
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们打中了什么重要部件！护盾和艾略特关闭了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgeelli_00006c81_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
They just took out our shields!
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们刚刚打穿了我们的护盾！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgeelli_00007031_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
Think you can take care of that mess in the engine room?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认为自己能料理引擎室里的杂碎吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05CryoSquadDiesB
DLC05CryoSquadDies
Yeah, maybe your right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，或许你是对的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen, we're all in danger if we stay here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我们要是继续留在这里，我们都会有危险。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I know. They're always mad when they find out I've been out of my cell. They're gonna be REALLY mad when they see what you did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我知道了，它们发现我逃出牢房时总会很生气的。但它们看见你的所作所为时真的要发疯了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallygree_00006de1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But it's okay. I'll go with you! I can show you around some. I've seen a whole bunch of this place already.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但没关系。我会跟着你的！我可以带你参观这里。我对这里了如指掌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallygree_00006de1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We need to go through the Steamworks to the big engine room. From there we can see all sorts of places. Come on, I'll help you get there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们需要穿过蒸汽管线区到达引擎室。途中我们可以看到各种场所。快来，我帮你到那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallygree_00006de1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage DLC05MZ1 50
How did you do that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么做到的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's wires and stuff inside the wall there. A while ago I learned which ones to put together to make the doors work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 墙里面有电线和其他的材料，我要把它们组装在一起让门工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallygree_00006ddf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's all kinds of stuff in the walls, but I guess you're too big to see. But that's okay, I can get to it just fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那墙后面有各种各样的材料，但我猜你太胖了。不过没关系，我刚好能过去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallygree_00006ddf_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, we need to get to the big engine room so I can show you the rest of this place. I can help you even more!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们要去引擎室让你看看这艘飞船上其他的人，如果你需要其他帮助的话尽管找我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallygree_00006ddf_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage DLC05MZ1 50
Thanks, kid. We're getting out of here -- you want to come with us?
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你，孩子。我们要离开了—你要跟着一起走么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure! I love exploring, and it's been a while since I've been out and about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然！我热爱冒险，因次我一直在外面闯荡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallygree_00006de0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll have to be careful, because they'll be mad that we're out. But it's okay, I know how to get through the steamworks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们要小心，因为它们将疯狂地搜捕我们，别担心，我知道怎么通过蒸汽管线区。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallygree_00006de0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We need to get to the big engine room, so I can show you the rest of the ship. Let's go!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们要去引擎室，我可以让你看看这艘飞船上其他的人，走吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallygree_00006de0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage DLC05MZ1 50
I'll take over from here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会接管这里的！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh really? Suddenly you have all the answers?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，真的？你一下子都知道了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahgree_00006ddd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen kid, I'm all ears if you've got an idea, but there's no way you've got any more idea what's going on here than I do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着孩子，如果你有好主意。我会洗耳恭听的，但是现在没有办法比我的办法更好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahgree_00006ddd_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any idea where we are, or how to get back home?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道我们在哪，或者我们该怎么回家吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not a clue. I'm hoping we can get some answers once we get out of this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁知道，我希望我们离开这里时能得到一些答案。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahgree_00006de2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're the one with the plan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是个有计划的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Plan? Yeah, we just used my plan. It got us out of our cell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 计划？是的，就采用我的计划。我们要逃出牢房。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahgree_00006dde_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hate to break it to you, but that's all I've got. We have to wing it from here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不愿意这样，但那是我必须做的。我们得从这里逃走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahgree_00006dde_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05CoreScene04
No sense discussin?it now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在没什么好争论的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B006E2B]DLC05CoreScene) 0B006E2B (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : matter of fact, after killing a potential alien hostage EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05cores_dlc05corescene0_00006e19_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;note don't condition this on DLC05CoreScene.running as it needs to happen regardless
setstage DLC05CoreScene 255
DLC05CoreScene03
I don抰 know, but maybe we should... there must be something...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道，但也许我们应该…做些什么…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B006E2B]DLC05CoreScene) 0B006E2B (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : coming up short for a good argument in his favor EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cores_dlc05corescene0_00006e1b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05CoreScene.stage to 4 DLC05PaulsonRef.evp
DLC05CoreScene02
And how are we supposed to do that? We can抰 understand what the hell they抮e saying!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我们应该怎么做呢？我们不知道它们在说些什么！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B006E2B]DLC05CoreScene) 0B006E2B (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : wanting to kill the alien and get it over with EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05cores_dlc05corescene0_00006e1c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05CoreScene.stage to 3 DLC05TercorienRef.sayTo DLC05SomahRef DLC05CoreScene03
DLC05CoreScene01
He抯 not going anywhere. Why don抰 we just hold on to him, and try to negotiate? Y択now, like a hostage?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他哪也没去。为什么我们不再耐心点对待他，并试着和他沟通？你觉得像一个累赘？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B006E2B]DLC05CoreScene) 0B006E2B (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : about a near dying alien captive EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cores_dlc05corescene0_00006e1a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05CoreScene.stage to 2 DLC05SomahRef.sayTo DLC05TercorienRef DLC05CoreScene02
Why are we stuck inside the laboratory?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们为什么会被困在实验室里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think when we opened the door to the operating room we set off some kind of containment alarm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我们打开手术室的门，可能触发了某种警报。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006e54_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The room seals itself up and it looks like it's being flooded with some sort of decontamination gases. Pretty high-tech stuff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个房间是封闭的，好象充满了某种净化气体。完美的高科技产品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006e54_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unless I miss my guess, it will cycle itself and unlock the doors in a little bit. We'll just have to wait it out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我猜的没错的话，它会自动开启大门。我们等等先。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006e54_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not sure. We'll just have to wait for the system to cycle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是很肯定。我们得等待系统运行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006e55_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How long until the laboratory unseals itself?
ESP.TRADUIT: 打开实验室需要多久？

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05CryoWeaponsFound
Hmmm. Let me take some of this cryogenic compound back to the engine core. I might be able to make some use of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯。我会带一些冷冻化合物回工程中枢，它可能有用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoweapon_00006e56_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait just a second...
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoweapon_00007242_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I've decided what we should do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我已经决定该怎么做了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks. I'm really not sure what's best for them. What did you decide?
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢。我真不知该怎么处置他。你们怎么想？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006e58_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We should just leave them here. It's too late for them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们走吧，他们没救了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, we have to do something! We can't just leave them in there like some sort of a lab rat to get poked and prodded and cut open!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，我们要做点什么！我们至少不能让他们像实验室的小白鼠那样任人宰割！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006e57_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We have to either let them fight and die like soldiers or at the very least put them out of their misery!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们要么让他们像战士那样战死，或者至少可以解除他们的痛苦！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006e57_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05CryoElliotChoice0c
DLC05CryoElliotChoice0b
Do you know where we're going?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道我们要去哪里吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。 !
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1tlsallywh_000076b7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We need to go to the big engine thing, and then from there we can go up to the top of the ship.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们需要到引擎室，从那里我们可以到飞船的顶部。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1tlsallywh_000076b7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's where the guy in charge is. I've only seen him once or twice, but he's extra mean.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是那家伙掌控的地方，我只见过它一两次，它很卑鄙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1tlsallywh_000076b7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess you'll probably have to kill him or something, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想你可能要杀了它，对吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1tlsallywh_000076b7_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05BridgeTopicSallyHelp
Try hitting some buttons, one of them has to do something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 试着按下那堆按钮，总有一个是有用的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_0000704d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05BridgeLD.sallyHelp to 1 set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
Try hitting that button down there. It's flashing, it probably does something good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 试着按那个按钮。它在闪，也许能派上些用场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_0000704f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
DLC05SteamSallyGunTut
I've seen them use those arch things to heal themselves. I don't know if it'll work for you, but you could try it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看过它们用这些拱型医疗站治疗。不知道它对你是否有用，你可以试试看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steam_dlc05steamsally_00007277_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those are some of their guns over there. You should get one. Or even a bunch of them, just in case.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是它们的枪，你应该拿一把，或者多拿几把。以防万一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steam_dlc05steamsally_00007049_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's some alien goo tubes on that table over there. I've seen them use it to fix guns and stuff. I bet it'll work for you too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那边桌子上有些外星凝胶管，我见过它们用它来修理武器等东西。我相信它也能为你所用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steam_dlc05steamsally_0000704c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05SteamSallyComment
Nice one!
ESP.TRADUIT: 漂亮！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steam_dlc05steamsally_00007032_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05SteamworksLD.sallyComment to 5
Good job!
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得好！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steam_dlc05steamsally_00007033_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow, you must really hate them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，你肯定恨死它们了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steam_dlc05steamsally_00007034_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Over this way!
ESP.TRADUIT: 对面！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steam_dlc05steamsally_00007035_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yay! We made it. That wasn't so bad, was it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 耶！我们成功了。还不错，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steam_dlc05steamsally_00007036_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05SteamSallyIgnored
You know, I could have done that for you. I'm only trying to help!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道吗，我能为你做到的。我只是想帮忙！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steam_dlc05steamsally_00007037_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;// send her to the vents set DLC05SteamworksLD.sallyIgnoreVent to 1 DLC05SallyREF.EVP
Or don't.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或者别这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steam_dlc05steamsally_00007038_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, be that way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，就那样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steam_dlc05steamsally_00007039_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm just trying to make your life easier, but whatever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只想让你轻松点，但还是算了吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steam_dlc05steamsally_0000703a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, your other left!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，你的另一边！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steam_dlc05steamsally_0000703b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05HQPaulsonGotYourBack
I'll stay up here to draw a bead on the aliens as they rush us. If they get near those towers... hit the buttons and fry 'em!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会留在这，等它们突袭我们的时候就用电圈对付这群外星人。如果它们靠近那些电塔…就敲这按钮，震飞它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B0041CC]DLC05HQ) Hangar Scripting/Staging Support Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05hq_dlc05hqpaulsongoty_00007075_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05HQPaulsonIncoming
I dunno what that sound is, but it can't be good. Watch yourself, I think we're about to have company.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道那声音是什么，但肯定没好事。你自己小心，我想咱们就要有伴儿了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B0041CC]DLC05HQ) Hangar Scripting/Staging Support Quest Comment (NAM2) : Player just set off an alarm, siege fight about to start. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05hq_dlc05hqpaulsoninco_00007079_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage dlc05HQ 46
DLC05HQPaulsonGenerator
Finally. Let's get rid of that machine and then get the hell outta here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后，让我们毁掉那个机器，离开这个鬼地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B0041CC]DLC05HQ) Hangar Scripting/Staging Support Quest Comment (NAM2) : Paulson walks into the generator room. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05hq_dlc05hqpaulsongene_00007074_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05HQPaulsonHole
Hold on there... don't take another step. No telling how far down that goes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 待在那里…别轻举妄动。还没说接下来怎么办呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B0041CC]DLC05HQ) Hangar Scripting/Staging Support Quest Comment (NAM2) : player gets too close to the hole where the hangar door is. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05hq_dlc05hqpaulsonhole_00007076_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05HangarPaulsonSeesShip
Well, I thought I've seen it all... what the hell is that thing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我想我都看到了…那到底是什么玩意？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B0041CC]DLC05HQ) Hangar Scripting/Staging Support Quest Comment (NAM2) : Paulson observes recon craft theta rising into the hangar bay. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05hq_dlc05hangarpaulson_00007078_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05HangarPaulsonEnemyBehind
Watch out! The damn things are comin' from the generator room!
ESP.TRADUIT: 小心！这该死的东西从发电机房跑出来的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B0041CC]DLC05HQ) Hangar Scripting/Staging Support Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05hq_dlc05hangarpaulson_00007077_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05HQPaulsonExplodeGenerator
Scratch one generator machine. That oughta piss those aliens off! If we're done here, we should get back to the others.
ESP.TRADUIT: 弄毁了一台发电机，这会气死那些外星人的！我们要是干完了，就该回去和其他人会合了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B0041CC]DLC05HQ) Hangar Scripting/Staging Support Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05hq_dlc05hqpaulsonexpl_0000710e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05CryoElliotMadAtPlayer
I had no choice... I.. I had to do it. You saw. They would have killed us. Damn it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我别无选择…我…我必须这么干。你看到了。他们会杀了我们的。该死的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006dad_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why couldn't you just wait before you opened their pods? If you don't trust me enough to listen to me, why did you drag me down here with you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么不能等到打开他们吊舱的时候呢？如果你不听我的，为什么还把我拖过来。
