ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006dad_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah forget it. It's too late now. They're dead and there's no way to bring them back. Let's get the hell out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，算了。现在太迟了。他们已经死了，无法再挽救了。让我们离开这鬼地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006dad_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05CryoQ.elliotMadBothKilled to 0 set DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF.mark to -1 set DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF.reset to -1 set DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage to -1 set DLC05MZ2.MZ2TercorienFollow to 1 set DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF.SquadDead to 3 set DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF.triggerHit to 3
What the hell did you do that for? There might have been a chance to save them! What the fuck is wrong with you?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你到底做了什么？本来可以救活他们的！你他妈的搞什么？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006e5f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you don't trust me enough to listen to me, why did you drag me down here with you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不听我的，为什么还把我拖过来?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006e5f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah forget it. It's too late now. They're dead and there's no way to bring them back. Let's get the hell out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，算了。现在太迟了。他们已经死了，无法再挽救了。让我们离开这鬼地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006e5f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05CryoQ.elliotMadPlayerKilled to 0 set DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF.mark to -1 set DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF.reset to -1 set DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage to -1 set DLC05MZ2.MZ2TercorienFollow to 1 set DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF.SquadDead to 3 set DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF.triggerHit to 3
What the hell did you do that for? I thought we agreed to leave them alone!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么要这样做？我想我们已经同意离开他们了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_000070a8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What if we would have found some way to revive them safely and returned here? Then they may have had a chance!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们能找到办法救活他们，让他们回到这？他们本来有机会的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_000070a8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah forget it. It's too late now. They're dead and there's no way to bring them back. Let's get the hell out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，算了。现在太迟了。他们已经死了，无法再挽救了。让我们离开这鬼地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003CB8]DLC05CryoQ) Cryo Lab EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_000070a8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05CryoQ.elliotMadPlayerKilled to 0 set DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF.mark to -1 set DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF.reset to -1 set DLC05CryoQ.elliotFoundSquadTalkStage to -1 set DLC05MZ2.MZ2TercorienFollow to 1 set DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF.SquadDead to 3 set DLC05CryoSoldierRoomTrigREF.triggerHit to 3
DLC05FF01goAwayMeanhead
Go away, meanie! Just you wait 'till my friend gets here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 走开，混蛋！我朋友来了的话，会给你好看！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [0B005C75] (mod) Quest : ([0B005C70]DLC05FF01) Steerage Rats EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05ff01_dlc05ff01goawaym_00007399_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05FF01xcartGetGoing
Hey, we're moving... Cool!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，我们正在移动…酷！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B005C70]DLC05FF01) Steerage Rats EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05ff01_dlc05ff01xcartge_00007452_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05FF01aliensLookout
Aliens! Look out!
ESP.TRADUIT: 外星人！小心！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B005C70]DLC05FF01) Steerage Rats EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05ff01_dlc05ff01xcartal_00007453_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC0FF01cows
Cows? We got cows!
ESP.TRADUIT: 牛？我们看到了牛了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B005C70]DLC05FF01) Steerage Rats EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05ff01_dlc05ff01xcartco_00007454_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you think you can make use of that stuff you picked up in the Cryo Labs?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认为你从低温实验室里面搞回来的这些东西有用吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I think so. Before I was shipped out to Anchorage, I was trained in cryoscience. We were hoping to apply that to medicine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我想是的。在来到安克雷奇前，我进行了新兵训练。我们希望成为一名医疗兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05conve_dlc05convtlterc_00007566_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The compounds we used weren't that different from this cryogenic liquid. I'm pretty sure I can make us some improvised weapons from it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们使用的化合物与这低温液体差不多，我确信能用它改进武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05conve_dlc05convtlterc_00007566_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm thinking something along the lines of cryo grenades and cryo mines... I don't know yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在想冷冻手榴弹和冷冻地雷的联系…我还不太清楚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05conve_dlc05convtlterc_00007566_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Check back with me in about an hour and I'll see what I can do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 过一小时再来找我，看看我能做出什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05conve_dlc05convtlterc_00007566_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05Conversations.DLC05CryoTimeFirst to 1 set DLC05Conversations.DLC05CryoHour to GameHour set DLC05Conversations.DLC05CryoDay to GameDay
Yeah, sure did. I was able to make a few cryo grenades and cryo mines.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，当然了。我能制造一些冰冻手榴弹或冰冻地雷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05conve_dlc05convtlterc_00007567_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can make more, but I'll need around three more hours. Keep checking back with me and I'll tinker with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能做更多，但我需要大约三小时。时不时回来看看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05conve_dlc05convtlterc_00007567_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05Conversations.DLC05CryoTime to 1 set DLC05Conversations.DLC05CryoWpnReady to 0 set DLC05Conversations.DLC05CryoHour to GameHour set DLC05Conversations.DLC05CryoDay to GameDay
Player.AddItem DLC05WeapGrenadeCryo 3 Player.AddItem DLC05WeapMineCryo 3
Were you able to come up with any cryogenic weapons?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能搞到一些冷冻武器吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here you go. Hope you're making good use of them. If you need more, I should have a batch ready in about three hours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给你，希望你好好利用。如果你要更多，我需要大约三小时。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05conve_dlc05convtlterc_00007568_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05Conversations.DLC05CryoTime to 1 set DLC05Conversations.DLC05CryoWpnReady to 0 set DLC05Conversations.DLC05CryoHour to GameHour set DLC05Conversations.DLC05CryoDay to GameDay
Player.AddItem DLC05WeapGrenadeCryo 2 Player.AddItem DLC05WeapMineCryo 2
Any more Cryo Grenades or Cryo Mines ready?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有更多的冷冻手榴弹或者冷冻地雷吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not yet. Still working on them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还没完成，我正在做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05conve_dlc05convtlterc_00007569_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any Cryo Grenades or Cryo Mines ready?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有更多的冷冻手榴弹或者冷冻地雷吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We need to find out what that was, and put a stop to it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们得弄明白那是什么，然后阻止它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose. Lead the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想可以，带路吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3greetdeat_000076ba_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage DLC05MZ3 20
Yeah, no kidding. Wow, they've gotta be really pissed at us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，别开玩笑了。哇，它们现在一定被咱们气疯了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3greetdeat_000076bb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We better hurry up and find out how to shut that thing down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们最好赶快找到怎样关掉那东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3greetdeat_000076bb_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage DLC05MZ3 20
Yeah, sure. No question about that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，当然，没问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3greetdeat_000076bc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if you ask me, seeing that was kind of good news. Means we're making some headway, you know? Really getting under their skin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是如果你问我，那看起来是个好消息。我们取得了一些成绩，明白吗？让它们受了重创。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3greetdeat_000076bc_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage DLC05MZ3 20
I have no idea what he said, but he sounded pretty angry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听不懂它说的话，不过听起来它很不爽。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yep, it seemed all riled up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，它被激怒了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3greetdeat_000076b5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Might end up being a good thing. Lose your cool, you're more likely to make mistakes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能是一件好事。失去冷静，更有可能犯错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3greetdeat_000076b5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still, seems we oughta make sure that doesn't happen again. Shut off whatever that thing was.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，看起来我们应该确保不会再发生此事。不管那是什么一定要关掉它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3greetdeat_000076b5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage DLC05MZ3 20
You think? What clued you in?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认为呢？有什么线索？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3greetdeat_0000a717_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's bad enough that they're trying to kill us, but that was... What, like trying to fry the Earth or something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们正追杀我们就够糟糕的了，没想到它们还要…什么？！它们还要把整个地球给油炸了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3greetdeat_0000a717_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We gotta find that... Death Ray, or whatever it is... and stop it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们必须找到那个…死光，不管它是什么…阻止它！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3greetdeat_0000a717_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage DLC05MZ3 20
Oh, come on. You don't need to understand it to get the point.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，来吧，你不需要那么深入地了解它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3greetdeat_000076b6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's some kind of a threat. And if they're threatening us, it's a good bet we're starting to scare 'em a bit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它是一种威胁。如果它们正在威胁着我们，去吓它们一下，这或许是个好主意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3greetdeat_000076b6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, you ask me, we need to find out what that was and make sure it doesn't happen again, but at least we know we're getting somewhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，既然你问我，我们需要找出到底是怎么一回事并确保它不再发生。至少我们还知道我们现在该干什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3greetdeat_000076b6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage DLC05MZ3 20
What the hell was that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 发生了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No idea. Been in over my head for a while now. Still, I'm thinking whatever that was, it wasn't a good thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还不知道，我想了一段时间。不过，我在想不管它是什么，应该不是什么好东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3greetdeat_000076b2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Probably best if it doesn't happen again, you get my meaning?
ESP.TRADUIT: 最好别再发生了，你懂我的意思吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3greetdeat_000076b2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage DLC05MZ3 20
How the hell do I know? It sure looked like it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我他妈怎样知道？它看起来就像那样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3greetdeat_000076b3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That was crazy! What if they use that thing on us!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这太疯狂了！如果它们用这东西对付我们怎么办！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3greetdeat_000076b3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You gotta find that thing. You gotta find it and get rid of it, before something really bad happens...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你得找到那个东西。在糟糕的事情发生前，你得找到并关掉它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3greetdeat_000076b3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage DLC05MZ3 20
You think it was some sort of weapon?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得这是某种武器吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pretty obvious, wasn't it? They're putting on a big show, trying to scare us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很明显，不是吗？它们要来次大型表演，想恐吓我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3greetdeat_000076b4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Means we're getting under their skin. That's a good thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好像我们就在它们的眼皮底下。这似乎不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3greetdeat_000076b4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course, now it looks like we've got a big Death Ray thing we need to take down before they blow up the whole damn planet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，现在看上去有个死光等着我们去摧毁它，不然它们会炸了下面这颗倒霉星球的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3greetdeat_000076b4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But it's nice to know we're having an effect, don't you think?
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来我们所做的有点效果，你不觉得？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3greetdeat_000076b4_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage DLC05MZ3 20
Are you all alone? Where's your family?
ESP.TRADUIT: 只有你一个人吗？你的家人在哪？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have any family anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有其他家人了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallytlwh_000076b1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My mom and dad died a while ago, before I ended up here. Y'know, back when all the bombs dropped on everything?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的妈妈和爸爸在我被关在这之前就已经去世了。就在核弹把一切毁灭之前，你明白了吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallytlwh_000076b1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, it was right after that. And then me and my sister, we got pulled up here... Except I haven't seen her in a long time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后我和我姐姐，我们被带到了这儿…我已经很久没看到她了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallytlwh_000076b1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you know so much about this place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么会对这个地方如此了解？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I've been here a while. A long while.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，我已经在这待了一段时间了。一段很长的时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallytlho_000076b8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes I can sneak out of my cell and go explore. I've seen a bunch of the ship. It's pretty neat, but they always catch me and put me back here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时候我可以偷偷离开了我的牢房去探险。我曾经瞧见过一大群这样的船。这实在是太美了，可它们总是抓住我，把我扔回这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallytlho_000076b8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found this sword... does it belong to you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到这柄剑，是你的么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, sessha no ken! Katajike nai.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，在下的剑！万分感激。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toshiro Kago [0B0032FC] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesamurai\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2samuraigr_0000a94a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sumanuga, korekara dosuruka hitoride kangaetai. Shitsurei suru.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，在下想独自细想今后的打算。失礼了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toshiro Kago [0B0032FC] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesamurai\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2samuraigr_0000a94a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.Removeitem DLC05WeapSamuraiSword 1 DLC05SamuraiRef.Additem DLC05WeapSamuraiSword 1 set DLC05Conversations.DLC05SwordFound to 2
Yeah, I'm not getting a single word here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 耶，我一个字都听不懂。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nantoka senuka! Sessha no ken wa ittai doko ni arunoda!
ESP.TRADUIT: 做点什么！在下的剑究竟在何处？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toshiro Kago [0B0032FC] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesamurai\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2samuraigr_0000797e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry, but I can't understand you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很抱歉，但是我听不懂你说的话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nani wo itteorunoda. Sappari wakaran. Nantoka shite kure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 发生了何事，全然不明。做点什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toshiro Kago [0B0032FC] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesamurai\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2samuraigr_00007987_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, great. You don't speak English? This is going to be a waste of time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，太他妈好了。你不会讲英语？这真是浪费时间。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Onushi, ittai nanimono? Sessha wa naze koko ni iru?
ESP.TRADUIT: 阁下究竟乃何人？在下为何在此？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toshiro Kago [0B0032FC] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesamurai\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2samuraigr_0000797f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sessha no ken wa do natta. Eei, hayaku kaesanu ka!
ESP.TRADUIT: 在下的剑怎么了。诶，速速还回！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toshiro Kago [0B0032FC] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesamurai\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2samuraigr_0000797f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Calm down. We're trying to escape. Can you help us?
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷静点。我们在试着逃跑。你能帮帮我们么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nani wo itte orunoda. Kono chi ni mioboe wa nai. Ittai sessha ni nani wo shita?
ESP.TRADUIT: 发生了何事，全无印象。究竟对在下做了什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toshiro Kago [0B0032FC] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesamurai\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2samuraigr_0000797d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sessha no ken wo imasugu kaesunoda. Hayaku kaesanu ka!
ESP.TRADUIT: 立即还回在下的剑来。速速还回！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toshiro Kago [0B0032FC] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesamurai\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2samuraigr_0000797d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? What are you saying?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？你在说什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sessha no ken wa dokoda? Ima sugu kaesanu ka!
ESP.TRADUIT: 在下的剑在何处？速速还回！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toshiro Kago [0B0032FC] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesamurai\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2samuraigr_0000797c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, are you okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，你还好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sappari wakaran. Koko ga doko nanoka mouse. Sessha no ken wa do shita?
ESP.TRADUIT: 全然不明。快说此处为何处。在下的剑怎么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toshiro Kago [0B0032FC] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesamurai\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2samuraigr_00007980_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you know about this Toshiro Kago guy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道什么有关加护俊这家伙的事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uhh... it wasn't my turn to watch him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃…不是还没轮到我看着他吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlsamurai_00007a66_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I dunno. He was here before...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道。他之前还在这的……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlsamurai_00007a66_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where's that Kago guy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 加护那家伙在哪？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He looks like a Japanese Samurai. I guess the aliens must have plucked him up from earth a long time ago. I can't understand a word he's saying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他看来像个日本武士。我猜外星人一定在很久以前就把他带离地球了。我 完全听不懂他说的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlsamurai_0000abad_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Huh, how about that. He's gone. I didn't even notice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，那怎么办。他都走了。我却一直没察觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlsamurai_0000abae_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hope he doesn't get himself into trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望他别给他自己惹上麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlsamurai_0000abae_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't see that Kago fellow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没看见那个加护跟过来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No idea what his deal is. Sounds like that gibberish you can pick up on the radio in some parts of the Wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道他在说什么。听起来就好象在废墟上的一些电台。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlsamurai_00007a67_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Took off. Don't know where to. Don't much care.
ESP.TRADUIT: 出发。不知道到哪去了。不过没什么好担心的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlsamurai_0000abaf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where's that Kago guy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 加护那家伙在哪？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some sort of foreigner, obviously. Can't make out a word he's saying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很明显是个外国人。他的话一句都没法听明白。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlsamurai_00007a68_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ummm, I think he's from the earth's past. There are people frozen all over the ship that the aliens grabbed wearing funny old time clothes and stuff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我想他来自古代。船上到处都是被外人星人抓来冷冻的穿着有趣的古装和饰品的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlsamurai_00007a69_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll handle this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能搞定。

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I can help!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是我能帮上忙！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steam_dlc05steamsally_00007b90_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;set dlc05SteamWorksLD.sallyIgnoreVent to 1 ;dlc05SallyREF.evp ;prevent sally from dialog spamming you
Don't worry about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oookay...
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steam_dlc05steamsally_00007b92_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well good luck. I'm going to get out of sight. Don't worry, I'll stay nearby and help you when I can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真幸运。我会躲起来的，别担心，我会在附近尽可能帮你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steam_dlc05steamsally_00007b92_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;set dlc05SteamWorksLD.sallyIgnoreVent to 1 ;dlc05SallyREF.evp ;prevent sally from dialog spamming you
How about I distract them, and you hit them from behind with a grenade?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我吸引它们的主意，而你从背后用手榴弹袭击它们，你看这个主意怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow, really?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，真的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steam_dlc05steamsally_00007b93_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I get to use a grenade? Neat!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会用手榴弹？太棒了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steam_dlc05steamsally_00007b93_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take this Plasma Grenade.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿着这个电浆手榴弹。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got it! Give me a minute to sneak around them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 了解！给我点时间偷偷绕到它们后面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steam_dlc05steamsally_00007b91_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage DLC05SteamworksLD 8 DLC05SallyRef.EVP set dlc05SteamworksLD.sallyGrenade to 2 player.removeItem weapgrenadeplasma 1
Take this Frag Grenade.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿着这个烟雾手榴弹。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cool!
ESP.TRADUIT: 酷！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steam_dlc05steamsally_00007b94_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give me just a second to get behind them...
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我点时间偷偷绕到它们后面…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steam_dlc05steamsally_00007b94_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage DLC05SteamworksLD 8 DLC05SallyRef.EVP set dlc05SteamworksLD.sallyGrenade to 1 player.removeItem weapgrenadefrag 1
DLC05SamuraiMeditate
You sure this is a good idea?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你确定这是个好主意？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think so. Seems like they're getting even more angry at us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想是的。它们看起来更生气了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3sallytele_00007e1e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forget the teleporter. Let's just go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 忘了传送装置吧，我们用走的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That doesn't seem like a very good idea.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这似乎不是一个好主意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3sallytele_00007e1d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If they turned it off, that means they know we're here, and they're probably waiting on the other side of that door.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果它们关掉它，那说明它们知道了我们在这，它们也许会在门后偷袭我们 。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3sallytele_00007e1d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It'd be smarter if just one person went and checked it out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只让一个人去查看会比较明智。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3sallytele_00007e1d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry, we'll be safe right here. Good luck!
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心，我们在这里很安全。好运！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3sallytele_00007e1d_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, you wait here. I'll see if I can find the controls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我们在这里等。我会试着找出控制开关的方法。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good luck! We'll stay right here and wait for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝你好运！我们会待在这等你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3sallytele_00007e1f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What did you get us into this time?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这次又把我们弄到哪里了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think we're in the trash section of the ship. Yucky!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我们是在船上的废品站。真讨厌！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B005C70]DLC05FF01) Steerage Rats EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05ff01_dlc05ff01xwherew_00007eb3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's go back the way we came.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们原路返回。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You really must have hit your head. Unless you're Captain Cosmos and have a rocket pack we can use, that's not happening.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你脑子坏掉了吗？除非你是背着火箭背包的考斯莫思舰长，但那是不可能的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B005C70]DLC05FF01) Steerage Rats EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05ff01_dlc05ff01xbackup_00007eb6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm all right. How about you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很好。你呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I'm okay. You don't look so good, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我没事。不过你看上去不太好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B005C70]DLC05FF01) Steerage Rats EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05ff01_dlc05ff01xiamfin_00007eb0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05WhereAreWe
I'm fine. No thanks to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很好。不谢了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry, okay!? How was I supposed to know this would happen?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很抱歉，好吗！？我怎么可能预料到会变成这样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B005C70]DLC05FF01) Steerage Rats EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05ff01_dlc05ff01xiamfin_00007ebc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's get back to the core.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们回中枢去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, there's a teleporter nearby that I found. Race ya!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我发现附近有个传送装置，跑！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B005C70]DLC05FF01) Steerage Rats EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05ff01_dlc05ff01goodbye_00007eb1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage DLC05FF01 91 evp
Okay, I'll try and find a way to help you get out of there. Otherwise, see you back at the core.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，我会尽力救你出去，你先回中枢看看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B005C70]DLC05FF01) Steerage Rats EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05ff01_dlc05ff01goodbye_00007eb2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage DLC05FF01 46 evp
I guess we should split up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我们应该分头行动。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for nothing, Sally.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么好谢的，莎莉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, it's not like this was a wasted trip. Check out the storage closet I found here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，这不是一次空手而归的旅行，瞧瞧我在这里找到储藏柜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B005C70]DLC05FF01) Steerage Rats EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05ff01_dlc05ff01retrosp_00007eaf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, that was... fun. What now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，那可真……有趣。现在干嘛？ ?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's get back to the core and never speak of this again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们回中枢吧，别再谈这个了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B005C70]DLC05FF01) Steerage Rats EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05ff01_dlc05ff01whatnow_00007eb7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05FF01xcartSawUs
Do you think we were noticed?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得我们被发现了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B005C70]DLC05FF01) Steerage Rats EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05ff01_dlc05ff01xcartsa_00007eb4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05FF01xcartFirstComment
Oh, I get it! We're in one of their trash cans that move around the ship. I always wondered where these things go...
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我知道了！我们在一个环绕飞船旋转的垃圾桶里，我想知道接着会发生什么…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B005C70]DLC05FF01) Steerage Rats EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05ff01_dlc05ff01xcartfi_00007ebb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05SamuraiScenesBridgeTopic
[BANGING SOUND COMING FROM BRIDGE DOOR]
ESP.TRADUIT: [舰桥上传来的砰砰声]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toshiro Kago [0B0032FC] (mod) Quest : ([0B007D27]DLC05SamuraiScenes) 0B007D27 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05SamuraiScenes.talking to 0
Wait, did anyone hear that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，有人听到吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B007D27]DLC05SamuraiScenes) 0B007D27 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05samur_dlc05samuraisce_00008291_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;needs to be conditioned on other NPCs being alive
set DLC05SamuraiScenes.talking to 0
Wait, did you hear that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，你听到了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B007D27]DLC05SamuraiScenes) 0B007D27 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05samur_dlc05samuraisce_00008292_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;if the other NPCs are dead she says this to player
set DLC05SamuraiScenes.talking to 0
Little busy here, darling.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有点忙，亲爱的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B007D27]DLC05SamuraiScenes) 0B007D27 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : sarcastic EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05samur_dlc05samuraisce_00008293_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05SamuraiScenes.talking to 0
What did you hear, Sally?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听到什么了，莎莉？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B007D27]DLC05SamuraiScenes) 0B007D27 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05samur_dlc05samuraisce_00008294_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05SamuraiScenes.talking to 0
[BANGING SOUND COMING FROM BRIDGE DOOR]
ESP.TRADUIT: [舰桥上传来的砰砰声]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toshiro Kago [0B0032FC] (mod) Quest : ([0B007D27]DLC05SamuraiScenes) 0B007D27 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05SamuraiScenes.talking to 0
There it is again. Is that an Alien?
ESP.TRADUIT: 又来了。是外星人？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B007D27]DLC05SamuraiScenes) 0B007D27 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesamurai\dlc05samur_dlc05samuraisce_00008296_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05SamuraiScenes.talking to 0
Iretekure! Sessha wa eirian deha gozaran. Sessha wa samurai nari. Otanomi mosu!
ESP.TRADUIT: 请让在下进去！在下并非外星人。在下乃武士是也。拜托了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toshiro Kago [0B0032FC] (mod) Quest : ([0B007D27]DLC05SamuraiScenes) 0B007D27 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : [sound muffled from being the door] EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesamurai\dlc05samur_dlc05samuraisce_00008297_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05SamuraiScenes.talking to 0
Oh, it's the Samurai! We should let him in!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，是那个武士！我们应该让他进来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B007D27]DLC05SamuraiScenes) 0B007D27 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : excited EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05samur_dlc05samuraisce_00008298_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05SamuraiScenes.talking to 0
Fine. Let the Chinaman in. Could use his arm in here if it gets rough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，让中国朋友加入。如果事态变糟，他还能帮帮忙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B007D27]DLC05SamuraiScenes) 0B007D27 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : begrudging EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05samur_dlc05samuraisce_00008299_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05SamuraiScenes.talking to 0
Actually, I think he's from Japan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上，我觉得他是个日本人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B007D27]DLC05SamuraiScenes) 0B007D27 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : correcting a prejudiced error EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05samur_dlc05samuraisce_0000829a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: look DLC05PaulsonRef 1
set DLC05SamuraiScenes.talking to 0 stoplook
As you say. Kindly invite the Oriental gentleman with the sword to join us... NOW!
ESP.TRADUIT: 像你说的，礼貌地邀请那个带着剑的东方绅士加入我们…就是现在！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B007D27]DLC05SamuraiScenes) 0B007D27 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : annoyed and sarcastic. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05samur_dlc05samuraisce_0000829b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05SamuraiScenes.talking to 0
Hello Samurai! Glad you're still alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好，武士！很高兴你还活着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B007D27]DLC05SamuraiScenes) 0B007D27 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : upbeat despite chaos around her EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05samur_dlc05samuraisce_0000829c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;stage 12 is her opening the door ;stage 13 is her walking to her marker to greet samurai look DLC05SamuraiRef 1
set DLC05SamuraiScenes.talking to 0 stoplook
Ya, kore wa katajike nai. Soregashi ni dekiru kotoga gozareba nannarito.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呀，真是万分感激。凡在下力所能及之事，请尽管吩咐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toshiro Kago [0B0032FC] (mod) Quest : ([0B007D27]DLC05SamuraiScenes) 0B007D27 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : relieved EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesamurai\dlc05samur_dlc05samuraisce_0000829d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05SamuraiScenes.talking to 0
You think anything in here can prove useful?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认为这里有什么东西用得上？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, the cryogenics compound I found will help already, but keep your eyes open for anything else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，我找到的低温化合物会有帮助的，再留意你的周围找找其他东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tllevelhe_00008ab8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not sure. Some of this stuff looks way more advanced than anything I've ever seen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不确定。有些东西比我见过的任何人造产品都要先进。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tllevelhe_00008ab9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's keep an eye out for any kind of materials or equipment I might be able to adapt for humans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 留意任何材料或者装置，我也许会让它们为人类所用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tllevelhe_00008ab9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, if this is where they make the robots, we may be able to discover some way to weaken or control them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，如果这里就是它们制造机器人的地方，我们可以想办法削弱或控制它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tllevelhe_00008aba_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be on the lookout for any gizmos or schematics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找找机械装置或图纸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tllevelhe_00008aba_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only thing useful in here is me and my gun. Now let's keep moving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这里唯一管用的就是我和我的枪，现在继续赶路吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tllevelhe_00008abb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05ConvERoomEpoxy
Epoxy over here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这有环氧树脂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05conve_dlc05converoome_00009903_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, some epoxy!
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了，一些环氧树脂！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conve_dlc05converoome_00009904_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Grab some of that epoxy, our weapons could use the field repair.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿上环氧树脂，我们的武器可以用这东西来进行临时维修。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05conve_dlc05converoome_00009905_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05ConvERoomEngineGasTrap
More gas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 更多的瓦斯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05conve_dlc05converoome_000098fd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Check your weapon, they're venting in gas again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 准备好你的武器，他们又往里面放瓦斯了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conve_dlc05converoome_000098fe_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're trying to gas us again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们又想试着熏死我们了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05conve_dlc05converoome_000098ff_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05ConvERoomEngine
Holy hell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 见鬼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05conve_dlc05converoome_000098fa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wonder what a well placed grenade could do to that thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想瞧瞧一颗在合适位置的手榴弹能对那玩意造成什么影响。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conve_dlc05converoome_000098fb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is that thing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是什么东西？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05conve_dlc05converoome_000098fc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05ConvERoomGasTrap
Gas. Flammable gas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 瓦斯。可燃气体。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05conve_dlc05converoomg_00009909_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Smells like they're pumping in flammable gas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 闻起来似乎他们正往里面灌可燃性气体。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conve_dlc05converoomg_0000990a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're flooding the room with gas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们想用瓦斯灌满这房间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05conve_dlc05converoomg_0000990b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05ConvERoomFilthyStructures
What a mess.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一团糟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05conve_dlc05converoomf_00009906_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome to the bowels of this shit hole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎进到这个狗屎洞。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conve_dlc05converoomf_00009907_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This place is filthy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这地方真恶心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05conve_dlc05converoomf_00009908_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05ConvERoomFirstRoom
What's going on in there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是怎么回事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05conve_dlc05converoomf_00009900_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looks like they're repairing something in there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看上去它们在那修理什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conve_dlc05converoomf_00009901_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those guys in there look busy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些家伙看上去很忙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05conve_dlc05converoomf_00009902_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05MZ1SomahDoorLine
Great. No way to open this that I can see. What do we do now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好极了，我看我们没办法打开这个。现在该怎么办？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahdoor_00009946_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05MZ1SomahInitGreet
Hey! Hey, you okay? You all right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨！嗨，你怎么样了？还好吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahinit_00009947_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05AsmSomahInit
Well, isn't this fancy, all these shiny machines and such. Gotta find a generator, huh? Let's see... How about we start with that teleporter thing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 恩，这不是很眩吗，这些亮晶晶的机器。得找个发电机出来，对吧？让我们瞧瞧…我们从那个传送装置开始怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B003392]DLC05Asm) Robot Assembly Scripting/Staging Support Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05asm_dlc05asmsomahinit_0000997c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage DLC05Asm 4
DLC05ConvCargo06
Hell, my horse never did that...
ESP.TRADUIT: 真见鬼，我的马从来不那样…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05conve_dlc05convcargo0_000099d4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our situation didn't get any better by the looks of what happened here. I say we get the hell out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里发生的事并没改善我们的处境。要我说，我们该离开这鬼地方了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05conve_dlc05convcargo0_000099d5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Curious, but I don't think I want to know the answer judging by what happened here. Let's not stay long, this place gives me the creeps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有点好奇，但关于这里发生了什么来看，我不想知道答案。我们别待太久了，这地方让我毛骨悚然。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conve_dlc05convcargo0_000099d6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05ConvCargo05
What kind of horses are these anyway? I can't see anyone havin' any respect ridin' into town on one of those things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论如何，这是哪种马？我没见过小镇中有这样的马。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05conve_dlc05convcargo0_000099da_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are they doing to the Buttercups?
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们要这小马巴特卡普干嘛？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05conve_dlc05convcargo0_000099db_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh OK, now it all makes sense...
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，现在这都说的通了…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations Comment (NAM2) : said very sarcastically EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conve_dlc05convcargo0_000099dc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05ConvCargo04
Why look at what we got here. Little girl here ridin' one of those horses. Giddyup Buttercup...kind of catchy ain't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看我们为什么来这，小女孩要来这骑马。小马巴特卡普…它挺吸引人的，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05conve_dlc05convcargo0_000099dd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh wow. I remember these posters plastered all over the place back home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇。我记得老家那里到处都贴着这样的海报。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05conve_dlc05convcargo0_000099de_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They even have some of the posters I've seen scattered about the Wastes. Looks like they're studying them...or idolizing them, not sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们甚至有那些我在废土上见过的海报，看来它们正在学习…或者崇拜它们，我不确定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conve_dlc05convcargo0_000099df_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05ConvCargo03
Giddyup.
ESP.TRADUIT: 驾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05conve_dlc05convcargo0_000099d7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is kind of disturbing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 令人不安。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conve_dlc05convcargo0_000099d8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: OK, this is getting a little ridiculous now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有点意思。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05conve_dlc05convcargo0_000099d9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05ConvCargo02
Well I'll be damned...look at all 'em!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我会被诅咒的… 看看它们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05conve_dlc05convcargo0_000099d1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, even more of them. Buttercups that is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看啊，还有更多。小马巴特卡普。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05conve_dlc05convcargo0_000099d2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Huh, I wonder what they're doing with them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想知道它们正在对他做什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conve_dlc05convcargo0_000099d3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05ConvCargo01
Hey look, Giddyup Buttercups! All the rich kids had them. Waste of money if you ask me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，看啊，小马巴特卡普！有钱的孩子都有。但要我说那就是浪费钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05conve_dlc05convcargo0_000099e0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got to be kidding me... I saw posters like these all over the ruins. Never actually saw one 'til now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一定是在开玩笑…我在废墟中见过类似所有这些一样的海报。但直到现在从没见过一个这样的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conve_dlc05convcargo0_000099e1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now that looks like some tough ridin'. Those things real?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在那看起来有些不好骑的样子。那些东西是真的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05conve_dlc05convcargo0_000099e2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05CaptiveHolo4
Oh! I see! Like a tape recorder, right? You just want me to talk? I can do that, certainly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦！我懂了！这就像一个录音机，对不对？你只是想让我聊聊？我会做的，没问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madeline Wallace [0B009A0B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcfemalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_00009a07_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello there! I'm Madeline Wallace. Of the Cincinatti Wallaces?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好！我是玛德琳·华莱士。所属辛辛那提的华莱士队？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madeline Wallace [0B009A0B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcfemalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_00009a07_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I... I'm here, on this rocket ship. I'm with the strange men, the space men. The ones who brought me here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我在这…在这个火箭船上。我和一些陌生的太空人在一起。是它们把我带到这里的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madeline Wallace [0B009A0B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcfemalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_00009a07_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My entire family is onboard, actually. My husband, Roy, daughter Margaret, and my son Arthur, as well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上，我的家人都在飞船上。我的丈夫罗伊，女儿玛格丽特和儿子亚瑟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madeline Wallace [0B009A0B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcfemalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_00009a07_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, you should see Arthur! He's so excited. He says this is much better than the things they show on Captain Cosmos.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，你应该见见亚瑟！他很兴奋。他说这比《考斯莫思舰长》里演的要好多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madeline Wallace [0B009A0B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcfemalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_00009a07_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And I have to say - I agree! Everything is just so... fantastical! I can only hope our hosts have been talking with Uncle Sam.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得说—我同意！一切都是…棒极了！我只希望这里的主人和美国谈过了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madeline Wallace [0B009A0B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcfemalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_00009a07_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because with these doohickeys, we'd have the Reds beat in no time! He he he he.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为只要有了这些技巧，我们很快就能修理赤匪了！呵呵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madeline Wallace [0B009A0B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcfemalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_00009a07_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmmm? I'm terribly sorry, sir. I'm doing my best. I really don't know what you want me to say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃？非常抱歉，先生。我尽力了。我真不知道您想让我说些什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madeline Wallace [0B009A0B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcfemalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_00009a07_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whomever will listen to this recording, I would just like to state that if you find yourself in the same boat as the Wallaces, don't be afraid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 任何人都可能听到这段录音，如果你发现自己和华莱士处境相同，别害怕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madeline Wallace [0B009A0B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcfemalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_00009a07_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not entirely sure what our hosts want, but the situation has been entirely acceptable. We have been treated fairly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不确定这里的主人在想什么，但情形还不错，我们得到了公正的对待。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madeline Wallace [0B009A0B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcfemalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_00009a07_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, the space man is waving his little electrical stick thingy, so I think I'm done. Goodbye!
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论怎样，太空人开始挥舞他的小电棒了，我想我已经说完了。再见！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madeline Wallace [0B009A0B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcfemalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_00009a07_11.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05CaptiveHolo3
Yes, yes, I understand! I've seen the others. I'll do what you want.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，是的，我明白！我见过其他人了。我会照你说的办。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Morrison Rand [0B009A0A] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric2\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_00009a04_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is Doctor Morrison Rand, Professor of Anthropological Archaeology at Banfield College, Humboldt, Orgeon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是莫莉森·兰德博士，俄勒冈州洪堡班菲尔德学院的人类考古学教授。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Morrison Rand [0B009A0A] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric2\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_00009a04_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shortly after 10:00 p.m., on August 16, 2041, as I was leaving the college campus, headed to my car, I saw a blinding light.
ESP.TRADUIT: 10年00月16日下午2041时后，就在我离开大学校园，走向我的汽车的时候，我看到了一道耀眼的光芒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Morrison Rand [0B009A0A] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric2\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_00009a04_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It just... appeared. In the sky, directly over me. I was blinded. I also found my body completely immobilized. I couldn't move, not at all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它…出现了。在天上，直对着我。我看不见了。我还发现我的身体被完全固定了。一动都不能动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Morrison Rand [0B009A0A] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric2\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_00009a04_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened next is... hazy. I don't remember much. But what became clear later - what is certainly clear now - is that I was abducted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 后来发生的事很…朦胧。我记不太清。但我后来明白了一些事—现在则彻底明白了—我被绑架了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Morrison Rand [0B009A0A] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric2\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_00009a04_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am now the captive of an alien race, one of many people held here, against our will. And, like those others, I am recording who I am.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在是外星人的俘虏，被强行囚禁在这的人中的一员。和其他人一样，我正在记录着我是谁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Morrison Rand [0B009A0A] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric2\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_00009a04_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why? Because the aliens want us to, for some reason. They have us do it right before they put us into some kind of... suspended animation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么？因为出于某种原因，外星人要我们这样做。它们要让我们进入了一种…假死状态。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Morrison Rand [0B009A0A] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric2\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_00009a04_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: These recordings... It's almost as if we're creating our own library catalog entries, before we get put into a giant collection.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些录音…这就相当于我们正在创建我们自己的资料库索引条目，在当我们被放置进一个巨大的收集库之前。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Morrison Rand [0B009A0A] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric2\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_00009a04_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The entire experience would be fascinating if I weren't so completely terrified.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我不是被吓坏了，这个经历将会是多么令人着迷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Morrison Rand [0B009A0A] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric2\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_00009a04_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Stop? You want me to stop now. All right! All right, see? I'm stopping...
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？停止？你要我现在停止。好吧！好吧，明白了，我已经停止了…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Morrison Rand [0B009A0A] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric2\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_00009a04_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05CaptiveHolo2
What? What the fuck is this thing? Ya got some kind of Martian sex machine, you sick fuck? Uh uh. No way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？这他妈是什么？他们的一个火星性玩具？没门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vin [0B009A09] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_00009a06_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ahh! God DAMNIT! Fuckin' crazy-ass Moon Man! Go ahead! Do your worst!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊！见鬼！欠操的月球疯子！来啊！放马过来啊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vin [0B009A09] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_00009a06_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gaaaaahh!! Jesus H! Do you not get it, space cadet? I. Do. Not. Fucking. Understand. What. You. Want. Me. To. Do!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噶啊~~~！！操！太空变态，你还不明白？我！他！妈！的！不！懂！你！要！干！嘛！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vin [0B009A09] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_00009a06_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This thing? This? What? Talk? I AM talking! What do you want me to say?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这东西？这？什么？说话？我这不就在说！你要我说什么？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vin [0B009A09] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_00009a06_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Blah blah blah, yakkety yakkety! That all you assholes can say?! Space men with all this science, and you can't even speak fuckin' English?
ESP.TRADUIT: 巴啦巴啦巴啦，丫壳提丫壳提！你这白痴就会这两句啊？！又是太空人又是外星科技，怎么他妈的连句英文都不会说啊？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vin [0B009A09] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_00009a06_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, how's about this. My name is Vin. I am on a fucking UFO. I'm from Flatbush, and I want to get home. Can I get a taxi, please?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，这样如何。我叫维恩。我在一个该死的UFO上。我来自弗莱巴许，我要回家。劳驾，我可以叫出租车吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vin [0B009A09] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_00009a06_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How's that? Huh? That work for ya, starstruck?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么样？呃？追星族，该满意了吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vin [0B009A09] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_00009a06_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Don't you raise that fuckin' thing to me again... Oh, you gonna hit me again? Is that...
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？别再拿那破玩意戳我…哦，你还要打我？那…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vin [0B009A09] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_00009a06_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Agggghhhhh!! Sonofa... Why don't you go back to Uranus, huh? Ha ha ha <zap!> Agggh!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊~~~！婊子养的…怎么不滚回天王星去，呃？哈哈哈 <电击声！> 啊~~！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vin [0B009A09] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_00009a06_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05CaptiveHolo1
What? Talk into this thing? Just... talk? I don't have to do anything else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？谈谈？只是…谈？我不需要做什么其他的事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Andrew Endicott [0B009A08] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_00009a05_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ow! All right! <Zap!> Ow! I said all right! Just stop!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗷！好吧！<电击声！> 嗷！我说好吧！快停下！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Andrew Endicott [0B009A08] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_00009a05_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello. Um... hello. My name is Andrew Endicott.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好…我叫安德鲁·恩迪科特。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Andrew Endicott [0B009A08] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_00009a05_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: On the night of May 17th, the year our Lord 1697, I was... I was taken. From my home in Salem Village.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在5月17日晚上，教历1697年，我被…带走了，从塞勒姆村的家里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Andrew Endicott [0B009A08] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_00009a05_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I do not know where I am, exactly, or why I came to be here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我…我不知道我在哪里，还有为什么会来到这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Andrew Endicott [0B009A08] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_00009a05_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have seen, through... windows... the stars, and sun, and beloved Earth. Down there, below me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 透过…窗户…我看到星星、太阳和亲爱的地球。就在那里，在我脚下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Andrew Endicott [0B009A08] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_00009a05_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So it would seem I am aboard some vessel, suspended in the ether. Ironically, it would seem, so close to where I thought Heaven must surely lie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我似乎是上了一艘悬浮在以太中的飞船。讽刺的是，这看似非常接近我曾认为是天堂的所在之处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Andrew Endicott [0B009A08] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_00009a05_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But this is not Heaven. And my captors are not angels. I am not entirely unconvinced that the scripture is wrong. That Heaven and Hell are reversed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但这不是天堂，虏劫我的并非天使。我不是说信奉的圣经是错的，天堂与地狱已然颠倒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Andrew Endicott [0B009A08] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_00009a05_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For my captives are devils. Demons from my nightmares. Even now they watch me, make me talk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虏劫我的人是魔鬼。来自我噩梦中的魔鬼。即使是现在它们还在盯着我，逼我开口。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Andrew Endicott [0B009A08] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_00009a05_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They seem to want me to tell my story. I know not why. A record of their deeds, perhaps? Or am I just a pawn in some... some evil game.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们似乎想知道我的故事。我不知道为什么。也许是为了它们的一项记录？或者我只是一只棋子…一只邪恶游戏中的棋子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Andrew Endicott [0B009A08] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_00009a05_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And there are others. Other... captives, I mean. From whence they came I cannot say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有其他一些。其他…我是说，俘虏。我不能确定他们来自何方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Andrew Endicott [0B009A08] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_00009a05_11.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some wear strange dress, as if they are from... a different time. And some are... frozen! As in ice! Unmoving! But, I think... alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一些穿着怪异的服装，好像来自…不同的时代。一些是…被冻结的！在冰块里！一动不动！但是我觉得是…活的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Andrew Endicott [0B009A08] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_00009a05_12.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I believe they plan the same fate for me. Will I be frozen, too? Will I...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信它们也打算给予我同样的命运。我也会被冻起来？我将…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Andrew Endicott [0B009A08] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_00009a05_13.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ow! Stop it! I did what you said! You wanted me to talk, so I talked! Just leave me! Leave me be!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢！住手！我照你说的做了！你要我说，我都说了！现在放过我！放过我吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Andrew Endicott [0B009A08] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_00009a05_14.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05AsmSomahComment01
This place is incredible. Can you imagine having stuff like this in the Wasteland? You'd even be a match for the Brotherhood of Steel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个地方真不可思议，你能相信废土上会有这样的东西？你都能和钢铁兄弟会媲美了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B003392]DLC05Asm) Robot Assembly Scripting/Staging Support Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05asm_dlc05asmsomahcomm_00009a13_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05MZ1SomahPrisonerLine
Nothing we can do for this guy now...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们现在不能为这家伙做什么了…。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahpris_00009c58_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goddamn Raiders. Last thing I need up here is more of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的歹徒。我最后要做的就是干掉他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahpris_00009c59_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, she's toast. Forget it, there's no one home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，她已经死了。忘了吧，没有家了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahpris_00009c5a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, this is a waste of our time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 赶快，这真浪费时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahpris_00009c5b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05SteamSallyEncourage
Okay, you're doing good! Just keep going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，干得很好！继续。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steam_dlc05steamsally_00009c5c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll be at the engineering core in no time!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们要赶快到工程中枢！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00424A]DLC05SteamworksLD) 0B00424A (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05steam_dlc05steamsally_00009c5d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05HQPaulsonComment01
All righty. Here's how it's gonna go down. You point, I shoot, aliens die. All of the crazy gizmo stuff is up to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧。继续这么干。你按钮，我开枪，外星佬死光光。所有疯狂的机械玩意都交给你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B0041CC]DLC05HQ) Hangar Scripting/Staging Support Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05hq_dlc05hqpaulsoncomm_00009c69_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05HQPaulsonGeneratorDone
ESP.TRADUIT: DLC05HQPaulsonGeneratorDone

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05AsmSomahGeneratorUpComment
Once that core gets exposed, blast it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 中枢一露出来就炸他个稀巴烂！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B003392]DLC05Asm) Robot Assembly Scripting/Staging Support Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05asm_dlc05asmsomahgene_00009c68_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05HQPaulsonGeneratorUpComment
Woah... I've never seen anything like that in my life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇…我这辈子还从没见过像那样的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B0041CC]DLC05HQ) Hangar Scripting/Staging Support Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05hq_dlc05hqpaulsongene_00009c65_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05AsmSomahGeneratorComment02
There! That ought to give the aliens something to think about. Now let's get the hell out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就该如此。这么一来应该能让那群外星杂碎长长记性。现在让我们离开这鬼地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B003392]DLC05Asm) Robot Assembly Scripting/Staging Support Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05asm_dlc05asmsomahgene_00009c66_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05AsmSomahGeneratorComment01
That's got to be the generator. Let's destroy it and get back to the engine core.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这应该就是那台发电机了。让我们毁了它，然后回工程中枢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B003392]DLC05Asm) Robot Assembly Scripting/Staging Support Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05asm_dlc05asmsomahgene_00009c67_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05ConvCargo08
Nuka what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 核子什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations Comment (NAM2) : Paulson commenting on Nuka bottles, nuka cola machine. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05conve_dlc05convcargo0_00009c73_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thirsty? Heh, I wonder if the aliens love this stuff as much we do down below.
ESP.TRADUIT: 口渴了？嘿，我怀疑外星人和我们下面的人一样喜欢这东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations Comment (NAM2) : Somah commenting on Nuka bottles, nuka cola machine. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conve_dlc05convcargo0_00009c74_1.ogg
