ESP.ORIGINAL: Nuka-Cola! You know, they came out with this stuff called Nuka-Cola Quantum way back. Now that was some powerful stuff. I can still taste it now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 核子可乐！我知道，他们中途还推出过种叫做量子型核子可乐的玩意。那可是相当带劲的东西。我现在嘴里都还有它的味道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations Comment (NAM2) : Tercorien commenting on Nuka bottles, nuka cola machine. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05conve_dlc05convcargo0_00009c75_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05ConvCargo07
I wouldn't go jumpin' down there if I were you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要是我是你的话，是不会冒险下去的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations Comment (NAM2) : Commenting on an extremely large trash chute found in the cargo hold. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05conve_dlc05convcargo0_00009c76_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now that's what I call a trash chute. I wouldn't get too close, don't wanna fall in or anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就是被我称为垃圾瀑布的玩意。我可不想靠太近，免得掉下去或出别的什么事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations Comment (NAM2) : Commenting on an extremely large trash chute found in the cargo hold. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05conve_dlc05convcargo0_00009c77_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, that's one way to take out the garbage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，那就是条处理垃圾的通道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations Comment (NAM2) : Commenting on an extremely large trash chute found in the cargo hold. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05conve_dlc05convcargo0_00009c78_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05ConvSallyGenWalkthruTopic
Then you stand WAY back, because it gets really hot and goes 'kaboom'!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你得退后站得远远的，因为它会变得非常热，然后就“喀嘭”！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05conve_dlc05convsallyg_0000a6f0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then, you push down these other things here. See? The ones that keep it cool.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后，你把其余的罐子推下去，看见了吗？这些罐子是用来冷却的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05conve_dlc05convsallyg_0000a6f1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: First, you push the button to make the generator come up from the floor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先，你按下按钮，使发电机升到地面上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05conve_dlc05convsallyg_0000a6f2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've seen the aliens use these a bunch of times, so I'm an expert.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我观察了很久外星人如何使用它们，我是专家。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05conve_dlc05convsallyg_0000a6f3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, here it is. Neat, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，在这。对吗，是吧?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05conve_dlc05convsallyg_0000a6f4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what are these generators? How do they work?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些发电机是怎么回事？它们怎么运作的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, you'll know them when you see them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，当你看到它们你就了解了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05conve_dlc05convtlsall_0000a6f6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You push this button, and then this big thing is like WOOOSH and it comes out of the floor...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你按这个按钮，然后等这些大家伙“呼哧”一下窜出地面…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05conve_dlc05convtlsall_0000a6f6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...and then there are these things you press down and it goes SHHHHHHH and then you'd better get out of the way. You'll see.
ESP.TRADUIT: …然后你按下这个，它会变的…嘘~~~…你最好让开点。看着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E1A]DLC05Conversations) DLC05 NPC Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05conve_dlc05convtlsall_0000a6f6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, let's talk to the astronaut.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，让我们跟那个太空人谈谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is going to be so neat!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这会很整齐！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallycryo_0000a718_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage DLC05MZ1 200
Why do we need a 'spaceman' to help us?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么我们需要一个“太空人”的帮忙？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, because he's got a spacesuit! Can't go out in space without one. And if we're going to escape, we need to go outside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，因为他有件宇航服！没有它就不能出去。如果我们要逃走，我们就需要出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallycryo_0000a716_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If they turned off the elevator things, that's the only other way to go. So we need a suit. See? Simple!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果它们关掉了电梯，这是仅存的出路。所以我们需要一套宇航服，明白了吧？很简单的道理！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallycryo_0000a716_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are these people?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些家伙是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know. I've never talked to them. Sometimes I'd come and look at them, and wonder why they're dressed like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道。我从没跟它们谈过。有时我会来看看它们想知道为什么它们穿成那样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallycryo_0000a71a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You see that one guy? He has this really neat suit on... like armor or something!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看到那家伙了？他穿着很整洁的衣服…类似于装甲什么的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallycryo_0000a71a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And that other guy? He looks just like a cowboy! I saw pictures of cowboys in books. I never saw a real one, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个家伙呢？他看起来像个牛仔！我在书里看过牛仔。但是我从没看过真正的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallycryo_0000a71a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are these things?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些东西是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've seen these all over. They put people in them, and the people go to sleep. They stay asleep for a really long time, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我全都看见了。它们把人放进里面，然后这些人就睡着了。它们也会留下沉睡很久。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallycryo_0000a719_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be careful if you touch them, though. They're really cold.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你要碰它们，那就小心点。它们真的很凉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallycryo_0000a719_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How are you holding up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还撑得住吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pretty good, I guess. This is scary, but it's also kind of fun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得很好。这有点吓人，但是会很有趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3sallylabt_0000a73c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a teleporter to the bridge, but it doesn't work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 舰桥上有个传送装置，但是它坏了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I think they're trying to keep us from getting there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，我想它们正想办法阻止我们到达那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3sallylabt_0000a747_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, we should look for another way to go. There's one more here that works...
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我们应该另找一条路走，会更好些…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3sallylabt_0000a747_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You go through first, and make sure it's safe, and I'll be right behind you, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你先过去，确保安全，然后我会跟上你，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3sallylabt_0000a747_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So we're here. Now what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们到了，接着怎么做？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, it looks like they're still keeping some of these turned off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，看起来它们还关着什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3sallylabt_0000a73d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But there's one that's on, so I guess that's the way we go!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但那还有一个，所以我猜我们该走这边！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3sallylabt_0000a73d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should probably go through first, in case there's something bad on the other side. And then I can go through after. Okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该先过去，以防对面有什么。然后我再过去，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000804]DLC05MZ3) This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3sallylabt_0000a73d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This has been a hell of a ride, hasn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这真是一趟地狱旅程啊，对吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No offense, but this ain't some sort of game.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有恶意，但这不是在玩游戏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05post_dlc05postgreet3_0000a983_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My whole life is over. Gone, a long time ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的人生在很久以前就该终结了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05post_dlc05postgreet3_0000a983_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry if I can't make light of the situation like you can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，我不能像你一样乐天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05post_dlc05postgreet3_0000a983_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, that's one way of putting it. Not really something I'm interested in doing again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，这只说说而已，我没有兴趣再做一次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05post_dlc05postgreet3_0000ab4e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Boy, I sure hope not. But at least we know what to do with them, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 小伙子，我当然不希望。但至少我们知道该如何处理它们了，对吧?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05post_dlc05postgreet3_0000a984_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think they'll ever come back?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得它们还会回来吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What will you do now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在你要干嘛？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I'm going to stay here for a while. I don't think I'd like it much down there anymore, and there's still a bunch of the ship I haven't seen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我要暂时留在这里。我恐怕不会再习惯下面的世界，而这里还有很多地方我没探索过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05post_dlc05postgreet2_0000a74e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll tell you what. If I find anything really neat, I'll bring it to you, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我告诉你，如果我发现任何好东西，我会拿来让你见识见识，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05post_dlc05postgreet2_0000a74e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know... I don't really have a place down there anymore, do I? Doesn't sound like it'd suit me very well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道…下面应该已经没有我的容身之地了，是吧？看起来那儿不太适合我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05post_dlc05postgreet2_0000a985_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I'll stick around here for a while. See if I can't figure out some of this technology.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我会待在这儿。看看我不能搞出这样的技术。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05post_dlc05postgreet2_0000a985_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm gonna see about getting off this thing. Head back to the Wasteland with some new toys, maybe carve out a place for myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要想想这事，把一些新玩意带回到废土，也许我该为自己开辟一片新天地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05post_dlc05postgreet2_0000a74f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Literally, if I have to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 确实，如果我必须那样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05post_dlc05postgreet2_0000a74f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Odds are we won't be bumping into each other again, so I just wanted to say thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我们会分道扬镳了，所以我只想说声谢谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05post_dlc05postgreet2_0000a74f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for your help. Couldn't have done it without you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你的帮助。没有你，我们无法成功。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know. And you're very welcome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道，这真不算什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05post_dlc05postgreet1_0000a74c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aw, come on. We both know you could have.
ESP.TRADUIT: 过来，我们知道你行的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05post_dlc05postgreet1_0000a98a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's right! If it weren't for me, you'd be sitting in a holding cell or lying on some crazy operating table right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧！如果不是我，你现在会待在留置间里或是躺在一些疯子的手术台上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05post_dlc05postgreet1_0000a74d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You owe me big time, kid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你欠我很多，孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05post_dlc05postgreet1_0000a74d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05CaptiveHolo6
I can't feel my legs... what did you do to my legs...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的腿失去知觉了…你对我的腿做了什么…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madeline Wallace [0B009A0B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : nice long scream EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcfemalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000a882_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...Frank? I can't see you...
ESP.TRADUIT: …弗兰克？我看不见你…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madeline Wallace [0B009A0B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : nice long scream EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcfemalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000a882_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <growling noises>
ESP.TRADUIT: <咆哮声>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madeline Wallace [0B009A0B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : nice long scream EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcfemalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000a882_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Frank? Frank! What did they do to you?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 弗兰克？弗兰克！它们对你做了什么?！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madeline Wallace [0B009A0B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : nice long scream EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcfemalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000a882_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <growling noises>
ESP.TRADUIT: <咆哮声>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madeline Wallace [0B009A0B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : nice long scream EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcfemalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000a882_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ahhhhhhhhhh!!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madeline Wallace [0B009A0B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : nice long scream EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcfemalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000a882_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05CaptiveHolo5
Oh god, what are you doing to me? What's that thing? Get it out of me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 天哪，你在对我做什么？那是什么东西？把它从我身上拿掉！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Andrew Endicott [0B009A08] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : ALIEN EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000a881_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ahhh.... that hurts... oh, please... stop... no.... <grunting>
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊…好痛…噢，拜托… 停下…不要…<惨叫声>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Andrew Endicott [0B009A08] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : ALIEN EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000a881_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <growling noises>
ESP.TRADUIT: <咆哮声>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Andrew Endicott [0B009A08] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : ALIEN EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000a881_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05AstronautHolo1
This is... this is incredible! I'm... I'm Colonel Hartigan, of the United States Air Force.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是…真是难以置信！我…我是哈德根上校，隶属美国空军。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colonel Hartigan [0B003302] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : ALIEN EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric3\dlc05gener_dlc05astronauth_0000a885_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry, what? I don't understa... Oh, speak into this? Yes, I was saying, I'm Colonel Hartigan, United States Air Force.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，什么？我不清楚 …哦，对着这个说？是的，我是说，我是哈德根上校，隶属美国空军。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colonel Hartigan [0B003302] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : ALIEN EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric3\dlc05gener_dlc05astronauth_0000a885_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our nation has been conducting manned spaceflight tests... I'm sorry, you'll have to forgive me. Frankly we never expect to meet you all!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们国家一直在进行载人航天测试…对不起，你得原谅我。坦白的说，我们从来没指望过会遇上你们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colonel Hartigan [0B003302] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : ALIEN EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric3\dlc05gener_dlc05astronauth_0000a885_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure there's a great deal that our two species can learn from <zap>
ESP.TRADUIT: 我敢肯定我们两个种族一定会学到很多<电击声>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colonel Hartigan [0B003302] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : ALIEN EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric3\dlc05gener_dlc05astronauth_0000a885_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oww! What the Hell? What is this, what are you doing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢！怎么回事？这是什么，你在干什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colonel Hartigan [0B003302] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : ALIEN EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric3\dlc05gener_dlc05astronauth_0000a885_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05SamuraiHolo1
Nanda kono arisama ha? Youkaihenge ka?
ESP.TRADUIT: 汝怎会如此？妖怪变化？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toshiro Kago [0B0032FC] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : ALIEN EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesamurai\dlc05gener_dlc05samuraihol_0000a880_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hanase, imasugu!
ESP.TRADUIT: 放开在下，现在立即！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toshiro Kago [0B0032FC] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : ALIEN EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesamurai\dlc05gener_dlc05samuraihol_0000a880_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kikoenuka, hanase, ima... <zap>
ESP.TRADUIT: 听到了吗，放开，现在…<电击声>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toshiro Kago [0B0032FC] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : ALIEN EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesamurai\dlc05gener_dlc05samuraihol_0000a880_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05TercorienHolo1
Oh shit, oh shit, oh shit, oh shit...
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，妈的，妈的，妈的…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05gener_dlc05tercorienh_0000a883_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gah! Look, just let me go, okay? This is crazy, this is like batshit unbelievable crazy. I didn't do anything, I don't know what you want with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿！让我走，好吗？这太疯狂了，这真的很疯狂。我什么都没做，我不知道你想要对我做什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05gener_dlc05tercorienh_0000a883_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is this because of Anchorage? I swear, I didn't even want to be there, man. You've gotta believe me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为安克雷奇？我发誓，我不想去那里，伙计。你得相信我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05gener_dlc05tercorienh_0000a883_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't even WANT to be out in the field! I was hoping for a job in Washington, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我完全不想上战场！你知道我当时想去华盛顿找工作的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05gener_dlc05tercorienh_0000a883_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? What do you want? I don't understand! Why is this happening to me??
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？你要要什么？我不懂！我怎么会遇到这事？？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05gener_dlc05tercorienh_0000a883_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05NPCHolo1
Where's my wife? Where's my boy? What've you done with them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的妻子呢？我的孩子呢？你对它们做了什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05gener_dlc05paulsonhol_0000a87f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I get free, so help me God I'm going to kill every last one of you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 上帝保佑，等我自由后，我要杀了你们所有人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05gener_dlc05paulsonhol_0000a87f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Agggh! What are you doing? What the hell do you want with us? LET ME GO!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊！你在做什么？你他妈想要我们做什么？让我走！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05gener_dlc05paulsonhol_0000a87f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05BridgeAlienMessages
DLC05BridgeTopicSallyIntro
And I'll go over here. I can be Stella Skyfire! She was Captain Cosmos' weapons specialist, back in season 2. This is great!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会仔细检查这儿。我就像史黛拉·天火。她是《考斯莫思舰长》里的武器专家，早在第二季的时候。真是帅呆了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_0000a887_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, that must be the Captain's chair! You should sit there -- you can be Captain Cosmos!
ESP.TRADUIT: 快看，那肯定是舰长的座椅！你应该坐上去—你就像考斯莫思舰长！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_0000a888_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow, look at this place! It looks like the ship in Captain Cosmos!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，看这里！它看起来就像《考斯莫思舰长》里面的飞船！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_0000a889_1.ogg

Uh-oh...

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05xcartGettingOut
We're stuck. Let me see if I can figure something out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们被困住了，让我看看我能不能想到点办法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B005C70]DLC05FF01) Steerage Rats EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05ff01_dlc05ff01xcartge_0000a899_1.ogg

Wow! This looks just like the bridge on Captain Cosmos! I know what to do!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇！这看起来就像《考斯莫思舰长》里面的舰桥！我知道该做些什么了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_0000a8c4_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 索玛，你在那里站好…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_0000a996_1.ogg

set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
Paulson... you can be Jangles the Moon Monkey...

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_0000a8c7_1.ogg

and I get to aim the Death Ray!
ESP.TRADUIT: 而我负责校准死光！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_0000a8c8_1.ogg

DLC05PaulsonREF.sayTo player DLC05BridgeTopicPaulsonRandom set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
DLC05BridgeEMPHitAlt
Shit, they hit the core and sapped our power. Look around for some buttons or something to restart the generators.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，它们打中了中枢，降低了我们的动力。找找按钮或别的什么东西来重启发电机。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgeemph_0000a927_1.ogg

Lights out, they killed our power! Maybe there's some buttons or something around here to restart this hunk of junk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 灯灭了，它们切断了我们的动力！也许会有按钮或别的什么东西能让这堆破烂重新启动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgeemph_0000a928_1.ogg

That looks like it's working, keep up whatever you're doing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来它运转起来了，不管你做了什么，继续。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgeemph_0000a929_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Things are flashing again! We got flashing things! You must be doing something right. Keep it up!
ESP.TRADUIT: 灯又亮了！我们又有光了！你肯定做对了什么。继续！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgeemph_0000a92a_1.ogg

I ain't no goddamn space monkey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是什么该死的太空泼猴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_0000a939_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 它们不断地杀过来。

This is almost fun.

Yippie ki yay.

When you really look, it doesn't seem that hard at all.

Holy shit. Where did that come from?

Why won't you work!
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么不动啊！

Work damn you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 动啊，该死的！
