set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
I push this, it doesn't do anything, I push THAT, it doesn't... oh hey that did something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 按这个，没反应，按那个，也没……哦！那个好像有点用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_0000a99f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05SomahRef.playIdle LooseHandsUpNoHarm
set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
DLC05BridgeTopicSomahHelmRandom
DLC05CaptiveHolo16
Oh man... what did you... why can't I feel my arms...
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，伙计…你干了什么…为什么我的胳膊没知觉了…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Andrew Endicott [0B009A08] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000a951_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...wait... are those... are those MY ARMS? WHAT DID YOU DO? OH GOD, PUT THEM BACK! PUT THEM BACK ON!
ESP.TRADUIT: …等等…那些是…那是我的胳膊？你在了什么？天的！装回去！把他们给我装回去！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Andrew Endicott [0B009A08] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000a951_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05CaptiveHolo10A
Just take it easy. If they wanted us dead, we'd be dead. They must need something from us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 放松点。如果它们要弄死我们，我们早就死了。它们一定要我们做什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Andrew Endicott [0B009A08] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Responding to: "NO! GET US THE HELL OUT OF HERE!..." <Slap> SFX is a face being slapped. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000a97d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey! I said, calm down! If they hear you they may come for us. Try and take it easy!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨！冷静点！如果它们听到你的话就要来抓我们了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Andrew Endicott [0B009A08] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Responding to: "NO! GET US THE HELL OUT OF HERE!..." <Slap> SFX is a face being slapped. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000a97d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I said to SHUT UP! <slap>... I'm... I'm sorry I did that. Please, forgive me. But we need to keep our heads on straight if we're going to survive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说闭嘴！<打耳光> 我很…我很抱歉这样对你。原谅我。不过我们要生存下去就要时刻保持头脑清醒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Andrew Endicott [0B009A08] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Responding to: "NO! GET US THE HELL OUT OF HERE!..." <Slap> SFX is a face being slapped. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000a97d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05CaptiveHolo10
What are we gonna do? They just threw me in this cell with you after they poked and prodded me and now I just hope they won't kill us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们怎么办？它们刚才对我又戳又刺的，现在又把我跟你丢到了一起，希望它们不要杀了我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madeline Wallace [0B009A0B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : crying as she says this EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcfemalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000a97f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just take it easy. If they wanted us dead, we'd be dead. They must need something from us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 放松点。如果它们要弄死我们，我们早就死了。它们一定要我们做什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madeline Wallace [0B009A0B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : crying as she says this EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcfemalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000a97f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah! They need us for FOOD or something! You saw that guy! He was all... cut open... like he'd been butchered! Oh my god! We're gonna be next!
ESP.TRADUIT: 对！它们应该把我们当作食物或什么的！你看那家伙！他就被整个…切开了…就像被屠宰了一样！天哪！我们就是下一个了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madeline Wallace [0B009A0B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : crying as she says this EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcfemalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000a97f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey! I said, calm down! If they hear you they may come for us. Try and take it easy!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨！冷静点！如果它们听到你的话就要来抓我们了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madeline Wallace [0B009A0B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : crying as she says this EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcfemalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000a97f_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: NO! GET US THE HELL OUT OF HERE! <pounding noise> SOMEONE! GET US OUT! PLEASE! <pounding noise>
ESP.TRADUIT: 不！带我离开这个鬼地方！！<砸墙声>有人吗？救我们出去！！求你了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madeline Wallace [0B009A0B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : crying as she says this EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcfemalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000a97f_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I said to SHUT UP! <slap>... I'm... I'm sorry I did that. Please, forgive me. But we need to keep our heads on straight if we're going to survive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说闭嘴！<打耳光> 我很…我很抱歉这样对你。原谅我。不过我们要生存下去就要时刻保持头脑清醒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madeline Wallace [0B009A0B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : crying as she says this EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcfemalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000a97f_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, please. I just want to go home... I just want to go home...
ESP.TRADUIT: 救命，救命。我只想回家…我只想回家…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madeline Wallace [0B009A0B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : crying as she says this EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcfemalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000a97f_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05CaptiveHolo09
Hey now. No reason to get yourselves worked up. Whatever you need, I'm going to tell it to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨。没什么值得激动的。不论你需要什么，我都会把它告诉你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vin [0B009A09] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000a97e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I'm pretty sure you want me to talk into this thing, so here goes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，我敢肯定你是想要我对着这东西说话，那么这就开始吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vin [0B009A09] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000a97e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My name is Giles Wolstencroft... I'm the current Assistant Chief Executive Officer of the Vault-Tec Corporation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我名叫贾尔斯·沃勒斯特卡夫特…我是现任避难所科技公司的助理首席行政官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vin [0B009A09] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000a97e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was inspecting the construction site of Vault 76 when I was captured by what I can only assume are alien beings from another world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我被姑且假设是来自异界的外星人俘获时，我正在视察76号避难所的施工现场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vin [0B009A09] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000a97e_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not sure what they want from me, or what they will do to me, but whatever they need, I will readily provide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不确定它们要从我身上得到什么，它们会对我做什么。不过无论它们要什么，我都乐意提供。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vin [0B009A09] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000a97e_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps if I can bridge our communication gap and establish a rapport with them, we can enter into an exclusive trade agreement.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或许我可以为我们之间建设沟通的桥梁，以达成贸易协议。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vin [0B009A09] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000a97e_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In fact, instead of talking to this damn machine, I'm going to attempt to address them directly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，与其尝试去跟这样一台机器对话，不如直接和它们沟通。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vin [0B009A09] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000a97e_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: On behalf of the Vault-Tec Corporation, I'd like to extend a heartfelt welcome to you. Wait... you don't need that... wait! WAIT! <zap>
ESP.TRADUIT: 我代表我们避难所科技有限公司，诚挚欢迎你们的到来。等一下…不必这样…等一下！等！一！下！<电击声>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vin [0B009A09] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000a97e_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05CaptiveHolo08
Where am I? Where's my sister?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在哪里？我姐姐在哪里？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Lights came on and seeing aliens for first time (scared). EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000a981_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can hear some weird noises, but I can't see you. Why is it so dark in here? What's this machine? Please... someone talk to me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能听到些奇怪的声响，但我看不见你。为什么这那么黑？这是什么机器？拜托…有谁能回答我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Lights came on and seeing aliens for first time (scared). EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000a981_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to go home! Please! Where's my mommy and daddy?! I just want to go home!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想回家！拜托！我的爸爸妈妈呢？！我只是想要回家！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Lights came on and seeing aliens for first time (scared). EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000a981_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: OW! That's bright! Ugh... wait... what... OH MY GOD! NOOOOOO! Stay away from me! GET AWAY!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇！亮了！噢…等等… 什么…上帝！不！离我远点！远点！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Lights came on and seeing aliens for first time (scared). EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000a981_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05CaptiveHolo7
Private Lawrence Mears, U.S. Army Medic, Serial Number 3476511.
ESP.TRADUIT: 二等兵劳伦斯·米尔斯，美国陆军医务兵，序号3476511。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Andrew Endicott [0B009A08] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : ALIEN EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000a980_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Private Lawrence Mears, U.S. Army Medic, Serial Number 3476511.
ESP.TRADUIT: 二等兵劳伦斯·米尔斯，美国陆军医务兵，序号3476511。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Andrew Endicott [0B009A08] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : ALIEN EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000a980_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: AGH! Fuck! You... can do what...ever you want to me... I'm not saying jack sh...Stick it where the... sun don't shine...
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊！操！你…可以做什么…哪怕你想要对我…我都不会供出杰克把…把它放在那…太阳都照不到的地…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Andrew Endicott [0B009A08] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : ALIEN EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000a980_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: AGGGH! Oh my g... P-priv.. ate Law-lawrence M..mea..rs. U.S. Ar...army M-m-m...edic...
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊~~！！哦，我的上…二…等兵…劳…劳伦斯·米…米…尔斯。美国…陆…陆军…医…务兵…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Andrew Endicott [0B009A08] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : ALIEN EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000a980_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05BridgeTopicSallyRandom
I never thought I'd get to do something like this!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从来没有想过我会有机会做这样的事！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_0000a993_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
Yeah, teach them a lesson!
ESP.TRADUIT: 耶，给它们点颜色看看！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_0000a994_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
This is like playing a holo-game, only better!
ESP.TRADUIT: 就像玩全息投影游戏，不过比那还过瘾！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_0000a995_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
DLC05CaptiveHolo15
This is my final message. If this doesn't work, I hope someone gets this recording and can bring it back to earth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是我最后的留言了。如果不行，我希望听到这个录音的人有机会为我把它带回地球。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vin [0B009A09] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000aa34_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been able to figure out how to use some of the alien devices, like this recorder, and I think I know what they want with our world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经掌握了一些外星人器械的使用方法，包括这个录音仪，而我也大概知道它们想从我们的世界得到什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vin [0B009A09] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000aa34_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They mean to take as many of us as they can and change us into... some sort of abomination. Many have been killed because of their experiments.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们尽可能的把我们抓起来，然后把我们变成…某种合成兽。我们中的很多人已经在试验中死去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vin [0B009A09] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000aa34_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They've been keeping us in cells, and then moving us one by one to their experimentation labs. I've managed to escape, but they are looking for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们把我们关在监狱里，然后一个接一个地送去活体实验室。我尝试逃脱，可是它们正在搜捕我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vin [0B009A09] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000aa34_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got to send help up here. As far as I can tell, they're never going to stop until they've captured hundreds... maybe thousands of us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们一定要带救援来。据我所知，它们在把成百上千…也许成千上万的人抓起来之前是绝对不会停下来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vin [0B009A09] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000aa34_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The good news is that they're totally reliant on technology. Without it, they're no tougher than you or I.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过好消息是它们完全依赖科技。没有科技，它们其实就跟你我一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vin [0B009A09] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000aa34_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A small, well-equipped force could take this ship and free all of the prisoners on board. That's your best chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一小队装备精良的部队完全可以控制这艘飞船并且解放所有的人质。这就是你最好的机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vin [0B009A09] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000aa34_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got to keep moving, so I need to hide this tape. Good luck to all of us, and godspeed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了，我要把这个录音藏起来。祝我们都好运，一路平安。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vin [0B009A09] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000aa34_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05CaptiveHolo14
Just wait until I tell Marsha and Karen about this! Imagine... I'm actually on a SPACEship!
ESP.TRADUIT: 等会我要把这的事告诉玛莎和卡伦！想想看…我真的站在宇宙飞船上了耶！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madeline Wallace [0B009A0B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcfemalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000aa36_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, they're pointing at... oh, talk into this? What is this? Is this the space phone?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，它们指着…喔，对着这个讲吗？这是什么？太空电话吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madeline Wallace [0B009A0B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcfemalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000aa36_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey Marsh, this is Janet. You will NEVER guess where I am. Never. Ohhhh... I wish I could hear you, but I'll just tell you. I'M IN SPACE!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，玛莎，我是珍妮，你绝对猜不到我现在在哪。你绝对猜不到。喔…我真想让到你猜猜，不过我还是告诉你吧。我在太空里！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madeline Wallace [0B009A0B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcfemalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000aa36_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was driving along the highway when there was this light... and suddenly I'm on this real spaceship! No joke!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在高速上开车时突然眼前一闪…我就在这太空船上了！不骗你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madeline Wallace [0B009A0B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcfemalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000aa36_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now these little green men are making all these noises and pointing at stuff trying to talk to me! I bet I'm the first one they've met!
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在这些小绿人又吵又闹的，指来指去一直想要跟我说话！我应该是它们见到的第一个人类。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madeline Wallace [0B009A0B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcfemalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000aa36_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I figure I'll talk with them a while then I'll join you later and I can tell you all about it over lunch! Oh! If only I had my camera!
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我想跟它们先聊一下，等一下我就去你，午饭时我可以跟你讲现在的事。对了，如果现在有相机就好了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madeline Wallace [0B009A0B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcfemalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000aa36_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, they're pointing at some table with all sorts of gizmos sticking out of it. Gotta go. Kisses!
ESP.TRADUIT: 对了，它们正在指着一个桌子，上面有一些小东西。要走喽！亲！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madeline Wallace [0B009A0B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcfemalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000aa36_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05CaptiveHolo13
Our defenses consist of 3 battalions of light infantry, 34 pieces of field artillery, 108 armored vehicles and 42 aerial vehicles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的防御包括3个轻步兵营，34门重炮，108辆装甲车辆以及42个飞行单位。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Andrew Endicott [0B009A08] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : ALIEN EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000aa35_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We have 38 ICBM's always on alert and ready to fire when the word is passed down from the White House.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们有38枚受命白宫随时准备发射的洲际导弹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Andrew Endicott [0B009A08] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : ALIEN EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000aa35_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The codes to activate the launch sequences are... are... uhhngh.... no... I can't let you... uggh... get out of my mind!
ESP.TRADUIT: 发射导弹的密码是…是… 啊~~…不…我不能让你们…噢…从我的脑子滚出去！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Andrew Endicott [0B009A08] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : ALIEN EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000aa35_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Agggh! The c-codes... are... ugh.... no... I can't betray... AGH! My head! I can't... won't... AGGGGH! Agggh...
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊~~~！密…密码…是…噢…不…我不能背叛… 唔呃！我的头！我不能…我不会…啊~~~！啊~~~…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Andrew Endicott [0B009A08] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : ALIEN EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000aa35_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05CaptiveHolo12
I'm Holly Barrisford, a linguistics specialist for the U.S.S.A. I think I'm beginning to understand you, but you need to stop shocking me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是霍利·贝尔斯福德，美国太空总署的语言学专家。我已经开始明白你们的语言，请你们不要再电击我了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madeline Wallace [0B009A0B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : injected and knocked out at the end... the ahhhh is like fading out, not a pain scream EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcfemalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000aa32_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn. I wish you could understand me. <Alien Noises>. Do you understand?
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死。我真希望你们能明白我在说什么。<模仿外星语>你们明白吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madeline Wallace [0B009A0B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : injected and knocked out at the end... the ahhhh is like fading out, not a pain scream EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcfemalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000aa32_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's it. You get it. I mean you no harm, I just want to learn how to speak with you. Then perhaps we can discuss what you need from us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就对了。你明白了吧，我没有敌意，我只是在学着如何跟你们沟通。或许我们可以探讨一下你想从我们这里得到什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madeline Wallace [0B009A0B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : injected and knocked out at the end... the ahhhh is like fading out, not a pain scream EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcfemalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000aa32_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you doing with that needle? No! Get it away from me! NO! PLEASE! We can be friends! You don't need to... ahhhhh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要用那根针做什么？不！把它从我面前拿开！不！求你了！我们可以成为朋友！没有必要…啊~~~。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madeline Wallace [0B009A0B] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : injected and knocked out at the end... the ahhhh is like fading out, not a pain scream EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcfemalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000aa32_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05CaptiveHolo11
Well, this is just ridiculous! I demand to see whomever's in charge!
ESP.TRADUIT: 真荒唐！我要见你们的主管！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Morrison Rand [0B009A0A] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : furious... recede sound towards end as if being dragged away from mic EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric2\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000aa33_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: OW! What the? Do you have any idea who you're dealing with?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊！干什么？你知道你们现在在跟谁说话吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Morrison Rand [0B009A0A] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : furious... recede sound towards end as if being dragged away from mic EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric2\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000aa33_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: AGH! Stop it! I am a U.S. Senator and I warn you... if any harm comes to me, you'll bring the full wrath of the U.S. Military upon yourselves!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊！住手！我是美国国会参议员。我现在警告你！如果你敢动我一条汗毛，我会动用整个美国的军事力量让你们尝尝愤怒的滋味！！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Morrison Rand [0B009A0A] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : furious... recede sound towards end as if being dragged away from mic EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric2\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000aa33_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Where are you taking me?! Get your goddamn hands off of me! You'll all pay for this! The U.S. doesn't bargain with aliens!
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？你要带我去哪里？把你的臭手从我身上拿开！你会因此付出代价的！美国是绝对不会跟外星人讨价还价的！！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Morrison Rand [0B009A0A] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : furious... recede sound towards end as if being dragged away from mic EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric2\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000aa33_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's just get out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们赶快离开这里吧！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, you're probably right. Wait, did you feel that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，你可能是对的。等等，你感觉到那个了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B005C70]DLC05FF01) Steerage Rats EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05ff01_dlc05ff01ygetout_0000aac6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05FF01.inCartFlag to 1 setStage DLC05FF01 15 DLC05SallyREF.evp DLC05SallyRef.playIdle MTHitTorsoA player.placeAtMe DLC05FF01cartLurch if player.getDistance DLC05FF01SallyCartMarker > 256 player.moveTo DLC05FF01sallyStartMarker endif if DLC05SallyREF.getDistance DLC05FF01SallyCartMarker > 128 DLC05SallyREF.moveTo DLC05cartPanelMarker endif
What an incredible smell you've discovered...
ESP.TRADUIT: 这味道太难以置信…

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, it is kinda stinky in here... Did you cut the cheese?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，这里有点臭，你在切奶酪？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B005C70]DLC05FF01) Steerage Rats Comment (NAM2) : it IS kinda stinky... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05ff01_dlc05ff01ysmells_0000aac7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're lost, aren't we?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们迷路了，是不是？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No way! Well, maybe a little. I bet we can find something neat, though!
ESP.TRADUIT: 才不是！好吧，或许有那么一点。但我敢打赌我们会发现些好东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B005C70]DLC05FF01) Steerage Rats EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05ff01_dlc05ff01ylost_0000aac4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05BridgeTopicSomahShipHelp
It looks like they're dropping shields to prepare for a big shot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来它们削弱护盾是要给我们来一发狠的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_0000ab3f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
Damn it. Their shields are back up at max.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死。它们的护盾能量又充满了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_0000ab40_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
DLC05BridgeTopicSallyShipHelp
I've got a lock on their ship, fire when ready!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经锁定了它们的飞船，随时可以开火！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_0000ab41_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05BridgeEnemyShields2.enable DLC05BridgeEnemyShipHealth100.enable DLC05BridgeFireButtonHolo.enable
set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
The squiggles around their ship are going away, but there's more appearing by their gun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们飞船周围的波纹消失了，但大炮周围却增加了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_0000ab42_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
Their shields are at full.
ESP.TRADUIT: 护盾充能完毕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_0000ab43_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
The enemies shields are down! Fire! Fire! Shoot 'em!
ESP.TRADUIT: 敌人的护盾减弱了！开火！开火！干掉它们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B004E40]DLC05BridgeLD) 0B004E40 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_0000ab44_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05BridgeLD.sayBlocker to 0
How's life in space?
ESP.TRADUIT: 太空生活怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pretty neat. I'm still exploring some of the rest of the ship using the vents. There's a bunch of places I never saw before.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，我用通风口探索。我还有很多地方没去过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05post_dlc05pqtlsallywh_0000ab4a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I saw a shooting star out the window!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在窗外看到流星！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05post_dlc05pqtlsallywh_0000ab4b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm okay. It's fun to just sit and look at the earth sometimes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很好。偶尔坐下来看看地球也很有趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05post_dlc05pqtlsallywh_0000ab4c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I told Mr. Elliott this really funny joke earlier, but he didn't get it. He's weird.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我之前告诉艾略特先生个非常好笑的笑话，但他却听不懂。真奇怪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05post_dlc05pqtlsallywh_0000ab4d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could use some more of these alien weapons. Got any?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以使用更多外星人的武器了。你有吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yep, sure thing!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，没问题！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05post_dlc05pqtlweapon_0000ab58_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem DLC05GiveItemsElliott 1 set DLC05Post.DLC05PQElliottSupplies to 1 set DLC05Post.DLC05PQElliottDay to GameDay
Here you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05post_dlc05pqtlweapon_0000ab59_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem DLC05GiveItemsElliott 1 set DLC05Post.DLC05PQElliottSupplies to 1 set DLC05Post.DLC05PQElliottDay to GameDay
Here's everything I've got.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是我得到的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05post_dlc05pqtlweapon_0000ab5a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem DLC05GiveItemsElliott 1 set DLC05Post.DLC05PQElliottSupplies to 1 set DLC05Post.DLC05PQElliottDay to GameDay
We don't have anything else stockpiled right now. Sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉我们现在没有其他储备了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05post_dlc05pqtlweapon_0000ab5b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry boss, not right now. Anything turns up, and I'll let you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，老板，现在没有。一有消息我就会让你知道的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05post_dlc05pqtlweapon_0000ab5c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, but we're still checking the rest of the ship as best we can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还没有，我还在尽力检查飞船其它地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05post_dlc05pqtlweapon_0000ab5d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything to report?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么要报告的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nope, I'll go back out and look for more stuff soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我要回去尽快找到更多的好东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05post_dlc05pqtlreport_0000ab5e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, sir! Nothing new!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，长官！没有新发现！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05post_dlc05pqtlreport_0000ab5f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nuh-uh. If I find anything else, I'll let you know!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯。如果我找到什么好东西，我会让你知道的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05post_dlc05pqtlreport_0000ab60_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, yeah! Here, you can have this stuff. I found it when I was looking around the rest of the ship.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，好的！这些东西给您。我在飞船四处张望时找到的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05post_dlc05pqtlreport_0000ab61_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem DLC05GiveitemsSally 1 set DLC05Post.DLC05PQSallySupplies to 1 set DLC05Post.DLC05PQSallyDay to GameDay
Yep, I was able to scrounge up some more stuff for you. Here you go, Captain!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是，我为你找到了一些材料，给你，舰长。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05post_dlc05pqtlreport_0000ab62_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem DLC05GiveitemsSally 1 set DLC05Post.DLC05PQSallySupplies to 1 set DLC05Post.DLC05PQSallyDay to GameDay
Sir, yes sir! I found some more supplies for you, sir!
ESP.TRADUIT: 长官，是的，长官！我为你找了些补给，长官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : giggling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05post_dlc05pqtlreport_0000ab63_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem DLC05GiveitemsSally 1 set DLC05Post.DLC05PQSallySupplies to 1 set DLC05Post.DLC05PQSallyDay to GameDay
DLC05MZ1SomahPostFight
Grab anything useful, and let's go. Who knows how long it'll be before they send more after us!
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿走那些有用的，我们走吧。它们马上就会派更多家伙来追杀我们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahpost_0000ab49_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: if ( DLC05PlayerContainerREF.DoOnce == 0 ) SetStage DLC05MZ1 30 else SetStage DLC05MZ1 35 endif
DLC05AnchorageCrateHolo01
To General Constantine Chase, Anchorage Command. Encoded message 457980-A. Decryption applied.
ESP.TRADUIT: 致康斯坦丁·蔡斯将军，安克雷奇指挥部。编码信息457980-A，已解密。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vin [0B009A09] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05anchoragec_0000ab6c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: These crates contain only a portion of the items you requested on 09/17/77. Due to the increase in demand, we were unable to fill the entire order.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这批货箱中只装有你在09/17/77所申请之物资的一部分。由于需求的增加，我们无法完成整个订单。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vin [0B009A09] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05anchoragec_0000ab6c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please distribute this equipment based on greatest need and we'll attempt to send the rest of your request as soon as possible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请基于优先需求分配装备，我们将尝试尽快满足您余下的需求。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vin [0B009A09] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05anchoragec_0000ab6c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enclosed you'll also find our new improved LAS-009 General's Overcoat. Hope it will serve as an appropriate upgrade.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会发现箱内附有我们新改进的 LAS-009型将官大衣。希望这次升级会是妥善的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vin [0B009A09] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05anchoragec_0000ab6c_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: General Victor Breckenridge, U.S. Army Quartermaster Command Forward Depot, Oregon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维克多·布雷肯里奇将军，美国陆军后勤司令部中转站，俄勒冈州。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vin [0B009A09] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05anchoragec_0000ab6c_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoops, sorry. Never mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呼，抱歉，别介意。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Onushi, naniyue sonoyo ni hanasu? Nanika shomo no mono demo arunoka?
ESP.TRADUIT: 阁下，为何如此说？难道说还有妖魔之类在吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toshiro Kago [0B0032FC] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesamurai\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2samuraisw_0000ab92_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know you can't understand me, but I thought you might want this sword.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你听不懂我说什么，但是我想你可能会想要这把剑。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, korekoso sessha no ken. Katajike nai.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，这正是在下的剑。万分感激。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toshiro Kago [0B0032FC] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesamurai\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2samuraisw_0000ab9d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sumanuga, sessha mizukara korekara okorukotoni sonaeneba naranu.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，在下必须独自应对今后所发生之事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toshiro Kago [0B0032FC] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesamurai\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2samuraisw_0000ab9d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.Removeitem DLC05WeapSamuraiSword 1 DLC05SamuraiRef.Additem DLC05WeapSamuraiSword 1 set DLC05Conversations.DLC05SwordFound to 2
I found this sword... Is it yours?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到这柄剑，是你的么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, sessha no ken! Kaeshite moraerutowa, katajike nai.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，在下的剑！承蒙寻回，万分感激。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toshiro Kago [0B0032FC] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesamurai\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2samuraisw_0000ab96_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sumanuga, sessha mizukara korekara okorukotoni sonaeneba naranu.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，在下必须独自应对今后所发生之事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toshiro Kago [0B0032FC] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesamurai\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2samuraisw_0000ab96_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.Removeitem DLC05WeapSamuraiSword 1 DLC05SamuraiRef.Additem DLC05WeapSamuraiSword 1 set DLC05Conversations.DLC05SwordFound to 2
Hey, you've been all over -- do you have any stuff hidden around here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，你已经把这转遍了—你有什么东西藏在这里吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure I do! I found a secret place they've never noticed. You want some of the stuff I have? Come on, I'll show you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然！我发现了一个它们从来没有注意到的秘密地点，你想要一些我有的材料？来吧，我带你去！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlsallyca_0000ab93_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05MZ2.MZ2SallyStash to 1 set DLC05FF01.SallyCrawlA to 1
What do you think the aliens want with us?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得那些外星人抓我们是为了什么呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doesn't matter. They're not getting it, whatever it is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系，它们什么也不会得到的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlalienin_0000ab97_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell if I know. I don't plan on starting a conversation to ask, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 鬼知道。你知道我不打算开始谈判。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlalienin_0000ab98_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Isn't it obvious? They're probably using us as guinea pigs, examining our anatomy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是很明显吗？它们一定把我们当小白鼠，研究我们的解剖学。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlalienin_0000ab99_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once they've figured out how to make exact copies of us, they'll send those copies back down to earth to take our places.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦它们能制造出我们的完美复制品，它们就会把那些复制品送回地球以取代我们的位置。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlalienin_0000ab99_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When they've copied enough of us, they'll turn on us and take over the world. Come on, how can you not see that coming?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当它们复制了足够多的人，就会控制我们的世界。拜托，你难道没发现吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlalienin_0000ab99_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe they're going to take over the whole planet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许它们将控制整个地球。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlalienin_0000ab9a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like, maybe they've been coming here for hundreds... no, thousands of years, waiting to hit us when we're not expecting it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们可能已经来这里成百上千年了。当我们没准备的时候突然攻击我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlalienin_0000ab9a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And then they wipe us out, and strip the planet of all its resources. I bet that's it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后它们把我们全部杀掉，掠走地球上所有的资源。我打赌就是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlalienin_0000ab9a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What if this is just some horrible misunderstanding? Like, what if some radio waves got beamed into space and made it all the way to their planet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这仅仅是一个可怕的误会？好吧，如果某些电台波段传进了太空，一直到达它们的星球。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlalienin_0000ab9b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only they didn't hear the nightly news or whatever, to them it sounded like a declaration of war. So they decided to attack us first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是它们没有听出来是晚间新闻什么的。对它们来说，这听起来像是宣战。所以，它们决定先来进攻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlalienin_0000ab9b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seriously, this whole thing could totally be our fault! Do you realize that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 说真的，这件事可能完全是我们的错！你意识到了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlalienin_0000ab9b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm... maybe, just maybe, they're responsible for life on earth. Like, they seeded the planet a really long time ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯…可能，仅仅可能。它们会为地球上的生命负责。好吧，它们在地球上播种已经很久了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlalienin_0000ab9c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And they've been coming back every once in a while to check on the progress... and now they've decided they don't like how it turned out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们每次回来都要看看进展…它们不喜欢这结果。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlalienin_0000ab9c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you imagine? They made us and now they're pissed at us!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能想象吗？它们制造了我们，现在却要抛弃我们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlalienin_0000ab9c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, forget I said anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，忘了我说的所有话吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2paulsonba_0000abbb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found this recording of you. Do you want to talk about your family?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我发现了这个关于你的记录。你愿意谈谈你的家人吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you... you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你…你知道了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2paulsonba_0000abc1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's not much more to say. Wasn't just me sucked up into this place... My wife and my boy, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么可说的了，不只是我被吸进了这…还有我的妻子和孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2paulsonba_0000abc1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can still hear 'em, crying out to me, begging me to save 'em. And there wasn't a damned thing I could do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我仍然能听到他哭着哀求我救救他们。我他妈的却无能为力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2paulsonba_0000abc1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They were... they were everything to me, you know? So now I've got nothing. Nothing at all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们是…他们是我的一切，你知道吗？但我现在什么都没有了，什么都没有了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2paulsonba_0000abc1_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set DLC05MZ2.MZ2PaulsonBG to 1
You can talk about what happened to you. It's okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以谈谈你身上发生了什么，没关系的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay? Lemme ask you something -- you ever listened to the two people you care most about in this world screaming in pain?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。我问问你—你是否听到在这世界上你最关心的两个人痛苦的尖叫声?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2paulsonba_0000abbd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Huh? You ever watched them screaming, looking to you to save them, only you can't do anything about it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么？你曾看着他们痛苦，想去帮助他们，但你却无能为力？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2paulsonba_0000abbd_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you had ANY idea what that feels like, you'd know damn well it's not okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你有那样的想法，那不是很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2paulsonba_0000abbd_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I lost my wife and my boy to these monsters, and they are going to suffer for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我失去妻子和孩子，落在了那些怪物手中，它们会付出代价的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2paulsonba_0000abbd_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05MZ2.MZ2PaulsonBG to 1
Oh, come on. You can tell me just about anything. I'll understand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，拜托，随便你告诉我什么都行，我会懂的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I appreciate that, miss. It's just that it's not easy to talk about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我很欣赏这一点，小姐。只是这不太容易说出口。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2paulsonba_0000abc2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I lost my wife and my boy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我…我失去了妻子和孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2paulsonba_0000abc2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One minute, we're riding back from town. Next, we're floating in the sky. Then we're here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 之前，我骑马回到镇子里，接着，我飘上了天，然后我就在这里了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2paulsonba_0000abc2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're screaming and crying, and I can't do a thing to help them. Haven't seen them since.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们又哭又叫，但我却帮不了他们。从此以后就没见过他们了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2paulsonba_0000abc2_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And now someone's going to pay for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在有人要为此付出代价。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paulson [0B0032FB] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquepaulson\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2paulsonba_0000abc2_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05MZ2.MZ2PaulsonBG to 1
DLC05MZ1SomahClawLine
Well, at least it wasn't coming for us...
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，至少它不是冲着我们来的……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahclaw_0000abbc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we're lucky, a friend of mine might show up to help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们幸运的话，我的一个朋友会帮忙的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uhh... okay... So, does that mean you're in?
ESP.TRADUIT: 喔…好吧…你要来真的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahfigh_0000abbf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05SomahHolo1
Oh, no way. NO WAY. This is a bad dream, right? I'm dreaming? Shit...
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，没门，没门！这是个噩梦，对吗？我在做梦？可恶…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : ALIEN EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05gener_dlc05somahholo1_0000abc0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what, I'm being held hostage now or something? I'm some kind of prisoner?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么了，我被绑架了还是怎么？我是囚犯吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : ALIEN EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05gener_dlc05somahholo1_0000abc0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen, if this is because of what we did... I just worked for those guys, okay? It's not like I enjoyed it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，如果这是因为我们做了什么…我只是为那些家伙办事。这不意味着我喜欢这么做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : ALIEN EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05gener_dlc05somahholo1_0000abc0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was just in it for the caps, all right? Can I go now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是为了瓶盖，我能走了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : ALIEN EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05gener_dlc05somahholo1_0000abc0_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05CaptiveHolo17
Hello, Mr. Alien. Yeah, I know... I'll talk into the thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好，外星人先生，好的，我知道…我会对着那东西讲话的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000abc4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know why you brought me back here. We've done this a whole bunch of.... Hey! Giddyup Buttercup! Wow!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道你们为什么会把我带回这里。我们之前都已经…嗨！小马巴特卡普！哇！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000abc4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I always wanted one of those!... Why do you have one?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直都想要一个！…为什么你们会有！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000abc4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't understand... What do you want? It's a toy. A TOY. Why are you so excited? You're weird.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不懂…你想要什么？那是一个玩具。一个玩具。为什么你们看起来那么兴奋？真奇怪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000abc4_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found this recording... Sounds like you regret something you did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我发现了这个记录……听起来你很后悔自己做过的事情？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, great.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，好极了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2somahback_0000abee_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, listen. Not that it's any of your damn business, but yeah. Before I got sucked up into crazy alien land here, I pulled some shady stuff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，听着。这和你那该死的生意无关。在我被那些疯狂的外星人吸到这以前，我捡到了一些可疑的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2somahback_0000abee_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Many of my associates may or may not have been slavers, and I may or may not have received payment for helping them in their trade.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的同伴可能是奴隶贩子，为了金钱我也可能为他们的贸易提供帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2somahback_0000abee_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay? Big secret exposed! Great job! Hope you're happy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了？秘密曝光！很棒的工作！希望你高兴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2somahback_0000abee_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set DLC05MZ2.MZ2SomahBG to 1
There must be a reason you don't want to talk about yourself. What is it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不愿意谈论你自己肯定是有原因的。到底是什么原因呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: A reason? Yeah, there's a reason. It's because I worked for slavers, okay? I worked for them, I helped them, and sometimes I liked it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 原因？是的，是有原因。我为奴隶贩子工作，对吧？我为他们工作，我帮助他们，我就喜欢这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2somahback_0000abed_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They needed someone who was good with machines, stripping tech, building shit. That's me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们需要擅长摆弄机器的人，精通技术，制造机器。那个人就是我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2somahback_0000abed_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I did the work. And look where it got me. Now can we stop talking about me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，那就是我做的，看看我得到了什么？现在能不能别再讨论我了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2somahback_0000abed_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05MZ2.MZ2SomahBG to 1
Forget I said anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 忘了我说的吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Already forgotten. Let's just get back to the whole "not getting killed by crazy space men" thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 早就忘了。让我们回到 “怎样才能不被疯狂的太空人杀掉” 的话题上吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2somahback_0000abea_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, it's okay. You can tell me anything. I won't judge you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，没关系。你想对我说什么都行，我不会以此来评价你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well listen, it's not like I even wanted to be there, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的听着，我不喜欢在那里，知道吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2somahback_0000abef_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm good with tech. These guys needed someone who knows her way around machines. They just happened to be slavers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的手艺不错，这些家伙需要有人摆弄那些机器。他们只是奴隶贩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2somahback_0000abef_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean come on, what was I supposed to do? They took care of me, and as long as I didn't think about where the caps came from, it was fun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说赶快，我该怎么做？他们照顾我只要我不去想这些瓶盖是哪来的，这真有趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2somahback_0000abef_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC05MZ2.MZ2SomahBG to 1
Where's Paulson?
ESP.TRADUIT: 保尔森在哪？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh. He left.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦。他走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05post_dlc05pqtlwherepa_0000abf5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He used the teleporter after you did. Said he didn't have any reason to stay... but I don't know where he was going to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他紧跟着你使用了传送装置。他说找不到理由留下来…但是我不知道他要去哪里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05post_dlc05pqtlwherepa_0000abf5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to miss him. He was quiet, but I think it's because he was really sad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会想念他的。他很安静，但我想是因为他非常伤心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05post_dlc05pqtlwherepa_0000abf5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He took off just after you did. Said there was no reason for him to hang around here, that he might as well go see what it was like down there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你走后他就走了，他说没什么理由留在这里了。他想去看看现在下面是个什么样子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05post_dlc05pqtlwherepa_0000abf6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wasn't about to tell him he couldn't go...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没告诉他不能去…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05post_dlc05pqtlwherepa_0000abf6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why can't I use the door to get off the bridge?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么我不能走这扇门离开舰桥呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, we were just in a really big space battle with a UFO... the ship is probably pretty damaged.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我们只是在非常大的空间和UFO战斗…飞船可能会严重损毁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05post_dlc05tlbridgedoo_0000abf2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But that's okay, we can just stay on the bridge. And I can try and explore through the vents to see if there's anywhere else to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那还好，我们可以待在舰桥上，我可以从通风口看看有没有别的地方可以走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05post_dlc05tlbridgedoo_0000abf2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I bet it's a safety mechanism, designed to seal off damaged areas of the ship. At least, that's what I'd do if I were designing a spaceship.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我确信这是一个安全机制，它会关闭受损的区域。至少，如果是我，我会这么设计宇宙飞船的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elliott Tercorien [0B00096B] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquetercorien\dlc05post_dlc05tlbridgedoo_0000abf3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Probably means the rest of the ship is so badly damaged that it decompressed. My guess is you don't WANT to open that door.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大概意思是这艘飞船严重损毁而变形了，我猜你不想打开那扇门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B00A752]DLC05Post) Post-Quest Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05post_dlc05tlbridgedoo_0000abf4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05CaptiveHolo20
Oh man, I've seen this on TV...
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，我在电视上见过这个…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Morrison Rand [0B009A0A] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric2\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000ac02_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...you're going to eat me, aren't you? I'm like some sort of delicacy on your planet, right? RIGHT?
ESP.TRADUIT: …你正准备吃掉我，对吧？我就像你们星球上的一道佳肴，没错吧？对不对？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Morrison Rand [0B009A0A] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric2\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000ac02_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well I hope you choke! I hope you stuff your stupid little green faces and choke to death!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你噎死！我希望你们这些绿脸的小白痴因为狼吞虎咽而面容扭曲到噎死！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Morrison Rand [0B009A0A] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric2\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000ac02_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...Unless this is like that other show where I get put in some sort of weird alien zoo... That might be okay...
ESP.TRADUIT: …要不这就好像我进到某种稀奇古怪的外星人动物园里的另类展览…那或许还不错…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Morrison Rand [0B009A0A] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric2\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000ac02_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05CaptiveHolo19
<Mooing>
ESP.TRADUIT: <牛叫声>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Andrew Endicott [0B009A08] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : ALIEN EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000ac01_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Mooing>
ESP.TRADUIT: <牛叫声>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Andrew Endicott [0B009A08] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : ALIEN EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000ac01_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05CaptiveHolo18
<sobbing>
ESP.TRADUIT: <哭泣声>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Andrew Endicott [0B009A08] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000ac00_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please.... just please, let me go...
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托…拜托了，让我走吧…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Andrew Endicott [0B009A08] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000ac00_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <mechanical sounds>
ESP.TRADUIT: <机器声>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Andrew Endicott [0B009A08] (mod) Quest : ([0B003419]DLC05Generic) Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcmalegeneric1\dlc05gener_dlc05captivehol_0000ac00_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: her
ESP.TRADUIT: 她的

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05SallyVentSay
Okay! That should do it! I'll be back out in a minute!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好！这样就行了！我一会就回来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars Comment (NAM2) : from inside wall vent EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz2_dlc05sallyventsay_0000acf9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why can't you do your vent trick and open the door to the decompression chamber?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么你就不能用你的发牢骚本事打开去减压舱的门？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey! If I could I would! Some of the vents are so small in there, even I can't crawl through them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿！假如我能的话那我会的！但那的通风口实在太小了，连我都没办法钻过去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlsallydo_0000acf8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, you'll just have to blow up those generators and get the door open yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，那只好由你亲自去毁掉那些发电机然后让这门打开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000803]DLC05MZ2) Among the Stars EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlsallydo_0000acf8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC05MZ1GeneratorConversation
Well, not really shut it off... More like blow it up. If you turn off the coolant, it'll get really hot and then explode, so be careful, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，不是真的关掉它…更像是弄坏它。如果你关闭了冷却剂，它就会因为过热然后爆炸，所以小心一点，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1generator_0000b40e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have to shut that off to open the door here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你必须关掉它才能打开这扇门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally [0B000969] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesally\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1generator_0000b40f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the hell is this thing? What are we supposed to do with it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这算什么破事？我们到底该做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Somah [0B00096A] (mod) Quest : ([0B000802]DLC05MZ1) Not of This World EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\zeta.esm\dlc05npcuniquesomah\dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1generator_0000b410_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not of This World
ESP.TRADUIT: 异界来客

Investigate the strange radio signal coming from the Wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 调查废土上的奇怪电台信号。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find a way out of the holding cell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想办法离开囚室。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Retrieve your equipment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找回你的装备。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Release Sally from her holding cell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把莎莉从她的囚室里救出来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Reach the engineering core of the ship.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抵达飞船的动力中心。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Free additional prisoners from their holding cells.
ESP.TRADUIT: (可选)从囚室中救出更多的囚犯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stage a fight with Somah to draw the guards' attention.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟索玛假装打一架，吸引守卫的注意力。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Defeat the alien guards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 消灭外星人守卫。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Continue to look for a way out of the Holding Cells.
ESP.TRADUIT: 继续寻找逃离囚室的出路。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Among the Stars
ESP.TRADUIT: 群星之间

ESP.TRADUIT: 解救被冷冻的囚犯。

ESP.TRADUIT: 摧毁机库中的发电机。

ESP.TRADUIT: 摧毁机器人装配车间中的发电机。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gain access to the upper level of the alien ship.
ESP.TRADUIT: 设法进入外星人飞船顶层。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak to Sally.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与莎莉交谈

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak to Sally.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与莎莉交谈

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find a way to activate the Access Teleporter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想办法启动入口传送装置。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Request help from the people you've revived.
ESP.TRADUIT: (可选) 向被你救出来的人寻求帮助。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough...
ESP.TRADUIT: 相逢在宇宙

ESP.TRADUIT: 进入外星飞船的舰桥。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Disable the Death Ray.
ESP.TRADUIT: 破坏死光发射器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Secure the bridge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 肃清舰桥。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Defeat the attacking alien ship.
ESP.TRADUIT: 消灭袭来的外星飞船。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to the Capital Wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回到首都废土。

ESP.TRADUIT: (可选) 启动外星飞船自毁程序。

ESP.TRADUIT: 启动动力中心的传送装置。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Defeat the Alien Captain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 消灭外星人船长。

ESP.TRADUIT: 机器人组装脚本/场景支援任务

;=============Choose marker to spawn and placeatme============== float randNum
set randNum to getRandomPercent
if DLC05HQ.numActive < DLC05HQ.maxActive && DLC05HQ.numEnemies < DLC05HQ.maxEnemies ;can't have more than 3 active at a time. Can't spawn more than 30. if randNum < 17 DLC05HangarSpawnPad01.activate DLC05HangarSpawnPad01 1 elseif randNum < 33 DLC05HangarSpawnPad02.activate DLC05HangarSpawnPad02 1 elseif randNum < 50 DLC05HangarSpawnPad03.activate DLC05HangarSpawnPad03 1 elseif randNum < 67 DLC05HangarSpawnPad04.activate DLC05HangarSpawnPad04 1 elseif randNum < 83 DLC05HangarSpawnPad05.activate DLC05HangarSpawnPad05 1 else DLC05HangarSpawnPad07.activate DLC05HangarSpawnPad07 1 endif endif
;showWarning "Enemy has spawned "
;=========Increase tracking Variables================ ;now done in DLC05TelepadActivatorHangarSCRIPT
;=========Set Spawn Timer and Difficulty====================== if getStageDone DLC05HQ 105 == 0 set DLC05HQ.spawntime to 3 + (DLC05HQ.numActive ) set DLC05HQ.spawnDiff to 0 elseif getStageDone DLC05HQ 107 == 0 set DLC05HQ.spawntime to 3 + (DLC05HQ.numActive / 2) set DLC05HQ.spawnDiff to 0 ;elseif getStageDone DLC05HQ 111 == 0 ; set DLC05HQ.spawntime to 3 + (DLC05HQ.numActive / 2) ; set DLC05HQ.spawnDiff to 1 else set DLC05HQ.spawntime to 3 + (DLC05HQ.numActive / 3) set DLC05HQ.spawnDiff to 1 endif
if getRandomPercent > 50 set DLC05HQ.spawnDiff to DLC05HQ.spawnDiff + 1 endif
set DLC05HQ.needToSpawn to 1

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest Stage : 10 Index : 0

ESP.ORIGINAL:
float healPercent float maxHealth float currentHealth float targetHealth float healthToRestore
float currentHead float currentTorso float currentLeftArm float currentRightArm float currentLeftLeg float currentRightLeg
float targetCondition
float HeadToRestore float TorsoToRestore float LeftArmToRestore float RightArmToRestore float LeftLegToRestore float RightLegToRestore
if DLC05AlienTechFunctions.overheal == 1 setstage Doctors 10 ;resets health showMessage DLC05HealingArchHealPlayerMessage;
else
set healPercent to .75 showmessage DLC05HealingArchHealPlayerPartialMessage
set maxHealth to player.getPermAV health set currentHealth to player.getActorValue health
set currentHead to player.getAV PerceptionCondition set currentTorso to player.getAV EnduranceCondition set currentLeftArm to player.getAV LeftAttackCondition set currentRightArm to player.getAV RightAttackCondition set currentLeftLeg to player.getAV LeftMobilityCondition set currentRightLeg to player.getAV RightMobilityCondition
set targetHealth to maxHealth * healPercent set healthToRestore to targetHealth - currentHealth
set targetCondition to 100 * healPercent
set HeadToRestore to targetCondition - currentHead set TorsoToRestore to targetCondition - currentTorso set LeftArmToRestore to targetCondition - currentLeftArm set RightArmToRestore to targetCondition - currentRightArm set LeftLegToRestore to targetCondition - currentLeftLeg set RightLegToRestore to targetCondition - currentRightLeg
if healthToRestore > 0 player.restoreActorValue health healthToRestore endif
if HeadToRestore > 0 player.restoreActorValue PerceptionCondition HeadToRestore endif
if TorsoToRestore > 0 player.restoreActorValue EnduranceCondition TorsoToRestore endif
if LeftArmToRestore > 0 player.restoreActorValue LeftAttackCondition LeftArmToRestore endif
if RightArmToRestore > 0 player.restoreActorValue RightAttackCondition RightArmToRestore endif
if LeftLegToRestore > 0 player.restoreActorValue LeftMobilityCondition LeftLegToRestore endif
if RightLegToRestore > 0 player.restoreActorValue RightMobilityCondition RightLegToRestore endif
endif
setstage Doctors 20 ;cures addictions setstage Doctors 30 ;cures rads imod DLC05healArchISFX ; image space for healing-------------------------------------------------------

OBSOLETE ---- ALIEN WEAPON REPAIR STATION FUNCTION
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest Stage : 100 Index : 0

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;First it checks players inventory and sets some variables ;Then it removes each alien weapon from the player's inventory ;Then it gives the player repaired versions ;Then it clears the variables
Check player inventory, set variables
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest Stage : 100 Index : 1

ESP.ORIGINAL:
;Count player's weapons set DLC05AlienTechFunctions.repairBaton to player.getItemCount DLC05WeapBaton set DLC05AlienTechFunctions.repairPistol to player.getItemCount DLC05WeapPistol set DLC05AlienTechFunctions.repairRifle to player.getItemCount DLC05WeapRifle set DLC05AlienTechFunctions.repairCannon to player.getItemCount DLC05WeapRobotCannon
;Determine if he has one equipped
if player.getEquipped DLC05WeapBaton == 1 set DLC05AlienTechFunctions.playerWeaponType to 1 elseif getEquipped DLC05WeapPistol == 1 set DLC05AlienTechFunctions.playerWeaponType to 2 elseif getEquipped DLC05WeapRifle == 1 set DLC05AlienTechFunctions.playerWeaponType to 3 elseif getEquipped DLC05WeapRobotCannon == 1 set DLC05AlienTechFunctions.playerWeaponType to 4 else set DLC05AlienTechFunctions.playerWeaponType to 0 endif
Remove all the player's alien weapons
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest Stage : 100 Index : 2

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeItem DLC05WeapBaton DLC05AlienTechFunctions.repairBaton player.removeItem DLC05WeapPistol DLC05AlienTechFunctions.repairPistol player.removeItem DLC05WeapRifle DLC05AlienTechFunctions.repairRifle player.removeItem DLC05WeapRobotCannon DLC05AlienTechFunctions.repairCannon
Add each repaired item to the player's inventory
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest Stage : 100 Index : 3

ESP.ORIGINAL:
if DLC05AlienTechFunctions.repairBaton >= 1 player.addItem DLC05WeapBaton DLC05AlienTechFunctions.repairBaton endif
if DLC05AlienTechFunctions.repairPistol >= 1 player.addItem DLC05WeapPistol DLC05AlienTechFunctions.repairPistol endif
if DLC05AlienTechFunctions.repairRifle >= 1 player.addItem DLC05WeapRifle DLC05AlienTechFunctions.repairRifle endif
if DLC05AlienTechFunctions.repairCannon >= 1 player.addItem DLC05WeapRobotCannon DLC05AlienTechFunctions.repairCannon endif
;equip one of the same type as the player had equipped when he activated the repair station if DLC05AlienTechFunctions.playerWeaponType == 1 player.equipItem DLC05WeapBaton
elseif DLC05AlienTechFunctions.playerWeaponType == 2 player.equipItem DLC05WeapPistol
elseif DLC05AlienTechFunctions.playerWeaponType == 3 player.equipItem DLC05WeapRifle
elseif DLC05AlienTechFunctions.playerWeaponType == 4 player.equipItem DLC05WeapRobotCannon
endif

ESP.ORIGINAL:
;=============Choose marker to spawn and placeatme============== float randNum
set randNum to getRandomPercent
;if DLC05HQ.numActive < DLC05HQ.maxActive && DLC05HQ.numEnemies < DLC05HQ.maxEnemies ;can't have more than 3 active at a time. Can't spawn more than 30. if randNum < 33 DLC05ExLabSpawnPad01.activate DLC05ExLabSpawnPad01 1 elseif randNum < 67 DLC05ExLabSpawnPad02.activate DLC05ExLabSpawnPad02 1 else DLC05ExLabSpawnPad03.activate DLC05ExLabSpawnPad03 1 endif ;endif
;showWarning "Enemy has spawned "
;=========Set Spawn Timer and Difficulty====================== if DLC05ExLab.TargetIndex < 5 set DLC05ExLab.spawntime to 5 - (DLC05ExLab.TargetIndex) ; delay from 5 to 1 seconds set DLC05ExLab.spawnDiff to 0 elseif DLC05ExLab.TargetIndex < 10 set DLC05ExLab.spawntime to 10 - (DLC05ExLab.TargetIndex) set DLC05ExLab.spawnDiff to 1 else set DLC05ExLab.spawntime to 15 - (DLC05ExLab.TargetIndex) set DLC05ExLab.spawnDiff to 2 endif
;if getRandomPercent > 50 ; set DLC05ExLab.spawnDiff to DLC05ExLab.spawnDiff + 1 ;endif
set DLC05ExLab.needToSpawn to 1
